name: Charming Room in the Center + Extra
summary: ***If the room is listed on Airbnb, it is available*** Experience true Berlin lifestyle by renting a room in this old style "Altbau" apartment with large bay windows, high ceilings and natural wooden floors. Stylishly decorated for the most comfortable stay. For cool extras, read bellow ;)
space: "Altbau" is a thought after construction style that is typical for Berlin and is distinguished by roomy spaces, high ceilings and large windows that let in lots of natural light. To experience true Berlin living, you must stay in the Altbau apartment, decorated in casually industrial style that is so representative of Berlin liberal lifestyle.

house_rules: •	Outside shoes should not be worn in the kitchen and bathroom. We walk barefoot there and for hygiene reasons we ask to keep the shoes in the corridor or in your room. •	If you have to be up early or come in late, please open the doors (main door, your room door, bathroom door) quietly and without slamming them. Sometimes we go to bed early and have to be up for work at 6 and sometimes we like to sleep in so quiet environment is beneficial for everyone. •	Please use shower time efficiently, especially in the mornings when everyone is trying to be out the door quickly. If 4 people take 15 minutes, then the last person will have to wait almost an hour to use the shower. Please be mindful of that. •	No illegal internet usage, such as Torrents, illegal movie downloads, illegal streaming. NOTE: German networks are monitored and we will be notified within 24 hours if illegal audio/video file sharing occurs. These are regulations across all of Germany •	No parties (without prior discussion w
host_about: I enjoy travel on a budget, meeting new people and discovering new experiences. I rarely stay at home and prefer the great outdoors. Love dining out.

name: Charming, cozy room in Kreuzberg
summary: Beautiful cozy room in the Hearth of Kreuzberg, in a calme street, with big windows and warmth ambient. Its located in a 4 room appartment, whith 2 toilets and one bathroom. Internet is of course available.
description: Beautiful cozy room in the Hearth of Kreuzberg, in a calme street, with big windows and warmth ambient. Its located in a 4 room appartment, whith 2 toilets and one bathroom. Internet is of course available.
host_about:
I think I could say I am free, open, easy, tolerant, dreamy, smily, authentic, analog, emphatic, confidence, caring. Enthusiastic, passionate. A bit fool. I am vegetarian, I make daily yoga and sport.  But i also love goings to bars and dancing. 

I couldnt live without music, drawing, books, cameras , sun, sea, friends, art , water & bananas. 

I love to travel for meeting myself in a different circumstances and making an exchange with the world and the people who one meet on the way. For learning. I am quite addicted to this exchange of new people and experiences.  I travel on my own city often, trying to watch it as if I was a tourist, as the first time again.  
I never had bad experiences traveling, and I believe is cause of the energy one projects . World is energy on movement and I enjoy going within it.
My best journey was walking alone "El camino de santiago"in Spain. India and Israel were also amazing-life-changing trips.  
I was "couchsourfer" for a long time when I was younger and I host over 100 people for free in Spain and Germany, that gave me a lot of life-teaching, a lot of respect , and unfortunately also a bit of suspicion.

name: stylish room in the heart of Kreuzberg
summary: Hi there! This beautiful apartment is located in the vibrant heart of Kreuzberg. It is well equipped with 1 double bedroom, and a spacious cozy kitchen. Close by, you can find many bars, restaurants and flea markets. It is just a 5 min walk away from Goerlitzer park and well connected to important public transportations.  This apartment offers an amazing space for couples, business travelers and families. Hope to hear from you soon! With best regards, Kami & Blusch

name: Modernes sonniges Maisonettes-Loft (Ab 4 Personen)
summary: Die helle, moderne Maisonette-Wohnung befindet sich im Stadtteil Prenzlauer Berg, nur wenige Schritte entfernt von der Tram M4 (fährt direkt zum Alexanderplatz und nach Mitte) und der S-Bahnstation Greifswalder Str. (S41, S42, S8 und S9 direkte Verbindung zum Flughafen Schönefeld). In direkter Umgebung sind Supermärkte und alles was man für den täglichen Bedarf benötigt. Das Apartment ist für Gruppen von 4-6 Personen geeignet.
space: Das große, zweigeschossige Appartement liegt im obersten Stockwerk des Hauses, hat eine verglaste Vorderfront und ist modern eingerichtet. Eine offene Galerie mit Wendeltreppe unterteilt den hohen Raum in zwei Ebenen.  Auf der unteren Ebene gibt es eine offene Küche, einen Essbereich, einen großzügig ausgestatteten Wohnbereich mit Sofaecke, die sich zum Bett zusammenschieben lässt, sowie ein Badezimmer mit Dusche und Wanne.  Insgesamt bietet die Galeriewohnung Schlafplätze für bis zu 6 Personen; auf der oberen Ebene steht ein bequemes Doppelbett, optional ist auch noch Platz für ein Zustellbett und das Sofa. Von der Wohnung aus lassen sich fußläufig Supermärkte, Spätshops, Cafés und Restaurants erreichen.

transit: Gleich vor der Haustür befindet sich die  Tram-Station Thomas-Mann-Straße (M4), welche einen innerhalb von 10 Minuten nach Berlin Mitte und Friedrichshain bringt. 5 Minuten Fußweg entfernt, befindet sich die Ringbahnstation Greifswalder Straße, von der aus man u.a. direkt zum Flughafen Schönefeld oder zum Ostbahnhof fahren kann.

host_about: My Name is Stefan and i am living in Berlin. I am 31 Years old and working as a creative director in advertising. I love to travel, good food and nice people.

name: Cosy Place in Prenzlberg
summary: Super Lage im ruhigen Prenzlberg, neu renovierter Altbau mit geschmackvoller Einrichtung. Großes Doppelbett im privaten Zimmer, warmes sauberes Badezimmer, gemütliche Wohnküche mit allem drum&dran. Toller Ausblick über die Altbauten, Alexanderplatz in 15min zu erreichen, Cafés und Restaurants direkt in der Nähe!
space: Das Zimmer hat ein großes Doppelbett, direkt am Fenster mit tollem Blick auf die schöne Nachbarschaft. Morgens strahlt einem die Sonne ins Gesicht und das Bett ist wirklich sehr weich.  Auf dem Sofa kann zur Not auch eine dritte Person schlafen.  Küche, Flur und Bad teile ich mit meiner ganz lieben kanadischen Mitbewohnerin, die meistens unterwegs ist. Das Bad und die Dusche haben wirklich alles was man braucht :) The room has got an amazing cosy King size Bed (1,60m) with a soft mattress, and a view over the nice old buildings in the neighbourhood.  At night its replay quiet, you have got a Tv that you can use with Wifi and an HDMI cable for your laptop connection :) The couch is amazing and can be a bed for a third person if you like. My flatmate is an easy going canadian girl who isn't home very much.  The kitchen has got everything you need and the shower is just amazing :)
description: Super Lage im ruhigen Prenzlberg, neu renovierter Altbau mit geschmackvoller Einrichtung. Großes Doppelbett im privaten Zimmer, warmes sauberes Badezimmer, gemütliche Wohnküche mit allem drum&dran. Toller Ausblick über die Altbauten, Alexanderplatz in 15min zu erreichen, Cafés und Restaurants direkt in der Nähe! Die Nachbarschaft ist ein Mischmasch aus den typischen Prenzlberg Menschen, viele Familien, kleine Kinder, und viele junge hippe Leute natürlich. Auf jeden Fall eine sehr sehr sichere Nachbarschaft, und sehr ruhig. Geht man einmal 5 min zu Bahnhaltestelle ist man schon mitten im Berliner  Trubel. The neighbourhood is super safe, there are lots of families , little kids riding bikes, and the hip young community of typical berlin people. The street is even though there are many restaurants, cafes bakerys and Spätis. It's still very quiet, and the Schönhauser Allee is a 5 min walk away.
neighborhood_overview: Die Nachbarschaft ist ein Mischmasch aus den typischen Prenzlberg Menschen, viele Familien, kleine Kinder, und viele junge hippe Leute natürlich. Auf jeden Fall eine sehr sehr sichere Nachbarschaft, und sehr ruhig. Geht man einmal 5 min zu Bahnhaltestelle ist man schon mitten im Berliner  Trubel. The street is even though there are many restaurants, cafes bakerys and Spätis. It's still very quiet, and the Schönhauser Allee is a 5 min walk away.
transit: Man kommt mit der S-Bahn, mit der U-Bahn und mit der Tram überall sehr schnell hin.  direkt 5 min zu Fuß entfernt, fahren Ring-Bahn nach Ost und West, die U2 zum Alexanderplatz bis nach Charlottenburg durch und die Straßenbahn durch den kompletten Prenzlberg Kiez. You will get everywhere by S-Bahn, Underground or Tram, everything is just a 5 min walk away. To Alexanderplatz its 15 min total.
interaction: Gerne steh ich für Ratschläge und Insidertipps in Berlin bereit :) Love to help you out with ideas for sightseeing :)
house_rules: Please use everything carefully as if it's your own home.
host_about:
Hallo ihr lieben, 
ich wohne jetzt seit über einem Jahr in Berlin und bin vorher auch 2,5 Jahre mit meinem Rucksack durch die Welt gereist und weiß daher ganz gut, dass es meistens schöner und günstiger ist in einem wirklichen Zu Hause zu nächtigen als in irgendeinem Hotel :)
Wenn ihr irgendwelche Fragen bezüglich Sightseeing habt, kann ich euch gerne ein paar Tipps geben :)
Freue mich,
Katha

name: Cosy Room located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg
summary: A nice and quiet room located in the heart of Berlin's most fashionable district Prenzlauer Berg/Kastanienallee. Although Kastanienallee is a very lively street with a lot of different restaurants (Vietnamese, Japanese, Egyptian, you name it) and stores, our flat is located in the rear and quiet part of the building. From here you have easy access to alexanderplatz (U2, 5min) Hackescher Markt (M1, 8min) Mauerpark (5min walk) and Oderberger Straße (right around the corner).

name: 1Room Beautiful Flat with Balcony
summary: Die 1-Zimmer Wohnung mit Balkon bietet mit ihrem Charme und ihrer trendigen Lage ein perfektes zu Hause.  Der Kudamm, die Gedächtniskirche, der Zoo oder das KaDeWe sind unmittelbare Nachbarn. Genießen Sie die voll ausgestattete Wohnung!
space: The apartment is located in the middle of the West-City of Berlin (Charlottenburg-Willmersdrof). Only 5 minutes walk to Berlin’s most famous trademark department store KaDeWe. If you would like to experience all the best parts of Berlin, this is the ideal place to base yourself to explore all the wonderful sites of Berlin.  The flat has been recently renovated and disposes of one big room with one double bed and a couch with sleep function, a fully equipped kitchen, a bathroom and a west-facing balcony where can enjoy the last sunrays of the day, relax and finish off your day. The flat is fully furnished and can host up till 4 people in 1 comfortable double size bed and a couch with sleeping function.  I will provide fresh bed linen and 2 towels for every guest. You have also access to a high-speed internet connection + WiFi (WLAN), a microwave, a toaster, a electric kettle, TV, and a hair drier and much more. neighborhood_overview: Der Stadtteil Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf ist einer der beliebtesten Stadtteile Berlins. Ob zum Shoppen, Sightseeing oder für einen Ausflug in die Natur hier sind Sie richtig!  Wer sich auch für die kulturelle Vielfalt interessiert, sollte die Museen und Sammlungen rund um das Schloss Charlottenburg nicht entgehen lassen.  Für die Natur begeisterten bietet der Grunewald als auch der Teufelssee eine Vielzahl an attraktiven Anschauungsmaterial.
transit: The apartment is centrally located. It takes only 2 minutes on foot to reach the next metro station. (U) Augsburgerstraße  (U) Spichernstraße (U) Bahn Wittenbergplatz S-Bahn Zoologischer Garten is only 2 metro stations away from the apartment.  A map of Berlin and a map of the public transport services is available.
house_rules: 1. The apartment is a Non-Smoking Apartment, therefore, smoking is not allowed.  2. Please do not disturb the neighbors.  3. Please do not use the internet connection to access illegal content.  4. Please note that you need to pay 20€  fee in cash, if you check-in after 8:00 p.m.
host_about:
I have been fortunate in my life to travel to many different places in the world. In those travels I had the privilege to be exposed to different cultures, different languages and different perspectives. 
On almost all my journeys I have met many wonderful people, made new friends all over the world and saw amazing places. 

I know how important it is to guide and help my guests if they need any assistance, which will hopefully lead to great experience as well as a long lasting positive memory during your stay.


Ich bin eine sehr kontaktfreudige Person, helfe Menschen gerne wo ich kann.
Habe ein sehr großes interessiert an verschiedenen Kulturen und bereise die Welt sobald sich eine Möglichkeit ergibt.  So konnte ich bereits Frankreich, Italien, Österreich, die Schweiz, die Türkei, Dänemark sowie Russland, China und Vietnam bereisen !

Jede Reise war ein Erlebnis für sich, ich habe neue Freunde gewonnen und viele schöne Orte entdeckt! Das Reisen ist für mich einer der beste Lebenserfahrungen, die ich persönlich sammeln kann. Alles ist einmalig und nichts wiederholt sich. Nach diesen Prinzipien werde ich versuchen den Aufenthalt meiner Gäste so gut wie möglich gestaltet. 

Auf der Liste meiner nächsten Reisen steht: England, Irland, Dänemark. Spanien und Japan.

notes: Let me know if you have any questions before making a booking. I'll be glad to help or prepare things to meet your requirements :-)
interaction: As often as needed of course
house_rules: * Not suitable for smokers, it's a non smokers flat.  * No shoes inside the flat, they must be left at the entrance. * No wet toes from the shower on the wooden floors or leaving water on any of the wooden surfaces: both tables and floors. * No parties in the flat!  * No noise after 22pm, as it is an old flat with thin walls ;) My neighbors are super nice, and I wish for it to stay that way :-> There are plenty of super nice and cheap places to go to around the corner, so there is no reason to have drinks at home. When you come back home, please be quiet in the stairs and inside the flat.  * Some things should be handled with care, as they are a little fragile. * The apartment is not suitable for babies between half and 3 years of age.
host_about:
Hello ! 

I've been living in this beautiful flat for six years, and work as a singer and actress. Love to travel and have flexible jobs, so my place is often available for guests. Very service minded and will provide tips for everything you can imagine. Be my guest and have a great stay in this beautiful city !

I would say that I am an easygoing, open and friendly host, and I will do my best to give you a pleasant stay. I believe there is good carma in my flat :D

My interests are: interesting conversing, all kinds of music, travelling, cultural activities and enjoying life. 

I would be able to communicate in the following languages: English, German, French and most of the Scandinavian languages.

Looking forward to hearing from you !

neighborhood_overview: The vibrant Friedrichshain offers a great variety of history with its east side gallery (Berlin wall), its plenty hip cafés, yummy restaurants of all kind and cool bars! Many of the worlds most famous clubs are located in Friedrichshain (e.g. Berghain = 5 min).  Its just another 10 min walk to Kreuzberg, another top berlin neighborhood. In a nutshell: the location is ideal! Its just very important that you leave the clubs and parties outside since there is a law that you need to be silent after 10pm. Thanks
transit: - S-(train) and U-(subway)-Bahnhof "Warschauer Straße" = 3min walk - U-Bahnhof "Frankfurter Tor" 3 min walk - Tram (Streetcar) / Bus just 2 min walk.  Its very easy to get around in berlin from here.

interaction: Questions? Just ask me, iam here to help :)

Heavily fined in germany -Check-in / Check-out times are 3pm and 12am, but usually iam flexible with the times! :) You are welcome to ask any questions!

Easy going based in berlin tech guy that spends most of his free time travelling. Fan of cubism art and photography!

Tom

name: Charming city-center apartment
summary: Beautiful, sunny room in a charming Altbau-apartment on a calm street right in the city center with a perfect view on the historical Zionskirche.
space: Your bright, spacious room is on the 4th floor of a charming 2-bedroom apartment of 77m2 in a typical renovated 19th century building overlooking the church and little park on Zionskirchplatz. The apartment is bright with big windows in every room and beautiful wooden floors. It is furnished with a mix of minimalist and mid-century style with a lot of books (German, English and French) and lovely details. The kitchen with a view on a chestnut tree in the yard and overlooking the roofs of Berlin is fully equipped with a fridge, a stove, a dishwascher and cooking utensils perfect for brunch and dinners at home. The bathroom is spacious with a tub and a washing machine. There's a lift in building. Towels, toiletries and detergents are available upon request.

neighborhood_overview: The space is calm, but once you turn into the next street, you're at bustling  Rosenthaler Platz and Torstraße, one of Berlin's most nicest districts with plenty of cafes, restaurants, bars and even galleries and individual shops and concept stores.
transit: Nearest stations: Zionskirchplatz, Tram M1, 12 is a 1-minute-walk away Rosenthaler Platz, Tram M1, M8, 12, subway U8 is a 5-minutes-walk away How to reach: Hauptbahnhof: direct connection to Hauptbahnhof with Tram 12 or M8 (ca. 15 minutes) Alexanderplatz: direct connection with subway U8 Friedrichstraße: direct connection with Tram M1, 12 Airport Schönefeld: direct train from Friedrichstraße (Schönefeld Express) Airport Tegel: direct bus from Alexanderplatz (TXL bus) Taxi distances: 25 minutes to Tegel Airport, 40 minutes to Schönefeld Airport, 5 minutes to Alexanderplatz, 10 minutes to Hauptbahnhof
interaction: I'm a style and culture journalist, so I can arrange exclusive visits to some private art spaces and provide you with all kinds of cultural and culinary insights. If I happen to be in town, I'm happy to take you to nice locations and arrange dinner or brunch. If not, you can contact me anytime via e-mail, messenger and phone for help and tipps.
house_rules: 1) Smoking is not allowed. 2) No illegal downloads. 3) Please don't be load between 10pm-6am.  4) Please leave the bathroom and the kitchen clean. 5) Please turn off the lights and the heater whenever you leave the apartment. 6) Please only switch the dishwasher on when it's full.  7) Visitors for lunch, coffee or dinner are allowed if agreed upon in advance, parties are not allowed. 8) Please be considerate to your host/flatmate and respect the apartment and the neighbors.
host_about: I'm a Berlin-based culture and style journalist. I love travelling, good food, and, of course, arts and culture.

neighborhood_overview: The Neighbourhood The apartment is centrally located and yet cozy and quiet at night. The street itself and the adjacent streets are home to very cool restaurants, high-end Berlin local labels for fashion, handcrafts, art and design objects. -A mere 5 minutes walk to Hackescher Markt/Hackesher Hofe, a buzzing spot full of restaurants, bars and shops. It also has weekend market for food, clothing and other interestings objects. -8 minutes walk towards Alexanderplatz to see the Rotes Rathaus, Berlin TV tower and other nearby landmarks of Berlin like Berliner Dom, River Spree, Museum Island, Nikolaiviertel and other historical spots. Weekend Art Market at Museum Island is worth visiting as well.  -5 Minutes walk towards Auguststrasse which is a street full of awesome boutique galleries.  -3 Minutes to Torstrasse which is home to fabulous quirky bars, restaurants and shops.  -Next to Mulackstrasse which is a known street for Berlin fashion labels. -Surrounded by rooftop bars and cool clubs
notes: 1) I will request for a copy of your ID upon arrival. 2) Kindly take great care not to lose the keys. Charge for missing keys is €150. 3) In case you have any downloading client/bittorent client installed in your laptops, please turn them off before you connect to the internet at home.

summary: Zu Fuß zum Nolli  . Sehr gut um Gay und  Lesbenbars und die dazugehörigen Veranstaltungen  zu erleben. name: Family-sized Altbau in Prenzlauerberg
summary: A charming altbau or old-style apartment, this apartment is ideal for relocation to Berlin as it's well connected to Alexanderplatz, (2 stops on the M4 tram), but is in the heart of the cafe and boutique neighborhood of Prenzlauerberg. With the Maerchenbrunnen (Renaissance fountain) just around the corner within lush Frederichshain volkspark, it's in a convenient and ideal setting.
space: We have a formal bedroom that faces the courtyard and two twin beds are setup in the dining room area, to accommodate up to 4 guests.
description: A charming altbau or old-style apartment, this apartment is ideal for relocation to Berlin as it's well connected to Alexanderplatz, (2 stops on the M4 tram), but is in the heart of the cafe and boutique neighborhood of Prenzlauerberg. With the Maerchenbrunnen (Renaissance fountain) just around the corner within lush Frederichshain volkspark, it's in a convenient and ideal setting. We have a formal bedroom that faces the courtyard and two twin beds are setup in the dining room area, to accommodate up to 4 guests. Volkspark Frederichshain, one of Berlin's most beautiful parks is just around the corner. Lots of walking paths, playgrounds for the kids and fountains. We will arrange for a key pickup or for our housekeeper to meet you in the apartment. If there are any issues, you can always call or text us with questions. Prenzlauerberg boasts loads of green spaces, corner bars, pre-war and art nouveau facades, ethnic food and one of the nicest and most lively parks in all of Berlin. Locat
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauerberg boasts loads of green spaces, corner bars, pre-war and art nouveau facades, ethnic food and one of the nicest and most lively parks in all of Berlin.
notes: With sharp corners, and glasswear, our apartment isn't childproofed and is best suited for families with children ages 7+.
transit: Located directly outside the M4 tram stop, it's a short ride (2 stops to Alexanderplatz) and 5 stops to the sbahn at Greifswalderstrasse.
access: Volkspark Frederichshain, one of Berlin's most beautiful parks is just around the corner. Lots of walking paths, playgrounds for the kids and fountains.
interaction: We will arrange for a key pickup or for our housekeeper to meet you in the apartment. If there are any issues, you can always call or text us with questions.
house_rules: Absolutely no smoking inside the apartment. Please remove your shoes upon entering and please speak quietly in the building staircase so as to not disturb the neighbors. Thank you :)
host_about: We're a couple in our late 20s. Enjoying all that Berlin has to offer, and looking forward to hosting on Airbnb and showing off this modern, vibrant city.

name: Cosy room in Berlin.
summary: Die Unterkunft ist für 1-2 Personen gedacht. Ein Schafzimmer mit einem Hochbett und Couch (Schlafplatz der 3. Person),  Küche und Badezimmer stehen zu Verfügung.  For english, see below.
space: Das Zimmer ist gemütlich eingerichtet mit Platz zum entspannen und einen Schreibtisch für die Arbeit.  Die Lage der Wohnung ist sehr ruhig, aber es gibt mehrere Busverbindungen und S Bahnstation ist auch in der nähe. Es gibt viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und ein Park, nur ein paar Meter entfernt, zum spazieren.  Im Haushalt wohnen noch 2 Katzen und ich.  I rent a room in my apartment. The bedroom has furnitures and it is really cosy. There is one loft bed for 1 or 2 Persons (couple or friends),a couch (place for the 3. Person to sleep), a table and tv. Also u can use the kitchen and the bathroom of course. There are a lot of busses and an s-bahn station nearby. Also, there is a wonderful park where u can go for a walk.  In the apartment will be living: me and my two cats.

name: Sunny & spacious 2-Room-Apartement!
summary: I live in a cozy and very quiet old apartment in the heart of Neukölln, next to the Kanal and not far from Treptower Park.
space: I´m renting my cozy and quiet Apartment in the heart of the multicultural Neukölln Area. The 60 squaremeters big apartment is yours during your stay, not a shared space! It´s a typical renovated old building, wooden floor, high ceilings and old, charming windows. The flat consists of a big livingroom which leeds to the smaller sleeping room, both facing the backyard, so its very quite all the time. In the living room you find a nice sofa with a small table to chill or to watch a movie on the projector. In the kitchen you will find, besides dishwasher and washing machine ( both you can, of course, use ) everything you need for breakfast, lunch or cooking a nice dinner. The table in the kitchen seats four people comfortably. Bathroom is typical for Berlin, pretty small and one little window, but has a bathtub (and of course a toilette and a sink) to relax after a long day in town. There´s free wifi for you to use In case you are more then two people, I can provide you with an extra, huge

transit: From Schönefeld Airport take the Busline 171 till "Werrastraße" and walk 50 meters to my place. From Tegel Airport take the TXL-Bus till "Beusselstraße", then switch to the S-Bahn (running clockwise) till "Sonnenallee", from there take Bus M41 till "Hertzbrgplatz" and walk 7min or take the Bus 171 till Werrastraße and walk 1min
access: You have the whole flat for yourself. I live in the back-house (just walk straight thorugh the backyard) on 3rd floor. It says "Konrad" on my doorbell
interaction: Ihr könnt mich jeder Zeit telefonisch oder via sms erreichen, ich rufe in der Regel innerhalb von 20 Minuten zurück
house_rules: During the week please no loud music after 8pm and after 10pm nighttime peace :) No additional visitors and therefore no partys please Because of the wooden floor, please take off your shoes inside the flat.
host_about: Productdesign student during the day, and a freelance fotographer at night....

name: Sunny dream apartment in the heart of Westberlin
summary: Make yourself comfortable in this spacious and airy apartment in old Westberlin. The apartment has about 70sqm and offers everything you might need: Central location, fully equipped kitchen, superfast WIFI.  Perfect for two people or three, if one person would like to sleep on the couch in the living room.
space: The apartment has a big living room with an open plan kitchen and a nice balcony.  All rooms open to the south and towards the backyard, making the whole apartment very sunny and also very quite despite the central location.  The kitchen is fully equipped and you will have more than enough room in the bedroom to fill just at home.  If the weather should not play along (as so often in Berlin) you can relax at home with my books or in front of the big TV.

The apartment is in beautiful Charlottenburg, almost opposite the R
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in beautiful Charlottenburg, almost opposite the Rathaus. Right across the street is a grocery store and a lot of restaurants and fast food places are scattered around the area. You can take the bus right in front of the apartment to reach the Kurfürstendamm within 10 minutes or walk to Wilmersdorfer Straße for a smaller shopping spree.
transit: M45 stop is right in front of the door. U7 and U2 are each only a few minutes away.
interaction: I won't be there, but you will always have a contact person, who will be able to help you in case of any issues. Also I will  be available via messaging all the time.
house_rules: Please be respectful with my home and please water the plants.  This is an apartment in a normal neighbourhood, so no partys or loud music after 10 pm, as my neighbours have to work during the week. Only smoking on the balcony!

name: VISITCITY24 - Richard Wagner
summary: Nice 2-room apartment with bathroom and fully equipped kitchen in the central part of West Berlin – close to Castle Charlottenburg, Messe Berlin and ICC. Private parking, fast wi-fi, 4 double sofas. 20 meters from subway station Richard Wagner Platz.
space: This is completely independent apartment – so you will be only guest inside! We can accommodate up to 6 persons.  There are 2 double sofas and 2 single sofa to sleep. Our apartment consists of: - living room – 22 sqm, - bedroom – 7sqm, - fully equipped kitchen – 6 sqm, - bathroom with bath tube – 4 sqm, - corridor with wardrobe – 3 sqm, - balcony – 4 sqm.
description: Nice 2-room apartment with bathroom and fully equipped kitchen in the central part of West Berlin – close to Castle Charlottenburg, Messe Berlin and ICC. Private parking, fast wi-fi, 4 double sofas. 20 meters from subway station Richard Wagner Platz. This is completely independent apartment – so you will be only guest inside! We can accommodate up to 6 persons.  There are 2 double sofas and 2 single sofa to sleep. Our apartment consists of: - living room – 22 sqm, - bedroom – 7sqm, - fully equipped kitchen – 6 sqm, - bathroom with bath tube – 4 sqm, - corridor with wardrobe – 3 sqm, - balcony – 4 sqm. Inside our apartment there are following facilities / appliances: -32’ LED TV (cable TV, approx. 40 channels), -DVD, -Table with 4 chairs and coffee table, -Wardrobe, -Fridge, -Stove, -Oven, -Iron, -Hair dryer, -Kettle, -Simple coffee machine, Bed-linen and towel included. You will meet me or my friend during your check-in. We do not live in the apartment – but if you will have some reque
neighborhood_overview: My apartment is located next to Rathaus (Townhall) Charlottenburg and close to famous Schloss (Castle) Charlottenburg which is main attraction of the district.  You have also good connection with Berlin Zoologischer Garten, Berlin Fair (Messe Berlin) and ICC – International Congress Centre. Just opposite the building there is very nice playground for children. Very nice shopping street Wilmersdorfer Strasse begins just 100 meters from the building – you can enjoy big shopping centre Wilmersdorfer Arcaden and a lot of shops and restaurants over there. There are 3 supermarkets within 100 meters - EDEKA, Kaisers and REWE. You have 2 restaurants and cafes just downstairs and a lot of restaurants nearby.
notes: Due to new legal regulations in Berlin we accept only reservations for min. 60 days and longer.
transit: The nearest public transportation is: U-Bahn (subway) – station Richard Wagner Platz (U7 line) – JUST 20 METERS!!! Bus – line M45 to Zoologischer Garten – just downstairs! During your stay you can use our safe, private parking place (5 EUR/day). The apartment is just 600 meters away from exit form internal highway A100 (Stadtring) – exit number 6 Spandauer Damm. Connection from Tegel Airport – bus + subway to station Richard Wagner Platz (15 min). Connection from Schonefeld Airport – city train (S-Bahn) and subway to station Richard Wagner Platz (50 min). Connection from railway station Berlin HBF - S-Bahn and subway to station Richard Wagner Platz (20 min). Connection from bus station Berlin ZOB - subway to station Richard Wagner Platz (10 min) or 20 min. walk.
access: Inside our apartment there are following facilities / appliances: -32’ LED TV (cable TV, approx. 40 channels), -DVD, -Table with 4 chairs and coffee table, -Wardrobe, -Fridge, -Stove, -Oven, -Iron, -Hair dryer, -Kettle, -Simple coffee machine, Bed-linen and towel included.
interaction: You will meet me or my friend during your check-in. We do not live in the apartment – but if you will have some requests we can come to the apartment or deliver something you need.
house_rules: No smoking please. Check-in after 20:00 and on Sunday / holiday costs 20 EUR.  Please inform us about your estimated check-in time 7 days before arrival. Check-in directly at the apartment - on the day of check-in please just call/text us 30 minutes before check-in to confirm your arrival or in case of any delay. If you will be late more than 1 hour and you do not inform us about it we can add 10 EUR for each hour of waiting for you.  You can use our private parking place - 10 EUR per night and Internet hi-speed wi-fi for 3 EUR/day. CityTax 5%.
host_about:
Welcome in my apartment,
I am very glad that you will be my guests. I can give you some tips about Berlin and some interesting places in this fantastic city.

Herzlich willkommen in meinem Apartment
Ich würde mich freuen, wenn ihr Euch für meine Wohnung entscheidet und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite.


Serdecznie witam w moim apartamencie,
Cieszę się że będziecie Państwo naszymi gośćmi - z przyjemnością podzielę się z Wami informacjami o ciekawych miejscach w Berlinie.

name: Sunny apt w balcony - longterm
summary: Its a very sweet, cozy and quiet 2 room apartment with a balcony. Its between three big parks, the Kreuzbergpark, Gleisdreieckpark and the Tempelhofer Flugfeld. There is a nice bar at the end of the street and plenty of restaurants and coffeeshops.
space: The apartment is fully equipped. I renovated it a couple of months ago. There is a bedroom and a living room. The table in the living room an be extended so that its also very comfortable for dinner with friends or alike. The living room has a sofabed, so there is one double bed and another person or two could sleep on the sofabed. The balcony is attached to the kitchen and it has wonderful plants and herbs that want to be included into your cooking plans ;) Its a lovely place in a nice house with great neighbours. Its perfect for living and working there.

Many families live here, its quiet with
neighborhood_overview: Its an old neighborhood. Many families live here, its quiet with full of parks at the one side and then on the other side its close to bars and oll the many attractions berlin has to offer. I highly recommend to rent a bike here. Then it really is the perfect point of departure.
transit: There is a busstation that is closest. Other than that there are two ubahn station: yorckstr and platz der Luftbrücke. But most of all its really nice to walk around. You can walk to Potsdamer Platz while walking through the park and you can walk into Kreuzberg also walking though parks and the Schönenergneighbourhoods are also in walking distance.
interaction: I am always happy to help and be in touch with my guests. So dont hesitate to contact me about anything thats on your mind.
house_rules: Its a strict nonsmoking apartment. You can smoke o n the balcony of course. There are some families with little kids in the house so keep the music down in the evening.
host_about:
I am a Berliner - born and raised. I am currently doing my Masters degree and can therefore not reside in my wonderful apartment.
I really like my apartment and my neighbourhood and I am happy to share it with nice people.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Körtestraße in the heart of the very popular and charming Graefekiez, Kreuzberg. The area is a beautifull, central yet unstressful neighbourhood with everything you need in walking distance: restaurants, bars, bakeries, small shops of all kinds, parks, the Landwehrcanal, the turkish market, Kreuzkölln, playgrounds, cinemas, clubs, galeries... The well known "Turkish Market" (Tuesdays and Fridays) at Maybach-Ufer is only a few minutes' walk away.
transit: The subway station Südstenrn (U7) is just around the corner, driving to Hauptbahnhof and Potsdamer Platz, AlexanderPlatz. The Bus is about 200 meter away and the subway station  Kottbusser Tor (U1) and Schönlein (U8) about 7 min. walk.
access: It´s not allowed to download movies (films, musik) from (URL HIDDEN) Germany there are very strict rules!!!  -Now: from januar 2014 * 5% City Tax for tourists is payable upon arrival. (Not included in price - applies only to overnight cost).
interaction: you are welcome in our apartment  in Berlin! There are only some little rules that we ask to respect to our guests: Please don´t smoke  and no parties in the apartment. please leave the apartment like you found it. - Bed linen  are provided,  bath towels on request  - INTERNET: WIFI ( € 2 per day or 20€ per month). Only for long term rental (min. 2 months): Extra costs: 20€/month for internet and final cleaning 50€ (one off).
house_rules: All the facilities are included ( cleaning , towels , bed linen , heating , WIFI) .
host_about: We would like to welcome you at our apartment. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Lovely Room near Nollendorfplatz
summary: Very nice accomodation, bright and quiet, situated in the trendy Nollendorfkiez with a lot of bars, restaurants and cafés. Wood flooring and very high ceilings with beautiful stucco/mouldings. Perfect location to explore the city!
space: Lovely, fully furbished room in a bright and quiet flat, with fully equipped kitchen (incl. dish washer), bathroom (with bath tub and washing machine) and a large dining/living room. Wood flooring throughout the whole apartment and very high ceilings with tasteful stucco/mouldings.

Lovely, fully furbished room in a bright and quiet flat, with fully equipped kitchen (incl. dish washer), bathroom (with bath tub and washing machine) and a large dining/living room. Wood flooring throughout the whole apartment and very high ceilings with tasteful stucco/mouldings. Located in the trendy Nollendorfkiez, the flat is only a few hundred metres away from the bars and restaurants of that area, while offering a quiet place to sleep. By foot, the Nollendorfplatz subway station is just three minutes away (subway lines U12, U2, U3 and U4; and several bus lines). It's also a very convenient location to explore the city by bike.

name: Lovely studio apartment in the Heart of Wedding
summary: A stylish studio apartment, re-designed by an architect with the tenant in mind, to reflect the emerging, creative, and alternative neighborhood in the heart of hip Wedding, conveniently located near Leopoldplatz. Everything you need in 36 m2.
space: The newly renovated designer Altbau apartment showcases the best of new and old as it retains the characteristic, charm and proportion of an Altbau flat with updated elements where needed.  It was transformed into a light, airy and calm space through careful manipulation of surfaces and natural light. Through the retention of original wooden flooring and by exposing the brick structural inner walls of the building the architectural integrity of the building is highlighted and re-interpreted using contemporary white washed finishes to create a unique contemporary lofty character for such a compact space.  It is located on the second floor. What is seemingly sparsely furnished is secretly packed full of the hidden design solutions required for modern living, hidden storage solutions and multi-functional furniture elements ensure the occupant is more than well equipped for day to day life. As the apartment is suited for one person or a couple giving spatial privacy and intimacy which are

neighborhood_overview: Located in a typical Berliner Altbau in Sprengelkiez, which offers several great cafe's, restaurants and bars. Triftstrasse offers a quiet reprieve from the nearby bustling Leopoldplatz with its weekly markets.
notes: We are located in Entrance 3 , you will walk through the courtyard and see entrance 3 on your left.
transit: We are located next to several Metro station and a fast train station ( S Bahn / S41 or S 42 to station : Wedding ) or to  Station Leopoldplatz: with the U6 and U 9 lines.
access: Easily accessed on second floor in the inner section of the building complex.
interaction: We will always be available for advice and tips, dont be shy to call or text us.
house_rules: No smoking and  sadly pets are allowed, so our neighbors won´t be bothered, we are sorry for that. . No parties or loud events, just keep it moderate to the basic rules :)

name: Bright, one-bedroom apartment in vibrant Wedding
summary: Bright, one-bedroom apartment in Wedding:One of the most multicultural and vibrant parts of Berlin. The apartment has a bright living room/bedroom, with a comfortable double bed (1,40m), a cozy dining area and a wide desk, a kitchen and a bath. You'll find restaurants and bars right around the corner.  Public transportation is within a 9min walking distance(U6/U9/Ringbahn) and it will take you right to Mitte (7min),Kreuzberg (14 min),Tegel Airport (20min) or any other place you want to explore.

name: Zimmer in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Mitten im Prenzlauer Berg zwischen Kollwitzplatz und Volkspark Friedrichshain. Helles, grosses Zimmer für 2 Personen in einer 3 Zimmer-Wohnung. Gemeinsame Küche und Bad. Gute Verkehrsanbindung, Supermärkte, Apotheke, viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.
description: Mitten im Prenzlauer Berg zwischen Kollwitzplatz und Volkspark Friedrichshain. Helles, grosses Zimmer für 2 Personen in einer 3 Zimmer-Wohnung. Gemeinsame Küche und Bad. Gute Verkehrsanbindung, Supermärkte, Apotheke, viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.
house_rules: HAUSORDNUNG 1.  Wir teilen uns eine Wohnung mit Gästen aus der ganzen Welt und haben auch Nachbarn. Jeder hat eigene Interessen. Bitte respektiert das durch Rücksichtnahme. Bitte Morgens bis 9.00 und ab 22.00 Uhr nicht laut sein (Musik etc.) um allen einen komfortablen Aufenthalt zu ermöglichen. 2. Bitte das Badezimmer nicht mit Strassenschuhen betreten. 3. Bitte die Waschmaschine nur bis 18 Uhr benutzen (wir haben auch Nachbarn). Bitte eigenes Waschmittel benutzen. 4. Wenn du in der Küche bist bitte die Tür geschlossen halten. Bitte die Tür vom Kühl- und Gefrierschrank schliessen und IMMER darauf achten, das der Backofen ausgeschaltet und die Flammen vom Herd nach Benutzung aus sind. 5. Bitte nach dem kochen oder essen benutzte Sachen abwaschen, abtrocknen und gleich zurück in den Schrank, damit alle Gäste etwas davon haben. 6. Du bist auf Kaffee eingeladen. Es sind immer ausreichend Pads da. Bitte achte darauf, dass du sonst deine eigenen Lebensmittel und nicht die, der anderen Gäste

name: Boutique Hotel - Villa Rotdorn
summary: Unser Boutique-Hotel mit 20 Doppelzimmern bietet eine charmante, persönliche Unterkunft für alle, die eine Mischung aus Großstadtabenteuer und ländlicher Idylle suchen. Das Hotel residiert in einer 20er-Jahre-Villa im Bezirk Charlottenburg Westen
space: Der angegeben Übernachtungspreis gilt pro Doppelzimmer.
description: Unser Boutique-Hotel mit 20 Doppelzimmern bietet eine charmante, persönliche Unterkunft für alle, die eine Mischung aus Großstadtabenteuer und ländlicher Idylle suchen. Das Hotel residiert in einer 20er-Jahre-Villa im Bezirk Charlottenburg Westen Der angegeben Übernachtungspreis gilt pro Doppelzimmer. Neben einer kleinen Gästeküche in der Sie sich selbst heiße Getränke und Mahlzeiten zubereiten können, bieten wir auch kostenfreien Internetzugang per WLAN und gebührenfreie Parkmöglichkeiten auf der Straße rund um das Haus an. Nach Ihrer Sightseeing-Tour durch Berlin finden Sie Entspannung in unserem Hotelgarten. Der nahe gelegene Grunewald und der große Hotelgarten lässt beinahe vergessen, dass die Innenstadt nur wenige Minuten entfernt ist.  In unmittelbarer Umgebung befinden sich die Messe Berlin, der City Cube, die Waldbühne und das Olympiastadion. Zentrale Lage am Grunewald, Messegelände, Kongresszentrum (ICC), Waldbühne, Olympiastadion, Funkturm in unmittelbarer Umgebung, 10-15 min
neighborhood_overview: Der nahe gelegene Grunewald und der große Hotelgarten lässt beinahe vergessen, dass die Innenstadt nur wenige Minuten entfernt ist.  In unmittelbarer Umgebung befinden sich die Messe Berlin, der City Cube, die Waldbühne und das Olympiastadion.
notes: In unserem idyllischen und sonnendurchfluteten Frühstücksraum bereiten wir Ihnen jeden Morgen unser Frühstücksbüffet.
transit: Zentrale Lage am Grunewald, Messegelände, Kongresszentrum (ICC), Waldbühne, Olympiastadion, Funkturm in unmittelbarer Umgebung, 10-15 min zu Kurfürstendamm, Bahnhof-Zoo. S-Bahnhof (Heerstraße) und Bushaltestelle vor der Tür.

name: Nice Room central Kreuzberg Berlin
summary: The flat is located in the most charming part of Berlin (Kreuzkoln) , 30 second walking far from the canal ,full of bars , galeries, cultures etc ... If you want to meet people , living a authentic Kreuzberg experience , this room is made for you !
description: The flat is located in the most charming part of Berlin (Kreuzkoln) , 30 second walking far from the canal ,full of bars , galeries, cultures etc ... If you want to meet people , living a authentic Kreuzberg experience , this room is made for you ! The room is comfortable and tiny , with everything that you need to take a break when you need it .There is a wood mezzanine that gives a super charming and cozy atmosphere . The flatshare is composed by another room (1 people) , a kitchen , a bathroom , and a large living room . During the daytime my best friend Jean and I are opening our vintage bike shop that comunicate with our kitchen , but the room is totaly independent and it s every time a pleasure to help our guests to find what they are surching in the town ! We are two young guys here and you will never disturb us with any questions. It will be a pleasure to help you enjoying your hollidays as much as we can ! And i can say that we can be good Berlin guides ! Kreuzberg is the most
neighborhood_overview: Kreuzberg is the most fascinating district of Berlin , espcialy where the flat is because it s next to the canal . It s the most charming district of Berlin , because of everything : best bars , best restaurant , nice architecture , green spaces , full of different nationalities etc .... Definitly Kreuzberg is unique !
notes: Bike rental : As guest you can rent a bike with discount 6 Eur/Day instead of 12 Eur
transit: 2 minutes far from "Kottbusser tor" a big station with U12 ,U8 ,U7 . You can easely going everywhere from kottbusser .

house_rules: INTERNAL RULES    Welcome in our Wohnung in Kreuzberg and we wish you a nice trip in our lovely city. You chose us to share a part of your experience in Berlin and in order to make this experience a great experience we ask you to respect the rules of the Wohnung Rules -No outside guest is allow to come inside the Wohnung -There is no fees ask for the cleaning so we ask you to respect the cleanliness of the room and the common part. That mean you must let the bathroom and the kitchen in order after each using and to let the room completly cleaned before the check out (bed shit off ready to clean) -Do not let something in the fridge before leaving -It is stricly not allowed to smoke in the room (it is tolerate to smoke in the living room at the window but go outside when it is possible for you) -In order to respect the neighbourhood we ask you to don’t make loud noise after 22h -Please do not use the Shop door to leave the room, use the main door of the Wohnung and close the door with 2x
host_about:
My name is Arthur Hoffmann , i am 24 living in Berlin , i love to travel and  I can do it in my town because Berlin is definitly  multicultural , every day happends differents super stories here !
I love all forms of art , and it is a second thing that i really enjoy in Berlin , that art take a important place in the town !
Love !

name: Your Spacious Kreuzberg Home
summary: Our amazing apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg has already hosted many people in it´s lifetime, and it enjoys to do so ! Friends and family have been visiting, children and turtles, confetti and ice cream. And now it´s open for you, so come around and bring some friends if you like. It will be a real treat! Our spacious home offers you great speakers, a work desk, a hammock is waiting for you, a fully equipped kitchen, a bath tub and nice venues, galleries and restaurants just next door.

name: Cute Room in Apartment in Berlin!
summary: Lovely place, great roommates and great location in Friedrichshain/ Lichtenberg. The room has its own fridge and desk.
space: The best part about this place are the roommates! There are three others who are in their mid-late twenties. All German and all very relaxed, respectful and happy to help or give travel suggestions.
description: Lovely place, great roommates and great location in Friedrichshain/ Lichtenberg. The room has its own fridge and desk. The best part about this place are the roommates! There are three others who are in their mid-late twenties. All German and all very relaxed, respectful and happy to help or give travel suggestions. You have access to the kitchen, bathroom, your room (of course ;) and the laundry machine! There is great wifi as well. Grocery store just across the street and big shopping center down the street. 10 minute walk from Ostkreuz a great area with shops, cafes, bars, clubs and the hip Berlin vibe. There is also a little park just next to the apartment building. There is an S-bahn station (Frankfurter Allee) just down the street and an U-bahn station (Magdalen Strase) just outside the door. There is also a tram (which runs all night) and there are buses. It is a great location!
neighborhood_overview: Grocery store just across the street and big shopping center down the street. 10 minute walk from Ostkreuz a great area with shops, cafes, bars, clubs and the hip Berlin vibe. There is also a little park just next to the apartment building.

name: Spacious and cosy room in Neukölln
summary: This spacious and cosy room in a fully-furnished, stylish home has a comfortable bed for two. Located far enough from the tourist droves, yet only a 20 min away from city-centre, be sure to get a true Berlin experience.
space: The apartment is on the 4th floor (no elevator) of a beautiful, old 1900s building. The ceilings are 3m high and the floors are classic wooden.  The kitchen is fully equipped with a refrigerator, dishwasher, oven, blender and more. Please feel free to dig into our elaborate spice and condiment collection and the fresh herbs. And obviously you’re welcome to use the coffee and tea.  Your room is the largest room is the apartment. It's light, spacious and comfy with low cushioned seating and peace resting chair.  There’s a work-cum-dining space, with an antique desk and table. The furniture has lasted over generations and it would be great if airbnb wouldn’t change that! ;-)  We welcome all kinds of guests – couples, families and friends – but no pets. We only expect you to treat the apartment and the neighbours respectfully. If you’re in Berlin to party, that’s great – we can recommend you a bunch of great local places – but we expect you NOT TO PARTY in the apartment.  We provide towels
description: This spacious and cosy room in a fully-furnished, stylish home has a comfortable bed for two. Located far enough from the tourist droves, yet only a 20 min away from city-centre, be sure to get a true Berlin experience. The apartment is on the 4th floor (no elevator) of a beautiful, old 1900s building. The ceilings are 3m high and the floors are classic wooden. The furniture has lasted over generations and it would be great if airbnb wouldn’t change that! ;-)  We welcome all kinds of guests – couples, families and friends – but no pets. We only expect you t
neighborhood_overview: Neukölln is one of Berlin’s original, yet up and coming neighbourhoods. You can expect the special local Berlin flavour – a blend of Turkish and Arab immigrants as well as the young and yuppy crowds. Some of Berlin’s best cafes, bars and clubs are located in Neukölln. The pretty Körnerpark is just a block away and the Tempelhoferfeld (the world’s biggest inner city open space) is about 5 min cycling distance, perfect for being outdoors. There’s a Kaisers, an Aldi and a Dennis organic supermarket all walking distance from the house. Be sure, we’ll hand you a guide to places to check out in and around the apartment.
notes: Just give us a call if you need anything at all.
transit: We are located 3 min walking distance from S+U Bahn Hermannstraße U8 and 5 min walking from S+U Bahn Berlin Neukölln U7. Both take you to the city in about 20 min.
access: You can access every room, except our bedroom. Feel free to read the books, use the yoga mats and anything that isn’t personal i.e. don’t walk out wearing our clothes ;-)
interaction: We will meet you to hand over the keys and show the apartment around. We will also leave you a list of things-to-do and visit etc. During your stay, you can expect complete privacy. At the same time if you need any assistance with anything, feel free to reach us over the phone. We will help you out with everything. We work from home in the working space most days so we might bump into each other anyway and are always available to help you out.
house_rules: We welcome all kinds of guests – couples, families and friends – but no pets. We only expect you to treat the apartment and the neighbours respectfully. If you're in Berlin to party, that's great – we can recommend you a bunch of great local places – but we expect you NOT TO PARTY in the apartment. This is a non smoking apartment, but you can do so on the balcony. If there is any damage, you are responsible to cover the full cost of replacement.
host_about: We are a German-Indian couple and lived nomadically for over the past five years. During our travels we were often met with great hospitality and now it's our turn to return the favour ;-)

space: Wie man auf den Fotos sehen kann ist die Wohnung nicht allzu groß  (ca 31 m2), aber ich würde sagen, sie bietet alles, was man für einen kurzen Besuch in Berlin so braucht. Das Bett besteht nur aus eine Matratze, ist aber bequem. In der Küche gibt es eine Waschmaschine.  Die Wohnung liegt im Seitenflügel eines Altbaus und ist nach Süden zu einem Innenhof ausgerichtet.  Es ist eine private Wohnung weshalb es besonders schön wäre, wenn ihr gut auf alles aufpasst und nach Bedarf die Blumen giesst. Vielen Dank im Voraus :)

access: Guestroom includes use of:   - modern bathroom and separate toilet, incl. towels - fully equipped kitchen (incl. toaster, mixer, dish washer, bar, big fridge/freezer) - highspeed WiFi - washing machine
interaction: Me and my lovely dog Lucy will be glad to assist guests in any possible way.  Advices if needed can be given about secret places to visit, cultural activities, museums, theatres, galleries, cabarets, concert venues, literary events, good restaurants, insider bars and clubs as well as trips to beautiful places outside of Berlin.
host_about:
Danielle is an artist and art teacher, Marcel writes for film, theater and the opera.
We spend our days and nights working or doing nothing or trying to live a meaningful live – at least in our definition of such.
Unfortunately, we sometimes tend to procrastinate which usually contradicts my philosophy of making the most of the moment … but maybe it doesn't. 
We share our apartment with a cute dog, lucy, who is loved by and loves everyone we know.

name: Cosy, modern flat only 10min from the main station
summary: Hi, I'm a freelancer and a frequent traveler, so when I'm not home, I offer my place for Airbnb. The apartment is recently renovated. You will enjoy a clean and modern apartment, which is very quiet and from the balcony you have a beautiful view of the park.  My place is located very close to bus stops, U-Bahn and S-Bahn (ringbahn) stations; it takes less than 10 minutes by bus to get to the main train station (Hauptbahnhof). It also has a perfect connection to both airports.

host_about: I like to travel, visiting especially new places but also meeting new people. I like to cook, meet with friends. I'm rather a quiet person, I prefer going to a pub than to a club. In my free time I like to stay in bed, watching movies or reading books. I enjoy playing board games, cards etc. I'm interested in art, I like to visit galleries and museums. Sounds kinda boring, but I like simple things. Few things I can't live without: my bed, warm socks, wine, Internet and maybe my boyfriend.

The bedroom is located towards the silent backyard. It has been rented to several persons before and was considered to be a very comfy place. The flat is fully equipped and you usually do not need to bring anything here except your personal belongings.

The flat is fully equipped and you usually do not need to bring anything here except your personal belongings. The room is 100% yours. The rest of the flat except my personal bedroom is shared area. The bathroom is also open for guests that I invite from time to time for some evening cooking. But 99% of the term it will be only you using it. I will be living here as well. neighborhood_overview: The flat is located within the Simon-Dach-Area, next to the RAW and close to Boxhagener Platz. To go to Volkspark Friedrichshain it needs about 15 minutes with tram line M10. Treptower Park is 2 stops by S-Bahn or 15 jogging minutes away. In the closer vicinity you find all things that you need: 24h supermarket, 24h kiosks, drugstores, cash machines, health-food-shops, plenty of restaurants / bars serving good food & beverages for moderate prices.
transit: If you should want to leave Friedrichshain for some reason going to Kreuzberg, Mitte or Prenzlauer Berg is very easy. Here is a list of all public transport connections including direct stops: - S-Bahn S5, S7, S75 "Warschauer Str." (to Ostkreuz, Alexanderplatz, Friedrichstraße, Hauptbahnhof or Zoologischer Garten) - 5 minutes walk - U-Bahn U1 "Warschauer Str." (to Kottbusser Tor, Hallesches Tor, Wittenbergplatz or Kurfürstendamm) - 5 minutes walk - U-Bahn U5 "Frankfurter Tor" (to Alexanderplatz or Lichtenberg) - 8 minutes walk - Tram M10 "Revaler Strasse" (to Volkspark Friedrichshain, Greifswalder Strasse, Prenzlauer Allee, Eberswalder Strasse or Hauptbahnhof) - 2 minutes walk - Tram M13 "Revaler Strasse" (to Frankfurter Allee) - 2 minutes walk
access: The room is 100% yours. The rest of the flat except my personal bedroom is shared area. The bathroom is also open for guests that I invite from time to time for some evening cooking. But 99% of the term it will be only you using it.
interaction: I will be living here as well. So feel free to ask for any help or advice at any time.
house_rules: No smoking and no pets!
host_about: I am Sebastian (34) from Berlin, Germany. I work for a real estate valuation department being responsible for the internal IT support. My hobbies are jogging, billiards, table tennis and poker (texas hold'em).

name: Sunny, Charming & Spacious 3 BR in Heart of Berlin
summary: Welcome! This spacious, quiet and nicely furnished apartment is conveniently located in the heart of Berlin in Schoeneberg, one of the most charming neighbourhoods of the city. As Airbnb Super Host I am striving to offer my guests the best possible experience. Please feel free to get in touch with any questions...
space: Bright, spacious (90m²=970sq ft) and airy for all that love space in one of the most beautiful areas of the city. Newly refurbished with quality furniture, hardwood floor, central heating and a nice balcony with afternoon/evening sun. All rooms are facing a huge courtyard, so despite the central location, all rooms are absolutely quiet even with windows open.  Thoroughly decorated with high quality furniture and appliances:  - 2 separate bedrooms with hardwood floor, each with queen-size bed;  - modern bathroom, one with shower, toilet and hairdryer;  - separate guest-bathroom; - fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, washing machine, microwave, refrigerator, oven, coffee machine, Toaster, steam iron, ironing board, etc.;  - large living room with huge comfortable leather couch, long dining table and 52" HD SmartTV with BlueRay player.  HighSpeed WiFi in all the apartment;  - double glazed windows; - big sunny balcony with table and chairs.  Fresh bed linen and towels will be provided

neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of Schoenberg, Berlin's artist and bohème district and one of the most beautiful areas of the city with many excellent restaurants and cafe. It is conveniently located right in the middle between City West and City East.
notes: This apartment is cleaned by a professional cleaning service and provided with freshly, professional laundered, bed linen and towels.
transit: The metro lines U1, U2, U3 and U4 are only a short 4min walk away (station Nollendorfplatz). The U1 is the central line and connects to Mitte, Kreuzberg and Charlottenburg. There's several bus stops within 200m to all kinds of destinations as well.
access: Full access to the apartment and all amenities. The apartment is on the 2nd floor, there is an elevator.
interaction: You will be personally welcomed at the apartment, provided with information about the area and handed over the keys. I will always be available for any help or information you may need.
house_rules: Non-smoking inside the apartment, but smoking allowed on the balcony.   Please observe house quiet period (after 10pm). No parties.  Please note only people registered to stay are allowed in the house for the duration of your stay.
host_about:
Meet a real, native Berliner that can share with you insights about the City nobody else can! I am currently working in Berlin's start up business. I lived in the US and South America for 6 years and travelled around the world for 2 years. Beside travelling, I love all kinds of sports, like tennis, skiing, beachvolley. I'm easygoing and open-minded. 

The apartment is about 90m² and furnished in my own style with quality furniture. 

My girlfriend is an Event Manager.  For those interested in special sights, events or other attractions, we can arrange visits or provide information. Feel free to ask.

summary: My cozy appartment is at the 4th floor facing the courtyard: that's way there is so much light and it's so quite. Lovely neighbourood very well connected with Alexanderplatz: from here you can go everywhere! 10 minutes walk from trendy Mitte.
space: What I love in my appartement is that it is warm and cozy, but also full of light and open. Almost every piece of furniture has his own, long story to tell.

My lovely neighbourood, the Winzkiez, is the quintessence of Berlin: 15 minutes walk from Berlin's most representative symbol, the Television Tower in Alexanderplatz, but far away from the crowded tourists.routes, 10 minutes walk from the trendy and lively bars on the Torstrasse and Rosenthalerplatz, but very quite and safe.  The Museum I
neighborhood_overview: My lovely neighbourood, the Winzkiez, is the quintessence of Berlin: 15 minutes walk from Berlin's most representative symbol, the Television Tower in Alexanderplatz, but far away from the crowded tourists.routes, 10 minutes walk from the trendy and lively bars on the Torstrasse and Rosenthalerplatz, but very quite and safe.  The Museum Insel, with it's Pergamon Museum, the Altes Museum (with the stunning egiptian collection and the Nefertiti) are just two bus stops from Alexanderplatz. A 7to24 supermarket is just 5 minutes walk, there are a bio supermarket and many nice cafes where you can enjoy a lovely brunch before starting to explore the city! On Saturdays you can go to thre lovely local products' market in Kollwitzplatz: you can shop fresh fruit and vegetable, and also enjoy a meal or a drink at the market: stawberries prosecco is my favourite ;-)
notes: Alcuni piccoli pezzi vintage del mio arredo sono acquistabili! Basta guardare sotto al oggetto che piace, potreste trovare un etichetta con il prezzo! Se non c'è l' etichetta, l' oggetto non è in vendita. Questo servizio non è sempre disponibile, ma cerco con costanza nuovi pezzi nei vari mercatini vintage berlinesi!
transit: Tram M2 and M4 are 5 minute walk and will take you to Alexanderplatz - from there you can go everywhere: 3 lines of subway, 4 busses, S-Bahn, regional, national and international trains, fast connection with both airports... there are no limits!
access: Wi-fi, washing machine, stereo amplifier+speakers, fully equipped kitchen, double bed
interaction: Dear guests, when you rent my appartment it will be all for you. We are going to meet at the check-in and check-out. If I'm in Berlin I'm avaiable for informations and help.
house_rules: No smoking, no shoes, no pets, no parties + no food or beverages in the bedroom.
host_about:
Hallo! I'm Sonia, i live in Berlin since 2009 but i moved a lot before coming here!
Travelling is for me a life-style, so from time to time i rent my home and leave for a while: i love to explore new cities,go to museum and festivals, or just fly south and lie down in the sun. 
Family and nature is what makes me feel at home - thats why my little cozy Berlin appartment is furnished with vintage family pieces and a lot of wood and natural materials.

Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen der Umgebung und der Lage. Im Herzen Friedrichshains. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für paare, alleinreisende abenteurer und geschäftsreisende. Auch zu dritt Reisende sind hier willkommen.
space: Es stehen: ein Doppelbet und ein Einzelbett zur verfügung. Handtücher stehen auch zur nutzung der Gäste da. Die Küche ist voll augestattet und ist für die freie Nutzung auch eingeplant.

Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen der Umgebung und der Lage. Im Herzen Friedrichshains. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für paare, alleinreisende abenteurer und geschäftsreisende. Auch zu dritt Reisende sind hier willkommen. Es stehen: ein Doppelbet und ein Einzelbett zur verfügung. Handtücher stehen auch zur nutzung der Gäste da. Die Küche ist voll augestattet und ist für die freie Nutzung auch eingeplant. Gästezimmer Bad und Küche. Auch der Garten ist für Sommertage mit einem Grill austgestattet. Ich stehe für fragen immer zur verfügung. Meine Private Telefon nr ist für notfalle auch zu nutzen. Bersarin plz (tram), Frankfurter Tor und Samariter str (UBahn) und Storkower str (SBahn) sind alle zu fuss in kürzester Zeit zu erreichen. Es handelt sich hierbei um eine Unterkunft für 2,
notes: Es handelt sich hierbei um eine Unterkunft für 2, die jedoch auch für drei Personen geeignet ist. Auf ein Kennenlernbierchen freu ich mich!

name: A Room in Berlin
summary: One of the best locations in Berlin.Underground U8 (Weinmeisterstr ) right outside the door, S-Bahn station 3' away(Hackescher Markt) and walking distance to Alexanderplatz. Museum island and spree river are a 10' walk. Visit the famous Augustrasse with Berlin's most recent art galleries or go shopping in the most fancy boutiques you will find around the corner. The room is comfortable and the kitchen is practical with a wonderful view in one of Berlin's coolest areas.  Enjoy your stay :)

name: Charming room for up to 3 people
summary: The apartment is perfect for a single person, a couple or for a group of three! Feel home in the 30qm room. It has the typical "Altbau" charm. host_about:
Hi!

I'm a 23 year old student living in Berlin. 

I couldn't live without sports, friends, or family. I love travelling to Croatia and Southern Africa. My favourite book is Thinking Fast and Slow (go read it if you haven't :D). I fancy Italian and French food, (currently) enjoy watching The Knick and listen to all kinds of music (mostly funk/rock/hiphop)!

My favourite way to travel is by train - allows me to move around, pee, and sleep while I'm getting closer to my destination!

Make sure to check out the greatest city in the world - while staying at my place :D

neighborhood_overview: Victoria-Kiez, where I live is a pre-cool area of Berlin, where gentrification has  just started. I like the mixture of little-village-feeling and metropolitan life.  Down my street is a very good bagel and espresso bar, few restaurants, the best icecream in town :-) and a supermarket, which is open until 10 p.m. even on saturdays - which is not so common in germany. There a two stores selling organic food (and vegan groceries) within 5-10 minutes walk. For the visual hunger there are two art galleries down the streets and in the neighbours building. If you like nightlife you are within 10 bicycle minutes of "about blank", "Wilde Renate" and "sysiphos", three places to be if you are into Berlin electronic music scene. Berghain is 20 bicycle minutes away.
notes: You will be sharing the apartment with me and two cats (Mrs. Konrad and Kasimir).
transit: Very frequent and straight connection to "the centre": 10 minutes travel to Alexanderplatz and 20 minutes to Brandenburger Tor or Friedrichsstraße by S-Bahn. The S-Bahn-Stop Nöldnerplatz connects you directly and frequently with the whole city until 1 a.m at night. Weekends all night long.  Trains run every 5 minutes and during weekends all night long (during night about every 15-30 Minutes).  There is no parking fee in my neighbourhood (yet) and depending on your arrival time it is easy to find a parking lot. In the evenings it is harder than during day.  If you arrive by plane, it takes 45 minutes to my place (both Tegel and Schönefeld), by  train 20 minutes from the Central Station Hauptbahnhof.
access: Enjoy my furniture as if it was yours:. I use the room (which of course has its own door and privacy) as a guestroom for friends or as living room while its not rented. Therefore you find my books on the shelf and my favourite furniture there.  There is a functional bike waiting for you and a rental-shop down the street, if you come as a couple, and need another one. We share the modern bathroom, towels will be provided as well as shampoo or showergel in case you need some.  The kitchen and fridge are at your disposal, too.  You can use spices and basic kitchen stuff like oil or butter. On your first day you can make yourself espresso or porridge before you go on your first grocery shopping tour.  During summer it is nice to sit in the backyard of the house or relax in the hammock in the garden.
interaction: Sometimes we exchange recipes, music, interesting thoughts, sometimes we just respect each others privacy or have one tea together on arrival, if we feel like it. If you have questions or problems, I will always be available by mobile.
house_rules: I would like you to enjoy and respect the room and the flat as if it was yours. It is not a hotel, it is a home- for me and for you during your stay.  It is a nice gesture if you take off your shoes in the apartment, but it is no obligation.  So far 80 guests have stayed at my place and brought a lot of interesting thoughts, impressions, recipes and shared experiences into my life! I am looking forward to every new guest.   I love nature and I try not to spoil water and energy but that does not mean that I never do long showers or a bath once in a while.  If you like to smoke you can use an open window in the hallway or take a seat in the garden.
host_about: In this digital world, I love the beauty of "live" encounters. Real World:  A new location, a live tune somewhere on the street or pioneers and travelers from all over the world, who tell interesting stories.

name: modern apartment Berlin (Lankwitz)
summary: This apartment is located in the south of Berlin in the district named Lankwitz. It is a quiet and very green neighbourhood. The bus (5 min) takes you to the nearest shopping mall in the Schlossstrasse within 12 min.  You can go by the train (S-Bahn Lankwitz 800m or 0.5 miles) to the center of Berlin within 16 minutes. There is a supermarket (lidl) only 650 m and a 24h-supermarket (Reichelt) only 500 m away from my apartment.
space: The apartment is located on the ground floor and is divided into two rooms (54 sum) and a balcony. One of the rooms is a very small bedroom and the other room is a kitchen/living/study-room. It has a nice modern couch, a flatscreen, a kitchen equipped with everything you might need, because it's my apartment that I live in every day. I can only recommend it for people who like to visit Berlin and enjoy a nice stay. You can even use my personal parking spot in the garage! I also have a bike that you could use for grocery shopping or something else.

name: PARK VIEW: SUNNY NEUKÖLLN ROOM
summary: The apartment is situated in one of the few  green spots of the lively neighbourhood of Neukölln, which has grown to be the most vibrant quarter of Berlin in the last couple of years. It is the perfect place to relax.
space: The apartment is situated between two parks and right next to the beautiful canal. It is the perfect place to relax after a busy day in the city. Even though it is so close to everything it is exceptionally quiet as there are no big roads nearby. The apartment and your room are very light and have a very warm and friendly atmosphere.

You are welcome to use the balcony and the kitchen. I am happy to give you tips on what to do in Berlin and help you out as much as I can. The apartment is in walking distance to numerous bars and cafès on Neuköllns popular 'Weserstraße'.  There are two big parks on each side of the house. The canal is in two minutes walking distance. There is a beautiful pedestrian bridge on which people sit in the mild summer evenings and enjoy a glass of w
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in walking distance to numerous bars and cafès on Neuköllns popular 'Weserstraße'.  There are two big parks on each side of the house. The canal is in two minutes walking distance. There is a beautiful pedestrian bridge on which people sit in the mild summer evenings and enjoy a glass of wine or beer. Right behind the house is the infamous "California Breakfast Slam" a restaurant, which sells delicious breakfast, lunches and dinners. You will also find a broad selection of inexpensive international bistros in the neigbourhood. No matter if you like Thai food, Sushi, Mediterranean food, Sudanese Falafels or vegan food, it's all in walking distance from the apartment. You can also walk to Kreuzberg and visit one of the popular fleamarkets, home to vintage treasures.
transit: Among others there is a bus stop of the bus M41, which willl take you directly to the Central Station. The U-Bahn Stop Neukölln of the U7 is also in walking distance as well as the S-Bahn Sonnenallee. There is also a direct bus to the airport Schönefeld.
access: You are welcome to use the balcony and the kitchen.
interaction: I am happy to give you tips on what to do in Berlin and help you out as much as I can.
house_rules: I only expect my guests to be considerate. Smoking is only allowed on the balcony. The few and simple house rules can be found in the room at your arrival.

name: Central & stylish Apt in B's center
summary: My comfy, stylish, clean and, most of all, centrally located apt can host up to 4 people either looking to have a relaxed sightseeing time in Berlin or people who want to enjoy Berlin's incredible nightlife (or maybe both). Have a great stay!
space: The apt is around 50qm big, has a living room, a separate bedroom, a large bathroom and a comfy kitchen with a big dining table.
description: My comfy, stylish, clean and, most of all, centrally located apt can host up to 4 people either looking to have a relaxed sightseeing time in Berlin or people who want to enjoy Berlin's incredible nightlife (or maybe both). Have a great stay! The apt is around 50qm big, has a living room, a separate bedroom, a large bathroom and a comfy kitchen with a big dining table.  Guests will have the entire apt to themselves. The kitchen is fully equipped (fridge, freezer, toaster, boiler etc.). Please also feel free to use my washing machine - ironing is possible, too. The bathroom is equipped with a shower as well as a bathtub and there's also a hairdryer that you can use. In addition, I will provide towels for you as well as bed linen for up to 3 people. And there's also the TV ;) I'd be happy to give some insights in not only Berlin's major tourist attractions and nightlife opportunities but also into its history. If needed, my girlfriend also speaks French and Spanish.  Prenzlauer Berg is o
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is one of the best areas in Berlin. The flat is in 2 minutes walking distance from the beautiful Teutoburger Park and in 5 minutes walking distance from famous Torstrasse where lots of fancy bars are located which is a good point to start out a night in Berlin. Rosenthaler Platz is to be reached in 7 minutes. Supermarkets are very close as well as the next underground station that takes you to Alexanderplatz/city center in two minutes.
notes: Please contact me before booking. Other than that, please keep in mind that I have a cat (that won't be in the apartment during your stay) but people that are allergic to pets should refrain from choosing this flat.
transit: 2 stops by underground (U2, Senefelder Platz) from Alexanderplatz.
access: Guests will have the entire apt to themselves. The kitchen is fully equipped (fridge, freezer, toaster, boiler etc.). Please also feel free to use my washing machine - ironing is possible, too. The bathroom is equipped with a shower as well as a bathtub and there's also a hairdryer that you can use. In addition, I will provide towels for you as well as bed linen for up to 3 people. And there's also the TV ;)
interaction: I'd be happy to give some insights in not only Berlin's major tourist attractions and nightlife opportunities but also into its history. If needed, my girlfriend also speaks French and Spanish.
house_rules: There is a family living on the floor above and it would be cool if you could turn the music down after 9 pm during the week and 10 pm on the weekends. Also, please note that checkout should be realized until 12pm and checkin should be after 3pm if not discussed differently.
host_about:
Hey people,

My name is Oliver, I am 35 years old and have been living in my centrally located flat in Prenzlauer Berg for 5 years now, alongside my cute little cat "Willi". I am soldier at the moment and responsible for several PR Projects of the German Armed Forces. 

In my leisure time I enjoy everything Berlin can offer me culturally, I am very interested in politics and history, I also like sports (Paintball etc.) but from time to time I am also a big party person. So if you want to check out Berlin from a non-tourist perspective I'll let you know which one is the place to be! This also applies to the best restaurants and bars in town. 

I am always open to meet new people and I am curious to meet you, too!

Cheers,
Oliver

There are convenience stores just around the corner, and also a "Späti", where you can get drinks and snacks alomost 24/7. And over the steet is Berlin oldest Jazz and Blues place "Yorcksschlösschen". Next to it is Mr. Mintch, one of the best cakes in town! Down the street at Mehringdamm is of course "Curry36" Berlins best Currywurst, and "Mustafas Gemüse Kebap".

(7 Min, straight down Grossbeerenstrasse) S+U Bahn Yorckstrasse (9 min, exit left from building all the way down Yorckstrasse, after walking under the brigdes.)
