house_rules: If you’re coming to Berlin to have fun you’ve picked a great city to do so. Unfortunately, just not at our place. Though we’re sure it won’t come to it, serious complaints of unruly behavior will unfortunately result in you being asked to leave. Not good for you. Not good for us. Check-in is at 14:00, and check-out is by 10:00. Arriving slightly earlier, or want that extra hour to sleep? Should be fine, but please check with us first. Being a private apartment, we have a no smoking policy. What you do in your personal time is entirely up to you, but when staying at our place we have a strict no drug use policy.  To keep our costs down (and pass those savings on to our guests) we kindly ask that you switch off lights and heating when its not in use or leaving the house. Mother nature thanks you too.   To be considerate to the other roommates, we kindly ask to keep things on the quieter-side after 9pm. And if you want to listen to music, please remember the other roommates and enjoy via
host_about: Came to Germany to work for VW as an automotive designer.  Since 2008 quit my job and now working as a design consultant.

space: My apartment is located right in the heart of Berlin in an old hospital which was beautifully renovated a few years ago.  It is extremely quiet as you can barely hear the cars so it is perfect to relax after a busy day in the city.

host_about:
Hi guys, 
I am an architecture student and I think the concept of airbnb is great. That's why I like to share my home with travelers from all around the world to make them feel welcome and at home at my place. 
I love colours as you may recoginze in my apartment as it is very bright and my furniture is in bold colours except of the bedroom as I love to wake up all in white-feels like heaven, right? :)
I used to live in London not so long ago and I love to come back every once in a while as it really became a second home for me. Nevertheless I think Berlin is unique and I especially love the cultural scene as well as all the different artists etc. the city is literally in bloom. 
Five things I can not live without: 
salted butter and raspberry marmalade sandwiches in the morning
white bedsheets
david hockneys paintings - oh those colours!
future islands album singles
architectural digest

I hope you will enjoy staying at my place!

If not now-when?

name: Beautiful apartment in Kreuzberg
summary: The apartment located in the the back of my fashion shop, during working time we will share the bathroom but except from that the room has a privet entrance  it is located in the great Kruezberg area and there are lots of cafes bars and restaurants.
space: The place is  in Wrangelkiez one of the greatest areas of Kreuzberg.
description: The apartment located in the the back of my fashion shop, during working time we will share the bathroom but except from that the room has a privet entrance  it is located in the great Kruezberg area and there are lots of cafes bars and restaurants. There is a separate entrance for the guests. A little kitchen with a fridge, toaster, water boiler (no cooking possible, there is no oven, no stove and it is also not permitted to bring a stove) and a bathroom with a shower we offer one towel per person plus one for the hands ( if you stay longer than a few days we of course offer fresh ones every 4 days)  The apartment is super quiet although it is located in a very active neighborhood with many bars cafes and clubs. We are sharing our private place the towels and bedsheets are not all one color since it is not a hotel ;)

name: Privatzimmer
summary: Privatzimmer ,ca. 20qm, im Souterrain eines Einfamilienhauses mit eigenem Eingang und Badezimmer. Ein Bett und eine Schlafcouch, Teeküche mit Kühlschrank. Direkt am Wald, nur 5 Gehminuten zur S-Bahn ( in 10 Minuten am Ku'damm). 12 Gehminuten zur Messe.
description: Privatzimmer ,ca. 20qm, im Souterrain eines Einfamilienhauses mit eigenem Eingang und Badezimmer. Ein Bett und eine Schlafcouch, Teeküche mit Kühlschrank. Direkt am Wald, nur 5 Gehminuten zur S-Bahn ( in 10 Minuten am Ku'damm). 12 Gehminuten zur Messe. Das Souterrain ist über einen eigenen Eingang zugänglich. Das Bad wird auch als Waschküche von der Familie genützt. Das Haus steht am Waldrand, und doch ist man in 10 Minuten mit der S-Bahn in der Stadt. Die Messe und das CityCube sind in ca.12 Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen. Am S-Bahnhof gibt es einen Bäcker, Pizzeria, Supermarkt und ein Restaurant. In unserer Straße stehen nur Einfamilienhäuser, somit gibt es genug Parkplätze vor der Haustür. Die S-Bahn-Station Grunewald erreicht man in 5 Minuten (Richtung Zoologischer Garten bzw. Potsdam). Auch mehrere Busse starten von dort. Das Gartentor ist etwas schwer zu öffnen: einfach fest drücken!

neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain is the perfect area for a stay in Berlin. You can easily walk to the famous Berlin Wall, stroll around the several flea markets and second hand stores or get some fresh air at the banks of the Spree.  In case you need a break of the big city life, you will find the Treptower Park with green areas and a boat rental around the corner. If you want to experience Berlin on a bycicle, there is a rental just across the street.
transit: The next S-Bahn station (Ostkreuz) with direct connections to Alexanderplatz, central station and Schönefeld is only a few minutes away.
access: You can access and make use of the entire flat, except for my private room.
interaction: Since I am often not at home because of work, you will usually have the flat for your own. However, you can reach me by mail or phone at any time, so please don't hesitate to contact me. I will usually be around the corner.
house_rules: - No visitors without asking.  - No parties.  - Keep the flat tidy and pleasant.  - Feel at home :)
host_about: Berlin has pulled me into its magic spell some years ago and since then has not let me go. I love to explore the daily changing city, especially its cultural and culinary parts and would be more than happy to share some of it with you :)

name: Modernes Zimmer in Berlin Pankow
summary: Es ist ein schönes gepflegtes und modernes Zimmer in einer Altbauwohnung in Berlin Pankow. Das Zimmer ist ca. 12m^2 groß. Es ist modern/ retro eingerichtet und sehr schön, es befindet sich noch eine Kommode und kleine Möbel im Zimmer. Eine hohe Decke und das Fenster zeigt in den Innenhof.
space: Das Haus befindet sich direkt vor eine Tram Haltestelle die wie die Straße Tschaikowskistraße heißt und es fahren auch Busse dort. host_about: Welcome, I'm Francois, 36yo. i've been living in Berlin for the last 10 years and really enjoy all the aspect of the berlin life. I'm a product designer and sound artist. I'm travelling a lot for fun and work and propose people to share my flat for a while when I'm not there. I enjoy philosophy, spirituality, art, coocking and DIY. My place is areflect of what I am, ecclectic and improvised, confortable and layed back in the center of the Kreuzberg scene. Take a look and share if you like!

host_about:
I've already hosted quite a few guests and I enjoy having people over :)
Although I love to live in our wonderful city, nature in general amazes me. Diving in caves, the view from the top of a mountain, the sky above the desert....and people who smile. I love the mountains (riding my motorcycle, skiing and hiking) as well as the water (swimming, scuba diving and sailing). Btw, there are lots of lakes in and around Berlin!
I usually spend a bunch of time dancing ballroom / latin dances and tango argentino and I try to go to the opera, to concerts or the theater on a regular basis. People say I'm quite relaxed and easy to get along with. 
If you feel like my place fits your taste and expectations, go ahead and drop me a line, I´ll be happy to get to know you!
Dagmar

name: Trip2Berlin - TOP Location***
summary: 40sq.m. apartment for rent in Friedrichshain, between Warschauer Station and Berghain, a quite street though. Kreuzberg is just on the other side of the Oberbaumbrücke. Loads of bars and restaurants starting on Warschauer Street. Read on in Details..

The apartment is on the second floor. Let me know if you have questions. Good travels!!

An enthusiastic art lover, coming from fine art/performing art background. A foodie who likes to both cook and eat them all.

Hello from lovely Berlin! 
I'm a fashion designer and love the big city vibe of Berlin but also love to travel around the world to find new inspirations. I love yoga, acro-yoga, meditation, nature, electronic music, art-exhibitions, fashion, reading, cooking, traveling and meeting people.

name: Cosy fully loaded apt. hideaway close to center
summary: This is a wonderful cosy little apartment, about 15 minutes train oder subway ride from Berlin center. I am a carpenter and have painstakingly decorated the kitchen and bathroom to make it a perfect little hideaway for couples, small families or the sophisticated individual traveler.  It has a balcony, a view to a lovely garden. The kitchen is complete and invites people to cook a healthy meal.  Supermarket, restaurants are only a few minutes walking distance.  The local subway is close
space: This is a quiet area of Berlin Prenzlauer Berg, you will be close to Alexander Platz or Friedrichstraße or Hackescher Markt - busy and lively Berlin destinations - but your hideaway is very very quiet and relaxing. If you want to stay in, the big screen  smart TV has Netflix and Amazon Prime  - which you are more than welcome to use.

neighborhood_overview: The Prenzlauer Berg area of Berlin used to be an artist area, now its more young families and urban professionals. My area is not really a happening party and  "going out" area for the super young crowd- but walking distances are a few pubs and restaurants as well as cinema.
notes: Its a perfect mix of being close to city center and the fun parts of town while not being disturbed by the busy Berlin night life.
transit: Supermarket, restaurants are only a few minutes walking distance.  The S-Bahn (local subway) is close as well as the local tram (Train). There are usually parking spaces in front of the apartment. But we have no reserved parking spaces. Im sorry I have no bikes to rent.
access: The whole apartment is yours, fast WiFi is included, as well as a fully working kitchen and washing machine. All modern equipment and fully functional. You may of course use the balcony and have lovely view to the garden.
interaction: I am available to answer questions and also help you with your choice when it comes to bars, restaurants and other activities. I love going out and eating so I can offer your first hand reviews of whats "hot" in Berlin right now.
host_about:
Hey, I’m in my late 30s and have been working for the international consulting company KPMG for a few years. Berlin has been home since 2014. 

Prior I  have been working as social worker for about 8 years and then I started to give my profession a new dimension in 2012. Next it was doing my international postgrad studies in “M.A. Psychology and Management”.

My boyfriend and I enjoy going out for dinner and we do hunt the Berlin food scene for new discoveries as well as food markets. We love going out with friends to explore the local Bar scene. We enjoy going to Philharmonie, jazz, indie concerts as well the museums and just being outside with the kids in the park. We are not really the wild and crazy party people. 

My favorites are reading, yoga, vast range of cultural interest, mountaineering and the many other beautiful things in life.

I am respectful and tidy and generally easy-going, with lots of good experiences in sharing flats and would enjoy meeting new peolpe in a friendly environment.

name: Bright&cozy apartment in Kreuzberg, close to canal
summary: Cozy appartment, perfectly located by the canal in the vibrant neighborhood of Kreuzberg - the heart of nightlife, art and gastronomy! My beautiful, fully furnished appartment is located in Berlin's hip district of Kreuzberg - home to many bars, excellent restaurants and many vintage/ thrift stores. It also just a foot step away to the canal which offers great spots to hang out and enjoy the young and international spitit of the neighborhood.
space: The living/ sleeping room is with 40sqm very spacious and perfect for couples / friends who would share a big double bed (200 x 150 cm). The big windows give a beautiful light throughout the entire day. The room is equipped with a couch and couch table, armchair, desk, mirror and dresser.

It also just a foot step away to the canal which offers great spots to hang out and enjoy the young and international spitit of the neighborhood. The living/ sleeping room is with 40sqm very spacious and perfect for couples / friends who would share a big double bed (200 x 150 cm). The big windows give a beautiful light throughout the entire day. The room is equipped with a couch and couch table, armchair, desk, mirror and dresser. The apartment is especially charming because most of the furniture is handed down by my grandma and gives the flat a very vintage look and feel. You get your own keys (deposit: 20 € / return by checking out), towels, lines. Of course I provide W-Lan too :) Please
neighborhood_overview: In 2 minutes you get to U8 Schönlein Strasse, from where you need just 8 minutes by underground/ tube to the famous Alexanderplatz. The area has plenty of bars, restaurants, vintage shops and clubs to offer. You need only 3 minutes on feet to get to the canal where you can enjoy a flea market every Saturday and plenty of cool evening locations (e.g. Admiralsbrücke). Also only 2 minutes away you will find a selection of supermarkets (Edeka, Netto, Biocompany).

I am happy to welcome you in my cozy home and give you some real insider tips on Berlin's hip places ;-)

host_about:
Ich heiße Joanina und bin 23 Jahre alt. Ich bin ein aufgeschlossener und Freundlicher Mensch und lache gerne und viel.
Ich liebe es geimnsam zu kochen und bei einem schönen Glas Wein beieinander zu sitzen. Meine Zeit verbringe in gerne in Cafés, bei einem guten Kaffe und einem Buch oder mit Freunden.
Ich male und fotografiere gerne, gehe oft in die Natur und ab und zu versacke ich auch mal in einer Bar.
Ich bin angehende Studentin und arbeite zur Zeit viel, um mir meine Reisen zu finanzieren.

name: nice room in friedrichshain
summary: i offer a nice, homely room in my flat. there are three rooms, one full appointed kitchen and bathroom. you will share the flat with my two nice flat mates from italy, eric & barbara. it's directly in the heart of berlin, 5 minutes to s-bhf warschauer straße, definitely one of the most lively area in berlin.
space: nearby are all the clubs you would want to visit (berghain, wilde renate, kater blau, suicide circus, sisyphus, about blank, watergate and there all reachable by foot) as well as lots of bars, cafés, restaurants etc.  the room has a double bed, which means its suitable for 1 person, a couple or any two people who like sharing a bed. the flat is equipped with a bathtub, washing machine, everything you need in order to cook a decent meal, coffee-maker, towels, hair dryer and WiFi.

name: Außergewöhnliche Wohnung  direkt am See
summary: Auf 84 m² Berlin erleben. Die schöne Dachwohnung ist Nahe an der Stadt um alles zu erleben aber doch so weit ausserhalb, dass man sich nach dem Trubel der Stadt erholen kann. Beim Blick aus dem Fenster oder beim sitzen im Garten schaut man auf den Obersee. Fussläufig 5 Minuten von der Tram M5 entfernt mit welcher man in 25 Minuten am Alexanderplatz (Zentrum Ost) ist. Sehr Familien und weniger Junggesellen geeignete Wohnung mit voll ausgestatteter Küche.
space: 1912 gebaute Villa im neugotischen Stil. Absolut aussergewöhnliche Dachgeschosswohnung. Die Wohnung ist sehr gemütlich. Das kleine Schlafzimmer ist mit einem Doppelbett ausgestattet, dass zweite Schlafzimmer mit einer Bettchouch. Eignet sich auch für eine lange Mietzeit. (Musiker, Geschäftstätige, usw.)

summary: room in beautiful, sunny apartment on the top floor. great view of hot spot Neukölln from the terrace, close to dozens cafes, bars, parks etc note: the room is ideal for 1-2 people. bookings for 3-4 possible, but only for shorter stays. also note that you book the room, not the apartment. I will be living there as well, though I'm working/traveling a lot.
space: it's a unique apartment, a lot of space, very sunny with a great view from the roof terrace.

I will be living there as well, though I'm working/traveling a lot. it's a unique apartment, a lot of space, very sunny with a great view from the roof terrace. bedroom, shared kitchen/living area with dish washer, balcony, bathroom with washing machine. Perfect for 2, but if need be I can put an extra mattress in the room, but this only works for a couple of nights. Depends on how busy I'm a the time, usually I'll let you do your thing, but if there's an opportunity I won't say no to hang out a bit. if you have questions regarding the apartment or Berlin in general, I'm always happy to help of course. Dozens, maybe hundreds of bars, cafes, restaurants, cinemas and small shops in walking distance, eve
neighborhood_overview: Dozens, maybe hundreds of bars, cafes, restaurants, cinemas and small shops in walking distance, everything you'll need.  Perfect for all who want it quiet, sunny but also close to the "kiez"
notes: I usually rent only for up to 2 people, but if need be there's an extra mattress. Though this usually only works only for short stays (1-3 nights).
transit: The subway station Karl-Marx-Straße (U7) is a 5 min walk away, from there you reach all the major sites in less than 20 minutes. Also the Schönefeld Airport can be reached quite easily with the U7.  The subway station Boddinstr (U8) is a 10 min walk away.  The S-Bahn station Neukölln (Ringbahn) is a 10 min walk way.  Also there are lots of bus stops close by, including the M41 which directly goes to Central Station.
access: bedroom, shared kitchen/living area with dish washer, balcony, bathroom with washing machine. Perfect for 2, but if need be I can put an extra mattress in the room, but this only works for a couple of nights.
interaction: Depends on how busy I'm a the time, usually I'll let you do your thing, but if there's an opportunity I won't say no to hang out a bit. if you have questions regarding the apartment or Berlin in general, I'm always happy to help of course.
house_rules: You should be tolerant, open-minded and friendly. You can make yourself at home, but treat the apartment and everything in it with respect. If you use the kitchen or other things, please clean up afterwards.  Important:  1. Please smoke only on the balcony, and not in the apartment.  2. do not use the fireplace on your own.  3. while showering, the water sometimes spills over. To avoid this: please use the shower head above you instead of the manual one, and turn turn the water on too strong. just keep an eye on the water level, and everything should be fine. if water still spills over, please just dry it off (or let me know, so I can do it).
host_about:
My name is Johannes, I'm 34 years old and live and work in Berlin since 2010. I'm laid back, easy going but reliable. A musicfreak, but also into arts, literature, theatre, movies and fancy drinks. I like meeting new people from all over the world, talking about the small and big things in life, and enjoying Berlin. I work at an environmental organsation during the day, and sometimes as an DJ at night. 

I live on the top floor of a typical "Berliner Altbau" building, in a sunny apartment with 2 bedrooms and would love to welcome you here. The apartment has everything you might need and is located in a quiet street in the center of the hotspot "Neukölln", only 30m away from the next subway station. 

One of the 2 bedrooms (16qm), equipped with a 140x200 bed, awaits you for your stay in Berlin. If need be, there's also second mattress that I can move into the guest room. Also, from time to time we are traveling, so you would have the apartment to yourself. 

If you want, I can show you lots of places in Neukölln and Berlin that are worth seeing.

name: bed- & livingroom very central
summary: Basic huge room, 25 m². Heart of Berlin. For spontaneous travellers. Couples. Late check-in after 6 pm. Nicely renovated building with high ceilings.
space: You will find a nicely renovated old building with high ceilings. Renovated wooden floors, wooden windows, in an overall quality building. Calm inner yard with no road noises. You will  have a huge room with comfortably endowed sleep-couch (width 125 cm). There is now a breckle `memory 6´ visco-matrass-topper for the whole surface, that was ranked best of its kind.
description: Basic huge room, 25 m². Heart of Berlin. For spontaneous travellers. Couples. Late check-in after 6 pm. Nicely renovated building with high ceilings. You will find a nicely renovated old building with high ceilings. Renovated wooden floors, wooden windows, in an overall quality building. Calm inner yard with no road noises. You will  have a huge room with comfortably endowed sleep-couch (width 125 cm). There is now a breckle `memory 6´ visco-matrass-topper for the whole surface, that was ranked best of its kind. The kitchen, that I built in myself, allows you to step back from the busy life outside and prepare your extravagant style of food ... or just hang out! The bath has a tub, if you need a timeout. Highspeed wireless internet is included. I want my guests to completely relax at home and make the most out of their short time in Berlin.  In case I am in Berlin, I love to give you my best tipps and some directions!  If you have any wishes, I am grateful to recieve your request. Flat
neighborhood_overview: You will be in the middle of Berlin literally.  Famous Oranienburgerstraße with delicious restaurants crosses right in front of the house. Spree river is a 5 minutes walk, follow it to either Bundestag or Alexanderplatz. The district has start-ups, lots of open-door gallaries, the famous and unique Hackische Höfe, excellent restaurants and bars as well as many crucial sights like Museum Island, Dom, Bundestag, Brandenburger Gate, Check-Point Charly, Wall Museums and much much more.  Trains to all destinations take the shortest amount of time, ideal for sightseeing or tours to more remote areas. As you read in most reviews, the location is a great starting point for discovering Berlin sights (mostly around the corner), visiting other districts or simply going-out closeby.
notes: 6 p.m. Late-Check-In during week. Check-Out really depends on situation next day, feel free to ask - even in case of new bookings :) Please specify on your plans considering dates and your entourage.
transit: There are stations of the three kinds of trains (subways, S-Bahn and tram) in a minute walk from the flat! The charming trams only go to former eastblock districts. Manifold the other lines connect the rest. There is a big traffic crossways Friedrichsstraße in 5 minutes walk, connecting east-to-west and north-to-south with the smooth and quick S-Bahns. Arriving in Berlin:  - with train: from central trainstation you can start in front of main entrance with tram "M5" to tram-station `Oranienburger Straße´  (and return).  - by plane:  Tegel Airport is connected by busses, TXL JetExpressBus brings you every 10 minutes to Alexanderplatz for 2,70 Euros in about 30 minutes (Note: temporary construction site requires you to exit central trainstation or Invalidenpark and continue with abovementined tram M5 to Oranienburger Straße).  Schönefeld: S-Bahns are taking off regularily after easy walk on well signposted way. Several options for you: ... for only one switch take S45 to Südkreuz, switch
access: The kitchen, that I built in myself, allows you to step back from the busy life outside and prepare your extravagant style of food ... or just hang out! The bath has a tub, if you need a timeout. Highspeed wireless internet is included.
interaction: I want my guests to completely relax at home and make the most out of their short time in Berlin.  In case I am in Berlin, I love to give you my best tipps and some directions!  If you have any wishes, I am grateful to recieve your request. Flat is well suited for flatshare, no walkthough rooms. Medium respect of quiteness would be good, low volume especially after midnight / before 8 morning / with open windows.
house_rules: I would not like you to smoke inside. In the yard it´s restricted, too.  In case of discussion tell the old concierge working downstairs you are visiting me. Drugs and being drunk hard I wouldn´t like.
host_about:
I live in Berlin for over 8 years now, and have not regretted it. I love its multicultural atmossphere.
I got to know a lot of clubs, bars and restaurants.. but am always surprised how quick Berlin changes.

I think the airbnb idea is a very good way to get people together and share as well as promote local life !
I know how precious holidays is, that is why I ask my guests early about their preferences and try to find out individual wishes to recommend what fits you best. It makes me smile if guests travel on with precious memories.

On the foto you see me sailing in the caribean last winter, another endeavour I can recommend.

name: Spacious&Stylish flat in the heart of Berlin/Mitte
summary: Fully renovated building in the heart of Berlin! Living room with dining area, kitchen, and separate bedroom. Directly at the Chauseestr. and Torstr. Only a few minutes walk to Friedrichstr., to museums, the Friedrichstadtpalast, the memorial Berlin Wall, the Mauerpark with flea market and karaoke, to the popular Rosenthaler Platz with cafes, bars and restaurants. Perfect traffic connection in 2 minutes to the S-Bahn, subway, tram and bus. 7 min. to main railway station, 30 min. to Tegel Airport

name: Beautiful apartment in central Berlin
summary: The apartment we live in is spacious and light-flooded. We love plants and we have many of them. Your room is fully and comfortably furnished. You will find anything here that you need, especially as regards rest and silence from an otherwise buzzing city. The flat is located in the center of Berlin - Mauerpark, Torstraße and Potsdamer Platz are in close vicinity. As your hosts we want to make your stay as comfortable & homelike as possible.
space: Your room is very spacious and well equipped. You will have a comfortable bed, a couch, a table and a cupboard for your clothes. You can use the kitchen with all its facilities. There is a bathtub installed in the bathroom. The apartment is well equipped with anything you need.
description: The apartment we live in is spacious and light-flooded. We love plants and we have many of them. Your room is fully and comfortably furnished. You will find anything here that you need, especially as regards rest and silence from an otherwise buzzing city. The flat is located in the center of Berlin - Mauerpark, Torstraße and Potsdamer Platz are in close vicinity. As your hosts we want to make your stay as comfortable & homelike as possible. Your room is very spacious and well equipped. You will have a comfortable bed, a couch, a table and a cupboard for your clothes. You can use the kitchen with all its facilities. There is a bathtub installed in the bathroom. The apartment is well equipped with anything you need. If you have any questions, you can always ask us. We know a lot about our neighborhood, paths worth exploring, and about Berlin in general as we have both been living here in the past seven years. So if you need any recommendations, we love to help you. The surrounding neigh
neighborhood_overview: The surrounding neighbourhood is quiet with a calm feeling to it. This means that on the one hand, you can be left in peace and silence while on the other hand, you are still in the center of Berlin. The flat is located in between four districts: Mitte, Moabit, Wedding and Prenzlauer Berg with each of them being fundamentally different and worth exploring. No matter what you are looking for, you will find it within walking distance. Once situated next to the Berlin wall, the neighbourhood became a thriving and fast-changing area with many cafés, restaurants and museums around. And if for some reason you wanna go to Neukölln, there is the U6 taking you right there.
transit: The subway station for the U6 is right in front of the house. With this line you can cross the city vertically. The fastest way to travel big distances in Berlin is the Ring-Bahn and the station Wedding is not far from the flat. If you wanna go to Prenzlauer Berg or Friedrichshain, take the M10 which is a little walk but in terms of Berlin still very close.
access: Als Gast kannst du Küche und Bad mitbenutzten. Wir freuen uns über aufgeschlossene Gäste. Ist aber kein muss.
interaction: If you have any questions, you can always ask us. We know a lot about our neighborhood, paths worth exploring, and about Berlin in general as we have both been living here in the past seven years. So if you need any recommendations, we love to help you.
house_rules: Smoking is prohibited inside the house.
host_about: Hello!

name: EU-Room, Berlin Mitte, Nähe Hbf., Tiergarten
summary: EU-Room sind Einzelzimmer mit gemeinsamer Küche- und Bad-Benutzung. Das Zimmer ist abgeschlossen und möbliert. Voll Ausgestattete Küche. Toilette, Duschbad. Bügeleisen- u. Brett Waschmaschine Geeignet für Sprachschüler, Praktikanten, Berufstätige für längere Mietdauer. Aber auch kürzere Zeiträume. Wenn Ihr EU-Room bucht, seid Ihr über längere Zeit in einer Wohngemeinschaft mit zum Teil unterschiedlichen Menschen zusammen. Dies erfordert  ein gewisses Maaß an Toleranz und Entgegenkommen.
space: Die ruhigen EU-Room-Zimmer sind  für Langzeitmieter und auch für Wochenweise anmietung konzipiert, und einfach ausgestattet. Für die Reinigung, Ordnung und Sauberkeit ist jeder Bewohner mitverantwortlich und bemüht sich seine eigenen Hinterlassenschaften im Gemeinschaftsbereich zu beseitigen und zu reinigen. Für das abschließbare Einzel-Zimmer ist jede Person selber verantwortlich. Eine Endreinigung wird mit 20,00 Euro berechnet. Bettwäsche, Handtücher, Service- und Reinigungsartikel werden für eine Gebüher von 20 Euro zur Verfügung gestellt.  Beides in Summe, wird mit € 40,00 als Reinigungsgebühr ausgewiesen.

neighborhood_overview: Im unmittelbaren Umfeld der Wohnung findet man Geschäfte, Apotheken, Gastronomien, Supermärkte, Kaffee´s, und und und, alles was man benötigt. Im nahegelegenen Hauptbahnhof sind die Geschäfte 24 Stunden lang geöffnet. Der nahegelegene Park lädt zum Entspannen ein. Die Spree und der Tiergarten sind auch sehr nah, und fußläufig in 5 Minuten erreichbar. Nah genug am Geschehen, um Berlin in seiner vollen Pracht zu erleben, und fern genug um danach in einen friedlichen Schlaf zu entfliehen

The apartment is well connected to public transport to all areas of Berlin including Mitte, Kreuzberg and Neukölln. It's also very direct to both airports and the main train station. The apartment has everything you could need for your stay -- WIFI, TV, DVD, surround sound, Washing Machine, Ironing Equipment, Oven, Fridge/Freezer, Linen. name: Modern & warm appartment close to Alexanderplatz!
summary: Meine schöne Wohnung liegt im Prenzlauer Berg, direkt beim berühmten Mauerpark, alles öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel sind in 5 min. zu erreichen, Bäckerei, Cafés, Restaurants aller Art sind direkt in der Straße. Am Alexanderplatz ist man innerhalb von 15 min!  Ihr habt ein privates Zimmer zur Verfügung, eine tolle Wohnküche mit allem drum& dran, ein schönes Badezimmer mit Glasdusche, und ein großes, sehr weiches Doppelbett. Der Ausblick über die schönen Altbauten in der Nachbarschaft ist toll :)
space: The room has got an amazing cosy King size Bed with a soft mattress, and a view over the nice old buildings in the neighbourhood.  At night its really quiet, you have got a TV that you can use with Wifi and an HDMI cable for your laptop connection :) The couch is amazing and can be a bed for a third person if you like. My flatmate is an easy going canadian girl who isn't home much.  The kitchen has got everything you need and the shower is just amazing :)

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is super safe, there are lots of families , little kids riding bikes, and the hip young community of typical berlin people. The street is even though there are many restaurants, cafes bakerys and Spätis still quiet at night, and the Schönhauser Allee is a 5 min walk away.
transit: You will get everywhere by S-Bahn, Underground or Tram, everything is just a 5 min walk away. To Alexanderplatz its 15 min total.
interaction: Love to help you out with  ideas for sightseeing :)
house_rules: - Pfleglicher Umgang mit allen Dingen in der Wohnung als wenn es eure eigene wäre - bitte sauber hinterlassen :) - Hausschlüssel muss zurückgegegeben werden ;) - Diebstahl verboten
host_about:
Hallo ihr lieben, 
ich wohne jetzt seit über einem Jahr in Berlin und bin vorher auch 2,5 Jahre mit meinem Rucksack durch die Welt gereist und weiß daher ganz gut, dass es meistens schöner und günstiger ist in einem wirklichen Zu Hause zu nächtigen als in irgendeinem Hotel :)
Wenn ihr irgendwelche Fragen bezüglich Sightseeing habt, kann ich euch gerne ein paar Tipps geben :)
Freue mich,
Katha

name: Kuschlige 1-Zimmer Wohnung im schönen Prenzlberg
summary: Die Unterkunft ist sehr zentral gelegen. Bis zum Alexanderplatz sind es nur 10 Minuten mit der Bahn. Die umliegende Nachbarschaft ist malerisch und ruhig. Bis zu den nächsten öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln sind es nur 2 Minuten zu Fuß. Die Unterkunft ist geeignet für Einzelpersonen, Freunde oder Paare. Das Badezimmer und die Küche sind sehr modern und mit allem ausgestattet was man braucht. Besonders das Badezimmer sticht mit seiner Eckbadewanne hervor.

name: VISITCITY24 - Spandauer Damm
summary: Nice studio with bathroom and fully equipped kitchenette in the central part of West Berlin – close to Castle Charlottenburg, Messe Berlin and ICC. Private parking, 2 double sofas. 300 meters from S-Bahn station Westend.
space: This is completely independent apartment – so you will be only guest inside! We can accommodate up to 4 persons.  There are 2 double sofas to sleep. Our apartment consists of: - living room with fully equipped kitchenette – 22 sqm, - bathroom with shower – 3 sqm, - corridor with wardrobe – 3 sqm.
description: Nice studio with bathroom and fully equipped kitchenette in the central part of West Berlin – close to Castle Charlottenburg, Messe Berlin and ICC. Private parking, 2 double sofas. 300 meters from S-Bahn station Westend. This is completely independent apartment – so you will be only guest inside! We can accommodate up to 4 persons.  There are 2 double sofas to sleep. Our apartment consists of: - living room with fully equipped kitchenette – 22 sqm, - bathroom with shower – 3 sqm, - corridor with wardrobe – 3 sqm. Inside our apartment there are following facilities / appliances: - FREE Wi-Fi -32’ LED TV (cable TV, approx. 40 channels), -Small table and coffee table, -Wardrobe, -Fridge, -Stove, -Iron, -Hair dryer, -Kettle, -Simple coffee machine, -Bed-linen and towel included. You will meet me or my friend during your check-in. We do not live in the apartment – but if you will have some requests we can come to the apartment or deliver something you need. My apartment is located next to f
neighborhood_overview: My apartment is located next to famous Schloss (Castle) Charlottenburg which is main attraction of the district.  You have also good connection with Berlin Zoologischer Garten, Berlin Fair (Messe Berlin) and ICC – International Congress Centre. Just opposite the building there is very nice playground for children. There are 3 supermarkets within 100 meters - ALDI, Kaisers and Penny. You have 2 restaurants just downstairs and a lot of restaurants nearby.
notes: Due to new legal regulations in Berlin we accept only reservations for min. 60 days and longer.
transit: The nearest public transportation is: S-Bahn (city rail) – station WESTEND – 200 meters. U-Bahn (subway) – station Richard Wagner Platz (U7 line) and Sophie Charlotte Platz (line U2) – 800 meters Bus – line M45 to Zoologischer Garten – just downstairs! During your stay you can use our safe, private parking place (5 EUR/day). The apartment is just 200 meters away from exit form internal highway A100 (Stadtring) – exit number 6 Spandauer Damm. Connection from Tegel Airport – bus 109 to stop Luisenplatz (15 min). Connection from Schonefeld Airport – city train (S-Bahn) to station Westend (50 min). Connection from railway station Berlin HBF - S-Bahn to station Westend (20 min). Connection from bus station Berlin ZOB - S-Bahn to station Westend (10 min) or 15 min. walk.
access: Inside our apartment there are following facilities / appliances: - FREE Wi-Fi -32’ LED TV (cable TV, approx. 40 channels), -Small table and coffee table, -Wardrobe, -Fridge, -Stove, -Iron, -Hair dryer, -Kettle, -Simple coffee machine, -Bed-linen and towel included.
interaction: You will meet me or my friend during your check-in. We do not live in the apartment – but if you will have some requests we can come to the apartment or deliver something you need.
house_rules: No smoking please. Check-in after 20:00 and on Sunday / holiday costs 20 EUR.  Please inform us about your estimated check-in time 7 days before arrival. Check-in directly at the apartment - on the day of check-in please just call/text us 30 minutes before check-in to confirm your arrival or in case of any delay. If you will be late more than 1 hour and you do not inform us about it we can add 10 EUR for each hour of waiting for you.  You can use our private parking place - 10 EUR per night. CityTax 5%.
host_about:
Welcome in my apartment,
I am very glad that you will be my guests. I can give you some tips about Berlin and some interesting places in this fantastic city.

Herzlich willkommen in meinem Apartment
Ich würde mich freuen, wenn ihr Euch für meine Wohnung entscheidet und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite.


Serdecznie witam w moim apartamencie,
Cieszę się że będziecie Państwo naszymi gośćmi - z przyjemnością podzielę się z Wami informacjami o ciekawych miejscach w Berlinie.

name: Gemütliche 1-Zimmer-Wohnung in Berlin Wilmersdorf
summary: Es handelt sich um eine kleine aber sehr feine 1-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung in der 2. Etage eines ruhigen Hinterhauses in Berlin-Wilmersdorf. Die Wohnung ist komplett möbliert. Ideal für einen Kurzurlaub in Berlin! ICH FREUE MICH AUF DEINE ANFRAGE
space: Es handelt sich um eine kleine aber sehr feine 1-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung in der 2. Etage eines ruhigen Hinterhauses in Berlin-Wilmersdorf. Die Wohnung ist komplett möbliert (1,40m Bett, Kleiderschrank, Schreibtisch, Wohnwand), Küche (mit Esstisch, Waschmaschine) und Bad mit Dusche.
description: Es handelt sich um eine kleine aber sehr feine 1-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung in der 2. Etage eines ruhigen Hinterhauses in Berlin-Wilmersdorf. Die Wohnung ist komplett möbliert. Etage eines ruhigen Hinterhauses in Berlin-Wilmersdorf. Die Wohnung ist komplett möbliert (1,40m Bett, Kleiderschrank, Schreibtisch, Wohnwand), Küche (mit Esstisch, Waschmaschine) und Bad mit Dusche. Ich stelle während meiner Abwesenheit Bettwäsche und Handtücher zur Verfügung. Ich rauche nicht und bitte auch dich darum, zum Rauchen in den Innenhof zu gehen. Falls du neu bist in Berlin, gebe ich dir sehr gern einige Informationen was Shopping, Feiern, Essen, Einkaufen und Unternehmungen betrifft. Die Wohnung liegt zwischen dem U-Bhf Ferbelliner Platz (U3 und U7) und dem U-Bhf Blissestraße (U7) und in Kudamm-Nähe. Ideal für HWR-Studenten aber auch für alle anderen sehr g
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt zwischen dem U-Bhf Ferbelliner Platz (U3 und U7) und dem U-Bhf Blissestraße (U7) und in Kudamm-Nähe. Ideal für HWR-Studenten aber auch für alle anderen sehr gut gelegen.  Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (Edeka-Reichelt, Biocompany Lidl, Netto, Rossmann), eine Sparkasse, und Apotheken in 5 Gehminuten und McFit in 10 Minuten erreichbar.  Für Spaziergänge gibt es den großen Volkspark Wilmersdorf oder den kleinen Preußenpark mit Parkcafé und Biergarten, an den Wochenenden findet dort ein Antikflohmarkt statt. Direkt in der Wegenerstraße gibt es einen Italiener, einen Kiosk, einen Bäcker und ein französisches Lokal. Im Sommer hate eine kleine Eisdiele geöffnet. In meinem Kiez wohnen viele Familien mit Kindern und es ist eine ruhige Wohngegend.

house_rules: Im Innenhof darf geraucht werden.
host_about:
Hey guys,

my name is Sina, I am 23 I've just finished my business studies. I am born and raised in Berlin and work in controlling department in a huge industrial company.

In my free time I like to go out, travel the world, do some sports and hang out with my friends.
I am very open-minded and always friendly. I like to get to know a lot of people and have a lot of experiences.

name: Spacious Room in Old Charming Flat
summary: A sunny, spacious room, centrally located on Reuterstrasse. Conveniently close to Hermannplatz Station; connecting you to all the sights of the city. A 5 minute stroll to the nightlife on Weserstrasse, grocery shops and a delightful market place open Tuesday, Friday, Saturday and every second Sunday.
space: A room large enough to be a flat with in a flat. It is in the beloved Reuterkiez in a turn of the century building with all of its original charm. Here you will have all the comforts of home.  You are of course welcome to use our kitchen, it is very well equipped with everything you might need to cook during your stay. The flat is very close to the U8 at Hermannplatz, which is a great gateway for you to use to travel around Berlin and sight see. Lots of cafes and bars right next to your door in one of the hippest, happening neighbourhoods of Berlin. The room is 25 qm, nicely furnished. This room is in high demand so please feel free to look at my profile for our other accommodation in my flat: Charming and Cozy Room in Reuterkiez! If you have any questions, please send me a message, I'm happy to help you get the most out of your stay in Berlin!

name: Wonderfully 3 room Apt in Mitte!
summary: Wonderfully, sunny, three room apartment with 86 sqm / 926 ft  in a renovated historical house in the heart of Berlin in Mitte-for 1-5 people- with 3 seperated sleeping rooms and a cozy living room. Located at the first floor, quiet neighbourhood
space: Feel in Berlin as if you were in your own home in this comfortable, spacious and recently renovated apartment. The house was built in 1883, is newly renovated (2013) with modern heating, bathroom, high ceiling, wooden floors and stuck ornaments. Although situated in the heart of Berlin, in Mitte, famous for its cultural and night life, this apartment is extremely quiet and peaceful. With 86sqm it includes a large living room with a balcony with sun in the morning and afternoon, two spacious and relaxing rooms with double bed and a bathroom with bathtub. You will also find a fully equipped kitchen to cook. If you prefer not to cook, enjoy the many restaurants and bars just 2 minutes walk from your home. Or just relax on the comfortable sofa or on the balcony in the living room while listening to music or chatting with your friends and recover from a long day of sightseeing. Within five minutes walk you will find a grocery store open until 24:00, a small kiosk/backery open 24 hours, Unde

name: On Top Of Berlin-Schöneberg
summary: Erlebe den Geist Berlins in meiner 110 qm Dachgeschosswohnung mit Dachterrassse und friem Blick über die Dächer. Das Schlafzimmer liegt zum Hinterhof, ruhiger Schlaf garantiert. Ideale S-Bahn-Anbindung (S1 - 3 min Fussweg).
space: Die Dachterrasse der Wohnung bietet einen einzigartigen Blick über Berlin (Potsdamer Platz, Fernsehturm/Alex, Gasometer). Das Schlafzimmer liegt zum Hinterhof und garantiert einen ruhigen Schlaf.
description: Erlebe den Geist Berlins in meiner 110 qm Dachgeschosswohnung mit Dachterrassse und friem Blick über die Dächer. Das Schlafzimmer liegt zum Hinterhof, ruhiger Schlaf garantiert. Ideale S-Bahn-Anbindung (S1 - 3 min Fussweg).  Die Dachterrasse der Wohnung bietet einen einzigartigen Blick über Berlin (Potsdamer Platz, Fernsehturm/Alex, Gasometer). Das Schlafzimmer liegt zum Hinterhof und garantiert einen ruhigen Schlaf. Meine Gäste haben Zutritt zum Wohnzimmer samt Dachterrasse, zum Bad (Waschmaschine) und zur Küche (Spülmaschine). Zusätzlich ist eine seperate Gästetoilette und ein weiterer Abstellraum (bsp. Gepäck) in der Küche vorhanden. Ich bewohne ein Zimmer im vorderen Teil der Wohnung und begleite meine Gäste bei sämtlichen Fragen rund um ihren Aufenthalt in Berlin. Falls gewünscht organisiere ich die Unternehmungen meiner Gäste (Stadtführung, Theater, Konzert etc.). Die Wohnung liegt auf der Schöneberger "Roten Insel". Dieser Statdtteil Schönebergs verfügt über eine eigenständige I
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt auf der Schöneberger "Roten Insel". Dieser Statdtteil Schönebergs verfügt über eine eigenständige Infrastruktur: Von der Apotheke bis zum Wochgenmarkt - man findet alles gleich um die Ecke. Unbedingt empfehlenswert sind die Akazien- und die Crellestrasse mit ihren malerischen Cafés, exotischen Restaurants und ausgiebigen Shoppingmöglichkeiten.
notes: Keine
transit: Die Wohnung ist optimal ans öffentliche Verkehrsnetz angebunden: Fussweg zur S-Bahn und zum Bus 3 Minuten (Julius-Leber-Brücke), zum Regional- und Fernverkehr der Deutschen Bahn 8 Minuten (Südkreuz), zur Stadtautobahn mit dem PKW 2 Minuten.

interaction: Ich bewohne ein Zimmer im vorderen Teil der Wohnung und begleite meine Gäste bei sämtlichen Fragen rund um ihren Aufenthalt in Berlin. Falls gewünscht organisiere ich die Unternehmungen meiner Gäste (Stadtführung, Theater, Konzert etc.).
house_rules: Die Wohnung ist eine Nichtraucherwohnung. Gelegentliches Rauchen ist auf der Dachterrasse gestattet. Haustiere sind nicht erlaubt.
host_about: Ich bin freier Redakteur und PR-Berater, habe eine kleine Tochter und einen Sohn und geniesse gemeinsame Unternehmungen (Theater, Konzerte, Reisen) mit Freunden. Es gibt zwei "Dinge", ohne die ich nicht leben könnte: Anne, meine Tochter, und David, meinen Sohn.

name: Schönes und gemütliches Zimmer zum Wohlfühlen
summary: Hallo lieber Gast, du wohnst in einer netten 4er Wg, die nur 5 Gehminuten vom Ostkreuz entfernt ist. Direkt gegenüber findest du hervorragende Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (Kaufland), sowie Lidl, eine Bio Company, aber auch zahlreiche Bars, Clubs, Restaurants und Kneipen. Wenn du etwas Ruhe von all dem Trubel brauchst, findest du ganz in der Nähe die Rummelsburger Bucht, wo du herrlich am Wasser entspannen kannst. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für Paare, alleinreisende Abenteurer und Geschäftsreisende.
space: Mein Zimmer bietet gegen Aufpreis auch Platz für zwei Personen. Falls du mit einem/r Freund/in anreisen willst, kannst du gerne Kontakt zu mir aufnehmen. In diesem Fall zahlt die zweite Person 50 % des ursprünglichen Preises.

Du kannst bei uns gerne das Badezimmer und die Waschmaschine nutzen. Außerdem steht die Küche zum Kochen und Entspannen für dich bereit. Hier findest du alles, was du brauchst wie Kühlschrank, Herd, Wasserkocher und vieles mehr. Bei Fragen kannst du dich gerne an mich oder mein
neighborhood_overview: Unser Haus wird von netten jungen Leuten und Familien bewohnt.
notes: Im Preis inbegriffen sind ein sauberes Handtuch sowie frische Bettwäsche.
transit: Bei uns wohnst du nur 5 Gehminuten vom Ostkreuz entfernt. Von dort aus findest du Anschuss in alle Richtungen mit der S-Bahn, Tram oder dem Bus. Aber auch zu Fuß bist du schnell im Friedrichshainer Kiez, der auf jeden Fall eine Erkundungstour wert ist.
access: Du kannst bei uns gerne das Badezimmer und die Waschmaschine nutzen. Außerdem steht die Küche zum Kochen und Entspannen für dich bereit. Hier findest du alles, was du brauchst wie Kühlschrank, Herd, Wasserkocher und vieles mehr.
interaction: Bei Fragen kannst du dich gerne an mich oder meine Mitbewohner wenden. Sie helfen dir auch gern weiter.

name: Beautiful Space in Friedrichshain
summary: A beautiful and quiet 2 Room Flat in Berlin, in the central neighbourhood of Friedrichshain, a huge park in front of the house, another one and the very lively Simon -Dach-Strasse in walking distance.  Alexanderplatz less than 10min by metro.
space: I am freelance photographer and cinematographer and this is my working space. Since i am spending a serious amount of days abroad, i thought, it would be a waste to keep this place empty, so i  modify it to a living space.  The apartment it self is located In Friedrichhshain and accommodates up to 3 people.  A 140x200 double bed and a very comfy sleeping sofa in the living room. The flat is on the ground floor in a very green and quiet courtyard. The biggest benefit is the location - very nice park, just across the street, another sport park, if you are regular jogger 500m away, the huge Friedrihshain Park less than 1 km. The very lively and famous Simon-Dach-Str with its restaurants and cool bars you will reach in less than 10min walking.  Toilet and bathroom are separate,  the kitchen has all the necessary elements to cook, a big refrigerator, toaster, as well as basic things like salt, oil, coffee, tee, milk and pasta.  On the end, this space is just very cozy and homey.....

neighborhood_overview: Around you will find several bakeries, cafes and restaurants: Just across the street, right out of the house is next big super market.  La Tienda del Torojust - nice spanish tapas and wines, around the corner, in the Bänschstrasse 41. In the Samariterstrasse 14 you will find a classical south german bakery, where you can buy good stuff for breakfast. Just next to it is a small coffee shop, they serve italian sandwiches, ciabatta, and good coffee.   Close by, Samaratiterstrase 29, you will find a small, but very fine bistro for vegetarian and vegan food, Kiez Cuisine, really good!   On the corner Samariter/Schreinerstrasse, ther is a russian restaurant, ANASTASIA, quiet ok. Just across you will find a self-service-laundry.  You can rent a bike at LITTLE JOHN BIKE,  Frankfurter Allee (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Berlin, its less than 10min walk from the flat.  In the Schreinerstrasse 59, there is a fine wine-salon. name: Beautiful central Berlin Mitte
summary: The apartment (3 rooms plus kitchen and bath) is beautifully located in the historic Berlin-Mitte. Small street in very central location. 5 min walk to museum island. public transport near by in every direction.
space: The apartment (3 rooms plus kitchen and bath) is beautifully located in the historic Berlin-Mitte. The neighborhood was the jewish quarter prior to the war and is filled with history and culture. The old Synagogue lies around the corner. The small quiet street location has great shopping, cafes and cultural venues nearby. A very central location with easy access to public transportation in all directions. Just a 2 minute walk to museum island where you find 5 major art museums including the Pergamon- and Bode-Museum.

name: light sweet attic room
summary: 1 Zimmer mit eigenem Bad für 1 Person.  Das Haus befindet sich ruhig gelegen in der Bruno Taut Siedlung im grünen Stadtteil Zehlendorf. Zur U-Bahn Onkel Toms Hütte sind es 2-3 Minuten Fußweg.
space: Das Zimmer befindet sich in einem kleinen Reihenhaus in der Waldsiedung Zehlendorf oder auch Bruno Taut Siedlung. Sie ist in den 20iger Jahren als Arbeitersiedlung entstanden und ist wegen ihrer bunten Farben auch als Papageiensiedlung bekannt. Die Siedlung gehört als Ensemble zum UNESCO Weltkulturebe.  Das Zimmer liegt im 2. Stock (Dachgeschoss) und hat gleich nebenan ein eigenes Bad mit Dusche.

transit: Die U-Bahnstation heißt "Onkel Toms Hütte" und ist fußläufig in 2-3 Minuten erreichbar.  Die nächste S-Bahnstationen sind Mexikoplatz oder Zehlendorf Mitte. Beides ist von hier aus gut mit einem Bus erreichbar. Man kann hier in der Strasse kostenlos mit dem Auto parken, allerdings ist es manchmal voll und man muss die Seitenstrasse nutzen. Die Strasse ist eine ruhige Einbahnstrasse in einer 30er Zone. Vom Flughafen und vom Hauptbahnhof kommt man mit Bus und U-Bahn gut hierher. Die U-Bahn Station heißt Onkel Toms Hütte, von dort aus ist man in 20-30 Minuten in Berlin Mitte, am Alexanderplatz und auch am Wannsee und in Potsdam.

name: Topfloor Design apartment
summary: Spacious, light and airy top floor design apartment in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Tranquil bedroom facing the inner courtyard, furnished with Japanese Tatami king sized Futon bed.  There is a beautiful terrace facing the West, capturing Berlin’s sunshine. Open living room with a big corner sofa, dinning table and ample seating. Directly connected to the fully equipped quality kitchen. The bathroom is naturally lit with a sky light features a shower and bathtub.
description: Spacious, light and airy top floor design apartment in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Tranquil bedroom facing the inner courtyard, furnished with Japanese Tatami king sized Futon bed.  There is a beautiful terrace facing the West, capturing Berlin’s sunshine. Open living room with a big corner sofa, dinning table and ample seating. Directly connected to the fully equipped quality kitchen. The bathroom is naturally lit with a sky light features a shower and bathtub. Prenzlauer Berg offers an array of tasty restaurants, from fine Asian dining to Berlin’s best burgers at The Bird, cool bars and a laid back coffee culture. A 24 hour supermarket, convenience stores, bakeries, wineries, ice cream parlours, juiceries and famous Mauerpark with Sunday vintage market are just a few minutes walk away. The apartments calm energy, central location and great transport connections should fulfill your needs. The apartment is perfectly connected to public transport with S/U-Bahn stop Schoenhauser Allee
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg offers an array of tasty restaurants, from fine Asian dining to Berlin’s best burgers at The Bird, cool bars and a laid back coffee culture. A 24 hour supermarket, convenience stores, bakeries, wineries, ice cream parlours, juiceries and famous Mauerpark with Sunday vintage market are just a few minutes walk away. The apartments calm energy, central location and great transport connections should fulfill your needs.
notes: Treat as your respectful home. No parties. Just good times.
transit: The apartment is perfectly connected to public transport with S/U-Bahn stop Schoenhauser Allee and Eberswalder Strasse at 7 minutes walk.  Both airports (Tegel and Schoenefeld) can easily be reached in approx 30 minutes.  Central Alexanderplatz is at 8 minutes with the U 2. From there you can change to all important U and S-Bahn lines. Several tram and bus stops are just around the corner. The east-west line M10 takes you to Friedrichshain and the edge of Kreuzberg in 15 minutes.

summary: Dear future guest! We are very proud to present our new home :) This beautiful, sunny and spacious apartment is located close to Ostkreuz, Boxhagener Platz and Rummelsburger Bay - right between a lively neighborhood with a lot of bars, restaurants and clubs and the quite and beautiful bay, which invites you to long walks in the nature.

host_about:
After graduating from my Bachelor and went out to travel the world. I am interested in getting to know people and their way of life, languages and all the beautiful places on earth. During my 4 month traveling in the USA, Mexico, Cuba, Guatemala, Peru, Bolivia, Chile and Brasil I learned a lot about myself, and the amazing people I met teached me to value every moment in live.
After that I lived for a year in Argentina where I was traveling, working and enjoying life. Then I came back to Berlin to study a Master in Arts and Media Administration which I ended last year. Now I am working as Marketing Manager and saving for my next big travel :)
I love music and the nature. I go a lot to the cinema and concerts and love watching all kinds of movies. When travelling I intend to use my time to the fullest and to see the most. In order to do that I am looking for a quite place where I can rest and safe energy for my trip.

If you want to know more about me and see some of my references, check out my couchsurfing profile: (URL HIDDEN) I am a passionate couchsurfer and love to meet locals to get to know the places I visit the best.

My motto: Live your dreams, don´t dream your life!!

name: Kurfürstendamm - Home away from home
summary: Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe von Kurfürstendamm. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen Küche, Gemütlichkeit, hohe Decken, der Ausblick und die Lage. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für paare, alleinreisende abenteurer, geschäftsreisende und familien (mit kindern).
space: Hello! Our beautiful home is right next to the most famous street in Berlin - Kurfürstendamm.The bus station is just a 1-minute walk away from home.The train station is also within walking distance,but you can take a bus (5 to 10 minutes) to the famous Zoologischer Garten.From here you can travel to anywhere you want in Europe.We are surrounded by beautiful pubs in a very quiet home.There is a bus which drives directly from the airport to our place and back. We,my daughter and I,have a beautiful garden and apartment to share.We will basically share everything,apart from hygiene articles of course.We have a 2-room (URL HIDDEN) rooms in Germany mean ONE bedroom and ONE living (URL HIDDEN) other rooms,e.g. bathroom are not counted but are within the apartment. neighborhood_overview: This is an amazing place to live or spend your time in Berlin.You will be right next to Kurfürstendamm and have access to a variety of means of transport - subway,buses,the major train station in Berlin that can connect you to other European countries or cities in Germany,buses that drive directly to and from the airport and then there's (URL HIDDEN) spite of all that's going on outside,the apartment is very quiet and a wonderful place to disappear and yet see and be seen :-).
notes: We have Starbucks and Subway right across the street.
transit: Buses,subway,train station - Zoologischer Garten,the possibility to park right in front of the door,but during the day you might need some patience. I will probably pick you up from the nearest station,depending on your time of arrival.I have time after nine p.m. on most days. -U Bahnhof Zoologischer Garten (Underground) -S Bahnhof Zoologischer Garten (Metro) - U Bahnhof Kurfürstendamm (Underground) - S Bahnhof Savigny Platz (Metro) - U Bahnhof Wilmersdorfer Straße (Underground)  -Adenauer Platz (Underground) -S Bahnhof Halensee (Metro) -S Bahnhof Charlottenburg (Metro) -The buses from the airport - Tegel - drive directly to my place.1 minute walk from the bus stop. -There are more than 5 bus lines that stop at Kurfürstendamm.You will probably get to any place you want to within Berlin in half an hour.
access: There are no restrictions.
interaction: If you're homesick I can give you hugs :-),but probably will not have time to spend with you.
house_rules: - NO racists allowed! -I understand that everyone has their favorite perfumes,but in my home PLEASE do not use perfume.I don't mind if you use it outside,but not within the apartment. -Please do not bring food with you.There is a Subway, 2 Starbucks,supermarkets,bakeries and over a hundred restaurants and cafes all within walking distance.Food will also not be consumed in the bedroom.I promise you will not starve :-). -No visitors allowed,but I suppose that goes without saying. -I'm pretty flexible about checkout time.We'll just talk about your plans and my plans. No problem :-). -Please note that I probably will not have time to spend with you during your stay.I therefore expect a certain degree of independence from you and will give you excellent directions to get to any destination.  -Please clean after yourself - very important.Just leave it as you found it and it will be ok. It takes a couple of seconds to get rid of hair,especially underneath the shower and in the sink,BUT leaves

name: Über den Dächern von Schöneberg
summary: Erlebe den Geist Berlins in meiner 110 qm Dachgeschosswohnung mit Dachterrasse und freiem Blick über die Dächer. Das Schlafzimmer liegt zum Hinterhof, ruhiger Schlaf garantiert. Ideale S-Bahn-Anbindung (S1 - 3 min Fussweg).
space: Die Dachterrasse der Wohnung bietet einen einzigartigen Blick über Berlin (Potsdamer Platz, Fernsehturm/Alex, Gasometer). Das Schlafzimmer liegt zum Hinterhof und garantiert einen ruhigen Schlaf.
description: Erlebe den Geist Berlins in meiner 110 qm Dachgeschosswohnung mit Dachterrasse und freiem Blick über die Dächer. Das Schlafzimmer liegt zum Hinterhof, ruhiger Schlaf garantiert. Ideale S-Bahn-Anbindung (S1 - 3 min Fussweg). Die Dachterrasse der Wohnung bietet einen einzigartigen Blick über Berlin (Potsdamer Platz, Fernsehturm/Alex, Gasometer). Das Schlafzimmer liegt zum Hinterhof und garantiert einen ruhigen Schlaf. Meine Gäste haben Zutritt zum Wohnzimmer samt Dachterrasse, zum Bad (Waschmaschine) und zur Küche (Spülmaschine). Zusätzlich ist eine seperate Gästetoilette und ein weiterer Abstellraum (bsp. für Gepäck) in der Küche vorhanden. Ich bewohne ein Zimmer im vorderen Teil der Wohnung und begleite meine Gäste bei sämtlichen Fragen rund um ihren Aufenthalt in Berlin. Falls gewünscht organisiere ich die Unternehmungen meiner Gäste (Stadtführung, Theater, Konzert etc.). Die Wohnung liegt auf der Schöneberger "Roten Insel". Dieser Stadtteil Schönebergs verfügt über eine eigenständige
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt auf der Schöneberger "Roten Insel". Dieser Stadtteil Schönebergs verfügt über eine eigenständige Infrastruktur: Von der Apotheke bis zum Wochenmarkt - man findet alles gleich um die Ecke. Unbedingt empfehlenswert sind die Akazien- und die Crellestrasse mit ihren malerischen Cafés, exotischen Restaurants und ausgiebigen Shoppingmöglichkeiten.
notes: Keine
transit: Die Wohnung ist optimal ans öffentliche Verkehrsnetz angebunden: Fussweg zur S-Bahn und zum Bus 3 Minuten (Julius-Leber-Brücke), zum Regional- und Fernverkehr der Deutschen Bahn 8 Minuten (Südkreuz), zur Stadtautobahn mit dem PKW 2 Minuten.
access: Meine Gäste haben Zutritt zum Wohnzimmer samt Dachterrasse, zum Bad (Waschmaschine) und zur Küche (Spülmaschine). Zusätzlich ist eine seperate Gästetoilette und ein weiterer Abstellraum (bsp. für Gepäck) in der Küche vorhanden.
interaction: Ich bewohne ein Zimmer im vorderen Teil der Wohnung und begleite meine Gäste bei sämtlichen Fragen rund um ihren Aufenthalt in Berlin. Falls gewünscht organisiere ich die Unternehmungen meiner Gäste (Stadtführung, Theater, Konzert etc.).
house_rules: Die Wohnung ist eine Nichtraucherwohnung. Gelegentliches Rauchen ist auf der Dachterrasse gestattet. Haustiere sind nicht erlaubt.
host_about: Ich bin freier Redakteur und PR-Berater, habe eine kleine Tochter und einen Sohn und geniesse gemeinsame Unternehmungen (Theater, Konzerte, Reisen) mit Freunden. Es gibt zwei "Dinge", ohne die ich nicht leben könnte: Anne, meine Tochter, und David, meinen Sohn.

name: Stylish apartment
summary: 2 Balkone, Stuckdecken, Dielenböden und ein Lage mitten in Friedrichshain mit zahlreichen Bars, Cafes und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe. Dazu Einkaufsmöglichkeiten direkt vor der Haustür und eine sehr gute Verkehrsabindung (S-Bahnhof Ostkreuz).
space: Light and bright first floor apartment (2 rooms, kitchen, bathroom and 2 balconies), with complete and modern facilities for a maximum of 6 persons. It is located in a restored old buildings in Berlin, near the city center, in a convenient and central location near Ostkreuz station. kitchen: - sink - Stove with 4 plates - Crockery, cutlery etc. - Kettle - Tea - Toaster - balcony bath room: Hand basin, shower, toilet, washing mashine. living room: pull-out bed (mattress 150cm x 190cm), armchair, table, television (cable), wardrobe, balcony. bedrooms: Double bed (140cm x 200cm), two single beds, sideboard Long distance train station Ostbahnhof is within 10 minutes by bus (bus stop: 50m) away. You can park directly in front of the house. S-Bahn, bus, tram and shops (including a large supermarket), and numerous restaurants, cafes (great for breakfast), bars and pubs are located within a radius of 50 to 100 meters. Attractions in the area: - East Side Gallery - Oberbaumbrücke - Friedrichsha

name: single bed room in friedrichshain (centre)
summary: i offer a nice, homely room in my flat. there are three rooms, one full appointed kitchen and bathroom. it's directly in the heart of berlin, 5 minutes to s-bhf warschauer straße, definitely one of the most lively area in berlin.
space: nearby are all the clubs you would want to visit (berghain, wilde renate, kater blau, suicide circus, sisyphus, about blank, watergate and there all reachable by foot) as well as lots of bars, cafés, restaurants etc.  the room has a single bed. the flat is equipped with a bathtub, washing machine, everything you need in order to cook a decent meal, coffee-maker, towels, hair dryer and WiFi.

name: Cozy duplex in Friedrichshain
summary: My place is situated in a very nice area of Berlin.  Full of restaurants, bars, cafes and not far from the city center. You’ll love my place because of the location, the neighborhood, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: My apartment is a cozy 75 sqm duplex in the heart of Friedrichshain. It's on the ground and first floor. The ground floor is a big open space with a kitchen, a guest restroom, a dining room and a living room that opens on a big terrace. The two bedrooms and the main bathroom are on the first floor. You will be particularly pleased with the huge Italian shower. There is a bathtub as well.
description: My place is situated in a very nice area of Berlin.  Full of restaurants, bars, cafes and not far from the city center. You’ll love my place because of the location, the neighborhood, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. My apartment is a cozy 75 sqm duplex in the heart of Friedrichshain. It's on the ground and first floor. The ground floor is a big open space with a kitchen, a guest restroom, a dining room and a living room that opens on a big terrace. The two bedrooms and the main bathroom are on the first floor. You will be particularly pleased with the huge Italian shower. There is a bathtub as well. Direct from Schönefeld with the S9 and 45 min from Tegel with the ring bahn. The tram 13 is right by and takes you to Warschauer Strasse/Kreuzberg (5min). I will welcome you in person at your arrival and will be glad to share some tips about restaurants, bars and clubs as well as for cool addresses to shop! It's 5 min away from Boxha
neighborhood_overview: It's 5 min away from Boxhagener Platz, where you will enjoy the cute food market on Saturday with all the shops around and the flea market on Sunday where I often find great things! If you are in the mood to go out, many clubs are within walking distance (Berghain, About Blank, Suicide Circus, Kosmonaut, etc...). It's also 5 min away from Ostrkreuz and Sontagstrasse, another lovely area full of bars and restaurants.
notes: I am currently not so often at home so it might be that you are able to enjoy the whole for yourself.
transit: Close to the M13, the U5 which takes you directly to Mitte, the M10 which goes to Prenzlauerberg or Kreuzberg and ring bahn that goes all around the city including Neukölln.
access: Direct from Schönefeld with the S9 and 45 min from Tegel with the ring bahn. The tram 13 is right by and takes you to Warschauer Strasse/Kreuzberg (5min).
interaction: I will welcome you in person at your arrival and will be glad to share some tips about restaurants, bars and clubs as well as for cool addresses to shop!

My name is Camille. 
I am from Paris and currently live in Berlin.

host_about:
I'm Tanja, computer scientist from Berlin.
As I was a student and a participant of the Erasmus exchange program, I discovered my interest for new countries and for open-minded people from different backgrounds and cultures. Since many years I really love to travel and to explore the world.
Besides traveling I like sailing, inline skating, stand-up-paddling (SUP) and snowboarding.

name: Cozy, beautiful flat in the centre of Berlin
summary: Cozy apartment at Boxhagener Platz (plaza park full of cool people, best bars and food). Also near by Spree River, Stasi-Museum, Revaler Straße & Simon-Dach-Straße (food & bars), Warschauer Straße (main street), Berghain (club), Watergate (club) and Ring-Center (shopping).  Public Transport is 1 min walking (uBahn, sBahn, Tram). You’ll love my place because of the location, the people, the ambiance, the space (big room). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.
space: Newly renovated 2 room apartment in Friedrichshain. Your room is large room with high ceilings and lots of natural light. There is a large double bed, and also a pull-out couch which is big and comfortable. Easily accommodate 3 people, even 4.  There is a large desk, wardrobe with hangers and big plants. The kitchen is nice and fully equipped, and can be used as a chilling area as well.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a quiet side street near the river Spree and the Charlottenburg Palace, together with the castle park. You sleep more quietly and are still in the middle of the city. Every Wednesday and Saturday 300 meters away, a weekly market takes place. In the market, or roughly 250 meters away supermarket (Edeka) you will find all your daily needs. In addition to the Charlottenburg Palace and the spacious park there are many museums, restaurants, shops and tourist attractions within walking distance. Distance from the apartment: - Edeka supermarket: 250 m - Weekly market (Wed + Sat): 300 m - A number of good restaurants can be found in the surrounding area.  - Landing for river trips (Spree) : 350 m - Charlottenburg Palace: 450 m - Museums: Scharf-Gerstenberg Collection: 750 m Berggruen Museum: 800 m Brohan Museum: 900m German Opera: 1.9 km Berlin State Opera: 2.4 km Berlin has an excellent public transport network. You can reach all sights of Berlin usually in 15 minu
notes: For short term stay only (up to 21 days only): Since 2014, the Berlin Senate rises the so-called City tax for private nights in the amount of 5% of the published price (without Airbnb service fee) to a stay of max. 21 days. This City Tax is payable by the guests upon arrival in cash separately. Longterm rentals and demonstrable business trips are excluded from this. We look forward to welcoming you in our apartment.
transit: nearest bus stop: "Schloss Brücke" 220 m nearest metro stop: "Mierendorffplatz" 450 m nearest tram stop: "Jungfernheide" 700 m Next free car parking: in front of the house - Tegel Airport: 6 minutes by taxi - Messe Berlin: 10 minutes by taxi - Main Train Station: 13 minutes by S-Bahn
access: The apartment is available exclusivly for you.
interaction: I'm looking forward to meet interesting people from all over the world.
house_rules: The apartment is a Non smoking apartment and is located in a quiet neighborhood. No Parties! Thank you for your understanding.
host_about:
Hello
we are hosts for more than 3 years in different ways. So we know all about being good hosts.  :-) 
We are happy and open-minded Berliner. We look forward to guests from all over the world, for a short trip or a longer stay, for holiday or business travel. We want to make your stay in Berlin as pleasant and relaxed as possible - as much as we wish it to us on our travels.

Welcome to the heart of the capital!


Hallo,
in verschiedener Art und Weise wir sind bereits seit über 3 Jahren Gastgeber. Durch unsere Erfahrungen wissen wir, was gutes Gastgeben ausmacht. :-))

Wir sind lebensfrohe und aufgeschlossene Berliner. Wir freuen uns auf Gäste von nah und fern, für kurz oder lang, auf Urlauber und Geschäftsreisende. Wir möchten Ihren Berlin-Aufenthalt so angenehm und entspannt wie möglich gestalten - genauso, wie wir es uns auf unseren Reisen wünschen.

 Herzlich Willkommen im Herzen der Hauptstadt!

name: große Wohnung im Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Sehr schöne 100m² große Wohnung im beliebten Bötzowviertel. In der 1.Etage gelegen empfangen Sie helle Räume, mit stuckverzierten, hohen Decken. 2 Schlafzimmer, 2 Balkone,1 großes und 1 kleines Bad, sowie ein Wohnzimmer und eine Küche warten auf Sie.
space: Sehr schöne, großzügig geschnittene 100m² Wohnung im beliebten Bötzowviertel. In der 1. Etage gelegen empfangen Sie helle Räume, mit stuckverzierten, hohen Decken. Von den zwei Balkonen aus haben Sie eine schöne Sicht auf die Liselotte-Herrman-Straße sowie auf die charmante Bötzowstraße. Neben zwei Schlafzimmern mit je einem Doppelbett bietet die Wohnung ein großes Wohnzimmer mit Esstisch, eine Küche mit Spülmaschine, ein geräumiges Bad mit Dusche und Badewanne wie auch ein Gästebad mit zweitem WC und einer Waschmaschine. Die Wohnung eignet sich hervorragend für Familien, Paare oder Freunde, die eine komfortable Unterkunft für ihre Zeit in Berlin suchen. Das Bötzowviertel zeichnet sich durch hohe Lebensqualität aus. Zahlreiche Cafes und Restaurants verlocken zum Entspannen, ausgefallene Boutiquen zum Flanieren und der nahegelegene Friedrichshain Park zu Freizeit- und Sportaktivitäten. Die öffentlichen Verkehrsanbindungen sind in unmittelbarer Nähe. Beautiful, generously proportioned ap

house_rules: Der Mieter verpflichtet sich die Nachtruhe von 22 Uhr bis 6 Uhr einzuhalten, die Nachbarschaft nicht mit Lärm zu belästigen, die Räume wie angemietet zu verlassen und sorgsam mit allen Einrichtungen um zu gehen. name: Grosses Zimmer in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Helles, grosses Zimmer für 2 Personen in einer 3 Zimmer-Wohnung. Mitten im Prenzlauer Berg zwischen Kollwitzplatz und Volkspark Friedrichshain. Gemeinsame Küche und Bad. Gute Verkehrsanbindung, Supermärkte, Apotheke, viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.
description: Helles, grosses Zimmer für 2 Personen in einer 3 Zimmer-Wohnung. Mitten im Prenzlauer Berg zwischen Kollwitzplatz und Volkspark Friedrichshain. Gemeinsame Küche und Bad. Gute Verkehrsanbindung, Supermärkte, Apotheke, viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.
house_rules: HAUSORDNUNG 1.  Wir teilen uns eine Wohnung mit Gästen aus der ganzen Welt und haben auch Nachbarn. Jeder hat eigene Interessen. Bitte respektiert das durch Rücksichtnahme. Bitte Morgens bis 9.00 und ab 22.00 Uhr nicht laut sein (Musik etc.) um allen einen komfortablen Aufenthalt zu ermöglichen. 2. Bitte das Badezimmer nicht mit Strassenschuhen betreten. 3. Bitte die Waschmaschine nur bis 18 Uhr benutzen (wir haben auch Nachbarn). Bitte eigenes Waschmittel benutzen. 4. Wenn du in der Küche bist bitte die Tür geschlossen halten. Bitte die Tür vom Kühl- und Gefrierschrank schliessen und IMMER darauf achten, das der Backofen ausgeschaltet und die Flammen vom Herd nach Benutzung aus sind. 5. Bitte nach dem kochen oder essen benutzte Sachen abwaschen, abtrocknen und gleich zurück in den Schrank, damit alle Gäste etwas davon haben. 6. Du bist auf Kaffee eingeladen. Es sind immer ausreichend Pads da. Bitte achte darauf, dass du sonst deine eigenen Lebensmittel und nicht die, der anderen Gäste

name: Own room with 1,60m bed in modern flat - Kreuzberg
summary: You can find our newly renovated Altbau apartment with a fully equipped kitchen, a cozy living room and a clean and a modern bathroom right between the Viktoriapark and the Park am Gleisdreieck in Kreuzberg! Our shared flat hosts 3 people who work a lot during the week and thus really enjoy their weekends outside, either doing sports or having a beer in the park. All 3 of us speak fluent English, 2 out of 3 also speak very good Spanish and we like to host people from all nations!
space: You have your own room with a 1,60m matress, a desk, a little dresser for yourself. If you are a couple or just very good friends, you can also rent the room with 2 people!

name: Cozy apartment in Mitte!
summary: Lovely apartment in the heart of Berlin, 1 minute away from subway. Very quiet and friendly area, amazing cafes just next door!
space: The apartment is very spacious, the living area and bar are very cozy and the bed is super-comfy and HUGE, the bathroom is full equipped.
description: Lovely apartment in the heart of Berlin, 1 minute away from subway. Very quiet and friendly area, amazing cafes just next door! The apartment is very spacious, the living area and bar are very cozy and the bed is super-comfy and HUGE, the bathroom is full equipped. Please call me upon arrival and I'll arrange the key handover for you. I usually rent out my place when traveling, but I'm happy to show you around and talk about my neighborhood when I meet you :) Mitte is a lovely vibrant neighborhood. I recommend you to check out the lovely book cafe located in my building and the pastry shop Du Bonheur next door. There is a supermarket next door. U-bahn Berannter Straße is 1 minute walk away, tram station is a 3 minute walk. A lot of sights are walking distance.

name: At the pulse of Berlin
summary: This lovely room within a 2-bedroom apartment and a huge balcony overlooks a park is right in the centre of Berlin, in the exciting Mitte area. Cultural sights, the Brandenburg Gate, a multitude of restaurants, infamous bars and clubs are all in close walking distance.
space: The house and the apartment is very modern and chic, although being an "Altbau", the rooms are light and the balcony is very big. It's location is perfect to get to know Berlin without hassle.

transit: You can travel everywhere within the city in around 15 minutes. Right next to the apartment block are flats S-Bahn (S1/S2/S26), Tram (M10) and Underground (U6( stations connecting you to all other districts and most venues in the city: Prenzlauerberg, Friedrichshain, Charlottenburg, Kreuzberg and so on.

host_about: Hello. I've been living in this exciting city for more than eight years and love Berlin. The city always thrives and there are so many options on how to spend you time. I'm a self employed PR consultant in the fields of tourism and political communication, with my office based in Kreuzberg, only 15 minutes away from my flat with a direct underground connection. My passion is my band and I play the lead guitar. I travel frequently to the US and Switzerland to visit my family, but try to tick off as many new places a year as possible.

name: Nice room central Kreuzberg Berlin
summary: The flat is located in the most charming part of Berlin (Kreuzkoln) , 30 second walking far from the canal ,full of bars , galeries, cultures etc ... If you want to meet people , living a authentic Kreuzberg experience , this room is made for you !
space: The room is comfortable and tiny , with everything that you need to take a break when you need it .There is a wood mezzanine that gives a super charming and cozy atmosphere .
