name: 60m2 mit grandiosem Blick über Berlin
summary: Meine Unterkunft ist direkt an der East Side Gallery. Perfekt gelegen zwischen Friedrichshain und Kreuzberg ist sie der optimale Sightseeingausgangspunkt.  Die Wohnung selbst hat alle Annehmlichkeiten wie Fußbodenheizung oder Deckenkühlung. Die Einrichtung besteht aus hochwertigen Markenmöbeln und Geräten. Für Nichtkenner von Berlin kann euch der Concierge im Haus  bei allen Fragen behilflich sein.
space: Die Wohnung ist in einem der bekanntesten Häuser Berlins - dem Living Levels - direkt an der East Side Gallery gelegen. Die Wohnung hat einen unverbaubaren Blick über Berlin - vor allem am Abend ein absolutes Highlight! Die Wohnung ist im Industrial Stil eingerichtet. Rohe Betonböden und -decken, dunkel gestrichene Wände und tolle Designermöbel (z.B. von Vitra) machen die Wohnung zu einem absoluten Style-Highlight.  Ihr habt ebenfalls eine voll ausgestattete Küche mit Miele Geräten - auch ein Geschirrspüler - und einer Nespresso Machine. Ebenfalls sind in der Wohnung eine Waschmaschine sowie ein Trockner von Miele vorhanden. Was braucht man mehr?

neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain und Kreuzberg sind zur Zeit die angesagtesten Viertel in Berlin. Die Kunst und Partyszene ist hier ebenso vertreten wie zahlreiche kleine Boutiquen und Geschäfte, die zum Bummeln einladen.
transit: Ihr könnt direkt vor dem Haus parken. Ansonsten sind die Haltestellen Ostbahnhof oder Warschauer Brücke nur 5min entfernt.
access: Ihr könnt die komplette Wohnung nutzen.  Ihr habt einen kleinen Balkon auf dem ihr einen tollen Ausblick über Berlin habt.
interaction: Ihr könnt mich immer telefonisch erreichen. Ansonsten steht euch bei allen Fragen ein Concierge von 8-18 Uhr (auch am Wochenende) im Haus zur Verfügung.

name: Stylish and sunny Neukölln home
summary: 80m2 light and stylish design apartment in one of Berlin’s multicultural neighbourhoods. Detached enough from the tourist droves to give you a true Berliner experience, yet only a 20 min U-Bahn ride away from Mitte (city-centre).
space: The apartment is on the 4th floor (no elevator) of a beautiful, old 1900s building. The ceilings are 3m high and the floors are classic wooden.  The kitchen is fully equipped with a refrigerator, dishwasher, oven, blender and more. Please feel free to dig into our elaborate spice and condiment collection and the fresh herbs. And obviously you’re welcome to the coffee and tea collection.  The living room is spacious. We even conduct some private yoga lessons here! The room can double up as a bedroom for two people by pulling out the comfy futon couch.  There’s a work-cum-dining space, with an antique desk and table. The furniture has lasted over generations and it would be great if AirBnB wouldn’t change that! ;-). There is an attached balcony with lots of sun.   The bedroom is a cosy space to read and relax with a master bed.  We provide towels and fresh linen, and the apartment will of course be cleaned before you arrive.
description: 80m2 light and stylish design apartment in one of Berlin’s multicultural neighbourhoods. Detached enough from the tourist droves to give you a true Berliner experience, yet only a 20 min U-Bahn ride away from Mitte (city-centre). The apartment is on the 4th floor (no elevator) of a beautiful, old 1900s building. The ceilings are 3m high and the floors are classic wooden.  The kitchen is fully equipped with a refrigerator, dishwasher, oven, blender and more. Please feel free to dig into our elaborate spice and condiment collection and the fresh herbs. And obviously you’re welcome to the coffee and tea collection.  The living room is spacious. We even conduct some private yoga lessons here! The room can double up as a bedroom for two people by pulling out the comfy futon couch.  There’s a work-cum-dining space, with an antique desk and table. The furniture has lasted over generations and it would be great if AirBnB wouldn’t change that! ;-). There is an attached balcony with lots of sun.
neighborhood_overview: Neukölln is one of Berlin’s multicultural, up and coming neighbourhoods. You can expect the special local Berlin flavour – a blend of Turkish and Arab immigrants as well as the young and yuppie crowds. Some of Berlin’s best cafes, bars and clubs are located in Neukölln. The pretty Körnerpark is just a block away and the Tempelhoferfeld (the world’s biggest inner city open green space) is about 5 min cycling distance, perfect for being outdoors. There’s a Kaisers, an Aldi and a Denn's organic supermarket all walking distance from the house. Be sure, we’ll hand you a guide to places to check out in and around the apartment.
notes: Just give us a call if you need anything at all.
transit: We are located 3 min walking distance from S+U Bahn Hermannstraße U8 and 5 min walking from S+U Bahn Berlin Neukölln U7. Both take you to the city in about 20 min.
access: You will have access to all the rooms in the apartment. You can use the beautiful, antique cupboard in the hallway to store your belongings. Just leave the stuff behind the cupboard as it is. Feel free to read the books, use the yoga mats and anything that isn’t personal i.e. don’t walk out wearing our clothes ;-)
interaction: We are a German-Indian couple and lived nomadically for over the past five years. During our travels we were often met with great hospitality and now it's our turn to return the favour ;-)  We normally rent out the whole apartment when we are travelling, so it's likely that we won't meet. But we always have a reliable friend who will welcome you and make you feel at home. But we will also leave you a list of things-to-do and visit etc. During your stay, you can expect complete privacy. At the same time if you need any assistance with anything, feel free to reach us over the phone. We will help you out with everything.
house_rules: We expect you to treat the apartment and the neighbours respectfully. If you're in Berlin to party, that's great – we can recommend you a bunch of great local places – but we expect you not to party in the apartment. This is a non smoking apartment, but you can do so on the balcony. If there is any damage, you are responsible to cover the full cost of replacement.

name: Überragende WG in Berlin Mitte
summary: Ich wohne in der wahrscheinlich Besten WG in ganz Berlin mit unglaublich netten Mitbewohnern (Phil, 29 und Jonas, 30). Wir drei sind Freunde und studieren nicht nur Sport, sondern trainieren auch noch eine Fußballmannschaft zusammen. Hier wird oft zusammen gekocht und auf unserem geliebten Beamer Fußball geschaut.  Wir freuen uns immer sehr, wenn wir hier Gäste haben und euch weiterhelfen können, damit ihr euch in Berlin wohl fühlt.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hello,

I am Filmmaker / Educator and have been hosting and renting apartments since 1998.  Originally from New York, worked in film, taught film & photography in Manila and Shanghai over last five years now producing/directing feature films and based in Berlin,

Currently, I host a three room apt here in Prenzlauerberg, Berlin while my brother Aaron lives in my New York City in our Parkside-Penthouse apartment in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.

Like many of you, travel is more then a passion it becomes a lifestyle and when work melds together it can be the best of both worlds.  Nature, culture, food, meeting new people and new experiences.  Interests include art, live music, snowboarding, scuba-diving, cooking, mountain climbing, bicycling and kayaking.

Please see my trusted reviews there you will find as a host I am communicative, accommodating, responsive, helpful and wish my guests the absolute best possible experience possible.   

As a traveller I am clean, quiet, well-mannered and respectful of cultures same as I would expect others to behave in my own apartment and city.  Most of my guests refer friends and family and return.  

Please share something about yourself and look forward to host you or travel to your neck of the woods! 

Kind Regards,
Joshua Sternlicht

space: Our flat is filled with nice art we've collected.  It's located in the best neighborhood of Berlin. Right across the street is the canal, where you can have amazing lazy summer nights. The subway is super close and offers the 2 best lines that get you everywhere in the city you need to be. Since the pictures where made we've made some changes in the flat. All of them made it better :). The bedroom has a little desk now and a shelve cabinet.

name: Bright and modernized flat in Friedrichshain
summary: Charming and light flat in Friedrichshain. Freshly renovated and modernized, the apartment comes completely furnished and equipped(fully equppied kitchen, WiFi, TV, washer, balcony). It best sleeps 2 plus a kid (optionally  one more guest - sofa bed in the living area). Close to Kreuzberg & Treptower Park and even closer to the river Spree. Ideally connected to the rest of Berlin via public transport (Train, Bus,Tram & Metro in close proximity) - 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz or Prenzlauer Berg
space: The modernized and beautifully furnished flat comfortably sleeps either three plus one kid or a small family (one separate bedroom with a cot, sofa bed in the living area). You can easily walk to Friedrichshain center, Kreuzberg or enjoy a family day in Treptower Park (just over the bridge). You have the tough choice of either starting the day at the comfy dinig table and its bright window front or in one of the cafes around Boxhagener Platz. Even during the coldest days of winter, you stay cozy and toasty warm, due to floor heating whilst preparing breakfast in the fully equipped kitchen. Should you want a change of location, take a 5 minute walk to Ostkreuz and within 10 minutes you will be in trendy Mitte or family-friendly Prenzlauer Berg. The Bus, stopping right in front of your door invites you to ride into an adventure in Neukölln and the metro (10 minute walk) takes you to Ku'damm or Schöneberg. At night, the rain shower helps you to unwind from a long and exciting day.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the heart of Neukölln, in a neighborhood that never sleeps. In the famous Schiller-Kiez and only 5 minutes on foot to Tempelhof, you will get an insight into the original Berlin during your stay. In addition to the many restaurants and pubs, there is also a supermarket nearby. NIGHTLIFE There are lots of clubs and bars around,  the famous ‘Schwutz’, ‘The Club’ like other clubs and bars in Neukölln are right there in 10-15 minutes of walking. Going further you can take U8 and in 4 stations you will be in Kotti (Kreuzberg-Oranienstr.) another party area. it all depends on your taste of party ;) DAYLIFE Lots of restuerants in the area, you can have food originated from a lot of different countries, like Turkish, Hungarian, Arabic, Chinese, Vietnamese, French, Italian, Indian, Iranian and ... all available in 5-10 minutes around in HermanStr, Karl-Marx-Str and Sonnenallee. Also there are lots of cafes, Bar, local backery and also Shopping Possiblity in the area
transit: he underground station (subway line 8) is about 1 minutes away offers you an optimal connection. The historic center of Schillerpromenade is almost directly in front of the door. The main train station in 15 minutes. Also Airport Schönefeld is directly accessible by S-bahn in less than half an hour.
access: Internet

name: Calm 'feelgood'-apartment at a city-west-hotspot
summary: Bright, sunny and cosy flat, 80 sqm, with high covers  at a gastronomical hot-spot. There are about 50 Restaurants of all types, prices and nationalities in 5 minutes walk distance. If you walk 5-10 minutes you will find another 50 or more. Savignyplatz is famous for lots of cafès, individual shops of all types, cinemas, theatres and parks. Green view! Perfect public transport connections towards all important sightseeing spots. The next 2 supermarkets are in 50m and 150m distance.
space: This wonderful place will only be available in 2017!

Da wir unsere eigene Wohnung während unserer Abwesenheit vermieten, werden wir nicht anwesend sein. Unsere Freunde Roswitha und Lukas stehen euch aber jederzeit zur Verfügung, wenn ihr Fragen oder Probleme habt! Roswitha wohnt um die Ecke und kann schnell vorbei kommen, falls es nötig ist. Die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel sind sehr gut zu erreichen. Direkt am Savignyplatz fahren  die S-Bahnen S7, S75 und S5, sowie die Busse M49, X34. Jeweils 5-10 Minuten Fu
transit: Die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel sind sehr gut zu erreichen. Direkt am Savignyplatz fahren  die S-Bahnen S7, S75 und S5, sowie die Busse M49, X34. Jeweils 5-10 Minuten Fußweg zu den U-Bahn Linien U2 und U1. Auf der Seite der BVG können die Ziele direkt eingegeben werden. Parkmöglichkeiten sind in hier der Innenstadt teuer (außer mit einem Bewohnerparkausweis s.u.) und man braucht manchmal Geduld bei der Suche! Für Anreisende, die trotzdem gerne mit dem Auto kommen möchten gibt es zwei Dinge zu beachten:  1. In der Berliner Innenstadt wird eine Umweltplakette verlangt! Informationen auf www.umwelt-plakette Deutschland (Webseitenlinks sind hier leider nicht gestattet.)  2. Bei rechtzeitiger Kontaktaufnahme (mindestens 3 Wochen im Voraus), können wir Gästen einen Gästepark-Ausweis (ca. 13 €/2Wochen) für die Parkzone 5 am Savignyplatz besorgen. Dazu benötigen wir folgende Dokumente: - Scan von den Wagenpapieren, - Ausweiskopie des Wagenhalters, Wohnanschrift des Wagenhalters.
interaction: Da wir unsere eigene Wohnung während unserer Abwesenheit vermieten, werden wir nicht anwesend sein. Unsere Freunde Roswitha und Lukas stehen euch aber jederzeit zur Verfügung, wenn ihr Fragen oder Probleme habt! Roswitha wohnt um die Ecke und kann schnell vorbei kommen, falls es nötig ist.
house_rules: - This appartement is our private home and we only rent it while we are travelling during our sabbatical. It is a wonderful place with a great atmosphere and we expect you to treat it with regard and respect! Our friends Lukas and Roswitha will take care of the renting and support you in your needs. Our neighbours are very friendly too an will help you if needed. - An important thing to know: Oil-stoves are the heating in the appartement! They are easy to handle and Roswitha or Lukas will show everything to you. There will also be precise written instructions to handle lighting them. It might be oldfashioned, but it is a lovely, cosy warmth and we use them now for decades with no problems! - The house entrance has to be locked after 8pm - Maybe important to know: as you can see on the pictures our bathtub is also the shower. So the access into the shower is 53cm high. As it is an old building (the very popular Berliner 'Altbau') you have to stand on there to open the window in the bath

neighborhood_overview: My apartment is located near Kantstrasse and famous shopping street KUDAMM.  This is a city centre of West Berlin – 5-10 minutes of walking from Savigny Platz and Zoo area – near KaDeWe department store. You have also good connection with Berlin Zoologischer Garten, Berlin Fair (Messe Berlin) and ICC – International Congress Centre. Close the building there are 2 good playgrounds for children. Very nice shopping street Wilmersdorfer Strasse begins just 200 meters from the building – you can enjoy big shopping centre Wilmersdorfer Arcaden and a lot of shops and restaurants over there. There are 2 supermarkets within 100 meters – ALDI and PENNY. You have 5 restaurants (Greek, Turkish, Asian, Portugese and Chinesse) and cafes just downstairs and a lot of restaurants nearby.
notes: Due to new legal regulations in Berlin we accept only reservations for min. 60 days and longer.
transit: The nearest public transportation is: S-Bahn (city rail) – station Savigny Platz – 300 meters away. U-Bahn (subway) – station Wilmersdorfer Strasse (U7 line) and Deutsche Oper (U2 line) – 400 meters!!! Bus – line M49 to Zoologischer Garten and 101 to Turmstrasse – just downstairs! During your stay you can use our safe, private parking place (10 EUR/day). The apartment is 1,5 away from exit form internal highway A100 (Stadtring) – exit number 6 Spandauer Damm or exit number 14 Konstanzer Strasse. Connection from Tegel Airport – bus 109 to stop S Charlottenburg (15 min). Connection from Schonefeld Airport – city train (S-Bahn) to station Savigny Platz (40 min). Connection from railway station Berlin HBF - S-Bahn to station Savigny Platz (10 min). Connection from bus station Berlin ZOB -  bus M49 (10 min) or 15-min. walk.
access: Inside our apartment there are following facilities / appliances: -TV set with DVD (cable TV, approx. 40 channels), -Table with 4 chairs and coffee table, -Wardrobe, -Fridge, -Stove, -Oven, -Iron, -Hair dryer, -Kettle, -Simple coffee machine, Bed-linen and towel included.
interaction: You will meet me or my friend during your check-in. We do not live in the apartment – but if you will have some requests we can come to the apartment or deliver something you need.
house_rules: No smoking please. Check-in after 20:00 and on Sunday / holiday costs 20 EUR.  Please inform us about your estimated check-in time 7 days before arrival. Check-in directly at the apartment - on the day of check-in please just call/text us 30 minutes before check-in to confirm your arrival or in case of any delay. If you will be late more than 1 hour and you do not inform us about it we can add 10 EUR for each hour of waiting for you.  You can use our private parking place - 5 EUR per night and Internet hi-speed wi-fi for 3 EUR/day. CityTax 5%.
host_about:
Welcome in my apartment,
I am very glad that you will be my guests. I can give you some tips about Berlin and some interesting places in this fantastic city.

Herzlich willkommen in meinem Apartment
Ich würde mich freuen, wenn ihr Euch für meine Wohnung entscheidet und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite.


Serdecznie witam w moim apartamencie,
Cieszę się że będziecie Państwo naszymi gośćmi - z przyjemnością podzielę się z Wami informacjami o ciekawych miejscach w Berlinie.

name: Bright & Spacious Rooftop Loft Style Apartment
summary: Newly renovated modern spacious rooftop 2-bedroom apartment with a retro touch located in a vibrant neighborhood close to everything. The place is 120 sqm & each bedroom has queen-size beds; one room with a French balcony & the other with a regular balcony. The living room has a large comfy sofa, a dining area connected to another balcony. There are two bathrooms, one with a nice big bathtub with large windows above. The place also has a washing machine, dish washer & well supplied kitchen.
space: Located between Frankfurter Allee and Ostkreuz Berlin. We are renting out the entire 120 sqm flat, including 2 bedrooms for 2 people each + more space to sleep on our comfy couch as well. The apartment is very bright and offers a spacious and well supplied kitchen next to the 1st balcony, a big luxurious bathroom including bath tub and additional guest toilet. The modern loft style livingroom includes a dinner table for 6 people, a very comfortable couch, rocking chair and danish retro couch table. From the first bedroom you have access to the gangway towards the fire stairs on the backside of the house which we use as our second balcony, to catch some evening sun when possible.

notes: We have an additional sleaping area added on top of the two private bedrooms.
transit: A great benefit of the location is the great connection to public transportation, which allows you to reach pretty much every part of Berlin in no time. Having the Ring Train, S-Bahn, regular Underground and Tram 4-5 min away from the house gets you to be in Kreuzberg, Neukölln, Mitte/Alexanderplatz and Prenzlauer Berg in about 15 minutes only. Even Kurfürstendamm and Berlin Zoologischer Garten are not further away than 30 minutes by train.
access: You are renting the entire apartment.
interaction: We will have someone close if you need help with enything!
house_rules: There is only one set of keys and they can not be copied so please keep them safe please. If you lose the key all locks in the house will need to be changed and that unfortunately cost around 600 euro.
host_about:
Female director living in Berlin with my boyfriend who works in music. Went to USC film school and has worked in the filmindustry since dircting film, commercial, and music videos etc. 

I am easygoing, open-minded, respectful and tidy. Do not smoke or have pets.

Love music, traveling, food, film, art, hiking, yoga, and my friends.

I am the host of two properties myself: me and my boyfriends flat in Berlin and my family vacation home in Bequia, St Vincent & the Grenadines.

neighborhood_overview: In Belziger street’s socalled “Akazienkiez” you will find cafes, bars, restaurants and a newly renovated in- and outdoor swimming pool. It’s a spiritual center with many diverse and current programs as well as possibilities for shopping of any kind, food, clothing etc., all in walking distance from the apartment. There are additional cafes and antique shops in Grunewald- and Goltzstrasse and a big open market every Saturday at Winterfeldplatz. Every Monday and Friday is market day at City Hall at John F. Kennedy Plaza. Flea market days are Saturday and Sunday at the same location. Directly behind City Hall lies the famous Schoeneberg Park for walking and jogging and as soon as spring weather permits, the Beer Garden Platzhirsch at the monument Golden Elk, the minigolf at the football arena, and other food and ice-cream concession stalls open for the public’s enjoyment. People are multi-cultural and tolerant. Besides young families and older people you will find artists, foreigners, and

name: Cozy flat in trendy neighborhood
summary: 52 cozy square meters in the heart of Berlin Friedrichshain are waiting for you, with the Simon-Dach-neighborhood within walking distance (10min) but still in a quiet side street. Public transport is close and brings you everywhere else.
space: Make yourself at home in the cozy 52 sq. meters with a large kitchen, one (!) large room (living room & bed room in one), 2 small balconies and a bright bathroom. Feel free to use the kitchen, the frige and all appliances whenever you want. Enjoy the tranquility of the street in the trendy district of Friedrichshain.
description: 52 cozy square meters in the heart of Berlin Friedrichshain are waiting for you, with the Simon-Dach-neighborhood within walking distance (10min) but still in a quiet side street. Public transport is close and brings you everywhere else. Make yourself at home in the cozy 52 sq. meters with a large kitchen, one (!) large room (living room & bed room in one), 2 small balconies and a bright bathroom. Feel free to use the kitchen, the frige and all appliances whenever you want. Enjoy the tranquility of the street in the trendy district of Friedrichshain. I myself live in this apartment - it is not a common holiday home. So please take into account my privacy when it comes to my personal things in closets, dressers etc. I wont be on site during your stay, but there is always a contact person available at your disposal if you have questions or need something. I'll also give you tips on what you can see in Berlin, where to grab some great food, which bars are particularly recommended, etc. Th
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the trendy district of Friedrichshain and is perfectly situated - you can reach many bars, clubs, restaurants and shops in a few minutes. Yet you live in a quiet side street and can relax from the hustle - if you prefer your peace ;) Whether Berghain, Astra, Watergate or Lido - everything is within walking distance. Even the Yaam or Kater blau are right in the neighborhood. By train you can quickly get to the TV tower or the Brandenburg Gate, on the Museum Island, or you can walk to the River Spree and the East Side Gallery.
transit: Just 4 minutes aways is the U5, which brings you directly to Alexanderplatz (5min). Within a 10 minute walk you reach Ostbahnhof, where numerous S-Bahn lines and regional trains take off. The M10 tram you reach in a few minutes on foot. Approximately 15 minutes away is the U1 station Warschauer Straße. Outside the door there is always plenty of parking - depending on  day and time parking is chargeable - but not too far is also free parking. If necessary just ask.
access: I myself live in this apartment - it is not a common holiday home. So please take into account my privacy when it comes to my personal things in closets, dressers etc.
interaction: I wont be on site during your stay, but there is always a contact person available at your disposal if you have questions or need something. I'll also give you tips on what you can see in Berlin, where to grab some great food, which bars are particularly recommended, etc.
house_rules: In the apartment itself, smoking is prohibited - on the balconies it's of course no problem at all. It would be awesome if you could water the balcony plants from time to time.
host_about: I love travelling - mostly for meeting people from all over the world. That's what airbnb - for me personally - is all about. I enjoy music, concerts, food (vegetarian) and a nice chat.

host_about:
I am living in Berlin since almost 4 years and working in the city as a Building Engineer. 

I speak German, English and Spanish. 

I am is creative person who likes building new things (some of the furniture in the apartment it is made by myself). I like nature and relaxing in it.

I love traveling, meeting people from everywhere and changing a bit my routine, trying to make every day different. 
That's why you are more than welcome to my place. I will try to help you knowing Berlin and trying to make you love it as I do. 

Looking forward to seeing you!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hello,

I am Filmmaker / Educator and have been hosting and renting apartments since 1998.  Originally from New York, worked in film, taught film & photography in Manila and Shanghai over last five years now producing/directing feature films and based in Berlin,

Currently, I host a three room apt here in Prenzlauerberg, Berlin while my brother Aaron lives in my New York City in our Parkside-Penthouse apartment in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.

Like many of you, travel is more then a passion it becomes a lifestyle and when work melds together it can be the best of both worlds.  Nature, culture, food, meeting new people and new experiences.  Interests include art, live music, snowboarding, scuba-diving, cooking, mountain climbing, bicycling and kayaking.

Please see my trusted reviews there you will find as a host I am communicative, accommodating, responsive, helpful and wish my guests the absolute best possible experience possible.   

As a traveller I am clean, quiet, well-mannered and respectful of cultures same as I would expect others to behave in my own apartment and city.  Most of my guests refer friends and family and return.  

Please share something about yourself and look forward to host you or travel to your neck of the woods! 

Kind Regards,
Joshua Sternlicht

I really like the concept of AirBnB, since I'm a frequent traveler and dislike all-inclusive holidays :) For me traveling is part of collecting experiences and living and enjoying a meaningful life. 
I'm very respectful with other peoples apartments and expect my guests to be the same.

name: 26qm Zi zentral ruhig S/U/Bahnhof Alexanderplatz
summary: Der 26qm- Raum mit Parkett hat 1 sehr bequemes Gästebett(Luftbett 1,40mx2m)) für 2 Personen und bei Aufbettungswunsch auch noch eine  gute Matratze. Ein grosses, ruhiges, gemütliches Altbauzimmer, eingerichtet mit dem was man braucht:  Kleiderständer, Sitzmöglichkeiten, stimmungsvolle Beleuchtung, kleiner Tisch.  Die Wohnung liegt in einem ruhigen schicken, sehr angesagten Bötzowkiez ganz in der Nähe vom Alexanderplatz.
space: In der Wohnung leben auch zwei Kater, die nicht in das Gästezimmer hinein dürfen.

Ausserdem gibts viele nette Cafes, Boutiquen und allerlei Läden, kulturelle Einrichtungen wie Kunstgalerien u. Museen usw, Parks, Tennisplätze, Schwimmbäder, Beachvolleyball, Seen, Saunen usw. Die Tram, Bus und S/U-Bahnanbindung hier ist gut. Der S/
neighborhood_overview: Leben und leben lassen. Von hier aus erreichst Du die besten Clubs der Stadt in wenigen Minuten, z.B. das Berghain, Sage, Kitkat, Prinz Charles usw. Ausserdem gibts viele nette Cafes, Boutiquen und allerlei Läden, kulturelle Einrichtungen wie Kunstgalerien u. Museen usw, Parks, Tennisplätze, Schwimmbäder, Beachvolleyball, Seen, Saunen usw.
notes: Wichtig ist, dass wir vor Eurer Ankunft die RICHTIGEN Handynummern austauschen, damit wir problemlos kommunizieren und ggf. genaue oder andere Checkin-zeiten vereinbaren können!!! Bitte nimm auf jeden Fall vor Deiner Anreise Kontakt zu mir auf um eine genaue Ankunftzeit zu vereinbaren, die auch von der hier genannten Check-In-Zeit abweichen kann. Bitte schau vor der Buchung nochmal genau im Kalender nach, weil z.B. ein Check- In Dienstags oder Donnerstags später stattfinden muss.  Di geht ab 21h u. Do ab 23h.
transit: Die Tram, Bus und S/U-Bahnanbindung hier ist gut. Der S/UBahnhof Alexanderplatz oder S Bahnhof Greifswalder Strasse sind in wenigen Minuten mit der Tram 4 zu erreichen. Vom zentralen Alexanderplatz aus, kommst Du überall in der Stadt schnell hin. Über die Tram 10 Arnswalder Platz kommst Du schnell nach Friedrichshain, in einen der buntesten lebendigsten Stadtteile Berlins. Parkplätze für Autos gibts hier im Kiez eher wenige und wenn teuer. In fußläufiger Entfernung (ca.15Min. durch den Park) kannst Du momentan noch kostenlos parken. Es empfiehlt sich bei gutem Wetter Fahrräder auszuleihen und Berlin  damit zu erkunden. Das macht richtig Freude!
access: Du hast Zugang zu Küche, Bad, dem eigenen Altbauzimmer.
interaction: Ja, bei Fragen stehe ich zur Verfügung.
house_rules: Please: -no alcohol or other intoxicating substances in the apartment -not overpowered people in the apartment - Towel use of my towels costs 2 euros per piece - Use of my shower accessories, such as shampoos and soaps, costs 1Euro per use- after 22h please rest - Free use of my hair dryer.  Bitte -kein Alkohol oder sonstige berauschende Substanzen in dem Appartement -kein berauschten zugedröhnten Personen in dem Appartement - nach 22h bitte Ruhe einhalten - Handtuchgebrauch meiner Handtücher kostet pro Stück 2 Euro - Benutzung meines Föhns nach vorherigem Fragen kostenlos - Benutzung meines Duschzubehörs wie Shampoos und Waschseifen kosten 1 Euro pro Benutzung
host_about:
Ich mag: Freundliche, katzenliebende Menschen aus aller Welt, die sich in meine Wohnung integrieren und zu schätzen wissen, was sie bekommen.

Gut finde ich Gäste, die :
im Sitzen pinkeln, keine schmutzige Unterwäsche rumliegen lassen, ihre Haare aus der Badewanne/Dusche selbst enfernen und gerne auch mal den Wischmop/Lappen in die Hand nehmen um ihren selbst verursachten Schmutz wegzumachen. Ich mag keinen Lärm, Alkohol und Drogen.
Mein Motto:  "Ein guter Gast, fällt niemandem zur Last" und "Mir zum Besten, niemand anderem zum Schaden"
Falls Du diese Basics drauf hast, bist Du bei mir willkommen.

name: Homely apartment in Kreuzkölln
summary: We want you to feel at home in our newly furnished one room apartment fully equipped with kitchen and bathroom next to the Landwehrkanal and Kottbusser Damm in the vibrant neighbourhood of Neukölln. Subway and bus station are just around the corner.
space: The apartment is located in a quiet rear building just off the beautiful Landwehrkanal on the fourth floor without elevator. We renovated the apartment at the beginning of 2014. The bathroom was completely redone. The timber floor boards give the place a cosy and warm atmosphere. You will have everything you need in the pantry kitchen with fridge, stove, microwave and all the pots and pans you need.
description: We want you to feel at home in our newly furnished one room apartment fully equipped with kitchen and bathroom next to the Landwehrkanal and Kottbusser Damm in the vibrant neighbourhood of Neukölln. Subway and bus station are just around the corner. The apartment is located in a quiet rear building just off the beautiful Landwehrkanal on the fourth floor without elevator. We renovated the apartment at the beginning of 2014. The bathroom was completely redone. The timber floor boards give the place a cosy and warm atmosphere. You will have everything you need in the pantry kitchen with fridge, stove, microwave and all the pots and pans you need. The advertised apartment is adjacent to our apartment and we are happy if we can assist you in finding your way around Berlin and having a great time in this amazing city. The apartment is connected via a door to our own apartment. The door will be locked throughout your stay. However, we cannot avoid that you will hear parts of our family life,
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is located along the border of Kreuzberg and Neukölln (Kreuzkölln). It is a very vibrant area, constantly reinventing itself. The neighbourhood has an abundance of beautiful cafés, yummy restaurants and lots of exciting nightlife locations. You will find all kinds of galeries, shops and street art close by.
notes: Since the beginning of the year 2014, tourists staying overnight in Berlin are subject to paying an accommodation tax, the so-called City Tax. It amounts to five percent of the room rate (net price), and we collect the City Tax in cash on arrival. It is NOT included in the quoted room rate. Business travellers can contact us for the exemption form which we can send in advance. Thank you for your understanding! Our cat occasionally has access to the apartment if we do not have any guests. If you have a cat allergy, this place might not be for you, even though we certainly keep it very clean.
transit: Access to public transport is very convenient with the Underground U1, U7, U8 and Bus M 29 etc. in walking distance. You will easily get to any location in Berlin from here.
interaction: The advertised apartment is adjacent to our apartment and we are happy if we can assist you in finding your way around Berlin and having a great time in this amazing city. The apartment is connected via a door to our own apartment. The door will be locked throughout your stay. However, we cannot avoid that you will hear parts of our family life, especially our two daughters who are early risers.
house_rules: As we will be living door to door we are looking for guests that keep the noise to a level acceptable amongst neighbours - as will we. Smoking is absolutely prohibited both in the apartment as well as in the staircase. We make our wifi connection available to you if you agree to sign a declaration on the rules of using the internet according to the German law.
host_about:
We are a Zimbabwean-German couple and we are looking forward to making you feel at home. The advertised apartment is adjacent to our apartment and we are happy if we can assist you in finding your way around Berlin and having a great time in this amazing city. We hope you won't feel bothered in case you occasionally can hear us and our daughter from next door.
Please do get in touch with us if you have any questions. We are looking forward to hosting you.

name: Your room in our luxury apartment
summary: Our stylish 120m2 apartment is too big for us three and that’s why we open our doors for guests :-) We are looking forward to friendly and open minded people from all over the world. Don't hesitate to contact us in English, German of French in case you have any questions.
space: You will sleep in our cozy guest room which contains a comfortable sleeping sofa (1,40m wide). The apartment has 3 more rooms: a children’s room, a parent’s bed room and a huge living area including an open kitchen. Our sunny terrace is provided with garden furniture and a gas barbecue. You can use all kitchen utensils, some space in our fridge or just chill on our electrically adjustable sofa. Other equipment features of our apartment are the WIFI controlled sound and light system in our living area, floor heating and an old piano.
description: Our stylish 120m2 apartment is too big for us three and that’s why we open our doors for guests :-) We are looking forward to friendly and open minded people from all over the world. Don't hesitate to contact us in English, German of French in case you have any questions. You will sleep in our cozy guest room which contains a comfortable sleeping sofa (1,40m wide). The apartment has 3 more rooms: a children’s room, a parent’s bed room and a huge living area including an open kitchen. Our sunny terrace is provided with garden furniture and a gas barbecue. You can use all kitchen utensils, some space in our fridge or just chill on our electrically adjustable sofa. Other equipment features of our apartment are the WIFI controlled sound and light system in our living area, floor heating and an old piano. We would love to share a drink or conversation with our guest but also respect if you just want to enjoy your privacy in your room. Our apartment is perfectly located and only 2mins walkin
notes: Before being our guest, it’s important to know a few things:  1. Since we only have one bathroom that you will share with us, it’s necessary to agree on “bathroom times” on weekday mornings. 2. Our one-year-old daughter is used to visitors from all over the word. However, we appreciate guest to respect her sleeping hours. TV and music can still be used. ;) 3. We do not allow any parties unless we’ve planned them together. ;)  4. Our gas boiler is located in the guest room inside wall cabinet. If heating or warm water runs, the boiler makes some noises which are less noticeable due to a sound isolation inside the cabinet.  5. Since we want you to feel save, you will find smoke alarms in all rooms as well as a gas alarm in your room. Smoking is only permitted on the balcony.
transit: Our apartment is perfectly located and only 2mins walking from the S-Bahn and U-Bahn station, with direct connection to the city center. By train it’s only 15mins to Alexanderplatz, 20mins to the main train station, 10mins to the Mercedes Benz Arena and 5mins to one of the most exciting nightlife districts. There is a supermarket next to the house as well as another one inside the train station which opens on Sundays.
access: Der Wohnbereich inkl. offener Küche und Esstisch, sowie das Badezimmer werden mit uns geteilt. Unser Schlaf-, sowie das Kinderzimmer sind unser privater Rückzug. Das Gästezimmer gehört alleine euch! Selbstverständlich bekommt ihr einen Schlüssel für euer Zimmer, die Wohnung und das Haus.
interaction: We would love to share a drink or conversation with our guest but also respect if you just want to enjoy your privacy in your room.
host_about: I love travelling around and having great airbnb experiences!

name: Snug :  Sunny Altbau Appartment Neukölln
summary: The apartment is in 3rd floor with balcony in a beautiful renovated  sunny Altbau in Neukölln. Located close to Hermannplatz and 5 minutes walk to Hasenheide.  Neukölln is a urban area with a great mix of culture, unique restaurants, up popping bars and little shops. The mixture of traditional and modern is packed in this district. Public transport is super easy. Easy to reach from both airports. Subway and Busstops is 2 minutes walk. With connection lines you can start trips all over the city.
space: The apartment is on 3rd floor with balcony in a beautiful renovated Altbau, located in Neukölln close to Hermannplatz and 5 minutes walk to Hasenheide.  Neukölln is a urban area with a great mix of culture, unique restaurants, up popping bars and little shops. The mixture of traditional and modern is packed in this district. Hasenheide is one of the most beautiful and expanding parks in Berlin. Always good for a walk, jogging in the morning or just sit down in the sunset and have a picknick. name: Quiet and Sunny Apartment in the Heart of P'Berg
summary: Welcome to our Quiet, Bright and Lovely flat in the heart of Berlin. Nearby you’ll find good restaurants, cosy bars, the Kulturbrauerei, the local market at Kollwitzplatz, you will enjoy the sunset while sipping a beer at Mauerpark. Many public transportations are available (Trams, Subways, S-Bahn). This place is a light therapy itself, and you will enjoy the comfy bed, the kitchen, the awesome view of the balcony, the lovely street. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

host_about: I'm an entrepreneur and music tech engineer. For my job I need to travel sometimes to Hong Kong and other times to the US. I live with my wife Cindy who's a French illustrator. If we both travel, we rent out our space.

name: Charming-large room in top location, full of light
summary: A gorgeous room with a high ceiling, full of light, space and quiet in a charming Altbau Berlin apartment. Access to the kitchen, living room, bathrooms, internet, towels, bedsheets etc, and of course you would be in famous Prenzlauerberg the nicest and most trendy areas of Berlin!  I am happy to welcome solo travelers as well as couples or friends from all background.
space: The room is 30m2 with a high ceiling, full of light, space and quiet.  There is a working station as well as an electric piano for the more artistic souls, a library and a wardrobe as your disposal. The bed is a 140x200 double bed! You would have access to everything the apartment has to offer (kitchen, living room, bathrooms, internet, towels, bedsheets etc). I absolutely love this apartment not only for its perfect location but for the light and the quiet that it offers.  It has been decorated with love, care and a certain "french touch" since I am originally from Paris. The one thing to know is that the apartment is organized a little strangely and although there is a restroom and a sink reserved for the guests in the entrance, you have to cross my bedroom to access the bathroom. It has never been a problem with any guests and during the day until late at night this bedroom serves as a passage room since I spend very little time in there anyways.

neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauerberg is one of, if not THE nicest and most trendy areas of Berlin! You'll find plenty of cafes, delicious restaurants, cute shops and the famous Mauerpark as well as a farmer's market twice a week down the road from me.
transit: The closest Ubahn is Eberswalderstrasse (U2), 5min away, or Senefeldplatz 10 min walk from the apartment. The U2 line is most convenient as it crosses the entire city. Several trams, all within 5min walk, will quickly take you to Alexanderplatz in 10 min, Mitte, Berlin Haupbanhof, and Friedrichstrasse.
interaction: I am tidy and quiet, but I enjoy sharing a meal and a good conversation. In other words I am happy to interact and give you Berlin recommendations if you wish but I respect privacy and the apartment is definitely big enough for 2 or 3 people to coexist happily! I am not necessarily sleeping in this apartment every night since I am often at my partner's house but if I happened not to be here I am available in my phone 24/7 and only a few stops away if needed.

name: Little pearl in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Bright and spacious apartment in the beating heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Close to Mauerpark, the most famous flea market in Berlin with its international karaoke and its international crowd and some historical highlights of the city. The street is very popular and full of nice bars and restaurant. Very lively in the weekends and summer evenings, nevertheless the apartment is very silent and cozy. You will love the vibe of the neighborhood, waiting for you guys!
space: The apartment is 70 square meters and composed by 1 big private bedroom,1 living room,1 kitchen also very spacious,1 bathroom. I can rent both the bedroom and the living room as the sofa turns into a very comfortable king size bed. So group of 4 people are also welcome!

host_about:
I am 36 years old and I have a full time job that I love and that allows me to travel frequently.
I am italian and I've been leaving in this beautiful city for 4 years.

Come to my place and enjoy Berlin as I enjoy every single day as it was the first day!

name: Hip apartment next to SohoHouse
summary: Amazing 60 sqm apartment in centre of Berlin. 2 min walk from the famous SOHO HOUSE and 5 min from Alexanderplatz.Cool bars and restaurants are in walking distance on Torstrasse and Prenzlauer Berg. Great view of the Berlin TV tower from the balcony.
space: 60 sqm apartment with an amazing large balcony , a large bedroom and a view of the famous Berlin television tower. Very modern building with elevator and a high-tech lighting system. Super king-size leather bed in the bedroom and a rustic leather couch in the living room give a vintage feeling to the apartment. The beautiful antique furniture I picked up from Bali,China ,India and Brasil and a collection of artworks by Shepard Fairey, give the apartment a very special character. Enjoy!

Avenue club , Weekend club , Soho House Bar, Dudu restaurant , Kitty Cheng Bar, Neue Odessa Bar and the famous Aug
neighborhood_overview: Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg are really hip areas with some of the best restaurants and coolest bars in Berlin. Avenue club , Weekend club , Soho House Bar, Dudu restaurant , Kitty Cheng Bar, Neue Odessa Bar and the famous Auguststrasse and Linienstrasse with all the hip cafes and restaurants, are all in walking distance.
transit: The apartment is located in the heart of Berlin, in a very popular district with an extensive cultural program: galleries, cafes, theaters, cinemas, bars, clubs, boutiques and restaurants. A weekly market within walking distance,The Kollwitz Platz, the huge park of Friedrichshain (jogging, beach volleyball, open air cinema, cafes, roller blade track, etc.), the Kulturbrauerei are all within walking distance. The tram is only 50m away and needs only a few minutes to the Alexanderplatz, Rosenthaler Platz ,Hackescher Markt or the next S-Bahn or U-Bahn. Major attractions such as Alexanderplatz, Museum Island, the Nikolai district, Unter den Linden, Hackescher Markt, Gendarmenmarkt, Friedrichstrasse, the Brandenburg Gate, Potsdamer Platz are nearby. For night owls: The most famous clubs such as Berghain, Felix, and many small gems lie in a 1 km-2 km km radius from the apartment.
interaction: I am always available on my phone.
house_rules: No smoking inside the apartment but the balcony is amazing to have a smoke with a view of the television tower on Alexanderplatz.
host_about:
I am originally Greek. I live in Berlin after spending 12+ years in London. I am involved in the Berlin internet startup scene. Founder of ENLOOPP, a location-sharing social discovery app.

name: Spacious Flat in Idyllic Location
summary: Renovierter Bungalow (54qm) am grünen Stadtrand von Berlin, nahe des S-Bahnhofs Grünau (ca. 10 Minuten Fußweg), wartet auf Dich. Durch die City-Anbindung ist auch das Großstadtgefühl nicht weit sowie der Flughafen Schönefeld. Wir freuen uns auf euch!

Italian restaurant in 7 minute walking distance. Greek restaurant 12 minute walking distance. Unweit des S-Bahnhofs Grünau (ca. 10 Minuten Fußweg oder 2 Stationen mit dem Bus).  Separates Gebäude mit eigenem Eingang, Bad, Küche und Außenbereich.

host_about:
I think I could say I am free, open, easy, tolerant, dreamy, smily, authentic, analog, emphatic, confidence, caring. Enthusiastic, passionate. A bit fool. I am vegetarian, I make daily yoga and sport.  But i also love goings to bars and dancing. 

I couldnt live without music, drawing, books, cameras , sun, sea, friends, art , water & bananas. 

I love to travel for meeting myself in a different circumstances and making an exchange with the world and the people who one meet on the way. For learning. I am quite addicted to this exchange of new people and experiences.  I travel on my own city often, trying to watch it as if I was a tourist, as the first time again.  
I never had bad experiences traveling, and I believe is cause of the energy one projects . World is energy on movement and I enjoy going within it.
My best journey was walking alone "El camino de santiago"in Spain. India and Israel were also amazing-life-changing trips.  
I was "couchsourfer" for a long time when I was younger and I host over 100 people for free in Spain and Germany, that gave me a lot of life-teaching, a lot of respect , and unfortunately also a bit of suspicion.

host_about: Ich komme aus Paris und lebe und arbeite seit 4 Jahren im schönen Berlin. Ich liebe Musik, Fussball, reisen und nette Leute kennenlernen und noch viel mehr.

name: CUTE VACATION FLAT IN KREUZBERG
space: Cute flat in Dieffenbachstrasse in the heart of Kreuzberg area in Dieffenbach strasse. One street away from the canal, the Admiral Brücke or Kottbuser brücke. The area is famous for its cool and alternative bars, clubs and restaurants. (We can give some advise of our favourite place on request.) One block away from the famous market of Maybachufer. The metro (Schönleinstrasse) is at 5min walk: line U8 will bring you to Alexanderplatz and the museum area in a few stops. The flat is at the 4th floor in the courtyard of the house, so it is really very calm. It is a 35 m2 open space with a bedroom and a kitchen/dining room. It also has a big bathroom with bathtube. Sorry there's no washing machine, but there's a laundry at 10mn walk from the flat. The flat was freshly renovated so it is completely clean and conveniently made for vacation stays. It has free WIFI Internet. Quite important for the freezy winter: it has a good central heating and good isolation. The flat is ideal for 2 persons

space: Die Wohnung ist zentral, aber dennoch sehr ruhig gelegen. In nur ca. 3min erreicht man die nächste Tram-Haltestelle, von dort aus kommt man zügig überall hin. name: Designer Studio Apt in ♥ of Wedding
summary: A stylish 36 sqm studio one bedroom apartment that was re-designed to reflect the emerging, creative, and alternative neighbourhood in the heart of hip Wedding, conveniently located on Leopoldplatz, connecting you to any corner in the city :)
space: A stylish re-designed 36 m2 studio apartment reflecting emerging, creative, and alternative neighborhood in the heart of hip Wedding.   The apartment is located on the fourth floor within the first courtyard of the building. The newly renovated Altbau apartment showcases the best of new and old as it retains the characteristic, charm and proportion of an Altbau flat with updated elements where needed.  It was transformed into a light, airy and calm space through careful manipulation of surfaces and natural light. Through the retention of original wooden flooring and by exposing the brick structural inner walls of the building the architectural integrity of the building is highlighted and re-interpreted using contemporary white washed finishes to create a unique contemporary lofty character for such a compact space.   What is seemingly sparsely furnished is secretly packed full of the hidden design solutions required for modern living.hidden storage solutions and multi functional furnit

name: Downtown Berlin 60sqm cozy flat
summary: 1 big oversize doublebed in a big separate bedroom, 1 additional sofabed for 2 persons in the studio, wardrobes, fully equiped kitchen, big table sitting 6 persons, open kitchen, spacious bathroom, WIFI, TV, etc. - and all this downtown ! Have a look
space: Classical, comfortable, cute... everything you wish for and everything you need if you like to feel all ‘homely’ in a foreign city. A spacious bedroom; and in front of that a dining area in the open spacious kitchen where up to 6 can comfortably round off the day. The apartment is completely renovated and new furnished. My highlight in this apartment is the "golden" bathroom. WiFi is available in the flat, (free of charge). Otherwise, you’ll also find various herbs and spices as well as oil and vinegar. I’d hate to think that every guest has to go and buy these products for themselves all over again! Just help yourself. All my apartments lie in central Berlin, in the district of Schöneberg.

name: Entire 73m² flat, 2 rooms bright Altbau w/ balcony
summary: Cozy large 73m²flat with balcony in the most popular area of Berlin. It has two rooms with four separate beds, including a double. The building is from 1920 and therefor has super high ceilings with lots of light, feels spacious and calm. Cafés, Restaurants&Bars are around the corner; a lively neighborhood on a quiet street near the canal. A very cheep food market is a 10-15 min walk away.
space: Bedroom 1: * One double bed 140x200cm in a large bedroom Bedroom 2/Living room * Two single beds 90x200 with new luxury mattresses Bedroom 1 or 2 * A comfortable Mattress for the 4th or 5th person (depending if only one person will use the double), will be installed on the floor. I'm renting out a large, bright apartment with a sunny balcony. It is situated in Neukölln at the border of Kreuzberg, next to the canal. Around the corner is the trendy and lively Weserstrasse, with lots of bars, cafés and boutique and designer stores. The apartment is on third floor facing the courtyard on one side and a quiet street on the other. Next to the apartment is a small park, a playground and a river.  A ten minute ride by bike and you will be at Treptower Park, Görlitzer Park, Hasenheide Park, Kreuzberg or you can take the Bus or U-Bahn a few minutes away from the flat.  Two large rooms (25m²), a large kitchen and a bathroom, all in all 73m² of space. One of the walls is one large window, opening

neighborhood_overview: Weserstraße and surroundings, with all its small shops, cafés and bars. River, bridges, parks. The most multiculti place in Berlin. The Market at Maybachufer: Tuesdays and Fridays are Vegetables, Fruits, Foods-stands and shops. Saturday is shops- and food stands.  At least once a month: Flea-market.
notes: Let me know if you have any questions before making a booking. I'll be glad to help or prepare things to meet your requirements :-)
transit: The U-Bahn U7 is 600 meters away.  The Bus M41 to the main station is 400 meters away.  Weserstraße is 200 meters away. From the Schönefeld airport 40 min: Take bus to Rudow train station (a few min) Take U7 to Rathaus Neukölln (20 min). Take exit "Fuldastr" Walk 600 meters to Fuldastr 34  From the main station: Take M41 to stop "Sonnenallee/Fuldastr" From Tegel Airport - 45 min: Take Bus to Jacob Keiser Platz (a few min) Take U7 to Rathaus Neukölln (around half an hour). Take exit "Fuldastr" Walk 600 meters to Fuldastr. 34
access: You will have access to the whole flat.
interaction: I will normally be there at your arrival and guide you around the flat and give you a list of tips on restaurants and places nearby. I am always an e-mail or a phone call away, and will also have people or myself nearby, in case you would need someone.
house_rules: * Not suitable for smokers, it's a non smokers flat.  * No shoes inside the flat, they must be left at the entrance. * No wet toes from the shower on the wooden floors or leaving water on any of the wooden surfaces: both tables and floors. * No parties in the flat!  * No noise after 22pm, as it is an old flat with thin walls ;) My neighbors are super nice, and I wish for it to stay that way :-> There are plenty of super nice and cheap places to go to around the corner, so there is no reason to have drinks at home. When you come back home, please be quiet in the stairs and inside the flat.  * Some things should be handled with care, as they are a little fragile. * The apartment is not suitable for babies between half and 3 years of age.
host_about:
Hello ! 

I've been living in this beautiful flat for six years, and work as a singer and actress. Love to travel and have flexible jobs, so my place is often available for guests. Very service minded and will provide tips for everything you can imagine. Be my guest and have a great stay in this beautiful city !

I would say that I am an easygoing, open and friendly host, and I will do my best to give you a pleasant stay. I believe there is good carma in my flat :D

My interests are: interesting conversing, all kinds of music, travelling, cultural activities and enjoying life. 

I would be able to communicate in the following languages: English, German, French and most of the Scandinavian languages.

Looking forward to hearing from you !

name: Charming & Cozy Room in Reuterkiez
summary: Conveniently close to Hermannplatz Station; connecting you to all the sights of the city. A 5 minute stroll to the nightlife on Weserstrasse, grocery shops and a delightful market place open Tuesday, Friday, Saturday and every second Sunday.
space: Cozy Room for rent in the beloved Reuterkiez. It is in a turn of the century building with all of its original charm. Have all the comforts of home. ;>) It's all a matter of perspective! Common use of the large eat in kitchen (with big fridge and pot rack) a real cooks kitchen. Very close to the U8 so that allows you to travel very fast around Berlin. Lots of cafes and bars right next to your door in one of the hippest, happening neighbourhoods of Berlin. The room is 15 qm, nicely furnished. If you have any questions, please send me a message, I'm happy to help you get the most out of your stay in Berlin!

house_rules: Check-in (Key exchange) very flexible, generally anytime between 6 am and midnight is fine, sometimes later. NO SMOKING. if you break anything by accident, tell me and we'll find a solution. you can read my books, watch dvds etc as long as you take care of everything. please check the plants and if they're desperately dry, water them!  please leave the apartment as you found it.
host_about:
I'm a very free spirit with an organized life. Sometimes it's a blissful combination, sometimes it's more like a box of angry cats. I run my own business organizing yoga classes in schools and businesses, so I am very much able to structure my time as I wish, which makes me very happy. I like to take LONG trips, especially when I'm going far away (next stop: bali!) to really soak in the new place I'm going to. I also love the enforced quiet and reflection that comes with traveling alone, the test of any friendship or relationship that comes with traveling together.

I've been an airbnb host for a while now, and I've met some pretty amazing people. I think my apartment absorbs some of the energy of everyone who visits, and I love to host interesting people.

name: Lovely sunny apartment in Berlin
summary: The apartment is located at the heart of Berlin Friedrichshain. Very sunny and cosy, you have the entire apartment for your private use. Lots of bars, restaurants and clubs in the area. Best place to start your Berlin exploration from.  Bakery, Kiosk and Tram station just outside the door. Supermarkets 5 min walk away.
space: Truly beautiful apartment located at the vibrant heart of Berlin. Best place to start exploring Berlin.

host_about:
"There are no strangers. Only friends you haven`t met yet". 

I am a master student and work part time in a Berlin bar. Always happy to meet new people and experience different cultures. 

Privacy is important, so please ask me if you have any questions to my person or regarding the apartment...always happy to answer.

name: A cozy student apartment
summary: A cozy student apartment in Wedding, Berlin. The apartment is very centrally located, with easy access to public transport. The U bahn is 500m walking distance and the Gesundbrunnen station is only 700m away.

name: Spacious room in Neukölln!
summary: Euch erwartet ein wunderschönes Zimmer (27qm) in unserer geräumigen, gut ausgestatteten Altbauwohnung im Herzen Neuköllns. Zahlreiche angesagte Bars und Restaurants findet ihr in Fußnähe. Das Zimmer, sehr ruhig zum Innenhof gelegen, ist der ideale Rückzugsort.
space: Die Wohnung liegt direkt an der Sonnenallee, einer der belebtesten Straßen mitten in dem angesagten Stadtteil Neukölln. Da das Zimmer zu dem sehr ruhigen, grünen Innenhof gelegen ist, kann man sich hier trotzdem sehr gut zurückziehen und sich von den Strapazen des aufregenden Großstadtlebens erholen. Die Wohnung liegt in einem sehr schönen, sanierten Altbau mit Dielenboden und hohen Decken. Sie liegt im 1. Stock, endloses Treppensteigen bleibt Euch also erspart.  Die Ausstattung des Zimmers erkennt Ihr am besten auf den Fotos! Es verfügt über ein 140cm-Bett, bei Bedarf können wir Euch eine zweite Matratze bereitlegen. Außerdem gibt es ein gemütliches Sofa mit Couchtisch, einen Sessel, einen sehr geräumigen Schreibtisch mit komfortablem Bürostuhl, Laserdrucker und Stereoanlage inkl. CD-Player, Plattenspieler und AUX-Anschluss.  In wenigen Gehminuten seid ihr auf der Weserstraße, einer der angesagtesten Ecken Neuköllns. Hier könnt Ihr eine ganze Fülle an Cafés, Bars, Restaurants, Klamott

transit: Bushaltestelle direkt vor der Haustür, von dort gelangt Ihr ohne Umsteigen z.B. zum Hauptbahnhof, Hermannplatz, Potsdamer Platz, Philharmonie etc. U-Bahnstationen der Linien U7 und U8, sowie die Ringbahn (Sonnenallee) sind in Fußnähe. Nach kurzem Suchen findet man in der Nachbarschaft immer schnell einen Parkplatz.
access: Neben Eurem Zimmer habt Ihr Zugang zum großzügigen Bad mit Badewanne und Dusche, sowie Waschmaschine, die Ihr bei Bedarf natürlich gern auch benutzen dürft. Außerdem steht Euch unsere Küche zur Verfügung. Hier findet Ihr alles, was man zum Kochen so braucht (Elektroherd mit Ofen, Spülmaschine, Mikrowelle, Toaster, Wasserkocher, Standmixer, Sandwichmaker etc.) Außerdem kann man hier mit Blick auf die Sonnenallee sehr gemütlich sitzen.
interaction: Ich stelle mein Zimmer zur Verfügung und werde während Eures Aufenthalts verreist sein. Meine beiden Mitbewohner sind da und stehen Euch für Fragen und Tipps jederzeit gern zur Verfügung!
house_rules: Da ihr die Wohnung mit meinen beiden Mitbewohnern teilt, bitte ich Euch, insbesondere abends bezüglich der Lautstärke etwas Rücksicht zu nehmen.
host_about: Hello there.

name: Room on famous Weserstrasse
summary: Cozy, large, studio-like, "Berliner Zimmer" for up to two people (one double bed 140x200cm) on Weserstrasse in trendy-artsy Neukölln in South-East Berlin. You would share the kitchen and our fantastic bathroom with us.
space: Hardwood floors, high ceilings, typical Berlin wooden windows and plus, being architects, carpenters and DIY lovers, the apartment has lots of self made and designed furniture and artwork. And... the coziest bathtub in Berlin!
description: Cozy, large, studio-like, "Berliner Zimmer" for up to two people (one double bed 140x200cm) on Weserstrasse in trendy-artsy Neukölln in South-East Berlin. You would share the kitchen and our fantastic bathroom with us. Hardwood floors, high ceilings, typical Berlin wooden windows and plus, being architects, carpenters and DIY lovers, the apartment has lots of self made and designed furniture and artwork. And... the coziest bathtub in Berlin! Your private studio-like bedroom features a double bed, a large working/dining table, an armchair and a wardrobe. You have access to a full bath with bathtub, kitchen, washing machine, hairdryer and one bike As we live here and will share the apartment with you, we will welcome you personally. Neukölln is the new creative hip hub of Berlin. Bars, cafés, restaurants, book and record stores, frequent markets and the canal just one street away makes it a great location for enjoying summer in Berlin. Two  "Späti" convenience stores just steps away from
neighborhood_overview: Neukölln is the new creative hip hub of Berlin. Bars, cafés, restaurants, book and record stores, frequent markets and the canal just one street away makes it a great location for enjoying summer in Berlin. Two  "Späti" convenience stores just steps away from the door.
transit: Busstop (Erkstrasse) 300m distance Subway (U Rathaus Neukölln) 700m distance

host_about:
Wir sind ein Paar und wohnen seit zwei Jahren gemeinsam in Berlin. Kristin ist gebürtig aus Mexiko, Matthias aus Deutschland. Wir arbeiten beide als Architekten. 
Einer unserer Hobbies ist das Reisen, das Kennenlernen anderer Kulturen. Da airbnb dazu eine wunderbare Plattform bietet, möchten wir auch unsere Wohnung Reisenden zur Verfügung stellen, wenn wir wieder mal unterwegs sind.

name: Modern 2-rms Apt in Heart of Berlin
summary: The apartment is located in the heart of Berlin, at walkable distance from the hectic center (Mitte) and from the more chilled and hipster Prenzlauer-Berg. The apartment is cozy and quiet, with the balcony facing to the internal courtyard. Would be happy to have you while I'm traveling.

The flat is very bright and equipped with eveyrthing you need for a short or eithera  longer stay. Contact me and I will be happy to help you with any question!

transit: Around my place you can have delicious food and drinks! The most famous and delicious sushi restaurant, Sasaya, is just 5 minutes walking from my place then you have a great choice of oriental cuisine restaurants as Korean,Vietnamese and Thai.A great African restaurant,Massia,that I deep recommend to you and great italian pizza to take away also!Then for your free time great shopping in Kastanienallee and on sunday you can join the most famous flea market of the city in Mauer Park (10 minutes walking) and in the summer the most funny Karaoke in the park as well of ever!

house_rules: Please: - Do not use the internet provided at the apartment for illegal downloads, filesharing or distribution of movies, songs, videos, etc. This is an infringement of copyrights, which can get the owner of the internet connection (i.e. the apartment owner or manager) sued by the owner of the files' distribution rights. Any such action by guests will therefore, unfortunately, lead to us taking legal action against them and to seek compensation. Unfortunately, we have learnt from our past experience where guests have engaged in such filesharing. DO NOT DO IT PLEASE!  - No excessive noise between 11pm and 7am  - Do not smoke in the apartment or inside the building  - Make sure the apartment's door is always properly shut and locked when leaving the premises  - Preferably take off your shoes when inside the apartment  - Switch off the lights and TV when leaving the apartment  - Close all windows when leaving the apartment ... and, of course, enjoy your stay!
host_about:
I am 36 years old and I have a full time job that I love and that allows me to travel frequently.
I am italian and I've been leaving in this beautiful city for 4 years.
I love reading,watching movies and of course I love shopping!
Come to my place and enjoy Berlin as I enjoy every single day as it was the first day!

name: Big friendly room with balcony
summary: My apartment is in walking distance to a few sights of Berlin city. There is also a train (U5) that you could use all day and night. The train station is 3 minutes far away by foot. My neigbourhood is very quiet and you find everything you need around here (food, drinks etc.).  Don't bring anybody in my apartment. Don't smoke, no strong alcohol, no parties or drugs. Feel free if you have any questions.  Check-In: 06:00 pm (weekdays) Check-Out: 10:00 am Caro :)

host_about:
My name is Carolin, I'm 27 years old and from Germany. 
I love travelling around the world!
I already used airbnb.com to find an awesome apartment in Dubai, L.A. and Barcelona. 

I'm a clean, reliable, friendly and open minded person. I like animals and I'm fine if there live any of them as long they're not toxic or dangerous. LOL

When I book a room or an apartment on here then I expect the pictures to be real, so I won't be disppointed when I arrive there. They are supposed to be tidy when I get there. I guess that's the most important thing. 

Go ahead and ask me whatever you would like to know, please. 

Caro :)

name: Nice room @Warschauer Straße/RAW/East Side Gallery
summary: Hi everyone, in my room you'll find a comfortable bed and a sofa. You'll be looking into the quiet courtyard while being in Berlin's most popular part of town, with the famous Simon-Dach-Kiez, the RAW and the East Side Gallery right in front. This is my private room that I offer to visitors while I am most likely not in Berlin - so you'll find a lot of personal stuff and get a real "living in Berlin"-feeling!
space: Ihr habt Zugang zu einer neuen, modernen Küche und unserem Bad mit Badewanne/Dusche.
description: Hi everyone, in my room you'll find a comfortable bed and a sofa. You'll be looking into the quiet courtyard while being in Berlin's most popular part of town, with the famous Simon-Dach-Kiez, the RAW and the East Side Gallery right in front. This is my private room that I offer to visitors while I am most likely not in Berlin - so you'll find a lot of personal stuff and get a real "living in Berlin"-feeling! You'll have tram M10 (direct connection to Hauptbahnhof) just a couple of meters away, underground (U1 & U5 to Alexanderplatz) and S-Bahn (S7/75/5) are also in walking distance. Furthermore there is a bus station just 100 meters away that leads you to Ostbahnhof.
neighborhood_overview: Ihr seid hier in Friedrichshain, einem der beliebtesten Viertel Berlins. Ein paar Hundert Meter entfernt befindet sich der Simon-Dach-Kiez mit Restaurants, Bars und kleinen Geschäften aller Art. Die Spree ist nicht weit entfernt und das RAW-Gelände ist gerade einmal 3 Querstraßen weg - dort gibt es Flohmärkte, Urban Lifestyle, eine Boulderhalle und Clubs. Außerdem ist der berühmte Berghain-Club zwei Straßen weiter. Trotzdem ist es in diesem Teil der Grünberger Straße relativ ruhig, das Partyvolk zieht meistens an der circa 200 Meter entfernten Warschauer Straße entlang.  Direkt an der Warschauer Brücke befindet sich die Mercedes-Benz-Arena und gleich davor die berühmte East Side Gallery am Ufer der Spree.  Der Alexanderplatz mit dem Fernsehturm ist von hier zu sehen und in circa 30 Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen, entlang der schönen Karl-Marx-Allee.
transit: You'll have tram M10 (direct connection to Hauptbahnhof) just a couple of meters away, underground (U1 & U5 to Alexanderplatz) and S-Bahn (S7/75/5) are also in walking distance. Furthermore there is a bus station just 100 meters away that leads you to Ostbahnhof.
house_rules: - Respectful behaviour - no smoking - no partying - cleaning of self-produced dirt in the flat (table, dishes...)

name: Beautiful & Cozy Room in the heart of Neukölln
summary: My apartment is in a beautiful neighborhood. Near the canal, a beautiful park, and the train station U Rathaus Neukölln. Down the street there are a lot of cosy cafés, gallerys and cute little shops.
space: Die Wohnung ist gemütlich, herzlich und einladend. Es gibt ein Badezimmer mit geräumiger Dusche, eine große Wohnküche in der man gemeinsam kochen und essen kann. Es gibt ein wunderschön größes Wohnzimmer mit Sesseln und einer Couch wo man es sich gemütlich machen kann.
description: My apartment is in a beautiful neighborhood. Near the canal, a beautiful park, and the train station U Rathaus Neukölln. Down the street there are a lot of cosy cafés, gallerys and cute little shops.
transit: Ubahn: 2 minutes bus: 1 minute Drive Now Car Sharing everywhere S-Bahn: 5 minutes

host_about: Ich wohne gerade in Berlin und arbeite hier für eine Künstleragentur. Ich reise gerne, lerne neue Kulturen kennen und treffe gerne offene und freundliche Menschen!

name: Cozy room close to Friedrichshain

name: Attractive Room In Beautiful Prenzlauer Berg
summary: This double bedroom in our modern, bright Prenzlauer Berg apartment makes a great base for a few days in Berlin. We're conveniently located on two tram lines with links to Alexanderplatz, Eberswalder Strasse (great for food!) and Hauptbahnhof train station. Clubs and nightlife in Neukolln are just a 12 minute train ride, and the Museum Island with its impressive cathedral is 15 minutes away.
space: My room (the room being rented) is not huge but cosy (14m2) and spotless, and has a new TV with PS4 and Netflix. The modern kitchen is perfect for cooking dinner after a day spent exploring the city.

My room (the room being rented) is not huge but cosy (14m2) and spotless, and has a new TV with PS4 and Netflix. The modern kitchen is perfect for cooking dinner after a day spent exploring the city. Everything in our kitchen is available to you for the duration of your stay. One of the two housemates will usually be around in the evenings, so feel free to say hey! You'll have all the privacy you require, though. Prenzlauer Berg is a safe, stylish neighbourhood famed for its leafy suburbs and the huge number of restaurants and bars it has to offer. If you enjoy Asian cuisine, a good burger or a wel
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is a safe, stylish neighbourhood famed for its leafy suburbs and the huge number of restaurants and bars it has to offer. If you enjoy Asian cuisine, a good burger or a well-made cocktail, this is the place for you. We're ten minutes from Mitte (great for shopping) and Friedrichshain (full of chic coffee shops and hip restaurants).
notes: Weekend arrivals can be arranged easily for any time of day. Check-in on Thursday or Friday will be possible in the evenings (after 6-7pm). If you need to check-in earlier, get in touch before you book and we'll do our best to work something out!
transit: Parking in the street requires a permit. We're two minutes walk from the M4 and M10 tramlines and three minutes walk from the ringbahn at Greifswalder Str., connecting you to every major neighbourhood in Berlin within 20 minutes travel time.
access: Everything in our kitchen is available to you for the duration of your stay. One of the two housemates will usually be around in the evenings, so feel free to say hey! You'll have all the privacy you require, though.

name: Comfortable room in Berlin for rent
space: My girlfriend and I rent our beautiful big sunny room. Because we are sympathetic young persons who like to be interacting with different people around the world. You got many public vehicle connections to reach fast and easier the different areas of Berlin. And a park near to the flat. We rent our beautiful sunny room in the 2 floor in Prenzlauer Berg. On the other side of the street you are in Friedrichshain. In the near is one of berlins wonderful green parks "Volkspark Friedrichshain"(10 min walk). Our flat is 5 Min walk from S-Bahn (train) Landsberger Allee away and also 5 min from tram M10 (for example to Warschauerstrasse ) und 10 min (to Alexanderplatz) so you have good connections to many favorite places. There are some supermarkets and day and night shops around. In one of them, you can rent bikes (12€ / day) -wifi -bathroom (only shower) -kitchen -Television ( only German canals but you can connect your laptop/pc with them and watch your own videos) I stay with my girlfriend

name: Center of Berlin
summary: 公寓坐落在柏林的心脏地区,拥有设施齐全的厨房,全套羽绒的高档床上用品,24小时热水且舒适的浴室,富有艺术气息的柏林风格涂鸦,您会永远记住在这里居住的一切。
space: It's Mitte, means closed to all cultural attractions, shopping and nightlife, but still quiet and you don't feel like living in a "bar". I like to call it the "new quiet Mitte" since recently a lot of luxury apartment buildings were constructed next to existing architecture, so it's for Mitte a pretty quiet neighbourhood, but Gendarmenmarkt, Checkpoint Charlie, Alexanderplatz, Friedrichstraße are all within easy walking distance (10min) Subway station (U-Bhf) Spittelmarkt 2 min walk. Several busses 3 min walk at Leipziger Str. Walking distance to Gendarmenmarkt, Checkpoint Charlie, Alexanderplatz and Friedrichstraße about 10 min.

name: Lovely private room in Berlin
summary: It the pictures you can see the cosy and beautiful private room in Berlin Wedding. It is suitable for couples, those travelling alone or even a small family. The sofa in the bed room is also a pull-out sofa which means four guests/ children are also welcome. The room can also be locked from the inside if you’d be more comfortable this way.  The apartment itself is a lovely 2-bed room apartment that you would be sharing with my friend, a quiet but very helpful person who is working in the week.

There is also a nice kitchen with the basic kitchen equipments you’d need and bathroom with a bathtub which is a big plus if you’ve had a long sightseeing day in Berlin. ;)  You can also use the clean bed sheets, blankets and towels provided for you. Plus the apartment is connected to Wifi.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Wedding. You are very well connected to the public means of transport: 10minutes walk to the underground station U-Bahn Pankstr., bus stations and also  S-Bahn Ring-Bahn + U6 "Wedding". There is also a little nice park close by; 5min by foot but also the big Volkspark Humboldthain with a beautiful green area for a relaxing walk. Of course seeing that you’re in the inner city you can also find some supermarkets, 24/7 corner shops, cafes and restaurants within walking distance. It takes about 30min to and from the airport with the bus.
access: If you have any further questions, please ask and I'll help you. :)

space: Please keep everything clean in the shared rooms and do not make a mess in your room!

notes: You can count on my help. I will help you with all your questions and matters. I am open to your wishes. We can not only exchange information about Berlin's history, politics and sights, but also about God and the world, making the world a bit more heartfelt. Du kannst mit meiner Hilfe auf jeden Fall rechnen. Ich helfe dir in allen Fragen und Angelegenheiten mit Rat und Tat. Ich bin offen für deine Wünsche. Wir können nicht nur über Berlins Geschichte, Politik und Sehenswürdigkeiten, sondern auch über Gott und die Welt austauschen und die Welt ein bisschen herzlicher machen.

name: Quiet and bright in Berlin Neukölln
summary: The apartment is a two room apartment. The small room with the mattress for sleeping is for rent. The kitchen and the bathroom are also for your use. The Apartment is situated in the trendy neighborhood of Neukölln directly at the Park Hasenheide and the huge Park Flughafen Tempelhof.
space: The apartment is very quiet and very bright. It has very high ceilings.

name: Charming home in lively and central Berlin Mitte!
summary: Very central: less than 15min from all major touristic spots (Museum Island,Alexanderplatz,Brandenburger Tor...) AND one block from the former Berlin Wall! Wall memorial 10m away! Lively and hipster neighbourhood with cafés/bars/restaurants, live music/cinemas/theatres/nightclubs in walking distance! Perfect for solo travelers, couples, small families. Tee and Nespresso Coffee included!! Highlight: Great advices on less common touristic attractions and hidden spots or local cultural events!
space: Very cosy appartement with a common living room, fully furnished kitchen and balcony to hang out together or relax after a long day of visiting! All the basic kitchen amenities like oil, vinegar, herbs etc can be used! For a third guest I can provide a mattress. The rented room is big enough even for three people!

host_about:
I have been living in Berlin for six years now and I love the place for the hundreds of things you can do here and for the very relaxed atmosphere and people. 
Although I am quite busy during the week with my medical studies, I am culturally very active. I have so many good advices to give on restaurants, bars, museums or places to visit.
I am very easy going and open-minded and it's a pleasure for me to host people coming from all over the world. I cannot wait to meet you all!
