name: cosy&nice&perfect located Apartment
summary: Berlin at its Best!  Quiet and centrally located-pefectly connected via U-Bahn/S-Bahn/Bus; numerous restaurants just around the corner-as well as cosy cafes. You will love this area!
space: Very nice and cosy apartment direktly where Kennedy did his speech in 1963 "Ich bin ein Berliner" (I am a Berliner) at the Townhall of Berlin-Schöneberg, an amazing district with a lot of small cafes and restaurants in footwalking distance. Even bakeries and restaurants with breakfast service are very close. On a Sunday you must try the spectacular Brunch at the Gottlob restaurant (upon reservation, 9,90 € Euro per person) The apartment is new renovated and very quiet at the 6th floor including elavator. It´s a two rooms apartment, but it´s really comfortable. Ideally located within 3 minutes walking at the Bus (M46, M104) and subway lines (U4). Station called Rathaus Schöneberg. 2 New bicycles can be rentet for € 5/day/unit. The famous Kurfürstendamm is reachable in a 10 minutes trip by bus (very 10 Minutes) as well as the KaDeWe. There is a perfect possibility for jogging in a beatiful park with little lake which is located just 4 minutes by walking. Trainstation for international tr

host_about:
As energy efficiency expert and PV/electric vehicle consultant we are living now in South East Asia.
We are running in the Philippines and Hongkong companies.
Between optimizing power plants and reducing the carbon emission of shopping mals we are enjoing the vibrant life style in Manila/HK/KL and Bangkok.

So our European home is only used for some weeks of the year.

Basically my wife and me do love to travel a lot. Building up relationships over the globe is amazing.

Clearly we do like sports (skiing, mountain biking, hiking) and nice food as well as nice wine ;-)

My wife is Russian and financial manager in a diesel trading company in Berlin and I am an electric Vehicles expert, working on a sustainable economic business case, which offers the balance between "making money" and "saving the planet".
So we do have some things to talk about….

Therefor as Austrian I am, living in Berlin and Dornbirn, doing a lot of global energy saving business, like optimizing steam boilers, heat generation and do create holistic energy reduction plans for enterprises.

We are also key members of the globes biggest shopping community, helping consumers to save money in all daily expenses.

name: KaDeWe and ZOO! Business and Fun!
summary: Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe von Kurfürstendamm und KsDeWe, ASTOR Film Lounge, Tauentzienstraße. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen Gemütlichkeit, hohe Decken, die Lage, der Ausblick und die Leute. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für alleinreisende abenteurer und geschäftsreisende.
space: Гости могут бесплатно высокоскоростным беспроводным доступом в интернет (WiFi).  Каждое утро с 6.30h до 7.30h сервируется вкусный завтрак. Завтрак     бесплатно Интернет     бесплатно Холодильник   бесплатно Мы предлагаем лучшее жилье в Берлине для каждого гостьа. Наш дом удивит вас не только прекрасным расположением в центре Берлина в районе Шенеберг, Универмаг KaDeWe В пешей доступности расположен самый старый и крупный универмаг Берлина KaDeWe. Этот торговый центр работает еще с 1907 года. За это время он значительно улучшился и стал больше. Сегодня KaDeWe представляет собой 6 гектаров торговой площади и 8 этажей элитных товаров: одежда, обувь, парфюмерия, аксессуары, косметика, украшения и часы, деликатесы, подарки и многое другое. В день универмаг посещает больше ста тысяч людей. Вечером KaDeWe красиво светится огнями. Его можно увидеть прямо из окон
description: Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe von Kurfürstendamm und KsDeWe, ASTOR Film Lounge, Tauentzienstraße. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen Gemütlichkeit, hohe Decken, die Lage, der Ausblick und die Leute. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für alleinreisende abenteurer und geschäftsreisende.
neighborhood_overview: Шёнеберг —  район Берлина, который привлекает разнообразием. Все, кто был в Шёнеберге, хотят вернуться. В первую очередь, этот район привлекает универмагом KaDeWe, шоппинг в котором вы никогда не забудете. Также здесь роскошные дома, которые одним своим видом дарят комфорт. Отели в Шёнеберге обеспечивают своим гостям максимум расслабления и отдыха. Разнообразие Шёнеберга: Можно много писать и говорить о KaDeWe, но Шёнеберг отличается не только универмагом. Кроме него здесь также есть много на что посмотреть! Площадь Ноллендорфплац известна своими многочисленными барами, ресторанами и кафе, где можно насладиться вечером и коктейлем, выпить коктейль перед тем, как идти в один из клубов. Некоторые из самых популярных ночных клубов:     Havanna Club — здесь звучат миксы южноамериканских инструментов и последние клубные треки.     Connection — этот клуб находится на Виттенбергплац и встречает ди-джеями,  музыкой в стиле хаус и техно.     Ypsilon — ресторан, бар и летний сад. Здесь играет жи
notes: Курение в комнатах запрещено! Высота потолков 3,75 м, есть паркет и деревянные полы, а также звуконепроницаемые окна. Мы подумали обо всем, чтобы вы могли чувствовать себя комфортно  у нас в центре Берлина!

name: Sweet apartment in Berlin Center
space: The apartment is in Berlin Center, in Wilmersdorf, a quite residental area, 10 min by car from the famous street of the shopping Ku'damm, only 5 min by walking far from the Metro Heidelbergerplatz. From here you can easily reach all the corner of the city. Only 5 min walking you can reach also Rudesheimerplatz, a beautiful old square with gardens, fountains and small bars where you can drink a wine in a friendly contest. Do not hesitate to contact me to get get more info! Take care Nicolo

name: Room in Friedrichshain Berlin
summary: ***Willkommen (Welcome) to Berlin and my Flat***
space: ***Willkommen (Welcome) to Berlin and my Flat*** Key facts:  You will life together with a 31 year old nice German dude in a beautiful first floor apartment in one of the nicest areas in Berlin, just 5-10 minutes by metro to the center of Berlin and close to all other popular areas like Kreuzberg or Prenzlauer Berg.  You will have your own beautiful full furnished room, access to bath and kitchen. The Room/Apartement:  You will life a big room. You will also have full access to the lovely bathroom and kitchen, where you can store your food if necessary. name: Top Floor with a View in Mitte!
summary: Beautiful top floor apartment centrally located by tons of sights, restaurants and the Spree, you'll be a short walk, bike or metro trip away from all of Berlin. Large kitchen, huge living area, master bedroom and tons of balcony space to enjoy.
space: With a massive kitchen, large living space with an eating area as well as a seating area with tons of comfortable sofas and one sofa-bed, you'll be all set to eat, relax and enjoy yourself after walking or biking around Berlin all day. We have plenty of patio furniture and a grill to enjoy some outside time on the front or back balconies. Want to snuggle up on a rainy afternoon? We have a projector you can hook up to your laptop and enjoy some relaxing movies or TV via the high-speed internet. The space is perfect for a couple who enjoys to cook or a family with small children looking to enjoy Berlin and feel at home at the same time.

neighborhood_overview: We are centrally located steps away from the Spree (large river that runs though Berlin) and between a combined metro and S-Bahn (regional train) station and another metro station. About a 10-15 minute walk to Museum Island. Steps away from weekend flea and art markets. Great cafe for early morning coffee and snacks and two 24-hour Spaties on the block (corner stores). Two blocks from a grocery store and one S-Bahn stop (5min or less) away from Alexanderplatz.
notes: Please be kind to the plants, vegetables and fruits we are growing. You're welcome to use some in your cooking, but make sure you leave some for the next visitors! We will also be leaving several, but not all of our kitchen appliances and cooking materials. Have any special requests on what we leave? Message us and we're happy to oblige!
transit: We are centrally located steps away from the Spree (large river that runs though Berlin) and between a combined metro and S-Bahn (regional train) station and another metro station. There are options to park your car directly across the street for a small daily fee. There are tons of great bike rental spots in the neighborhood, should you wish to rent a bike and enjoy Berlin's bike-friendly roads.
access: You can access the back bike-holding area through a door on the main floor. There is also an elevator so you can take your luggage upstairs without climbing 6 floors.
interaction: We won't be in Berlin while you're here, but the good news is -- we have friends here! If you need anything, we're happy to converse and if you need any in-person help a few close-by friends will be around to see that you're okay.
house_rules: Please be polite and respect the neighbors in the building. Several of our neighbors have family with children, so keep the noise to normal levels late at night. Please smoke ONLY on the balconies. Please water the plants occasionally, so they can keep living. Please look after the kitchen appliances, dishes and furniture as you would your own. Please be careful not to scratch the floors, as they are quite expensive to repair.

name: Beste Kiezlage in Kreuzberg
summary: 2-Zimmer-Wohnung in bester Kreuzberger Kiezlage: - gut an ÖPNV angebunden - zahlreiche Restaurants und Cafés in direkter Nachbarschaft - Markthalle 9 & Zalando Outlet direkt um die Ecke Da ich bald ausziehe, ist die Wohnung nur mit dem nötigsten ausgestattet: - Bett inkl. 2 Bettdecken + Kissen (140x200) - Küche & Geschirr, KEIN Kühlschrank - WLAN - 2 Stühle und kl. Tischchen -  Campingmatratze als "Couch" - Einbauschrank für Kleideraufbewahrung - frische Bettwäsche & Handtücher (2 Personen)
space: Süße 2-Zimmer-Wohnung in bester Kreuzberger Kiezlage!  - zahlreiche Restaurants, Cafés und Bars in direkter Nachbarschaft - 100m zur bekannten Markthalle Neun  - 300m zum Zalando Outlet - Schlesisches Tor, Warschauer Str. uvm mit quirligem Nachtleben fußläufig - perfekt angebunden (Bus 100m, U-Bahn 8 Minuten zu Fuß) Da ich bald ausziehe, ist die Wohnung sehr spartanisch ausgestattet. Tischchen -  Campingmatratze als "Couch" - Einbauschrank für Kleideraufbewahrung Selbstverständlich stelle ich frische Bettwäsche und Handtücher für jeden Gast, sowie Reiningungsmittel für den Abwasch. Um Missverständnisse zu vermeiden, möchte ich noch einmal betonen, dass die Wohnung folgendes NICHT bietet: - Kühlschrank - ein super bequemes Wohnzimmer  - TV Für einen Berlin Besuch bei dem man eh die meiste

name: Design Appartment+Rooftop Terrace, Light & Central
summary: Furnitured Appartment with Rooftop Terrace near to Checkpoint Charlie. Ideal for sightseeing trips in Berlin: Brandenburger Tor, Reichstag and Potsdamer Platz close-by. Light-flooded, cozy Flat with design furniture, ideal for couples or groups of 4 persons.  Short ways also to STATION Berlin or Tempodrom. +Sleeping Room (King-Size Bed) +Guest Room (Sofa bed) +Work Desk +Rooftop Terrace +100% Privacy, rent the full appartment +quiet neighborhood but central location +10 mins to Alexanderplatz
space: The exclusively furnished apartment of 80 sqm offers more then just high comfort, you will find interesting art, cool details and also some designer classics, but honestly - you could call it a hidden gem. From the outside building you would never guess it´s such a light-flooded, beautiful flat - that was at least our first impression before we rented it one year ago. It will be yours, but  we fell in love and you hopefully will too. You enter the main entrance, take the elevator to the 4th floor and after some stairs you will enter directly our living room with floor-to-ceiling-windows a big sofa, indirect design lighting, a lot of interior pieces to explore. When you turn right you will see the small, but fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, oven, cooking plate, fridge & of course a coffee machine ready-to-use. Turn left and you will see our dining area with a big wooden dining table with enough space for 5 people next to a small balcony with a beautiful view over the inner courty

It will be yours, but  we fell in love and you hopefully will too. You enter the main entrance, take the elevator to the 4th floor
neighborhood_overview: In Short: Checkpoint Charlie, Brandenburger Tor, Reichstag, Ministerial Gardens, German State Representation Offices, Embassies, Tiergarten, Potsdamer Platz, Galleries Lafayette, Friedrichstraße, MALL OF BERLIN Shopping Center, Station Berlin, Tempodrom, Gendarmenmarkt, Berliner Mauer (THE WALL)...
notes: We live in this appartment ourselves - please respect our belongings and treat our belongings well. Don´t smoke in the appartment, but feel free to use the roof top or the balcony to do so. Don´t party as we like our neighbours but nothing speaks against a decent dinner party with some music though ;-)
transit: Very close you can find subway U6  (Checkpoint Charlie) as well as the buslines M29 and N6 which both stop right in front of the appartment directly in Kochstraße. A bit further 5 -10 mins walk you can find U+S Brandenburger Tor U+S Potsdamer Platz U 2 Mohrenstraße or the "inofficial Sightseeing Tour-Bus" 200 The BVG’s public Berlin 200 offer the cheapest sightseeing tours in all of Berlin, considering that, for the price of a single ride in Zones A and B (only €2.40), you’ll pass most of the city’s main points of interest. The “tour” you take while riding Bus Line Line 200 really isn’t all that different from a typical commercial sightseeing excursion, for which you’d be expected to pay upwards of €14.  Of course, your bus trip won’t be narrated by a tour guide, but with a little bit of luck, you’ll manage to land a slightly off-the-wall bus driver, who has a few (URL HIDDEN) and stories up his sleeve, and is more than happy to share them...
access: We are frequent travellers ourselves and prefer Airbnb appartments over unpersonal hotel rooms -  we always feel welcome in other people´s flat so we want you to feel like home as well. We´re living normally in this appartment so you will find a lot of art & interior pieces, personal belongings and our interior taste all over the place - we hope you will like it as much as we do! We freed up space in the wardrobes and drawers for our guests to create space for longer stays. Of course you have full access to all rooms, all furniture and feel free to use everything you find from the fridge to the oven, iron, washing machine, my barbecues, wardrobes and hangers, bed couch...please just respect our privacy and belongings and treat them as you wish someone would treat yours. (If you take something from our supplies, our house bar, etc. no problem, just replace/refill it afterwards or give us a note) Fresh Linen and Towels are included and will be provided.
interaction: We rent out the whole appartment and will be on travel ourselves. We will organize a smooth handover with a short tour through the appartment. We are available for smaller & bigger issues via phone - don´t hesitate to contact us in case of questions. We provided a A-Z list with FAQ for the most common issues for your convinience.
house_rules: Nichtraucherwohnung - Rauchen ist nur auf der Terrasse und auf dem Balkon erlaubt! Wohnung ist Partyfreie Zone! Professionelle Fotoshootings oder Filmaufnahmen nur nach vorheriger Absprache mit extra Vergütung!

name: LOFT- 8 minutes from train station!
summary: Das Loft kann gerne für Foto-und Filmproduktionen gemietet werden, zurzeit ist es leider nicht möglich, es für Übernachtungen zu buchen. Bitte beachten Sie, dass es sich bei dem Tagespreis um einen Mindestpreis handelt und dass bei Film- und Fotoproduktionen ein individuelles Gastgeberangebot ausgehandelt wird.
space: This incredible loft of over (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) square feet captures the unique Berlin spirit and is located only 8 minutes by taxi from the main train station and only 14 minutes from the Airport Tegel.  It is located in a 110 year old factory, one of the very last ones in Berlin not bought by a developper and still full of artists. With its 4 Meter/13 feet ceilings and original concrete floors it has remained a rough industrial style character. The unique furniture consists of custom-made pieces or vintage collectibles. Even the Bakelite switches are original pieces from the 40s or 60s.  In the same factory complex you will find the famous Tangoloft (www.tangoloft-(email hidden) as well as a lounge run by one of the most prominent DJs in Berlin. There is a supermarket some 200m/800 feet away as well as a subway station (S-Bahn Wedding or S-Bahn Humboldhain) some (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) feet away.  Guests will find parking possibilities in front of the factory, free Wifi, flat TV, a

name: Wonderfull place Friedri 1
summary: Friedrichshain district of Berlin. The best apartment to discover Berlin. Visit the city but enjoy staying in a quiet home. It's your holiday, you want to feel comfortable, store your things on shelves and drawers, as in your own home. Having more than 1 bathroom available for the group isn't minor thing either. Your baby won't be be missing anything while away from home.
description: Friedrichshain district of Berlin. The best apartment to discover Berlin. Visit the city but enjoy staying in a quiet home. It's your holiday, you want to feel comfortable, store your things on shelves and drawers, as in your own home. Having more than 1 bathroom available for the group isn't minor thing either. Your baby won't be be missing anything while away from home. Similar to the neighbouring districts Prenzlauer Berg and Kreuzberg, Friedrichshain lacks of sights but is full of urban lifestyle. Most notably around Simon-Dach-Straße there has developped a vivid clubbing quarter with countless bars, pubs and restaurants in a stunning speed in the last few years. The alternative scene is located on both sides of the Karl-Marx-Allee with a focus in Rigaer Straße, whereas the taverns towards Ostkreuz become more quiet and dignified. I am an economic student about to finish my master degree.

name: Design-Wohnung am Arkona Platz
summary: Charmante Wohnung, renoviert und designed vom Künstler Alexander Vethers, am Arkona Platz, Nähe Zionskirche und Mauerpark. Schlafzimmer, Bad und Wohnzimmer mit Küche und sonnigem Balkon. Das Haus verfügt über einen Aufzug. U-Bahn Station 5' entfernt.
space: Gemütliche, geschmackvoll eingerichtete Wohnung am Arkona Platz, Nähe Zionskirche und Mauerpark. Eingangsbereich, großer Wohnraum mit offener Küche.  Der Künstler Alexander Vethers hatte die Wohnung eingerichtet. Die Wohnung habe ich vor Kurzem gekauft und beschlossen die schöne Einrichtung zu belassen. Einzig das Bad wurde 2015 erneuert.  An den Eingangsbereich ist das Wohnzimmer angeschlossen. Dieses verfügt an der Süd-West Front über einen kleinen Balkon, welcher im Sommer besonders geschätzt wird. Auf der sehr ruhigen Rückseite des Hauses liegt das Schlafzimmer.  Bettwäsche, Badetücher, Küchentücher, Föhn u.a. sind vorhanden. Check-in check-out zwischen 8 Uhr und 20 Uhr. Eine Mittelsperson übergibt und übernimmt den Schlüssel zu den vereinbarten Zeiten. Restaurants, Geschäfte, Märkte und Galerien rund um den "Hackescher Markt" liegen in unmittelbarer Nähe. Das Geschirr ist vor der Abreise zu reinigen und die Lebensmittelreste sind zu entfernen. Die Reinigungsspesen sind ausschließlich für die Reinigung der Wohnung vorgesehen.  Entsorgen Sie vor Abreise den Abfall in den Mülltonnen im Hinterhof. Die üblichen Lärmrichtlinien sind einzuhalten. Das Rauchen in der Wohnung ist nicht erlaubt. Verschließen Sie die Eingangstüre bei Verlassen der Wohnung. Fahräder werden außerhalb des Wohnhauses geparkt. Gegenstände wie Schirme, die von der Wohnung entfernt werden, sind zu ersetzen, wenn nicht zurückgebracht.

name: Schönes, helles, möbliertes Zimmer
summary: Hallo,  Ich biete ein schönes, helles, möblierte Zimmer zur Tagesweisen Miete im Szene-Kiez MITTE an.  Es ist direkt am Rosa-Luxemburg Platz und mit guter Anbindung in die vier Himmelsrichtungen. U2. Mit der Tram 8 u dem Bus 142 direkt zum HBF.
space: Hallo!  Ich biete ein schönes, helles, möblierte Zimmer zur monatlichen Miete in Berlin Mitte an.  Es ist direkt am Rosa-Luxemburg Platz und somit mit guter Anbindung in die vier Himmelsrichtungen. U2. Mit der Tram 8 und dem Bus 142 direkt zum HBF.  5 Minuten Fußweg zum Alex oder Rosenthaler Platz.  In 3 Minuten am Hakeschen Markt und die Clubs sind vor der Haustür. Theater umgeben einen wie der Sand an der See und man kann super gemütlich zur Museumsinsel laufen. Aus der Haustür raus und die Schönhauser Allee hoch zum schwofen und Schaufensterbummeln. Man hat mehrere Biomärkte um die Ecke, einen Netto und Rehe, einen Kaisers vor der Tür. Bäcker und diverse leckere ausländische Essens-Anbieter.  Wenn man Berlin für einen Kurztrip besuchen mag und nicht in die teuren Hotels einchecken, dann ist man bei mir richtig. Bei Mietung bekommt ihr: ein schönes helles Zimmer mit Single-Bett, einen Schreibtisch, einen Kleiderschrank, Bettwäsche und Handtücher werden gestellt. Heizung und Warmwasse

neighborhood_overview: Freundlich, im Sommer auf den Straßen musikalisch. Multikulti, durch die vielen Touristen.
notes: 3 Etage Achtung...Dies ist ein Wannenbad. Wir duschen einfach im Sitzen u umsichtig. Ausserdem gibt es einen Wischlappen, falls mal was daneben gehen sollte. Hat bisher jeder geschafft.  Es gibt keinen Duschvorhang, da das Bad ein Schlauch ist u so gar kein Licht herein kämme.... Der Vorhang im Zimmer ist nur, weil es Gäste gibt, die gerne Vorhänge haben. Einfach Schleife lösen, schwubs ist es dunkel. Schleife rein, Licht herein. Dies ist ein Haus in Mitte. Es wird vor allen im Sommer also nie so still wie in "Stuckenborstel" sein. Aber bisher haben meine Gäste immer alle sehr gut geschlafen. Mit offenem Fenster  hört man morgens die Vögel trällern... Es gibt kein Frühstück von mir. Es ist Eigenversorgung.  P.S. Es ist eine ::Feder:: Bettdecke und Kissen. Ihr könnt aber auch die Allergiker - Variante bekommen. Dies bitte rechtzeitig ansagen, damit ich das richtige beziehe.
transit: SBahn/UBahn/Tram/Bus/DB
access: Über die Wohnungstür. Eigener Schlüssel - auch für das gemietete Zimmer.
interaction: Wenig: da ich viel arbeite. ABER FÜR FRAGEN BIN ICH DA..
house_rules: Es gelten die bekannten Regeln. Respekt dem anderen Eigentum gegenüber. Und man soll sich wohlfühlen und Spaß haben.

summary: Cozy private room with large double bed in trendy area close to central station. 10 min. with public transportation to S+U Friedrichstraße or U/S Zoo/City West, 15 min. to S+U Potsdamer Platz or S+U Central Station and 20 min. to S+U Alexanderplatz.  +++ Gemütliches Privatzimmer mit großem Doppelbett in trendiger Gegend in Stadtmitte. It is only 10 min. with public transportation to S+U Friedrichstraße or S+U Zoo/City West, 15 min. to S+U Potsdamer Platz or S+U Central Station and 20 min. to S+U Alexanderplatz. Two of the main areas for partying - Kreuzberg and the area around Ostkreuz and Warschauer Straße - are about 30 minutes away. Public transportation runs 24/7 in Berlin! access: You can use the kitchen, whenever it is possibly. Just ask me, we can figure everything out together. You can also smoke in the kitchen and stash food in the fridge.  I got towels and bed sheets for you and there is Wi-Fi. Please ask me, if you have any further questions! +++ Ihr habt Zugriff auf die Küche und könnt dort - in Absprache mit mir - kochen. Dort dürft Ihr auch rauchen. Selbstverständlich könnt Ihr auch Essen im Kühlschrank deponieren.  Die Wohnung hat ein schönes Bad mit Duschbadewanne und WC, es gibt Handtücher und frische Bettwäsche für Euch. Natürlich gibt es WLAN. Bei weiteren Fragen sprecht mich einfach an!
interaction: I'll leave you alone but will be there for your questions.  Ich lasse meinen Gästen ihren Freiraum, bin bei Fragen jedoch erreichbar.
house_rules: Hi there, No parties!* No visitors!* Please respect the neighbours!* Please do smoke in the kitchen only! I want you to feel welcome and at home, so you can cook and use any kitchen equipment, the washing machine etc. but please ask me first for details! *No parties doesn't mean you can't drink a couple of beers here and have a good time, but out of respect for the neighbours, please keep quiet in the yard and when the windows are open and generally keep it down after 22:00/10pm. We can change the rule about visitors for long-term guests, of course. Just ask me for details. name: Spacious room with a beautiful view
summary: We offer a central bright bedroom in our apartment overlooking the famous Görlitzer Park in the heart of Kreuzberg - Berlin's most exciting neighbourhood. Close to public transport, parks, water canals, bars, cafes, restaurants, clubs & many more.
space: This double bedroom is located in a spacious and bright flat in the heart of Kreuzberg - one of Berlin's most beloved and exciting central neighbourhoods. The room has a huge window with a lovely view over Gorlitzer Park and Alexanderplatz TV tower and, despite being in a very lively area, is quiet and private.  Guests also have access to a cozy, fully equipped kitchen where they can cook and have their meals, a big south-facing living room with a balcony, a bathroom and a second toilet. Bed linens, towels, washing essentials, little snacks, coffee and tea are all provided. On the last 10th floor of the building there is also a shared terrace offering a great and unique view point over this area which has so much to offer!  Rent a bike or take a walk down the canals to enjoy beautiful views and feed the swans, explore the eclectic food at the weekly Turkish market and the street food market hall, or try the unique night mini golf in Gorlitzer Park. The neighbourhood offers a vast selec

neighborhood_overview: Kreuzberg is the coolest, most vibrant and international borough in central Berlin. Our apartment is well-located within a few min walk to the busy spots Görlitzer Bahnhof, Schlesisches Tor, Oranienstrasse, as well as a 10-12 min walk to Kottbusser Tor. The area is full of street art, green spaces, exciting bars, cafes, restaurants, clubs, independent cinemas, concert halls and various shops, as well as plenty of other going-ons. The canals with their beautiful views and all the great markets along are 5 min away, and Treptower Park with the Soviet Memorial is also nearby. Other popular neighbourhoods such as Neukölln and Friedrichshain (where the Berlin Wall East Side Gallery is), are within short walking distance. The city centre Mitte with its famous landmarks such as Alexanderplatz, Museum Island, The Reichstag, Brandenburg Gate, Checkpoint Charlie etc., is around 15 min away by public transport.
notes: Please note that we are working professionals and can't provide 24h access to our flat for check-ins. When you book our room, just let us know what time and where you arrive in Berlin, so we can organize your check-in smoothly. Generally, we try to be considerate and very flexible with check-in and check-out times, but we sometimes can't ensure check-in before 14:00h, or check-out after 12:00h, because if your arrive/leave on the same day when another guest leaves/arrives, we need some time to prepare the flat and your room. But you can of course leave your bags here!
transit: The place is a great starting point for your Berlin exploration. A bus which takes you in 10 min to Mitte (the city centre) and Hermannplatz in Neukölln stops in the street. The 3 underground stations near the flat offer easy connections with the whole city. Görlitzer Bahnhof and Schlesisches Tor take around a 5 min to walk to, and Kottbusser Tor 10 min.
access: We hope that our guests here can feel immediately at home - the only thing we would require is to respect our flat.
interaction: We are a young, easy-going English+Bulgarian couple working in the field of design, we also live in the flat and you will share it with us.  We tend to keep quite busy and are often out, but some days we may also work from home.  In case you need tips with your stay in Berlin, or would like to hang out with us in the flat, we would love to help or have a drink/snack together.  As this is our home, from time to time we might have guests over for a drink, dinner or film projection in the apartment (you are welcome to join us of course:) ), or, not so often but sometimes, we could have a friend that needs to sleep on our sofa for a night or two. Our flat is pretty large, we always try to be considerate of our Airbnb guests' comfort, peace and privacy, so we will try our best to not have anything affect your stay here negatively - we are happy to haven't had problems with anyone so far!
house_rules: We are non-smokers, so please keep in mind that smoking is allowed only on the balcony, where you can also sit and enjoy your morning coffee :) Also important: file sharing and downloading through torrent/file-sharing software is  strictly illegal in Germany and results in hefty fines, so please don't do it! If you have such software on your computer, please also make sure it is disabled before connecting to the wi-fi.

neighborhood_overview: Sehr liebevolle und familiäre Nachbarschaft. Es gibt sehr viele Restaurants und Ausgehmöglichkeiten. In 10 min. erreichst du alle wichtigen Shops, Kinos, Sportclubs und Cafés. Der bekannte Soda Club und vieles mehr befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe. In 15 min. Kannst du auch das Freibad erreichen und den großen Mauerpark. Direkt neben unserer Wohnung habt ihr die Möglichkeit Fahrräder auszuleihen. Very loving and family neighborhood. There are very many restaurants and entertainment. In 10 min. You reach all the important shops, cinemas, sports clubs and cafes. The famous Soda Club and much more are in the immediate vicinity. In 15 min. You can also reach the outdoor pool and the great Mauerpark. Right next to our apartment you have the possibility to rent bicycles.
notes: Zum Ende der Miete, den Schlüsselbund einfach in die blaue Box legen. At the end of the rental, simply put the keybord into the blue box.

interaction: Ich arbeite im Aussendienst und bin selten in der Wohnung , aber man kann mich täglich erreichen. I work in the aftere sales service and I am rarely in the apartment, but you can reach me daily. In the front area we have our small studio, so there is always a contact person and nice entertainment on site.

name: Nice & Quite Room in PrenzlauerBerg
space: Hi there, I am subletting one of my rooms in Berlin (Prenzlauer Berg). U would live together with me, Clara and my dog Holly in a 107 sq Appartment. The flat is in the citycenter of Berlin with good connections to the local traffic. For example: it's a 5 min. walk to "Mauerpark", which is a nice park and where Berlins most beautiful fleamarket is located every sunday (in the summertime it's like a little "Berlin festival"). Just around the corner you can find everything you need: small coffee shops, bars, 2nd hand clothing stores & supermarkets... It´s a 15 min. walk or one train station to go where you´ll find night-clubs as well as theatres, cinemas & galleries. See you in Berlin, Nina

name: Beautiful room near Kollwitzplatz
summary: We have a very large livingroom and share this with you. Our sleeping couch is 1.20 meters wide and therefore perfect for single travelers or couples or good friends who like eachother :-) We take great care that you feel comfortable with us. Our livingroom is at your disposal.  We also work a lot, we are usually only at home in the evening. We also like to spend time with you or leave you completely your free space, we adapt ourselves individually.
space: The apartment is located 200m from Kollwitzplatz. Around you will find everything from the cheese factory to the shoe shop, great restaurants to eat and even wellness facilities (Rykestraße) in which you can relax your body&soul. The highlight of the apartment is the six-seater, light-flooded living room. Through the corner orientation of the apartment you have a great small-town panorama on the Immanuelkirche. The creaking floorboards, the stucco, the beautiful double windows and the wing doors to the bedroom create a native old building. From kitchen utensils to the park blanket, everything is at your disposal.

neighborhood_overview: Restaurants: Umami (Asian), Zefiro (Italian), Ventura Tapas Bar (Spanish), Marienburger (Burger), Suriya-Kanthi (Sri Lanka), Poulette (French) Breakfast: In Knaackstraße and Immanuelkirchstraße there are many small cafés where you can start the day very nicely Shopping: 5 minutes walk to Kaisers (Marienburger / Winsstraße) and Edeka at Kollwitzplatz, 2 minutes to Netto and a small organic shop (Prenzlauer Allee), 7 minutes to the LPG-Biomarkt (Kollwitzstraße) Pharmacy: Immanuelkirchstraße Every Thursday and Saturday there is a street market at Kollwitzplatz until 4 pm, where natural products, vegetables and food are sold from the surrounding area Every Sunday there is the famous Flohmarkt am Mauerpark, which is reached in 10 minutes by foot
transit: The metrotram line M2 runs directly in front of the door. So you are in five minutes at the Alexanderplatz or at the Ringbahnstation Prenzlauer Allee. From there you can explore the city with different lines. The parking spaces must be paid in Penzl'Berg. The calculation period is usually from 9-24 Uh
access: You have access to the living room, bathroom and kitchen. You will receive your own key for the apartment.
interaction: During your stay we are also in the apartment. Of course we also work and are not there all day.
house_rules: Da wir euch unsere privaten Dinge anvertrauen, erwarten wir einen respektvollen Umgang mit unseren Gegenständen und Ehrlichkeit bei Schäden an der Wohnung oder Gegenständen.

name: Central, Spacious & Quiet Room in East Berlin
summary: The apartment is centrally located, situated in a quiet street at the edge of the lively Simon Dach neighborhood. Just around the corner are many shops, bars, restaurants and nightclubs. Metro train station U-/S-Bahnhof Warschauer Straße easily connects you to bigger Berlin. The 28m2 room, incl. double bed and living, makes a great place for 2 on a weekend trip, or when alone, stay longer and discover Berlin, unwind or get some work done. Please send a note to request availability!
space: The private 28m2 area is very spacious and has a serene feel to it. It is located at the first floor and looking out at a quiet courtyard. The room contains all you need for a relaxed stay in Berlin: on your own or with the two of you. There is a 140x200cm double bed, a living area with couch, a desk for working and some storage space. We of course provide sheets and towels.

We of course provide sheets and towels. You are of course very welcome to use our shared kitchen and bathroom. We are also happy to share coffees and newspapers. Luckily, we t
neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain is a part of former East-Berlin where you will find an interesting combination of elegant 'Altbau' housing and GDR's monumental architecture. Our altbau-apartment is situated in a quiet street just at the border of the lively Simon Dach neighbourhood. A 3-minute walk starts your nightly stroll down streets full of lovely bars and restaurants. During the day you will find loads of small and specialized shops in this area. Walk 5 minutes the other way and check out the East Side Gallery, then cross the river Spree over Oberbaumbrücke to enter Kreuzberg. Or take a 5 minute S-bahn ride, since it is only 3 stops to Alexanderplatz and you can easily visit the east city center in Mitte with it's numerous shops, museums and galleries. As your hosts, we can of course also give you our personal tips: we will tell you all about our favorite places to go out for dinner, drink a nice cocktail, visit museums and art galleries, shop, or relax at one of Berlin's great lakes or parks.
transit: We are located just next to central public transport hub Warschauer Straße, which connects you easily to bigger Berlin by U-Bahn (underground), S-Bahn (metro train) or Straßenbahn (tram). Train stations Ostkreuz and Ostbahnhof are also very nearby, there you could also take a train to get you outside of Berlin.
access: You are of course very welcome to use our shared kitchen and bathroom. We are also happy to share coffees and newspapers. Luckily, we tend to keep our shared spaces very tidy and clean :).
interaction: We live in the apartment with the three of us: working and in our mid thirties, a biologist, a photographer and a recipe writer. Some of us are out quite often but we also do home office. We like to cook, read the newspaper or have a good conversation in the kitchen, and you can of course join any of those. For the rest we keep it calm.
house_rules: Do not bring any visitors into our home without discussing with us first. Just tell us if you encounter any problems or have questions so that we can help out! Enjoy your stay :)
host_about:
Originally from the Netherlands, living in Berlin since 2015. I work in food and hospitality and have always loved the people aspect of it. Connecting to people, sharing experiences, getting to know new perspectives, is what I like to live for.

Because of my professional experience hosting is running through my veins. Listening to the needs of guests and following up on feedback is I think most important to keep improving service and for getting the details right.

There are plenty of nice cafes, bars and little shops. A new tiny but super nice independent cinema just opened its doors in Wildenbruchstraße. So come over and check all the nice places out. Hej, my name is John and I am an actor living in Berlin. originally I am from the countryside but I want to check out the life in one of the most amazing cities I know. That is why i moved to Berlin. John

Ich erwarte von meinen Gästen Freundlichkeit, Sauberkeit, sorgfältigen Umgang mit der Einrichtung und die Einhaltung der Nacht- und Mittagsruhe. Es handelt sich um eine Nichtraucherwohnung. Ich bitte Sie, die Schuhe in der Wohnung auszuziehen. Und bitte nicht selber den Müll raus bringen, das mache ich gern für Sie.
host_about: Ich bin Ingenieurin vom Beruf (Wahl-) Berlinerin, aber vor allem Mutter und Ehefrau. Ich liebe es, neue Leute zu treffen und ihnen Tipps für meine Lieblingsorte zu geben, insbesondere in meiner Wohnlage. Airbnb ermöglicht mir den Kontakt zu vielen interessanten Persönlichkeiten, was ich jedesmal spannend finde.

neighborhood_overview: My apartment is located next to Messe Berlin (Berlin Fair) and and ICC – International Congress Centre. There is also Funkturm (Radio Tower) nearby – you can enjoy beautiful panorama of Berlin from the observation desk.  You have also good connection with Berlin Zoologischer Garten and Schloss (Castle) Charlottenburg. Just downstairs there is very good Japanesse restaurants with sushi menu – eat all you can – for just 7,90 EUR! You can also enjoy 2 bakery / cafes and over 10 restaurants nearby (e.g. Italian, American, Asian, German, Turkish, Thai). There are 2 supermarkets ALDI and Kaisers at Theodor Heuss Platz – 200 meters away. Big selection of beer and soft drinks available in drink-shop Getranke Hoffmann.
notes: Due to new legal regulations in Berlin we accept only reservations for min. 60 days and longer.
transit: The nearest public transportation is: U-Bahn (subway) – station Kaiserdamm (U2 line) 150 meters away!!! S-Bahn (city rail) – station Messe Nord/ICC – 300 meters away. Bus – line M49 to Zoologischer Garten and 218 to Pfaueninsel – at Theodor Heuss Platz – 200 meters away. During your stay you can use our safe, private parking place (10 EUR/day). The apartment is 500 away from exit form internal highway A100 (Stadtring) – exit number 7 Kaiserdamm. Connection from Tegel Airport – bus X9 to stop Jungfernheide and S-Bahn to Messe Nord/ICC (20 min). Connection from Schonefeld Airport – city train (S-Bahn) to station Messe Nord/ICC (40 min). Connection from railway station Berlin HBF - S-Bahn to Zoologischer Garten and subway U2 line to station Kaiserdamm (20 min). Connection from bus station Berlin ZOB – 5-minute walk!
access: Inside our apartment there are following facilities / appliances: -32’ LED TV (cable TV, approx. 40 channels), -DVD, -Table with 4 chairs and coffee table, -Wardrobe, -Fridge, -Stove, -Microvawe oven, -Iron, -Hair dryer, -Kettle, -Simple coffee machine, Bed-linen and towel included.
interaction: You will meet me or my friend during your check-in. We do not live in the apartment – but if you will have some requests we can come to the apartment or deliver something you need.
house_rules: No smoking please. Check-in after 20:00 and on Sunday / holiday costs 20 EUR. If you are late and you will not inform us about it we can take 10 EUR (> 1 hour). Check-in directly at the apartment - just call/text us 30 minutes before check-in to confirm your arrival.You can use our private parking place - 10 EUR per night and Internet hi-speed wi-fi for 3 EUR/day. CityTax 5% should be paid on arrival!

Welcome in my apartment,
I am very glad that you will be my guests. I can give you some tips about Berlin and some interesting places in this fantastic city.

Herzlich willkommen in meinem Apartment
Ich würde mich freuen, wenn ihr Euch für meine Wohnung entscheidet und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite.

Cieszę się że będziecie Państwo naszymi gośćmi - z przyjemnością podzielę się z Wami informacjami o ciekawych miejscach w Berlinie.

host_about:
Hello
we are hosts for more than 3 years in different ways. So we know all about being good hosts.  :-) 
We are happy and open-minded Berliner. We look forward to guests from all over the world, for a short trip or a longer stay, for holiday or business travel. We want to make your stay in Berlin as pleasant and relaxed as possible - as much as we wish it to us on our travels.

Welcome to the heart of the capital!


Hallo,
in verschiedener Art und Weise wir sind bereits seit über 3 Jahren Gastgeber. Durch unsere Erfahrungen wissen wir, was gutes Gastgeben ausmacht. :-))

Wir sind lebensfrohe und aufgeschlossene Berliner. Wir freuen uns auf Gäste von nah und fern, für kurz oder lang, auf Urlauber und Geschäftsreisende. Wir möchten Ihren Berlin-Aufenthalt so angenehm und entspannt wie möglich gestalten - genauso, wie wir es uns auf unseren Reisen wünschen.

 Herzlich Willkommen im Herzen der Hauptstadt!

name: Appartment - Very Welcome = 2 Rooms

The living room has a couch which can be turned into a bed. Each room has its own door. All is decorated with love. The kitchen has two ceramic glass cooktops, under bench fridge, sink, Hob, kettle. It is fully equipped with pots + pans, plates etc. + cutlery. The bathroom is square an includes a WC and a shower unit.

Bitte habe Verständnis, wenn meine Mitbewohner in Ihrem Zimmer nicht gestört werden möchten, meistens sind diese jedoch offen neue Menschen kennenzulernen. :) Meine zwei Mitbewohner sind während des Aufenthaltes vor Ort und freuen sich, neue Leute kennenzulernen. transit: Einer der zentralsten Knotenpunkte Berlins, sämtliche Bus, Ubahn und Sbahn Stationen sind in weniger als 10min Fußweg zu erreichen um sämtliche Orte Berlins in weniger als einer halben Stunde zu erreichen. (Alexanderplatz, Fernsehturm, ect.)

Als echte Berliner geben sie dir gerne ein paar Tipss oder nehmen dich/euch vielleicht auch am Wochenende zum Feiern mit, wenn ihr auf einer Wellenlänge seid. :) Für besondere Anliegen o.Ä. bin Ich, als Gastgeber, aber natürlich zu jeder Uhrzeit telefonisch ,unter meiner Handy-Nummer, zu erreichen.
house_rules: Nach Absprache könnte das Mitbringen eines Haustieres (z.B.: Hund) in Ordnung sein. Rauchen in Küche erlaubt.
host_about: Bin gerne im wilden Nachtleben von Berlin unterwegs, je mehr Freunde, desto mehr Spaß und Freude erwartet uns. Das Leben ist voller Überraschungen und positive Energie ist der magische Schlüssel.

name: Cozy bright room in spacious apartment
summary: Me and my flatmate live in a lovely, well located apartment in Prenzlauer Berg right next to a huge vivid parc "Volkspark Friedrichhain" & close to the lovely neighbourhood Bötzowviertel with plenty of cafes, restaurants and little shops. The connections are great, by tram or bus you can reach Friedrichshain, Kreuzberg and Mitte in no time! A Supermarket is in front of the door. After living in Berlin for on and off 11 years I can give you plenty of infos about Berlin.

I've been living in Berlin on and off for about 11 years now so I'd say I know my way around. I travel as much as possible, and I like music in all forms and dancing. I am working in gastronomy so I am not home too much but if, I like cooking all kinds of delicious vegan meals and having friends over to wine and dine. My flatmate is a super kind and chill guy and we will both do our best to make sure you feel home and of course give you all the privacy you need.
I'd call myself relaxed, adventurous and openminded.
See you soon!

name: Studio Apartment in the heart of Prenzaluerberg

It is minutes away from Alexanderplatz and Mitte and yet close enough to jump on the M10 and tram-ride easily to F'shain and x-Berg. It is close to Umami,  Sorsi e Morsi, Pasternak, and plenty of other small cafes and bars. You’ll love it because of the comfy queen-size bed, the neighborhood, the couch, the big balcony and the cozy ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Large and bright apartment in PBerg
space: Situated close to Eberswalderstraße and around the corner from Mauerpark with its flea market and arts performances as well as Kastanienallee with its dozens of cafes for Sunday brunch is my large 85 sq meter apartment. The apartment has a wooden floor, high ceilings with stucco decoration and is kept in warm crème-color and brown tones. It is situated at the southern side of the building in the third floor which guarantees lots of sun all day long. Your room is 25 sq. meters (225 sq. feet) large with space in the closet and wardrobe for your clothes and belongings. The bed is 2,0 x 1,4 meters and provides enough space for two. For your stay you can use the nice and modern kitchen that features an oven, a dish washer, a washing machine and a dryer for your cloth.  The wireless internet allows you to research latest events in Berlin or share your experiences with friends and family at home. With the fixed phone you can make reservations at the places you want to visit or confirm opening

name: 100 sq m Rooftop Apartment in Berlin's East!
summary: Dear future guest! We are very proud to present our new home :) This beautiful, sunny and spacious apartment is located close to Ostkreuz, Boxhagener Platz and Rummelsburger Bay - right between a lively neighborhood with a lot of bars, restaurants and clubs and the quite and beautiful bay, which invites you to long walks in the nature.
space: The rooftop apartment with over 100 square meters is very light and has fairly high ceilings. It has also a big balcony, where you can enjoy the view over the roofs of Berlin and when it is warm, enjoy your meals here. But this beauty has a catch - we live in the 5th floor and there is no elevator. The view and peace reward us for walking up the stairs every day, but of course heavy lifting and tired legs might not be everybody's thing. The furniture and decoration are vintage style we have LED lights as a special design detail in the living room. You will find stay in a cosy dormitory with a double bed (200x180 cm). The kitchen with electric stove, oven, dishwasher and fridge also offers a full set of dishes, high quality pots/pans, a toaster, coffee mashine and water boiler. Tee, coffee, sugar and spicery are provided. You are welcome to use the provided washing mashine.  We hope our guests feel at home but expect that they respect our home as if it was their own.

But we would appreciate if you left us some money for the food and drinks you took. We hope we can do this on a trust basis because we don't want to put prices or limit you the access. Just leave us what it was worth to you :)

host_about:
After graduating from my Bachelor and went out to travel the world. I am interested in getting to know people and their way of life, languages and all the beautiful places on earth. During my 4 month traveling in the USA, Mexico, Cuba, Guatemala, Peru, Bolivia, Chile and Brasil I learned a lot about myself, and the amazing people I met teached me to value every moment in live.
After that I lived for a year in Argentina where I was traveling, working and enjoying life. Then I came back to Berlin to study a Master in Arts and Media Administration which I ended last year. Now I am working as Marketing Manager and saving for my next big travel :)
I love music and the nature. I go a lot to the cinema and concerts and love watching all kinds of movies. When travelling I intend to use my time to the fullest and to see the most. In order to do that I am looking for a quite place where I can rest and safe energy for my trip.

If you want to know more about me and see some of my references, check out my couchsurfing profile: (URL HIDDEN) I am a passionate couchsurfer and love to meet locals to get to know the places I visit the best.

My motto: Live your dreams, don´t dream your life!!

name: Wohnung mit nostalgischem Charme für junge Leute
summary: Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe vom Ubf. Sophie-Charl.-Platz, U2, S-Bahn v. Hbh. bis Zoo, Bus 109 v.Tegel Airport, Haltestelle "Haubachstrasse".  Schloß Charlottenburg, Deutsche Oper, Kudamm  und Mitte sind gut zu erreichen. Die Wohnung ist  ruhig und sogar mit Hofgarten. In den Seitenstaßen gibt es Cafes  und Restaurants, ebenso wie Apotheken, Supermärkte oder Bioläden. Zum Airport Schönefeld dauert es ca. 1 St.  Bus X7 b. Rudow dann U7 b. Bismarckstrasse, dann U2  b. Sophie Charl. Platz
space: Bei mir ist es sehr gemütlich, sämtliche Hektik fällt von einem ab, sobald sich mein Wohlfühlzimmer öffnet... es ist sehr ruhig, aber eben Altbau, 3 OG und der Standard ist eher für Studenten und junge Leute geeignet. (Oder für Junggebliebene  ;-),  die 3 Treppen sportlich bewältigen und keine Luxusausstattung erwarten).

transit: Ich wohne in der Nähe von der Ubf. Station Sophie-Charlotte-Platz, U2. direkte Verbindung zum Zoologischen Garten und Alexanderplatz (hier S-BAHN zum Hauptbahnhof möglich)  auch die S- Bahn bzw . Ringbahn sind in der Nähe, sowie der Bus 109, der direkt zum Flughafen Tegel führt.  Der Airport Schönefeld ist ca 1 St. entfernt. Mit dem Bus X7 kann man bis Rudow fahren, dann mit der U 7 bis Bismarckstrasse und nun nur noch eine Station Richtung Ruhleben bis Sophie-Charlotte-Platz.

host_about:
Meine Mutter Ursula hilft  mir ab und zu etwas. Wir sind ein gutes Team,  freundlich, aufgeschlossen, kommunikativ, humorvoll und hilfsbereit. Wir leben nach dem Motto: "Leben und leben lassen...."


We are open for everything, we like to talk with people and we are friendly and have a good mood.

name: NEU Checkpoint Charlie3 2room-App.
summary: Modern small 2-room apartment for 2 persons -max.4, Terrace in a quiet side street in Berlin-City. 1 Bedroom/TV (Bed 180x200) and 1 Livingbedroom/TV (Bed 160x200) incl. kitchen, washing machine, underground parking & WLAN-free, 24h doormen service!
space: Description: (Up to max. 4) The small 2-room apartment for 2-4 persons with terrace including TV tower view is centrally located in a quiet side street in Berlin at Checkpoint Plaza. The apartment is a very good base to explore Berlin without car, the next underground station U Bahnhof Friedrichstrasse is located in walking distance just 100m away. The apartment is within walking distance in the center between the Brandenburg Gate, Potsdamer Platz and Alexanderplatz. We hope to welcome you soon here in Berlin-Mitte. At the ground floor there is a small inexpensive bistro and bakery, and a italian restaurant Living room  spacious and bright living room with walk-in windows facing the terrace, an LCD TV, a double bed with split mattress for 2 people (Federkern/160x180), coffee table and relax chair, large chessboard. name: Room Berlin City in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Die große freundliche Altbauwohnung liegt im Prenzlauer Berg direkt in der Nähe vom Zentrum Alexanderplatz. Die Straße ist ruhig aber auch hipp wegen den vielen Cafés und Restaurants in der Nähe. S-Bahn, Tram und Supermärkte sind zu Fuß erreichbar.

name: sweet,bright,quietly Apartment
summary: In our sweet ,comfortable Souterrainapartment for 2 persons with lovely garden in a quiet, green area and very near direkt connection 17 min to the cities  you can enjoy very well the ambivalence of the pulsating Berliner Metropolis.5%citytax incl.
space: Pretty, individual basement floor (42sqm) in a detached house Berlin Reinickendorf, in a green area very quiet (no airport noise). Neat features: 1 bedroom with double bed (160x200), large kitchen, small bay with a desk, hall with wardrobe, large bathroom and everything with direkt view into the pretty garden where you  can have  breakfast. There is a rapid bus links into the heart of the City. U-S-alley nearby. W-Lan (V-DSL High Speed 50,000 kb / sec). On request, docking station, - Microwave, small stove, refrigerator flatscreen TV, laundry, cleaning supplies and everything you could need available. (For questions we are happy to help) - Extra bed with mattress for a 3rd person possible - Breakfast on request 6 € / pers.

notes: I have Infomaterial! Here is super  high speed Internet. Berlin city tax is already included in the price. I have a cat! She never comes in the Apartement! So NO danger for Allergics!

Wittenau,Karl-Bonhoefer-Nervenklinik From the airport to my house: TXL(Airport) Bus 128 in Direction "Kurt-Schumacher-Platz"(ca. 9 minutes) then Bus X21/M21 till Station"Karl-Bonhoefer-Nervenklinik". 5 more minutes to walk.How to find me:English:by Foot: we are very cenrtal and our Bus 120 takes you 24 hours to S-U-Bahnhof Hauptbahnhof,heart of the city! more X21/M21  U- Paracelsiusbad, U-S - Wittenau.You can directly park your car in front of our house!(no extra cost) With car:coming from the center the city motorway  in direction North ,Hamburg. interaction: I am interrested  to interact with my guests if they really wish so. I live in the upper part of my house,but I do not touch or enter the guest area!

host_about: Hi,I am Annett from Berlin,Germany and love travelling and meeting lovely and interesting people. Iam nice,creative and funny and like seeing you happy in my city.

name: Stylishly furnished 3 room flat
space: Very nice furnished 2 bedroom apartment for sublet on a nice leafy street. One block away from the idyllic Landwehrkanal (with swans!) and one block from Görlitzer park. Many nice bars and restaurants in the immediate area.  Apartment features: • High ceilings, hardwood floors, granite countertops in the kitchen and granite floors in the bathroom with bathtub.  • Living room with sofa and large dining table. television, dvd player • One large (160 x 200 cm) bed and one small (90 x 200 cm), each in separate rooms. Both with down comforters and pillows. • Full kitchen with gas stove, refrigerator, breakfast table, chairs and dishes • Nice plants, clean towels and linens. Görlitzer Bahnhof U-bahn station is 2 blocks away for easy access to other neighborhoods, although there are many amenities in the immediate area. name: 73m, top location, balcony, even a piano!
summary: As we are often on the road we are - for these periods - happy to let others enjoy our wonderful 73 m 2 bedroom flat in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg! - and it is Prenzl at its best, located right in the heart of the city,  in a fully refurbished beautiful building, with a sweet balcony going to a garden. Location could not be better - check out the area! We love it ourselves! :)
space: NB! - you may be disturbed by the fact that we have had several booking  cancellations last year. Reason for that was a new law in Berlin which prohibited to rent out private flats for a short term. BUT - we just (March 2017) got the official permission for renting, are very happy about it and herewith no further cancellations will be necessary!  --- Our flat is located right in the heart of the city, and it is Prenzlauer Berg at its best - restaurants and cosy cafes, playgrounds and small shops, parks and absolutely superb connection to almost anywhere. Tram stops right across the street and it takes you to Alexanderplatz (one of Berlin main hubs) in less than 5 mins. Famous Kollwitzplatz just 5 min walk. Two other subway stations (Senefelderplatz/U2, and Prenzlauer Allee/Circle line) reachable within 5 min by tram.  The flat has two bedrooms: one with a normal size bunk-bed (can be used by both children and adults) and a wooden baby bed. There is a 20 m eat-in kitchen/dining area wit
description: As we are often on the road we are - for these periods - happy to let others enjoy our wonderful 73 m 2 bedroom flat in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg! - and it is Prenzl at its best, located right in the heart of the city,  in a fully refurbished beautiful building, with a sweet balcony going to a garden. Location could not be better - check out the area! We love it ourselves! :) NB! - you may be disturbed by the fact that we have had several booking  cancellations last year. Reason for that was a new law in Berlin which prohibited to rent out private flats for a short term. BUT - we just (March 2017) got the official permission for renting, are very happy about it and herewith no further cancellations will be necessary!  --- Our flat is located right in the heart of the city, and it is Prenzlauer Berg at its best - restaurants and cosy cafes, playgrounds and small shops, parks and absolutely superb connection to almost anywhere. Tram stops right across the street and it takes you to Al
notes: MISCELLANEOUS KEYS:    There is only ONE key to the flat, which fits both front door AND the door of the apartment. IMPORTANT! - The door of the apartment automatically locks when you close it! Please: -- NEVER leave the flat without making sure the key is with you and  -- NEVER leave the key sticking in the inner side of the door – should the door close, you won’t be able to unlock it from outside even having another key.  There are special services which help in such cases, but costs vary from 120 to 240 EURO. Best is to simply carry the keys with you and never to leave them sticking. Please always lock the doors when leaving the flat, even for a short period of time. Thieves are pretty active in the area. Also always make sure windows and the balcony door are locked (handles should be completely down). HOUSE RULES:  We are a small and peaceful house and there are certain rules people here are used to. Which means for instance that you can happily have your breakfast on the balcony f
transit: Absolutely superb connection to almost anywhere. Tram M2 stops right across the street, ca. each 4 min. and almost all night. It takes you to Alexanderplatz (one of Berlins main hubs) in less than 5 mins. Famous Kollwitzplatz just 5 min walk. Two other subway stations (Senefelderplatz/U2, and Prenzlauer Allee/Circle line) reachable within 5 min by tram/walking. If you need a taxi it usually takes it around 2-4 min to be at our door. 40 min to Schönefeld airport, 40 to Tegel using public transportation.
interaction: We are technically "normal" and will be available any time via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)/Tel/Whatapp and similar.
house_rules: There is a strict rule in the house that everyone must be reasonably peaceful after 8pm. This especially goes for the garden and the balcony. While you are  absolutely welcome to use it for breakfast you would have to stay home for a late dinner - but it is much better to go out here in Prenzlauer Berg anyway...

name: Prenzlauer Berg Zimmer, hell & groß
summary: Helles, grosses Zimmer für 2 Personen in einer 3 Zimmer-Wohnung. Mitten im Prenzlauer Berg zwischen Kollwitzplatz und Volkspark Friedrichshain. Gemeinsame Küche und Bad. Gute Verkehrsanbindung, Supermärkte, Apotheke, viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.
description: Helles, grosses Zimmer für 2 Personen in einer 3 Zimmer-Wohnung. Mitten im Prenzlauer Berg zwischen Kollwitzplatz und Volkspark Friedrichshain. Gemeinsame Küche und Bad. Gute Verkehrsanbindung, Supermärkte, Apotheke, viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.
house_rules: HAUSORDNUNG 1.  Wir teilen uns eine Wohnung mit Gästen aus der ganzen Welt und haben auch Nachbarn. Jeder hat eigene Interessen. Bitte respektiert das durch Rücksichtnahme. Bitte Morgens bis 9.00 und ab 22.00 Uhr nicht laut sein (Musik etc.) um allen einen komfortablen Aufenthalt zu ermöglichen. 2. Bitte das Badezimmer nicht mit Strassenschuhen betreten. 3. Bitte die Waschmaschine nur bis 18 Uhr benutzen (wir haben auch Nachbarn). Bitte eigenes Waschmittel benutzen. 4. Wenn du in der Küche bist bitte die Tür geschlossen halten. Bitte die Tür vom Kühl- und Gefrierschrank schliessen und IMMER darauf achten, das der Backofen ausgeschaltet und die Flammen vom Herd nach Benutzung aus sind. 5. Bitte nach dem kochen oder essen benutzte Sachen abwaschen, abtrocknen und gleich zurück in den Schrank, damit alle Gäste etwas davon haben. 6. Du bist auf Kaffee eingeladen. Es sind immer ausreichend Pads da. Bitte achte darauf, dass du sonst deine eigenen Lebensmittel und nicht die, der anderen Gäste

name: Zentrales gemütliches WG-Zimmer
summary: Zimmer (34 qm/eigener Balkon) in Kreativ-WG (150 qm, 4 Mitbewohner/ Küche/Bad) für bis zu 3 Personen. Großes Hochbett für Paare und JugendstilBett für Einzelpersonen oder Kind. Zentral gelegen an Ringbahn, U-9, Parks und Autobahn (in Hörweite).

name: BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT IN PARTY DISTRICT OF BERLIN
summary: Neukolln Kiez is the district containing artists, students and renogades Berlin is famous for. A hot bed of activism and creativity, Neukolln is well known for its underground club scene. Find yourself in an unnamed bar, or basement room with the most exclusive techno in town. Close to many galleries and museum district. Next-door to Kreuzberg, another party district, containing Berghain, about:blank//.. among many others and galleries to see.

name: Best of Neukölln and Kreuzberg
summary: Sunny top floor flat next to canal. Centrally located with easy access to public transport. Cool bars, galleries, trendy boutiques, global restaurants, Turkish market & Sunday flea market at your doorstep. Welcome to the heart of cool Berlin.
description: Sunny top floor flat next to canal. Centrally located with easy access to public transport. Cool bars, galleries, trendy boutiques, global restaurants, Turkish market & Sunday flea market at your doorstep. Welcome to the heart of cool Berlin.       I'm happy to help make your stay special and comfortable. Please feel free to ask anything before or during your visit.  I know checking in directly after arrival is most ideal which is why I do not set a check in/out time however I work Monday-Friday from 10:00-18:30. I will try my best to accommodate check ins between those hours if I can, so please let me know your arrival and departure when you send a request. Update on key pick up. There is a new service here in Berlin (Hoard Hotspot) where local cafes securely store keys for Airbnb guests. If I am at work or away then I can leave keys at a Hoard hotspot which is conveniently at a cafe 3 min walk from flat. Local recommendations Coffee:  Five Elephants  Concierge  Prachtwerk Breakfast:
neighborhood_overview: Local recommendations Coffee:  Five Elephants  Concierge  Prachtwerk Breakfast:  Croissanterie on Pannierstr (filter coffee and fresh croissants for under 2 euro...can't be beat!) Roamers Lunch/Dinner:  ll Casolare  Industry Standard (more pricey, for foodie types) Ein Laden Cocolo Ramen Xberg Azzam  Bars: Klunkerkranich (for good weather) Monkey Bar (bit far from the flat but a great view of the city and zoo) John Muir (great seasonal cocktails) Twin Pigs (standard Berlin bar with local craft beer) Also, starting on the corner of my street and extending to the next bridge there is a canal side Turkish market every Tuesday and Friday, eat hummus and olives to your heart's content! During Summer and Spring there is a flea market in the same location every alternate Sunday. If you don't see much of interest in above recommendations, let me know your taste and I can tell you more.
transit: - BUS M(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) - Metro Hermannplatz U7+U8 (10min walk)  - Metro Shönleinstr U8 (10min walk) - Airport Schönefeld 45min  - Airport Tegel 55 min

I know checking in directly after arrival is most ideal which is why I do not set a check in/out time however I work Monday-Friday from 10:00-18:30. I will try my best to accommodate check ins between those hours if I can, so please let me know your arrival and departure when you send a request. Update on key pick up. There is a new service here in Berlin (Hoard Hotspot) where local cafes securely store keys for Airbnb guests. If I am at work or away then I can leave keys at a Hoard hotspot which is conveniently at a cafe 3 min walk from flat.
house_rules: The legality around file-sharing and downloading is extremely strict in Germany.  Under German copyright law, one can basically assume that unless you are paying for your item, legally, through a reputable service such as Amazon or ITunes, almost all file-sharing—downloading (making a new digital copy on your computer), uploading (putting your previously purchased content on the internet for others to download), and streaming (watching a film in a browser) is illegal and heavily fined. In other words, please use my wifi responsibly or pay the 1000 euro fine. NO SMOKING in the flat  Please take the trash out before you leave Don't make my neighbours hate me, keep noise levels down at night
host_about: Hi, I am originally from Colombia, grew up in California, and now live in Berlin. I simply love to travel and get to know locals as well as other travellers in the places I visit. My favourite activities include shopping open markets, nature hikes, listening to street music and laziness at a beautiful beach. All recommendations welcome :)

name: Die Altstadt mitten in Berlin
summary: Dieses Apartment mit enspannten Ausblick vom Balkon bietet seinen Gästen die Möglichkeit, Spandau aus einer anderen Perspektive zu betrachten und ein Fernseher stehen zur Verfügung.
space: Verkehrsgünstige Lage mit sehr guter Anbindung ins Zentrum (B5) und an das öffentliche Nahverkehrsnetz. name: studio downtown close to Kurfürstendamm
summary: A high bed with a ladder, all cute and kind of intimate. For those who want to enjoy the typical pulse of Berlin life and in particular want a central base, this is popular with young people, who feel right at home here. It’s very central - walk to KaDeWe, or check out the bars round the corner, or explore the indigenous cultures of Berlin. It’s quiet, though, the flat’s in a side wing of the building. Scores of bars and restaurants, plus the charm of Viktiria Luise Platz, are all close at hand.

name: City Apartment in Berlin Mitte
summary: The City Apartment ( 25sqm) is a separate part of our flat and located directly in the city center of Berlin. A lot of the relevant sights and hundreds of restaurants are in walking distance.  It has an own entrance and a small kitchen (with microwave, dishwasher, refridgerator, nespresso machine and 2 hotplates) and 1 bathroom (with a shower). It has just been refurbished in 2016 with modern furnitures. The apartment is working best for young couples, Travelling Alones and business travellers.
space: Our Place is directly next to the corner of Linien-/Oranienburger Str. and Friedrichstrasse - located in the middle of the city centre of Berlin. The entrance can be found between two restaurants (Flaminia and a Vietnamese Restaurant). The apartment is part of our flat - so we live directly next door. Both apartments are linked with a balcony that can be used as an emergency exit but is not for usage. During your stay you'll have the city apartment for your own with your own entrance.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment has a top location in Berlin - we are in the very heart of Friedrichstrasse, vibrant Oranienburger Strasse and Torstrasse plus Linien- and Auguststrasse - both good Shopping and Restaurant streets with excellent connection to public transport. You'll find hundreds of good Restaurants, Sights and Shops in direct surrounding.
notes: * Check In: when arriving at our place you'll find the doorbell of the City Apartment  with the name 'City Apartment' - ours is 'Buchheim' directly next to it. You'll find us in one of the flats if you informed us a day earlier about your arrival time and will get one key during one check in from us then. The apartment has an own intercom - that makes life a bit easier with one key :-)  * washing:  there is no washing machine / dryer in the apartment but in our flat - in urgent cases we can help with washing 1 or 2 machines * parking: Unfortunately, there are nearly no (cheap) parking options nearby if you travel by car * air conditioning: we have no air conditioning but a fan. The apartment has 4 windows that can be opened and help to regulate temperature within the room and one in the bathroom - as the apartment is directly under the roof, please note it might be pretty warm during the summer months * stairs: there is no lift going to the apartment - you'll have to climb up 4.5 stair
transit: You will find all travel information for public transportation via (URL HIDDEN) - shortest way from Airport Tegel would be Bus 128 (direction Osloer Str.) to U Kurt-Schumacher-Platz and then changing to U6 (direction Alt-Mariendorf) to U Oranienburger Tor. * Subway: U6 Oranienburger Tor (2min walking distance to our door) * Tram: M1, M5, M12 Oranienburger Tor (2min walking distance) * Car: flat is located at the very end of Linienstrasse where it meets Friedrichstr. - unfortunately there are nearly no options for parking nearby * Suburban Train: S1 Oranienburger Str.
access: You'll have the City Apartment with an own entrance just for your own. There is another door leading to our balcony that is open due to fire safety reasons. Usage of balcony is not included in the apartment.
interaction: Before and during your stay you can always send us a message via AirBnB or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) (+(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)).  In any case, please send us a message about your travel plans the day before you arrive to agree on checkin time and mode. That's really essentiell as we cannot ensure to be at the flat the whole day / are not that flexibel unfortunately but want to handover apartment and key in person.
house_rules: * no open fire * no additional unknown overnight guests * in case of loss of keys we will have to use the deposit * terrace / balcony is not part of the rented space * understood that there is no lift / air conditioning
host_about:
My name is Constanze. I'm an entrepreneur in the Berlin Startup Scene and mother of 3 small kids -  my days are pretty packed therefore but I enjoy every single  minute of them as I chose them to be like that. "Create the life that you want to live" and 'love it, leave it or change it' are very important principles for me. 
More than 6 years ago we decided to live in the heart of Berlin with our kids - feel welcome to share that feeling by visiting our place.

name: Elegant Room on trendy MITTE street
summary: Spacious room in the trendiest neighbourhood of Berlin. Luxuriously decorated with lush beds & cozy living room. The neighbourhood offers cool restaurants, cafés & bars. Upscale + local Berlin brands & most of Berlin landmarks are just down the road.
space: Experience living in the best spot of Berlin in a lush apartment complete with everything you would need for a comfortable stay. -You will occupy your private room. I live here myself and occupy the other room. The entire apartment consists of 2 bedrooms with super lush kingsize beds, a spacious und luxurious living room with french style balcony, big toilet and bath and a fully equipped kitchen for some gourmet cooking. -Featuring highspeed WIFI and big UHD Smart TV with Netflix for home entertainment. -Awesome neighbourhood guaranteed! :)
description: Spacious room in the trendiest neighbourhood of Berlin. Luxuriously decorated with lush beds & cozy living room. The neighbourhood offers cool restaurants, cafés & bars. The entire apartment consists of 2 bedrooms with super lush kingsize beds, a spacious und luxurious living room with french style balcony, big toilet and bath and a fully equipped kitchen for some gourmet cooking. -Featuring highspeed WIFI and big UHD Smart TV with Netflix for home entertainment. -Awesome neighbourhood guaranteed! :) Your own private room and all the apartment's common areas. The Neighbourhood The apartment is centrally located and yet cozy and quiet at night. The street itself and the adjacent streets are home to v
neighborhood_overview: The Neighbourhood The apartment is centrally located and yet cozy and quiet at night. The street itself and the adjacent streets are home to very cool restaurants, high-end Berlin local labels for fashion, handcrafts, art and design objects. -A mere 5 minutes walk to Hackescher Markt/Hackesher Hofe, a buzzing spot full of restaurants, bars and shops. It also has weekend market for food, clothing and other interestings objects. -8 minutes walk towards Alexanderplatz to see the Rotes Rathaus, Berlin TV tower and other nearby landmarks of Berlin like Berliner Dom, River Spree, Museum Island, Nikolaiviertel and other historical spots. Weekend Art Market at Museum Island is worth visiting as well.  -5 Minutes walk towards Auguststrasse which is a street full of awesome boutique galleries.  -3 Minutes to Torstrasse which is home to fabulous quirky bars, restaurants and shops.  -Mulackstrasse is a known street for Berlin fashion labels. -Surrounded by rooftop bars and cool clubs like House of
transit: Very accessible by public transportations as it is surrounded by train stations, if you walk a couple of minutes left or right, you'll reach U-bahn (U8) Weinmeisterstrasse Station, U-bahn (U2) Rosa Luxembourg or S-bahn (S75, S5 and S7) Hackescher Markt.
access: Your own private room and all the apartment's common areas.
house_rules: 1) I will request for a copy of your ID upon arrival. 2)No partying. 3)Kindly take great care not to lose the keys. Charge for missing keys is €150. 4)No downloading of illegal files/use of any torrents. In case you have any downloading client/bittorent client installed in your laptops, please turn them off before you connect to the internet at home. 5)Be considerate to our neighbours  6)Avoid noise from 10pm

name: St. Meze Apartment
summary: 5 % Berlin City Tax will be charged on the arrival day in cash. Business travelers are excluded. We only need the confirmation of your company, that you travel on business.
space: Our 50 sqm guest apartment is calmly located on the ground floor of a backyard building. It has its own beautiful garden – an idyllic little gem in the middle of bustling city life. With select finds, concealed gimmicks and surprising details the apartment adopts the style of our adjoining St. Meze coffee shop. The apartment can be rented on a daily basis for 1 to 3 persons. It has a generous living and sleeping area with a full-size bed, a sofa bed, as well as a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom. Our apartment costs 70,00 EUR per night. The non-recurring final cleaning charge is 25,00 EUR. Cleaning costs won’t be charged with a duration of stay for at least 6 nights. The apartment is fully equipped with towels, bed linen etc. and has access to a little garden.

neighborhood_overview: The St. Meze coffee shop and apartment are located in the same building at Helmholtzplatz – a very popular park with a playground surrounded by restaurants and bars offering international food. Start your day at Meze with a cafe specialty and a wide range of home made sandwiches and delicious pastry. The apartment is calmly located in the backyard of said building and comes with a small but private garden. Not far from here at Hackescher Markt, Kastanienallee or Alexanderplatz you can enjoy sightseeing and shopping.
notes: 5 % Berlin City Tax sind vor Ort in bar zu entrichten. Geschäftsreisende sind davon ausgenommen. Wir benötigen jedoch eine Bestätigung der Firma, dass Sie geschäftlich reisen.
interaction: You can find us at our coffee shop daily from 9am to 6pm.
host_about:
We are running the St. Oberholz Café, the Apartments and the Coworking Space "Le Bureau".
All in one building, overlooking Rosenthaler Platz.

name: Large apartment in Berlin-Mitte
summary: Nice and Clean 100 square meters apartment. Located in the heart of Berlin-Mitte.  Nicely danish design furnished. Lots of space. There is one big bed for two in the sleeping room and a HUGE sleeping couch suitable for two in the living room.
space: Nice and Clean 100qm apartment. Located in the heart of Berlin Mitte.  It's a walk-up building, 3rd floor. No elevator in the building. There is one big bed for two in the sleeping room and a HUGE sleeping couch suitable for two in the living room.  -Free WIFI high-speed wireless Internet -Towels provided (one big towel for per person)  -Toilet paper, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hand soap, hair dryer and so on. -Please bring personal products you need (toothpaste, toothbrush, Extra towels and personal items)  -Coffee maker, rice cooker, cups, wine glasses, various pots, pans, knives, spoons, forks, cooking utensils, etc. are in the kitchen
