neighborhood_overview: The flat is only one block away from the city's best restaurants (Grill Royal, Pauly Saal, Pantry, Chicago Williams BBQ is actually in the same house), all tourist attractions (Berlin Wall, Bundestag, Museums-Island), Musical shows (Friedrichstadtpalast) etc.  Large supermarkets, convenience stores, pharmacies, lunch places, bakeries and coffee shops are all in front of the house it takes only one minute to three minutes to walk there. Also my favourite syrian/lebanese cuisine lunch place is round the corner. It's called "Yarok" and you find it on Torstraße, a quick 5 minutes walk away. Lots of known galleries are here too. For example Boros Collection in an old WWII bunker, Michael Fuchs Galerie, Galerie Eigen + Art, etc.
transit: Easy access to all major public transport (U8, Friedrichstraße, Nordbahnhof, Oranienburger Tor - event central station is just a 15 min walk away). Also there is an underground carpark under the house where you can park your car (paid).
access: Guests have access to the balcony (of course) with a nice little table and three chairs (of course you can bring out more chairs if you want). Also there are two colored bikes in the yard that you can use. I'll leave the keys on the kitchen table. Berlin is really fun to explore by bike and has almost no hills :)
interaction: During your stay I will be on travels in Europe but I will be reachable via cell phone and e-mails all the time. Also there is the sister of my girlfriend living round the corner and can help in any cases.  If you need any assistance, you are free to contact me 24/7. Please do not hesitate to send me a message if you have any questions :)
house_rules: I love to live in this place and do this usually so it would be lovely if you could treat the place you want other people to treat the place you live in and that you love. But I trust this is what you do anyways.
host_about: I'm Jakob, a writer for Dandy Diary.

name: Beautiful 2-room apartment in central Kreuzberg
summary: Die schöne und zentral in Kreuzberg gelegene 2-Zimmer Wohnung befindet sich direkt am Carl-Herz Ufer und ist im 4. Stock. Sie verfügt über ein Schlafzimmer, ein Wohnzimmer, eine neue, komplett ausgestattete Küche, ein Bad mit Badewanne, eine Diele und einen Süd-Balkon, von dem man einen wunderschönen Ausblick genießen kann. Im Haus befindet sich ein Fahrstuhl. Die Wohnung ist nicht weit vom beliebten Bergmannkiez und dem Victoriapark gelegen, schnell ist man aber mit auch am Schlesischen Tor.
space: Die Unmittelbare Nähe zum Carl-Herz-Ufer und der Süd-Balkon, von dem man traumhafte Sonnenuntergänge und an Silvester Feuerwerk über der Stadt genießen kann machen diese Unterkunft besonders.

name: nice apartment with beautiful view all over Berlin

name: beautiful 60sqm apartment
summary: Beautiful 60 suqare-meter apartment in Berlin Friedrichshain with high, elaborately decorated ceiling, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom and cosy and large living room. After years of traveling I treasure my cosy home a lot and am happy to share it with enriching and interesting people!

host_about:
Hi!

after growing up in Flensburg - the most northern city in Germany -
I traveled the world and moved many times before I finally settled down in Berlin in 2011. My cosy apartment is situated in Berlin Friedrichshain is a quiet and peaceful oasis just a few minutes away from the best and most trendy clubs in Berlin, Alexanderplatz, the street life of Simon-Dach-Straße, Boxhagener Platz and the exciting "RAW-Gelände" at Revaler Straße.

Besides traveling I love surfing, the ocean, cooking, south of France, my french roots and have enjoyed a decade of showbiz life - which I am still connected to nowadays.

If you want to spend some relaxing and / or exciting days in Berlin, I would love to welcome you in my apartment and am looking forward to your requests :)

Best from Berlin
Achim

name: Apartment: Luise in Berlin
space: Centrally located between the Opera and the castle, next to the subway and bus. Phone / wireless flat, garage 3-room apartment, 68 square meters, for max. 6 people. Living room, loggia, kitchen, 2 shower rooms, 2 separate sleeping rooms. Beautiful, bright apartment, renovated in 2008, the 6th Floor (elevator), with a view to the dome of Schloss Charlottenburg to Spandau. space: You will live in a typical old building from the early 19th century. The apartment has about 67sqm. It can host up to 4 persons (2 in the bedroom, 2 on the sleeping (URL HIDDEN) includes a large living room with 2 (sleeping) sofas, , as well as SatTV and Internet (Wi-Fi). neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain is one of the trendy districts of Berlin, is great for nightlife explorations and chilling in understated bars. Here you can still find a colorful mixture of young creatives, international community and born Berliners also families living togehter. A wide range of trendy street cafes, restaurants and flag ship stores are waiting for you to be discovered. Here is a list of other things very close to you that might could find your interest: -East Side Gallery, a part of the Berlin Wall that was turned into an international outdoor gallery -Karl-Marx-Allee, a boulevard lined with buildings in the Stalinist style, originally called Stalinallee -Frankfurter Tor, two landmark towers on Karl-Marx-Allee, which resemble the church domes on Gendarmenmarkt -Oberbaumbrücke, a road and rail bridge connecting Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain built in North German brick -Fairytale Fountain in Volkspark Friedrichshain -Simon-Dach-Straße, a street with numerous pubs -Boxhagener Platz, heart
notes: if you wish to smoke go ahead and make use of the balcony as we do it too :)
transit: You can reach the tram in 1min, the S-Bahn and Ring (city rail ring) in 3 min and the Underground Line U5 in approx. 7min by walk. Distances: to Alexanderplatz about 10 min (by S-Bahn) to the East Side Gallery about 15min (Walking) to Potsdamer Platz about 25min (by S-Bahn) to Schönefeld airport about 35min (by S-Bahn) to Tegel airport about 40min (by S-Bahn + Bus) I'm pleased to help you out with anything you want to know about the city, sightseeing, clubbing, shopping and so on :-) There will be a small survival package by the time you'll arrive - maps, numbers, helpful information,.. Any more questions?!? Don't hesitate - contact me! Cheers, Miguel
access: You can use all the rooms of apartment, including the balcony. The washing machine, the dishwasher, the coffe machine, the satellite TV and the internet wifi are free for you.
interaction: I usually rent the flat when I am not in Berlin for work reasons. A reference person is attending you for the check in and the check out and for everything you could need.
house_rules: Please respect the neighborhood and avoid any lound music after 10pm.) The checking time is flexible but please try to arrive before 10 p.m., if you arrive later there is a fee of 10€ In case you lost the keys you will have to make a copy of the keys or you will have to pay an amount of 35€/key.

As my guest you are staying in a comfortable and clean space with all you need to feel like home.

Du bist in der Großstadt und super gut angebunden. Ich bin offen für eure Fragen und immer erreichbar. interaction: Ich bin offen für eure Fragen und immer erreichbar.
host_about:
Hi :) 
ich bin eine Architektur- Studentin. Ich liebe die Kommunikation mit Menschen und bin für neues sehr offen. 
Interessante, freundliche und offene Menschen unterbringen zu können, wäre für mich eine große Freude.

Ich bin 26 Jahre alt.
Bin in Hannover geboren und Berlin aufgewachsen.

Kreativität, Kunst und Architektur ist meine Leidenschaft. 
Das spiegelt sich in meiner gemütlichen, schönen Wohnung wieder. Ich möchte meinen Gästen ein sehr komfortables Umfeld bieten. 

Berlin ist ein idealer Ort, wenn man aus sich selbst rauskommen möchte und für neues offen ist.

name: Near northside Berlin, 15 mins to centre!
summary: Renovated, very clean apartment, located in a quiet tree-lined cul-de-sac with a nearby lake (50 metres) and U-bahn station (100 metres).  Easy connections, 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz). Restaurants, shopping, cafes - all within minutes' walk!
space: The apartment is located in a quiet cul-de-sac - no traffic noise. The street ends in the park surrounding the lake (less than a minute walk away). The living room with a nice enclosed terrace and a bedroom are facing a large, green and quiet inner courtyard (south-east direction, so plenty of sun from morning till early afternoon), while the large and bright kitchen is facing West and gets a lot of evening sun. The apartment is located on the second story of the three story 1920's building with original windows and doors. There is no elevator, but it's a short walk up. The street is quiet and there is plenty of free parking, if you arrive with the car. For your sleeping pleasure all my bedding is 100 percent cotton and all the pillows and blanket are feather/dawn combination - no polyester! If you need, I can also provide a portable baby bed - just let me know in advance!
description: Renovated, very clean apartment, located in a quiet tree-lined cul-de-sac with a nearby lake (50 metres) and U-bahn station (100 metres).  Easy connections, 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz). Restaurants, shopping, cafes - all within minutes' walk! The apartment is located in a quiet cul-de-sac - no traffic noise. The street ends in the park surrounding the lake (less than a minute walk away). The living room with a nice enclosed terrace and a bedroom are facing a large, green and quiet inner courtyard (south-east direction, so plenty of sun from morning till early afternoon), while the large and bright kitchen is facing West and gets a lot of evening sun. The apartment is located on the second story of the three story 1920's building with original windows and doors. There is no elevator, but it's a short walk up. The street is quiet and there is plenty of free parking, if you arrive with the car. For your sleeping pleasure all my bedding is 100 percent cotton and all the pillows and blank
neighborhood_overview: The immediate vicinity is quiet and green - with a lovely park and a lake basically on your door step! However, a vibrant and busy Residenzstr, with its many shops and restaurants is right around the corner, or, rather, around the park -  a few minutes walk away. All major supermarkets: Aldi, Lidl, Edeka and Kaisers are all within minutes walk. U-bahn station is exactly 3 minute walk away (with U8 direct line to Alexanderplatz - there in 10 minutes!) For nature lovers and bike-riders - the large, green Shillerpark (2 min way), Volkspark Rehrberge (10 min) and Strandbad Ploetzensee (15 min), as well as the Berliner Mauerweg - are all in the area. For urban explorers, the Wedding area of Berlin is basically across the street, with many trendy bars and restaurants about 20 minute walk away.
notes: The area gets some noise from the Tegel airport traffic, however it is hardly audible inside the apartment (double windows) and no air-traffic at night. It is completely quiet.
transit: The area (as the whole Berlin) is extremely bike-friendly. If you prefer public transportation: the U-Bahn (U8) Franz-Neumann-Platz (Am Schaefersee) is 5 minute walk away (and a nice walk, too - through the park with the lake). U8 connects directly with Alexanderplatz (10-14 min) - this is a subway line that allows carry-on bikes.
access: You will have access to the entire apartment, as well as the courtyard. There is plenty of free parking space on the street. The neighborhood is quiet and safe, as there is a nice fully-illuminating park surrounding the lake (boat-rentals are available during the season). Aside from the playground inside the courtyard, there are several nearby  - without crossing any streets - so kids are safe to play and run around. The area itself is very green, as the large Schillerpark is 7 minute walk away, and Volkspark Rehberge and Ploetzensee with Strandbad is about 15 minute bike ride away. All the major shopping - Aldi, Kaisers, Netto - within walking distance, as many shops and restaurants on the vibrant Residenzstr. The neighbourhood is very mixed and very friendly - an piece of authentic Berlin to discover!
interaction: I will personally meet the guests and show them around. I speak both English (native) and German (fluently).
house_rules: This is my private house, so please no smoking inside (only on the balcony). No loud music, no parties. There are some antique pieces of furniture, as well as books - so please treat those with care, but feel free to read whatever you like.
host_about: I'm an American, originally from Chicago, living in Berlin since the 90s. My motto: books, surround yourself with good books and good people!

name: Beautiful flat in Berlin Mitte
summary: Welcome Home! Our beautiful big apartment is located in the middle of Berlin close to Alexanderplatz and Hackescher Markt. With its comfortable livingroom, cosy bedroom and big kitchen you have a lot of space to take a rest from the buzzing Berlin City Live and experience the 'local' Berlin.
space: Our sweet apartment is located right in the heart of Berlin. There is enough space for at least 4 people with a very big bedroom with a double bed and an extra big living room with a very comfortable sofa bed (1,40x2,0meters). Next to these 2 rooms our kitchen is equipped with everything you need, so rest in the bedroom, watch movies with our big projector screen (3meters!) and enjoy a bubble bath in the bathtub.

host_about:
Hiya,

I'm Madlen. I'm an artist, I love sculpture art, sketching, photography. I'm open minded and always up for fun. I'm a wee bit nerdy, so I like to play videogames, watching movies, series, playing table top and roleplay and so on. I like books and sports as well. 
I really love to laugh, there is nothing better than a belly laugh! I'm selfconfidend and extroverted, so I really like to get in touch with new people to have proper conversations :)

I just finished traveling and came back to my home Berlin in August 2015.

I would love to have guests here from time to time.

name: Schön wohnen in Charlottenburg
summary: Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe vom Schloss Charlottenburg und dem schönen Lietzensee. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen der Umgebung, der Nachbarschaft und weil es viel Platz im Freien gibt. Während der Winterzeit gibt es einen wundervollen Weihnachtsmarkt direkt am Schloss Charlottenburg. In der nächsten Straße kannst du einkaufen gehen oder einfach in einem Cafe deine Seele baumeln lassen. Die kleinen Restaurants in der Umgebung laden direkt ein zum Verweilen.
space: Ich vermiete meine 60qm Wohnung im schönen Altbaustil. Die Wohnung verfügt über eine geräumige und sehr gut ausgestattete Küche sowie ein Bad mit einer Regendusche, einem Wohnzimmer und einem gemütlichen Schlafzimmer. Die Wohnung befindet sich im 4. OG im Hinterhaus und ist aus diesem Grund sehr ruhig.

neighborhood_overview: Meine Nachbarn verhalten sich alle sehr ruhig, jedoch aufgeschlossen und hilfsbereit. Die nächste UBahn (Sophie-Charlotte-Platz U2) befindet sich direkt vor der Haustür und ist in wenigen Gehminuten zu erreichen. An der Ecke befindet sich ein nettes Cafe, bei welchem sehr gut gefrühstückt werden kann. Etliche Restaurants und das schöne Schloss Charlottenburg befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe. Supermarkt und Späti sind natürlich auch in weniger als 5 Minuten zu Fuß erreichbar.

name: A Green Oasis -Terrace Park View- centrally  Xberg
summary: Bright, comfortable 150 m² apartment, 25 m² terrace to the green Viktoriapark. Centrally, quietly, green, on the historical protected brewery. Carless. Central - 5 min to the subway (Platz der Luftbrücke). A green oasis in the heart of Kreuzberg. Only a 5-minute walk to the popular Bergmannstraße-Kiez with many restaurants, shopping and entertainment.
space: Bright, nice, comfortable 150 m² apartment with 25 m² terrace to the green Viktoria-Park. Centrally, quietly, on the historical protected brewery. Autofreed zone. Only a 5-minute walk to the popular Bergmannstraße-Kiez with many restaurants, shopping and entertainment. Sunny sheltered terrace. The apartment, built in 2010, is located on the listed grounds of the former Schultheiß Brewery. Paved courtyards and lush green spaces offer a picturesque backdrop. Autofreies ground. A dining table for 6 people. Two bathrooms, one with bath, one with shower. Further sleeping possibilities are possible on request. In the living room is a large sofa, armchair, a dining table for 6 people. Fully equipped kitchen with small dining table for 4 persons, ceramic stove, fridge, nespresso machine, etc. WLAN, cable TV, stereo system. Wooden parquet and stone tile floor. neighborhood_overview: quiet neighborhood
notes: "This apartment has been reviewed favorably elsewhere and I can only reinforce those positive experiences. The photos (as stated by someone else) do not do justice to this big, bright, airy and comfortable apartment. It's in a quiet neighborhood, fringes a beautiful public park and within minutes of every amenity: restaurants, bars, supermarket, public transport etc. It was spotless when we arrived (Li was on holiday but arranged for a friend to meet & greet. He was excellent and filled us in quickly and comprehensively with all the 'need-to-know' facts). Since we did not have one problem during our stay I cannot comment on how Li might have responded if we'd called on her but she was very quick and pleasant with our last minute queries about leaving the apartment safe and secure on our final day. If, like us, you're travelling from the airport it's a €35 taxi journey to the front door. Thinking of a trip to Berlin? Stay at Li's apartment, you can't go wrong." "We had a really great st
transit: centrally located U6 U7

name: Prinz DD- Stylish Living :) -Prinzregentenstreet-
summary: The 2 rooms are brand new, furnished in a modern and comfortable style. It is a peaceful heaven of rechargement in the heart of the city. Every need for young and ernest is within the reach of a nice walk, yet the noise of the streets is far away.  The place is equipped with all the amenities a short- or mid-term traveler can require, has excellent public transport, and even a cleaning robot.:) Looking forward to welcome you in one of the nicest and historic residential areas of West Berlin
space: There is free parking available for cars at the building on the street. The nearest U-bahn (Subway) station is 'U9+U7 Berliner str.'

transit: 1. Airport Tegel (TXL)  is 'door-to-Gate*'- ca. 25-30 minutes on the subway. (U7 line) Airport Schönefeld (SXF) is 'door-to-Gate'- ca. 45-55 minutes with subway. (U7 line)  *-I usually travel with hand-luggage- ICC/MESSE and ZOB (International Bus station) ca. 25-30 minutes with a direkt bus. (104 line) or with Subway (U9+S41) Parking is for free on the street at and in the area of the building.
house_rules: No street-shoes in the apartment, thank you!
host_about:
Hi, my name is Daniel. Hallo Ich bin der Daniel :)

-since this is a rather international community I'll write in English, but I speak fluent German, English and Hungarian. 

I am an Actor/Singer/Dancer living in Berlin. I am happy to share my own place through the cumminuty, together with my friend Dalma. We are looking forward to welcome you and provide you with a great and comfortable stay in West-Berlin, in one of the nicest residential areas of the city in the 'Bayerischen-Viertel' (Bayern-Distric). This area is rich in parks and in pre-war architecture, and shows a more traditional look of the Berlin as it was before the second world war. Yet it is all very close to the modern city life of Kurfürstendamm, Zoo, Tiergarten, Nollendorfplatz, Potsdamer Platz and to all the vibrant metropolis features that the city has become to offer.  
______________________________________________________
About me:
 I don't have pets and I do not smoke. I prefer quiet evenings with a good movie, self made healthy food, listening to the the daily news, and some educative documentaries with a glass of good wine. I usually travel with my own car, and I travel a lot between  the Budapest and Düsseldorf, Hamburg and Vienna axis. I prefer hand-luggage over hiking-gear and positively thinking people with ideas of the world to talk about as company. Looking forward to meet you in person.

name: Quiet and green place in Berlin
summary: The room is in the first floor of the house. The house has floor heating, double glazed windows, and a large shared kitchen. The main bathroom is in the same floor. It is located near to a train Station. The room offers one doublebed and a Music System. Power Sources are near the bed. Next Grocery Store: 400m.
space: Welcome to this quiet and green place in Berlin. The room is situated at the first floor of the house and has floor heating, double glazed windows, and a large shared kitchen. The main bathroom is in the same floor. It is located near to a train Station. From which u reach central Berlin/downtown with the important places within a quarter of an hour/20 minutes. The room offers one doublebed and a Music System. Power Sources are near the bed. Wi-Fi is available. You can park your Car on the private Property. The next Grocery Store is only 400 meters away. In the same distance u will find the train and bus stations. The Host will help with questions about the train connections! Feel free to ask about things i forgot to write down. I look forward to welcoming you to Berlin Spandau Staaken.

name: 25m² Room in Neukolln, Bright and Beautiful!
summary: Located in hip Neukolln, there are many bars and restaurants nearby. Tempelhofer Feld is a 5 minute bike ride away - which is a must see if you are visiting Berlin!  The closest U-bahn station is a 30 second walk away, which provides easy travelling to all around Berlin, including airports.   There are also supermarkets, bakeries and parks close by!  The room is best suited for solo adventures or couples.

name: City Studio - central, cosy, quite!
space: This beautiful and comfortable studio apartment offers a perfect alternative to a hotel room. It is very quiet on the bright 5th floor with elevator and has a small balcony with southern exposure. The apartment was completely renovated in March 2013 and offers everything a guest needs for the pleasant stay in the capital. The highlights of this fully refurbished studio apartment: an eye-catching quality wallpaper, comfortable queen-size bed (160x200 cm) and a 40 inch LED TV with cable. Fast WiFi is also included. The small kitchenette is equipped with a microwave, induction hob and a fridge-freezer. The apartment is located in Berlin’s favorite district Charlottenburg and is just two minutes walk from the pedestrian zone Wilmersdorferstraße. There you will find a huge variety of shops and restaurants. The subway station “Bismarckstraße” is at your doorstep and the train (S-Bahn station “Charlottenburg”) within walking distance. This Studio-apartment is ideal for Berlin Tourists who app

transit: How to get to the apartment from Tegel Airport: You can take a bus - either the 109 or the X9. The x9 (express) has less stops - you can get off at subwaystation "Ernst-Reuter-Platz" and take the U2 subway line only one stop to "Deutsche Oper" (german opera). The direction you need for the subway is "Ruhleben". The 109 has more stops than the x9 - you could get out at Kaiser-Friedrich and Bismarckstr. and walk Bismarckstr. about 400 m (5 minutes) to the apartment. The whole drive should be between 10 and 15 Minutes. From Schönefeld airport take the bus to subway "Rudow" - take the subway, there is just one direction to "Rathaus Spandau" .  Get off at "Bismarckstraße". Walk 2 minutes towards the opera to corner of Sesenheimer street. A few steps into the street is the entrance 87. ring at Puck, 5 th floor.
house_rules: This is a non-smoking apartment. Please be considerate -  no parties or loud music. Downloading or uploading copyrighted material via internet is prohibited - especially the use of bittorrent or other file sharing software.  Guests are responsible for any kind of damages that occur by the violation of those rules. NEW in 2014 - CITYTAX! Berlin's senate is charging 5% of the total (without comission fees) which has to be paid cash by any guest that stays in Berlin privately - all business travelers don't have to pay City Tax, if they provide proof like an employers contract etc.
host_about: Ich freue mich über Gäste, die sich für Berlin genauso begeistern können wie ich.

name: Penthouse @ Savignyplatz, city west, gorgeous view
summary: Spacious penthouse at Savignyplatz located in the city west, in a quiet street with many restaurants, bars and clubs. Nearby Berlin's largest shopping street, the Kurfürstendamm, the KaDeWe (luxury department store) and Berlins larges park, the Tiergarten. The legendary jazz club A-Trane is on the other side of the street. The city east (Brandenburg Gate, Mitte) and Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain with a vibrant nightlife is 20 minutes away by train.
space: The apartment is on the top floor, oriented with a free view to the west. There are fantastic sunsets to be observed. The flat has a spacious connected living, dining room and kitchen with two terraces. The bathroom has a shower, bathtub, WC and bidet. There is a separate guest toilet. There are two bedrooms and a convertible sofa-bed in the livingroom. The kitchen is fully equipped with stove, microwave, dishwasher, washing machine. WiFi is included in the price. An elevator is in the Building. You can use a multi room hifi-system, external player can be connected.  Baby bed and baby chair on request (free of charge). Additional (air) guest bed on request (free of charge). Piano use only by prior request.

An elevator is in the Building. You can use a multi room hifi-system, external
neighborhood_overview: In the surrounding area, max. 15 min walking distance: Bars, clubs, restaurants and cafes: Puro Sky Lounge, Pan-Am Lounge, Monkey Bar, The Pearl, A-Trane Jazz Club, Café what do you fancy love, Cafe Savigny, Restaurant Florian, Restaurant Le Petit Royal, Restaurant Belmondo. Kantstraße Berlin's Chinatown - countless restaurants serving Asian cuisine. Shopping: Kurfürstendamm or Ku'damm - Berlin's largest and most elegant shopping street, KaDeWe - luxury department store with legendary gourmet floor, Bikini-Berlin - a truly unique shopping center, Wilmersdorfer Straße - another shopping street, various lovingly managed retail stores. Others: Technical University, University of the Arts, Tiergarten, Berlin’s largest park. Within 20 min by suburban train or underground: Mitte, Hackescher Markt, Brandenburg Gate, Unter den Linden, Friedrichstraße, Museum Island, Potsdamer Platz, Alexanderplatz, Kreuzberg, Friedrichshain, Berghain, RAW (party location), Olympiastaion.
transit: Very good transport links with Berlin’s public transport system. Various subway stations and stations for suburban trains and regional trains are located in the immediate surroundings. 24h service at the weekend of the railways, central night bus station (Zoo) in 10 min walking distance, 24 h service during the week. Distances: Hauptbahnhof - central railway station (15min), airport Tegel (15 min), airport Schönefeld (30 min), Autobahn (10 min). Public car parking: Parking fees apply Mon-Sat 9:00 am to 10:00 pm. Free of charge in front of the technical university, 10 min walking distance. For longer stays: Please ask for a guest parking ticket, reduced parking fees apply.
access: It is the top part of a duplex apartment on the 5th floor, the access to the lower part of the 4th floor is firmly closed. Absolute privacy is guaranteed, the apartment has separate entrances. 100% legal according to ZwVbG (Berlin law).
interaction: I am always available by phone, SMS or e-mail. I live in the same house on the 2nd floor. My wife and I speak German, English, Spanish and French.
host_about: Hi everybody, I'm an fun sociable family man, I have three sons. I love sports and travel. I hope I can help you in anyway. Enjoy your stay in Berlin!

name: 3 room flat Berlin Friedrichshain
summary: Great flat on the first floor, perfect for families and 4 persons. In the neighbourhood are lots of restauransts, pubs, bars. Go to the Fleamarket on sunday at Boxhagener Platz or food market on saturday where you can have a nice breakfast and good turkish lunch. Please take into account that there is only german TV.
space: MINIMUM STAY 5 DAYS. Nice, modern and comfortable flat (85 qm), first floor in Lenbachstraße in the part of Friedrichshain (former East part of the city) very close to S-Bahn station Ostkreuz to rent. 2 bedrooms 1 bedroom with doble bed (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) bedroom with 2 single beds. 1 living room with balcony. 1 bathroom with bathtub 1 complete kitchen with everything you need for cooking and making breakfast, tea and coffee. Big fridge. Bed linen and towels are available. Good for families and 4 persons. Everything available to prepare food coffee and tea, but that doesn't mean that coffee and tea are always there. Friedrichshain is one of the most exciting places in Berlin, many bars, restaurants and also playgrounds for children, park is around the corner. Washing facilities are in the same street with a nice café. Bank, Supermarket and health-food shop are just around the corner. notes: If you break something or spell coffee on the wallpaper, please inform us so we can fix it before the next guests are coming! Rubbish goes into the backyard. Yellow container is for plastic, blue = paper, green = normal rubbisch. Don't leave bottles or rubbish or food in the fridge please! PLEASE NO LATE ARRIVAL AFTER 23 PM Minimum stay = 5 nights Parking: Prices = from 9 - 18 o'clock = 1 Euro per hour, after 18 - 24 = 2 Euros per hour. From 24 - 9 morning = free parking. Some streets away is free parking, about 5 minutes to walk.
transit: S-Bahn station Ostkreuz is just around the corner, from there you can get to every place really easy. Even there is a Metro/ Tram or buses which bring you to Prenzlauer Berg or to other neighbourhoods. Rent a bike and go by bike to Kreuzberg! PLEASE NO LATE ARRIVAL AFTER 23 PM
access: You have the flat for your own. Forbidden: to remove the furniture!!! No smoking! PLEASE NO LATE ARRIVAL AFTER 23 PM
interaction: I won't be there but most of the times my husband is there to help. You can always contact me or my husband on our mobile phone or via e-mail.  PLEASE NO LATE ARRIVAL AFTER 23 PM
house_rules: No parties and no smoking! Don't leave your rubbish in the flat or open leftovers in the fridge. Rubbish and bottles can be put into the containers in the court. Please don't remove the beds or other furniture. No pets. In the last time we had some problems with our neighbours downstaris, so we would apreciate that you don't wear any high heels or loud shoes. Try to shut the doors silently. The best would be to bring some own houseshoes.   Don't remove any furniture. PLEASE NO LATE ARRIVAL AFTER 23 PM
host_about: I like to meet poeple from other countries, I also like to travel and see other places. I'm originally from Hamburg, studied in Cologne and now live in in Spain and Berlin with my husband and my son. I lived for a year in America when I was younger.  I visited England and Ireland many times to practice my English. Everybody is welcome to see Berlin, I can give you many tips.

name: Rooftop Terrace in Friedrichshain
summary: Welcome to Berlin. This apartment offers a fabulous southward facing rooftop terrace overlooking Berlin. The room is located at the top of the building with an elevator. Even in winter the sun won't stop shining through the ceiling high windows.

Enjoy the busy city and relax in your home. I speak german, french, english and russian.

name: Schöne Dachgeschoss-Wohnung
summary: Die Wohnung: 40 qm groß, Dachgeschoss (5.OG), Altbau , frisch renoviert, zentral und ruhig gelegen, weiter Blick in Ostlage, (Morgensonne), für 1-2 Personen. Duschbad, Küche, Wohn-und Schlafbereich, Atelier u. Arbeitsbereich. Gute Verkehrsanbindung.
space: Die Dachgeschoss-Wohnung ist eine helle, frisch renovierte Unterkunft für 1-2 Personen. Sie liegt ruhig, in einem Seitenflügel, mit weitem Blick, jedoch ohne Aufzug. Es ist eine Nichtraucher-Whg. und tierfreie Zone.  Das Duschbad ist fein, aber klein.
description: Die Wohnung: 40 qm groß, Dachgeschoss (5.OG), Altbau , frisch renoviert, zentral und ruhig gelegen, weiter Blick in Ostlage, (Morgensonne), für 1-2 Personen. Duschbad, Küche, Wohn-und Schlafbereich, Atelier u. Arbeitsbereich. Gute Verkehrsanbindung.  Die Dachgeschoss-Wohnung ist eine helle, frisch renovierte Unterkunft für 1-2 Personen. Sie liegt ruhig, in einem Seitenflügel, mit weitem Blick, jedoch ohne Aufzug. Es ist eine Nichtraucher-Whg. und tierfreie Zone.  Das Duschbad ist fein, aber klein. Die Wohnung ist möbliert und voll ausgestattet. W-LAN ist vorhanden. Gern beantworte ich Fragen meiner Gäste. Es gibt im Viertel viele Erholungs-und Freizeitangebote. Nur 3 Fußgehminuten von der Wohnung befindet sich ein großer, alter Park mit Wasserfall. Direkt neben der Wohnung ist ein Eingang zum Gleisdreieck-Park, der sich groß und weit bis zum Potsdamer Platz erstreckt.  In Fußnähe gibt es  Supermärkte/Discounter,  einen türkischen Wochenmarkt, diverse Restaurants, Bars, Straßencafés, 2
neighborhood_overview: Es gibt im Viertel viele Erholungs-und Freizeitangebote. Nur 3 Fußgehminuten von der Wohnung befindet sich ein großer, alter Park mit Wasserfall. Direkt neben der Wohnung ist ein Eingang zum Gleisdreieck-Park, der sich groß und weit bis zum Potsdamer Platz erstreckt.  In Fußnähe gibt es  Supermärkte/Discounter,  einen türkischen Wochenmarkt, diverse Restaurants, Bars, Straßencafés, 2 kleine Theater, 1 Kino, sowie zahlreiche exquisite, kleine Ladengeschäfte und Boutiquen. Ebenfalls in Fußnähe gibt es div. Bars, Clubs und Kneipen des Kreuzberger Nachtlebens.
notes: Obwohl die Dachgeschoss-Wohnung im 5.OG über eine innenliegende Treppe mit der unterhalb gelegenen Wohnung im 4.OG verbunden werden kann, ist diese Verbindung bei Vermietung verschlossen. Jede Wohnung eine separate Wohneinheit, zugänglich über das Treppenhaus. Bei Leerstand wird der Atelierteil des 5.OG genutzt, weshalb dort einige Künstlerutensilien lagern, die meine Gäste jedoch nicht beeinträchtigen sollten.
transit: Die Anbindung an die öffentl. Verkehrsmittel  ist sehr gut. In nur 10 Minuten erreicht man mit der U-oder der S-Bahn die City West ( Ku-damm), die City Ost (Alexanderplatz), das Regierungsviertel, den Hauptbahnhof, das Brandenburger Tor, die Museumsinsel, und einige große Shopping-Center. Die Parkplatzsituation vor Ort ist eher schwierig.
access: Die Wohnung ist möbliert und voll ausgestattet. W-LAN ist vorhanden.
interaction: Gern beantworte ich Fragen meiner Gäste.
house_rules: Nichtraucher-Wohnung, bitte keine Haustiere,  für feierwillige Party-people ungeeignet.

space: My flat is about 80qm has a nice balcony to the backyard and you have access to 3 of the 4 rooms while I´m abroad. name: Sunny Room with a great view!
summary: We offer a clean, simple room with a proper 1,5m bed (for 1 or 2 people) in our flat. It is situated in a quiet and safe neighbourhood. Mostly German and international people in their 25-40 live around. It is not in the touristic area, but it is extremely close to everything. Very well communicated day and night with trams and sbahn. Just one sbahn ( s9 in 35mins) to get to Schönefeld, just 11 mins to Alexander Platz and 2 tram stops to be in the heart of Fhain. Very close to most clubs too.
space: Our flat consists of a living room, a big room, a smaller bedroom, a bathroom with a bath tub and a kitchen with a washing machine and a dishwasher. It is situated in Friedrichshain, one of the coolest areas in Berlin. Very central, sunny and good communicated with Sbahn, tram and bus. Amazing view over Friedrichshain, top floor and very quite. Alt bau, recently renovated, super new. We are renting the smaller room for a maximum period of two weeks.  When we are away we rent also the bigger room. The area is quite but still very close to Simon Dach Strasse, one of the busiest streets in Berlin with loads of cafes, restaurants, shops etc. Just a few meters from our flat you can find bakeries, late night shops, bars, pizzerias, restaurants. You can move very easily, as it is very good connected with Sbahn and tram right round the corner. The tram runs 24/7, so there is always a way to get to our flat easily.

Alt bau, recently renovated, super new. We are renting the smaller room for a maximum period of two weeks.  When we are away we rent also the bigger room. T
house_rules: Please NO DOWNLOADING! In Germany it is illegal to download films, series, music etc and you could end up in court & will have to pay a big fine for that.  You are not allowed to have guests, unless we are aware and ok with it. This is a no shoes apartment. Please take yours slippers with you, ask us to lend a pair or walk with no shoes inside. We are against wearing your shoes inside anyways, but now we got expensive rugs, that we cannot afford to have cleaned every time a guest leaves. In case we are away: Please water our plants. If there are more people in the flat, ask them before smoking in common used rooms. We smoke and don't mind smokers. No guests.
host_about:
My name is Dina and I was born and raised in Greece, but have been living since 10 years in Berlin. 

I have studied law, but at the moment work at an electronic music promotion and booking agency and as a dj. I speak English, German, Italian, Spanish and Greek.

I live in Friedrichshain, Berlin with my husband Max, who is working as a product manager at two music labels. We are in our thirties and work every day during the week and travel or dj and party on the weekend. We dj and produce electronic music (slow techno, acid, post disco, chug), have a blog and run our own events. 

We love traveling, music, films, art, parties and meeting new interesting people. 

We enjoy having friends over at ours and are smokers.

★★★★★ ★★★★★

You are welcome to Berlin! We would love to help you have a great time here, give you tips (sightseeing or partying) and if there is time and will from both sides, hang out with you!

Find the room with the title:
Cute sunny room in Friedrichshain

Rarely we can offer you the room with the title:
Sunny Room with a great view in FH!

We are always happy to meet new people from all over the world! 

But after doing airbnb for four years now and having made different experiences, we are a bit picky.

Requirements:
We prefer to host adults between 22-45 years old, you need to have a picture and write in your request what you do for a living and what is the purpose of your travel. We will be staying a few nights under the same roof, so it would be good if we more or less got along.

 We would also prefer to have guests who will not be cooking at home (had the forgotten hot plate/stove or burnt pans and smell all over the house way too many times so far. It's not really worth the risk, since our own flat/things are at stake, so we prefer to be careful than sorry). You can of course keep things in the fridge, just no cooking please. Eating out in Berlin is very cheap anyways and we are happy to give you tips.

We also have the rule of no shoes in the house, you would have to leave them in the flat by the entrance. 

You are not allowed to bring people back to the flat. No extra guests please!

Please contact us and don't hesitate to ask us any questions.

name: Cute Room Overlooking Punk Street in Family Space
summary: A lovely room within a large, family apartment. Recently refurbished to a high standard, our apartment is located within the bustling district of Friedrichshain and is a prime location for those looking to explore the beautiful city of Berlin.
space: Our recently refurbished altbau has all the charm and character of typical Berlin apartment with tall ceilings and original art stucco. The bedroom has a double bed, space to unpack your clothes and access to a small balcony overlooking the street (perfect for smokers).  A large, fully equipped kitchen/diner with juicer, coffee machine, dishwasher is available to use and the washing machine is also available on request. Standard breakfast is provided weekdays and you are welcome to join us for a full continental breakfast on Sundays (complete with fresh juice). Our apartment is also baby-friendly and therefore suitable for travellers with young children.
description: A lovely room within a large, family apartment. Our recently refurbished altbau has all the charm and character of typical Berlin apartment with tall ceilings and original art stucco. The bedroom has a double bed, space to unpack your clothes and access to a small balcony overlooking the street (perfect for smokers).  A large, fully equipped kitchen/diner with juicer, coffee machine, dishwasher is available to use and the washing machine is also available on request. Standard breakfast is provided weekdays and you are welcome to join us for a full continental breakfast on Sundays (complete with fresh juice). Our apartment is also baby-friendly and therefore suitable for travellers with young children. There are plenty of bars, restaurants and cafes all within walking distance.  Alexanderplatz
neighborhood_overview: There are plenty of bars, restaurants and cafes all within walking distance.  Alexanderplatz and the main tourist spots of Berlin can also be reached with a 10-15 minute tube ride.  The East Side Gallery is just a short tram ride (or nice stroll) away where you view the Berlin Wall and walk by the river.
transit: Walking distance from the tube (U5 Sameriterstraße, 5 minutes), tram (M10, 5 minutes) and s-bhan (10 minutes; direct link to airport).
house_rules: Smoking is permitted but only on the balcony adjoining the room. As we have a young daughter, we would also like to ask guests to refrain from any heavy drinking in the apartment.
host_about:
We are Thor and Charmaine and we are hosts to a cute city apartment in the bustling Berlin district of Friedrichshain. 

We are an international couple, Thor from Norway and Charmaine from England, and we are new parents to our little daughter, Åsa. Thor is a self-employed glass artist but spends most of his time at his studio and Charmaine is currently on maternity leave from her work in the field of clinical research. 

We are relatively new to the world of AirBnB hosting but we are excited to meet new people and welcome you to our home.

name: Sunny Room in ArtistFlat in PrenzlB
space: Hello Hello Hola Salut Ciao Mambo Shalom Namaste Merhaba Berlin Calling?  welcome! Your room is spacious 25qm room in a  82qm apartment. The apartment is located in quiet wine-covered house in the background, 3th Floor, and offers plenty of space, light and atmosphere to relax, cook, do sports and ...? The apartment has 2 large rooms- my room and the guestroom- a large kitchen, which is at the same time my art studio, and a very spacious bathroom with daylight, shower and bathtub.  Style motto: collage of found objects of my travels, fine art, a little bit of high-tech, nature and principle relax ... In the guest room a 140cm bed, clothes rack, space to practice yoga, some yoga mats and a view in the green courtyard.  The kitchen has a gas stove, toaster, sandwich maker, spice mortar, italian Pastapress, blender for cool smoothies, a manual italian coffee maker, dishes and glasses for cozy evenings .... and behind the curtain a little "work in progress feeling" of an art studio. ...  I

house_rules: Wash your used dishes. Take off shoes. Hello male guests: Close the W.C.  :-)  Wifi will be turned off between 23h- 7h Turn off lamps and electronic decives etc when not needed
host_about:
Ich bin Eva Blanca und liebe dieses lebendige Berlin! Nach Stationen in Deutschland und im Ausland nun in Berlin, wo viele tolle Dinge zusammenkommen. 
Ich bin tätig im Bereich Kunstvermittlung, Kunsttherapie & Coaching und Performance. Ich singe und tanze und mag es, mich mit anderen Menschen für den Moment zu begeistern. 
Den Tag beginne ich am liebsten mit Yoga und danach gutem Essen wie ein scharfes Curry oder Pasta. Ich bin häufig auf Reisen und Entdeckungstour, um zu staunen wie ein Kind... Dabei lasse ich mich gerne inspirieren von bunten Menschen, kleinen und großen Tieren und von der Natur;  von farbigen Klängen und lauten Gerüchen, von Weltgeist und Seelenbildern, von Poesie und Crazyshit.

You can find me on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Eva Blanca Robinson

name: Panorama view in city heart
summary: Bright and stylish apt (180 square meters) in a historic Building. Bedroom (30 sq.m.) with great view, bath and sep. toilet, fully equipped kitchen and living area (100 sq.m).  Please note!  – Sometimes me, my wife and our dog are there as well – in a different part of the apartment (sharing kitchen and some of the living space with you). – For events, there are additional charges of up to € 25,- per person.
space: Big, quiet and bright Guest Room:  - queen size bed, incl. sheets and blankets - a table and chairs  - a comfortable easy chair to enjoy the view  - hatrack on wheels and a cupboard - two mirrors  - a docking station/loudspeaker for iphone/ipod etc. An additional bed is available on request. The apartment has huge windows with spectacular panoramic views (on the 6th floor, there is an elevator). It is stylishly decorated (50's) and has a beautiful atmosphere.  The apartment building is an architectural landmark built in 1953 and located on famous Karl-Marx-Allee, which is an essential part of every tourist bus tour …

neighborhood_overview: The apartment building is located right where Berlin's most popular districts meet: Mitte, Kreuzberg, Prenzlauer Berg and Friedrichshain - which are all reachable within a few minutes.  Legendary main square Alexanderplatz is just a 15 minute walk away. One of Berlin's most beautiful bars is located nearby, as is the most famous cinema, stunning Kino International. There are restaurants and supermarkets nearby.
transit: Subway stations (U5) are just around the corner.
access: Guestroom includes use of:   - modern bathroom and separate toilet, incl. towels - fully equipped kitchen (incl. toaster, mixer, dish washer, bar, big fridge/freezer) - highspeed WiFi - washing machine
interaction: Me, my wife Danielle and our dog Lucy will be glad to assist our guests in any possible way.  Advices if needed can be given about secret places to visit, cultural activities, museums, theatres, galleries, cabarets, concert venues, literary events, good restaurants, insider bars and clubs as well as trips to beautiful places outside of Berlin.
host_about:
Danielle is an artist and art teacher, Marcel writes for film, theater and the opera.
We spend our days and nights working or doing nothing or trying to live a meaningful live – at least in our definition of such.
Unfortunately, we sometimes tend to procrastinate which usually contradicts my philosophy of making the most of the moment … but maybe it doesn't. 
We share our apartment with a cute dog, lucy, who is loved by and loves everyone we know.

name: Cute sunny room in Friedrichshain
summary: A proper 1,5m bed, a sofa (if you dont need a second bed) or a second bed, shelves, whole body mirror, table and a nice view over a playground, a park and Friedrichshain. Quiet and safe neighborhood, but still very close to everything.  Very well communicated with sbahn and trams.
space: Our flat consists of a living room, a big room,  a smaller bedroom,  a bathroom with a bath tub and a kitchen with a washing machine and a dishwasher. It is situated in Friedrichshain, one of the coolest areas in Berlin.  Very central, spacious, sunny and good communicated with Sbahn, tram and bus. Amazing view over Friedrichshain, a park and a playground, top floor and very quiet. High ceilings, recently renovated, super new and clean. We are renting the smaller room for a maximum period of two weeks. When we are away we rent also the bigger room. The area is quiet but still very close to Simon Dach Strasse, one of the busiest streets in Berlin with loads of cafes, restaurants, shops etc.  Just a few meters from our flat you can find bakeries, late night shops, bars, super markets, pizzerias, restaurants. Most of Berlin's nightclubs are within 3 km from the flat and it is very easy to get to Kreuzberg by tram and ubahn, Prenzlauer Berg by tram and sbahn, Neukölln by sbahn, Mitte by tr

neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is lovely. Very quiet and safe with young people mainly in their late 20s or 30s German and international living near. It is situated near the beautiful park Volkspark and has another small park even nearer. There are loads of late night shops just round the corner, three supermarkets, three very good Italian restaurants, a Vietnamese restaurant, an Asian & sushi take away, an Indian, a German, a cheap burger place and a cheap pizza place very close! Vivantes hospital is a tram stop away.
transit: You can get to our place with the Sbahn or tram! The tram runs 24/7. There is an sbahn that takes you to ours directly from Schönefeld airport and from Tegel it is an Sbahn and a bus. Super easy and fast! I will send you exact details how to get to ours with screenshots and all info you need to make your arrival easier for you.
access: Access to the kitchen, fridge, bathroom utilities, washing machine, hair dryer. We upgraded the guest room, so now you will have a 1,5 proper bed to your disposal along with a sofa or another bed if you need it, a table, a whole body mirror, shelves, towels. Very sunny room, equipped with curtains. Please inform us if you need two beds or one before your arrival.
interaction: If the guests and ourselves have time, it is always a pleasure to spend some time with them and get to know them, go out with them or just hang out at home. We both work full time though and have a busy schedule so it all depends. Of course we don't mind at all if the guests don't feel like interacting. We are totally fine with that too!
house_rules: _ Please NO DOWNLOADING! In Germany it is illegal to download films, series, music etc and you could end up in court & will have to pay a big fine for that. Turn off your torrents or any other download sites, BEFORE you log in in our wifi. You can find the wifi password on a paper. Please fill in with your personal data. _You are not allowed to have guests, unless we are aware and ok with it. _This is a no shoes apartment. Please take your slippers with you, ask us to lend a pair or walk with no shoes inside. We have expensive rugs, that we cannot afford to have cleaned every time a guest leaves. My parents had a no shoes policy in their house and I always despised them for that and felt bad when they asked my friends to take off their shoes. But guess what? I now do the same. :) On top I have a dust allergy and need a dustless environment. _You need to lock the door if you leave the flat if noone is at home and shut down the windows. You shouldn't use the latch (lock on the door), bec
host_about:
My name is Dina and I was born and raised in Greece, but have been living since 10 years in Berlin. 

I have studied law, but at the moment work at an electronic music promotion and booking agency and as a dj. I speak English, German, Italian, Spanish and Greek.

I live in Friedrichshain, Berlin with my husband Max, who is working as a product manager at two music labels. We are in our thirties and work every day during the week and travel or dj and party on the weekend. We dj and produce electronic music (slow techno, acid, post disco, chug), have a blog and run our own events. 

We love traveling, music, films, art, parties and meeting new interesting people. 

We enjoy having friends over at ours and are smokers.

★★★★★ ★★★★★

You are welcome to Berlin! We would love to help you have a great time here, give you tips (sightseeing or partying) and if there is time and will from both sides, hang out with you!

Find the room with the title:
Cute sunny room in Friedrichshain

Rarely we can offer you the room with the title:
Sunny Room with a great view in FH!

We are always happy to meet new people from all over the world! 

But after doing airbnb for four years now and having made different experiences, we are a bit picky.

Requirements:
We prefer to host adults between 22-45 years old, you need to have a picture and write in your request what you do for a living and what is the purpose of your travel. We will be staying a few nights under the same roof, so it would be good if we more or less got along.

 We would also prefer to have guests who will not be cooking at home (had the forgotten hot plate/stove or burnt pans and smell all over the house way too many times so far. It's not really worth the risk, since our own flat/things are at stake, so we prefer to be careful than sorry). You can of course keep things in the fridge, just no cooking please. Eating out in Berlin is very cheap anyways and we are happy to give you tips.

We also have the rule of no shoes in the house, you would have to leave them in the flat by the entrance. 

You are not allowed to bring people back to the flat. No extra guests please!

Please contact us and don't hesitate to ask us any questions.

I'll do it for you. ;-) Ich erwarte von meinen Gästen Freundlichkeit, Sauberkeit, sorgfältigen Umgang mit der Einrichtung und die Einhaltung der Nacht- und Mittagsruhe. host_about: Ich bin Ingenieurin vom Beruf (Wahl-) Berlinerin, aber vor allem Mutter und Ehefrau. Ich liebe es, neue Leute zu treffen und ihnen Tipps für meine Lieblingsorte zu geben, insbesondere in meiner Wohnlage. Airbnb ermöglicht mir den Kontakt zu vielen interessanten Persönlichkeiten, was ich jedesmal spannend finde.

name: Whole flat with two rooms
summary: Our cosy two room apartment is the perfect base to discover the vivid and cultural Kreuzkölln, while we are on holiday. Feel free to enjoy our flat and the surrounding area with cafés, bars and clubs. Internet café 100 m away, as we don't have WiFi.
space: In both rooms there is a double bed/sleeping couch for two people. The room with the double bed is very quiet, as it points to the yard. Please make you feel at home and listen to the vinyls, play on the guitar or the piano. Our balcony gets sun in the morning until 1pm. Kitchen is fully equipped, you can use the coffee and tea and make your coffee in a Mokka. Towels will be provided and you can use the shampoo and shower gel, if you like.  We don't have internet, so you would have to go to the internet café, 100 m from the house. Two different supermarkets right next to the house. Tuesday and Friday turkish market at Maybachufer with fresh fruits and vegetables - 30 min nice walk by the channel.

neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is 10 min away from the beautiful Treptower Park and only 5 min from Landwehrkanal, both perfect to take walks. To Electro Club “Wilde Renate“ it takes 20 min by foot, and Weserstraße with a lot of bars is only 10 min by foot away. Great restaurants everywhere you look :) With the bus, that leaves in front of the house you will be at the old Airport “Tempelhofer Feld“, which is now used by Berliners for leisure activities. Worth a visit!
notes: No internet, please use internet café, 100 m away from the house. We will only take requests up to three people and minimum five nights.
transit: Bus stop directly in front of the house. The bus takes you to nearest stations for S-Bahn Treptower Park or to U-Bahn Rathaus Neukölln. You can also walk there, which would take 10 to 15 min.  From Airport Schönefeld it will take you 30 min, from Tegel around 45 min.

name: Wunderschöne luxuriöse Altbauwohung
summary: Schöne, stilvoll eingerichtete klassische Altbauwohnung. Die großzügige Wohnung hat ein helles Wohnzimmer mit einer offenen modernen Küche, modernem Bad und ein geräumiges Schlafzimmer. Außerdem gibt es einen langen Balkon angrenzend an alle Zimmer.
space: Schöne, stilvoll eingerichtete, klassische Altbauwohnung. Die großzügige Wohnung hat ein helles Wohnzimmer mit einer modernen, offenen Küche, sowie ein schönes großes Schlafzimmer. An alle Räume grenzt ein sehr langer Balkon zur Südseite, auf den ganztägig Sonnenstrahlen fallen. Außerdem gibt es ein großes, modernes Bad mit einer geräumigen Badewanne. Die Wohnung ist ideal für Pärchen geeignet, kann aber auch mit 3 Leuten bewohnt werden. Im Schlafzimmer befindet sich ein Boxspringbett und im Wohnzimmer eine gemütliche Couch, auf der auch ideal eine Person schlafen kann. Das Wohnzimmer bietet viel Platz und lädt mit seiner offenen Küche zum gemütlichen Kochen und sitzen ein. Zugang für Gäste - Saubere Handtücher und Bettwäsche - Voll ausgestattete Küche inkl. Geschirrspülmaschine - High-Speed Wi-Fi - Balkon Die Nachbarschaft Die Wohnung liegt in einer sehr ruhigen, schönen Straße von Bäumen umgeben. Sie befindet sich genau zwischen dem Weserkiez und Richardplatz und unweit der Tempelhof

name: Abgeschlossene 2-Raum-Wohnung in Pankow
summary: Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe von Naherholungsgebieten, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln in Französich Buchholz (Pankow). Einfache Anfahrt in 5 Minuten vom Dreieck Pankow mit PKW Gegenüber der Wohnung öffentlicher kostenloser Parkplatz und Haltestelle Tram Nr. 50, die alle 10 Minuten fährt, nachts gibt es den Nachtbus. In 25 Minuten ist man am Alexanderplatz/ Stadtzentrum. Ein Badesee ist mit dem Fahrrad in 10 Minuten erreichbar. Alle Supermärkte fußläufig.
space: Die Wohnung besteht aus einem Wohnzimmer, einem Schlafzimmer, einer Küche und einem Duschbad. Im Schlafzimmer befindet sich ein 1,80m breites Doppelbett. Im Wohnzimmer steht ein bequemes Einzelbett und eine Couch, die sich leicht zu einem Schlafsofa ausklappen lässt. Die Küche ist mit Ceranfeld, Backofen, Geschirrspüler und Küchenutensilien voll ausgestattet. Sie verfügt über eine geräumige Essecke für vier Personen und einem Fernseher. Somit ist die Wohnung bestens für eine Familie mit 2-3 Kindern, zwei Paare oder Geschäftsleute, welche eine eigene Wohnung für einen längeren Zeitraum suchen, geeignet.

The place comes fully equipped, with internet, clean and well heated. You will have the place just to yourself. There are two different sized rooms, each equipped with a bed, desk, and place to store your clothes. So you can come with friends or relax from your partner. Ask me any question.

name: Cozy room in modern apartment
summary: Genau zwischen dem Viktoriapark und dem Park am Gleisdreieck und in Laufweite zum Bergmannkiez liegt unsere frisch renovierte Altbauwohnung mit moderner Küche, gemütlichem Wohnzimmer und einem sauberen und modernen Badezimmer. Wir sind eine WG aus 3 Berufstätigen, die unter der Woche viel arbeiten müssen und daher das Wochenende gerne draußen im Park bei Bier oder Sport verbringen. Wir sprechen alle fließend Englisch und 2/3 fließend Spanisch und freuen uns über Gäste aller Nationen.

summary: Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe von der U- Bahn, S-bahn wie Straßenbahn. Der Rosenthalerplatz  ist in 5 Fußminuten gut zu erreichen, genauso wie der Mauerpark. neighborhood_overview: Mitte/ Prenzlauer Berg ist ein sehr familienfreundlicher und gepflegter Stadtteil, einfach ein Kiez zum Wohlfühlen. Es gibt unzählige Bars, Clubs wie Restaurants, zahlreiche Cafés, attraktive Shops wie Galerien. Für jeden etwas zu haben. Für touristische Attraktionen zu Fuß ist hier natürlich auch vorgesorgt: der Mauerpark, die Gedenkstätte Berliner Mauer, das Brandenburger Tor, die Museumsinsel, der Hackescher Markt oder der Alexanderplatz sind gut zu Fuß erreichbar.
transit: Die Wohnung liegt sehr Zentral hat also die perfekte Anbindung. U-bahn (U8) ist nur ein paar Meter entfernt genauso wie die Tram (M10, M8, M1, 12) und der Bus. Die S- Bahn ist natürlich auch nicht weit und nur ein paar geh minuten von der Wohnung entfernt.

interaction: Meine Mitbewohnerin steht gerne zur Verfügung bei aufkommenden Fragen euch zu helfen.:)
house_rules: - Bitte verhalte dich so, wie du das von Gästen in deiner Wohnung auch erwarten würdest. Gehe achtsam mit den Dingen um. Ich bitte dich ebenfalls keine Partys zu veranstalten oder fremde Leute hier hin einzuladen. Fühle dich ansonsten wie zu Hause.

name: Luxury Apartment in West Berlin!
summary: The apartment is located at the most famous alley in Berlin- the Kurfürstendamm.You are right in the spot with a fancy neighborhood, cafés,restaurants, shops,etc. Buses and train station are nearby,you can reach everything in a walking distance. The apartment is very cosy,chic and has the typical high ceilings. The building offers a concierge service and very secure access. If you have any questions, feel free to ask. In addition there is 30€ cleaning charge after your departure.

host_about: As I am currently studying in New York,  I am more than happy to offer my place to anyone who wants to visit Berlin long or short-term! I furnished my apartment with love&care. Please feel home and comfortable at my apartment but also treat it with respect! Ideally for 2 people, a third person could be accomodated at the couch! Thank you for your request!

name: bright/cosy apartment in Schöneberg
summary: The apartment is located in Rote Insel, in Schöneberg next to Kreuzberg. It includes a balcony with a wide view and is next to Victoriapark. Subway, trains and buses take you quikck to any direction. Very central!
description: The apartment is located in Rote Insel, in Schöneberg next to Kreuzberg. It includes a balcony with a wide view and is next to Victoriapark. Subway, trains and buses take you quikck to any direction. Very central!
host_about:
hey there. 
I'm studying dance theory and i'm finishing a yoga teacher training this summer. Besides that i like to hang out with my friends, go to the gym, see a performance, cook, read or travel. I moved to Berlin in 2009 and it doesn't look like i'm going to move away in the close future ;-) .
Since this year i'm living in Schöneberg on the red island, one of my favourite areas in town.
When i travel, i really like to stay in a nice apartment/house,so that i can withdraw myself a bit to enjoy my holiday.
I think my apartment exactly gives you the chance to relax, especially after a nice breakfast on the balcony with a wide Berlin Panorama View (you see Potsdamer Platz, Alexander Platz and Kreuzberg).

I hope i'll get to know you as a guest, or host in the future.

So far, all the best
Stephan

name: Apollo Apartments Berlin Schöneberg
space: Enjoy the German capital Berlin and stay in the heart of the city - in Berlin Schöneberg. 40 square meters apartment. 2-room apartment with kitchen and bathroom. 2-burner stove, refrigerator, coffee maker and kettle. Bathroom with shower and toilet Bed linen and towels are provided weekly. The nearest supermarket is found in about 200 meters away.   from here You reach easily all important places by underground, bus, S-train or just walking.   The impressively redesigned Potsdamer Platz, Leipziger Platz and Pariser Platz with it´s important Gate of Brandenburg, Berlin´s Museum Island with all its unique attractions, many cultural institutions, opera, theater and museums as well as the more numerous expectant art galleries, restaurants and bars of all nationalities, the luxurious Ku´damm, the impressive Berlin department store KaDeWe and come back to shopping street Friedrichstrasse and the impressive new government quarter in the heart of Berlin.

house_rules: Liebe Gäste!   Sie verbringen Ihren Urlaub in einer privaten Ferienwohnung. Wir haben uns mit der Einrichtung Mühe gegeben und hoffen, dass Sie einen wunderschönen Urlaub hier in unserer Ferienwohnung verbringen.    Nachstehende Hausordnung soll eine Hilfestellung geben, in der wir nur beschreiben, wie wir uns den Umgang mit der Wohnung und dem Inventar im Idealfall vorstellen.   Außerdem haben wir, zu unserer Entlastung einige Regeln aufgeführt, von denen wir hoffen, dass sie Ihr Verständnis finden. Durch eine ordentliche Behandlung der Wohnung helfen Sie uns auch in Zukunft, Ihnen eine schöne Ferienwohnung zur Verfügung zu stellen. . Sollten Sie irgendetwas in der Einrichtung vermissen oder Sie brauchen Hilfe, wenden Sie sich vertrauensvoll an uns.       Sämtliche Dinge, die sich in der Ferienwohnung oder Balkon befinden oder dazugehören, dürfen und sollen von den Gästen benutzt werden. Bitte gehen Sie mit der gesamten Einrichtung und Inventar sorgsam um.   Der Mieter hat das Mietobj
host_about: Hallo ich bin Ashraf. Ich freue mich darauf Gäste aus aller Welt bei mir zu begrüßen und fremde Kulturen kennenzulernen.

name: New Loft Kreuzberg-Friedrichshain
summary: This Loft at Boxhagener Place is a totally quiet and peaceful house for your own with two floors and an inner staircase within the green Court of a building from 1910. All is just renovated, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and washing machine.
space: The house has two floors with an inner staircase. The sleeping room is in the first floor, the living room in the ground floor with a terrace to the inner court has a sofa(recamiere), which is very easy to change into another two beds. Very comfortable and new.

name: Huge private room (36m²) in studio space
summary: You´ll have a room to yourself in a studio collective. Our house is close to basically everything as it couldnt be more in the center. The subways U6 and U2 are three minutes away. There are more than five different grocery stores in walking distance. The german cathedral, the french cathedral and the concert hall are two minutes by foot. The Friedrichstrasse is right around the corner with its endless shopping options as it´s one of the main shopping sreets....
space: The room is situated in a functioning art space/studio. There are fine artists, architects and fashion designers working/living in rooms surrounding the kitchen and bathrooms which are communal. Therefore it can be a little chaotic in the common rooms, but as you´re having your separate room in the back of the loft I´m confident you´ll feel at home.

name: Berlin Mitte is it! Flat on ground floor, Dogs ok
summary: Currently we are on holiday and are offering our home to be used for accomodations. We live here with a 6 months old baby and a toddler dog. Since our apartment is on ground level, it suits a young family (with dog) or elderly people (with dog).  The building is brand new, our flat is inside the quiet court yard. The nearest underground is only 500m away, U6 Schwartzkopfstraße. To  Friedrichstraße for example it´ only 3 stopps or a walk of 20 mins.
space: Our home is fully equipped and furnished. From kitchen tools to baby equippment - everything can be used.  The building is new and modern, our flat is practical because it´s on ground level - so there is no steps at all from front door to house door.

host_about:
Hi Leute,
als gebürtiger und einer der letzten UrBerliner freue ich mich über Besuch aus aller Welt. Berlin hat zahlreiche Facetten und bietet für jeden das gewisse Etwas. Ich hoffe, dass ich euch ein Stück Berlin näher bringen kann. 
Mi casa es su casa ;-)

Hey guys,
As a native and one of the last ancient berliner I appreciate and am very happy about every visit from all over the world. Berlin has various facets and I am able to provide everyone that certain something. I hope I can bring a piece of Berlin closer to you.
Mi casa es su casa - my house is your house ;-)

name: Cosy 2 room furnished apt. in Berlin
summary: My place is a 3-minutes walk to Pankstr. Station on U8 line, and 10-minutes walk to Bornholmer Straße S- bahn Station.The grocery store Lidl is also nearby. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the neighbourhood and of course the comfortable bed. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: My apartment comes with a bedroom, lounge, kitchen and a bathroom. It is a ground floor apartment in an hinterhaus (back row)....rather quiet as it is away from the main street noise It is a furnished apartment with a queen sized bed with a very comfortable mattress, cupboards, drawers, two 1-seaters and two side tables. The lounge is furnished with a sofa, two lamps, a couch table, a round dinner table for four and a decorative fireplace. The kitchen comes with a washing machine, oven, stove, wash basin and so on. Almost all the essentials will be there including some utensils. The bathroom has a bath tub/shower area. Overall, it is adorned with frames, mirrors and so on. From the way i look at it, I think it is tastefully decorated and cosy:)  WiFi is there and electricity connection is also there. Heating works like a charm too.

neighborhood_overview: There are numerous restaurants, bars, cafes and hanging out areas in the neighbourhood. The Gesundbrunnen shopping centre is just a hop away. The area of Prenzlauerberg is only a station away. Its an exciting and a happening area with a lot of night life and activities to keep you entertained.
transit: The apartment can be reached very conveniently using the metro line U8 (the stop is called Pankstr.- 4 minutes walk) and the train lines S8 or S9 (the stop is called Bornholmerstr. - 10 minutes walk). These are central line which connects you to most of the interesting places in Berlin. Moreover, trams and buses run all day and night connecting you to anyplace in Berlin without any hassle.
access: I will be happy to welcome you and introduce you to the apartment when you reach Berlin.  If you come with heavy lugguage, i can offer a  pick up service (at a reduced price) from the Tegel or Schönefeld airport to the apartment.
interaction: I can be your guide to Berlin, in case you have some questions during your stay. Questions are welcome!

name: Schillerkiez! Charming Room <3
summary: Neukölln for some days? Cosy Appartement located in one of the top-spots in Berlin. Only 5 min to the U8. A lot of nice Cafés, Restaurants Bars around and close to the Tempelhofer Feld! Whatever you want to do, im sure you will have a good time. I love my Kiez and i'm sure you too :)
space: The Appartement is really silent, because it's located far away from the street noise, so i can guarant that you will sleep heavenly. It's not a flat for the comercial renting, like some other Appartements; it's really my home.  It's fully equipped with all the typical goods for the fight against the typical problems of life. My place gives you the ideal chance for a retreat, after a day full of urban adventures!
description: Neukölln for some days? Cosy Appartement located in one of the top-spots in Berlin. Only 5 min to the U8. A lot of nice Cafés, Restaurants Bars around and close to the Tempelhofer Feld! Whatever you want to do, im sure you will have a good time. I love my Kiez and i'm sure you too :) If you have any questions you can contact me during your trip! :) The Schillerkiez is one the hotspots in Neukölln. You have an endless amount of bars here and all the local streets give you a lot of stuff to explore. I just recommend to have a lot of air and a long walk at the Tempelhofer Feld. Or rent a bike, roller skates, blades, skateboard or longboard from any of the rental shops nearby and take a ride around the old airport runways! Close to the U8. Only 10 min to Kotbusser Tor, 15 min to Alexanderplatz and 5 min to Herrmanplatz, the heart of Neukölln.

host_about: Socialworker and Student in Berlin :) Sometimes, when i'm not in Berlin or at my Girlfriend, i like to share my flat to give others the opportunity to have a nice stay here :)

name: Sunny and cosy penthouse w/bal
space: If your looking for an authentic Berlin experience, you should forget about Mitte, Prenzlauerberg and Kreuzberg, and  come down south Neukölln! Here you will find the coexistence of Germans and Internationals, Hipsters and Plumbers, Döner and Pho, smoky corner pubs and artsy indi bars, gentrifiers and resistance leaders!! Big, bright 3- rooms flat, up under the roof in the cosy and hip Schillerkiez neighborhood. Big terrace out to the backyard, fully equipped Kitchen, 2 bedrooms with double beds, and a big bright living room.  Only 5 min. walk from U-bahn station Leinestrasse, which brings you to Alexander platz in under 15 min.  5 min walk from the amazing old Tempelhof airport where you can take off on your bike, skates, long board, play football, or go for a run. The flat has a big terrace with afternoon and evening sun. You will find a number of great bars, restaurants, cinema, yoga, and even a local farmer's market on Saturdays, just few minutes away.

name: Gemütliche Wohnung, Optimale Lage
summary: Charmant eingerichtete  kleine 2 Zimmer Altbau-Wohnung im Herzen von Pankow, Nahe gelegen am Kiez von Prenzlauer Berg.Verkehrsmöglichkeiten sind direkt vor der Haustür und auch Einkaufsmöglichkeiten 2 Minuten zu Fuß. Die Wohnung ist ausgelegt für maximal 2 erwachsene Personen. Im Idealfall kann auch ein Kleinkind mit Urlaub machen, da hierfür ein separates eingerichtetes Kinderzimmer zur Verfügung steht. Mit in der Wohnung lebt ursprünglich ein kleiner Hund, der jedoch für die Zeit fremd betreut wird. Die Wohnung liegt im Hinterhaus in der ersten Etage (ohne Fahrstuhl), sodass man auch nichts vom Straßenlärm mitbekommt.

name: Big, central Apartment in Berlin
summary: Spacious apartment in a lively neighborhood. Suitable for families and travelers who want to spend a few pleasant days in Berlin and exciting. With all the comfort, space and many shops, cafes
space: Large apartment in the lively Kreuzberg neighborhood Graefkiez -  little traffic. Kitchen, three bedrooms, a large living room and a furnished nursery. At the door: restaurants, Cafés, Bars.
description: Spacious apartment in a lively neighborhood. Suitable for families and travelers who want to spend a few pleasant days in Berlin and exciting. With all the comfort, space and many shops, cafes Large apartment in the lively Kreuzberg neighborhood Graefkiez -  little traffic. Kitchen, three bedrooms, a large living room and a furnished nursery. At the door: restaurants, Cafés, Bars. Wi-Fi
neighborhood_overview: Viele Straßenmärkte sind um die Ecke: Maybachufer, Südstern, Zickenplatz, viele türkische Supermärkte mit frischem Gemüse, Obst und Fleisch auf dem Kottbusser Damm. Untem im Haus ist ein Edeka, der Getränke, Lebensmittel, Drogerieartikel verkauft. Viele Spätis in den umliegenden Straßen.
notes: Wir haben zwei Klaviere, einen Flügel und ein Klavier. Falls ihr spielen wollt, müsst ihr auf die Nachbarschaft Rücksicht nehmen und Euch an folgende Zeiten halten: 9-12 und 15-18 Uhr. Nur in dieser Zeit darf -bei geschlossenem Fenster- gespielt werden. Die Nutzung des Flügels kostet außerdem extra (80€ für die Vorab-Stimmung von einem Stimmer der Berliner Philharmonie, 20€ am Tag). Falls ihr nicht spielt, schließen wir die Instrumente ab. Ein weiteres gutes Klavier (Yamaha - Baujahr 2008) steht Euch zur freien Verfügung. Kinder sind gerne willkommen. Wir haben ein eingerichtetes Kinderzimmer mit Kinderbett (optional mit Gitter), das darf gerne benutzt werden. Ebenso das Spielzeug und der Kinderhochstuhl unseres Sohnes.
transit: U+-Bahnlinie 8 (Station Schönleinstraße), Hermannplatz, Metrobuslinie M41.  Verbindung Flughafen Tegel: Vom Flughafen mit dem Bus zur Osloer Straße, dort in die U8 Richtung Hermannstraße einsteigen und bis Schönleinstraße fahren. Hier vom Kottbusser Damm in die Schönleinstraße einbiegen und dann in die nächste Straße nach rechts. Das ist schon die Dieffenbachstraße.
access: Wi-Fi
interaction: Wir sind immer erreichbar via Telefon & Mail. Wenn möglich sind wir bei An- und Abreise auch Vorort, oft aber selber auf Reisen.
house_rules: In der Küche darf moderat geraucht werden. Bitte die Küchentür schließen und gut lüften. In den anderen Zimmern darf nicht geraucht werden.  Bitte keine Party-People. Das ist ein Wohnhaus mit normalen Mietern, die kleine Kinder haben und arbeiten gehen. Bitte nehmt Rücksicht.  Bitte die Wohnung so zurückgeben wie wir sie Euch übergeben.  - No parties or guests, please, especially none that you have just met.
host_about: Wir sind eine junge Familie, die selber gerne reist und sich deshalb sehr auf Gäste freut. Wir genießen das Leben in Berlin und lieben es Gastgeber für Freunde und Gäste zu sein. Außerdem gehen wir gerne in Theater, auf Konzerte und ins Kino. Willkommen!

name: big apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Our cosy and big 2 rooms apartment (75sqm) is centrally located in popular Prenzlauer Berg district, directly at the Mauerpark. Right around the corner you will find plenty of cafés and alternative-style bars!
space: Location  Our big 2 rooms apartment (75sqm) is centrally located in the beautiful and trendy Prenzlauer Berg district. Right around the corner you will find plenty of cafés and alternative-style bars. The popular Mauerpark is only a 5 min stroll away, with his famous international flea market and music and culture events! Also nearby is Kulturbrauerei (about 10min), an old brewery with shops and nightlife.  It's located in the forth floor, It's hidden from the street life. There are two separated beds, so its a perfect flat not just for couples.  The tram (M1,M10,M12) is about 7 min. walk away and needs only a short distance to Mitte Neighbourhood with highlights like the Oranienburgerstrasse, Hackescher Markt or Alexanderplatz.

name: Huge Flat in the Heart of Berlin
summary: My lovely apartment is located in Prenzlauer Berg, right next to the famous Kollwitz Platz. It has easy access to public transportation and is furnished with a mix of beautiful antiques/modern stuff. It provides all amenities - just check in and relax. Pleace read the whole description of my flatSome of the pictures are outdated, the furniture in the childrens room has changed.  The flat is not suitable for cat allergics - superfriendly catliving here.
space: Unsere 120 qm große Wohnung liegt mitten im Prenzlauer Berg, nur 5 Minuten entfernt vom berühmten Kollwitzplatz handelt sich um einen wunderschönen sanierten Altbau von 1890 mit Holzfußböden und Stuck und 3,80 m hohen Decken in der ersten Etage. Das große Schlafzimmer verfügt über ein Doppelbett (180x200), Deckenventilator, Verdunklungsrollos, Kleiderschränke, Kommoden und einen Schreibtisch. Das Kinderzimmer bietet nicht nur jede Menge Spielzeug, sondern auch ein Tagesbett (Hemness von Ikea mit einer Liegefläche von 80x200, ausgezogen 160x200) sowie ein wunderbares und sehr robustes  (Doppel-) Hochbett mit zwei kleinen Matratzen (je 80x200, nicht auf den Bildern zu sehen), ein Verdunklungsrollo, CD-Player. Das Wohnzimmer ist sehr groß, verfügt über ein großes Sofa mit einem Schlafplatz (2,50x1m), eine Essgruppe für bis zu 8 Personen (nicht auf den Bildern zu sehen) ein Tipi-Spielzelt, W-Lan und jede Menge Platz. Hinzu kommt ein 47 " Flatscreen und eine Playstation 4, auf der man auch
