house_rules: Bitte behandelt alle Sachen der Wohnung so pfleglich, wie Ihr sie auch vorfinden möchtet. Nachts ist die Nachtruhe zu achten um die Nachbarn nicht zu stören. Es handelt sich um eine Nichtraucherwohnung, es darf nirgends geraucht werden. Die Katzen sind einmal am Abend zu füttern und das Katzenklo ist einmal pro Tag zu säubern. Das W-Lan kann kostenlos genutzt werden, es ist jedoch nicht gestattet, illegale Dateien runterzuladen oder  zu Streamen.
host_about:
Ich bin Juristin und lebe mit meiner Tochter (7Jahre alt) in Prenzlauer Berg. 

In meiner Freizeit reise ich gerne nach Asien für längere Aufenthalte oder in den nahen Osten, Afrika und Europa für Städtetrips. Ich liebe Individualreisen und war nur ein einziges schreckliches Mal pauschal unterwegs. Ich liebe die indische und laotische Küche - esse aber auch gerne die hausgemachte Pasta bei unserem Lieblingsitaliener direkt vorm Haus, den Du unbedingt besuchen solltest, wenn Du bei uns wohnen wirst.

Enjoy Berlin!

name: Kuschelige Kreuzberger Wohnung - super zentral!

name: Cozy room in central Berlin
summary: Your room is located towards the yard, so there won't be much noise. Unfortunately this is the most recent picture we have, naturally the shelves and desk will be free and yours to use as you please.  We are located very centrally, along the subway U6 that takes you to all major attractions and anywhere else you would want to go. It takes about 30 minutes to get to the airport, and 20 to the Hauptbahnhof (main station).
space: You will be sharing the kitchen and bathrooms with us, three medical students. We have a huge kitchen where we like to cook or just spend some time together. You're more than welcome to join us but we will also respect your privacy.  There are two bathrooms, one with a tub and one with a shower. One is conveniently located right next to your room. There is also a washing machine. Naturally you can use everything in our flat as long as you clean up after yourself and treat everything respectfully.  Don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions :)

name: High above the roofs of Berlin
summary: Enjoy Berlin off the beaten path in hot and coming Moabit (Mitte) and join us in a 160m2 appartment high above the roofs of Berlin. 10 minutes by bus from Tegel Airport or the Hauptbahnhof. Close to Tiergarten. Discover new bars and a foody paradise.
space: Welcome to our bohemian paradise with a view! A very spacious 160m2 with wooden floors offer enough room to breathe and relax. We rent out a very quiet room at the "end of the west wing" of our apartment which provides you all the privacy you need. If you wish, you can enter your room through a separate entrance from your own staircase. The room offers a queensize bed and your own workdesk. We provide high speed Internet, your own TV (with cable), you can scan and print in our homeoffice or just relax on the big patio or the living room with a view on the TV Tower.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Berlin district of Mitte - in Moabit - Berlin's inner city island (no kidding!). Moabit offers a wild mix of renovated old-style buildings, old-style Berlin charms and the pounding heartbeat of a fast-changing formerly rougher neighborhood with hidden bar and cafe gems. It is a 10 Minute walk to the Spree's riverside, a 10 Minute bikeride to one of Berlins most beautiful inner city swimming lakes and 10 Minute bikeride to the famous Tiergarten or Berlin hottest galleries.
notes: We live in the 5th floor. There is no elevator!
transit: The area around Turmstraße is well connected to various buslines and the U9. City East and City West are short busrides. Wherever you wanna go, it is a short ride. More info on  (URL HIDDEN) Moabit is well connected to Prenzlauer Berg via Ringbahn, too.
access: You can use the full apartment - Fully equipped open kitchen (dishwasher, espressomashine), huge livingroom with sound system (apple airplay connected) and projector,  bathroom (tub, rainshower, washingmashine, dryer). Wifi. Feel at home away from home.  You can even use the bar (just fill up whatever you empty...)
interaction: How much we interact with you depends on your schedule and ours. Both of us are usually pretty busy, but if time allows we are happy to give you some backgroundinfo over a glass of red or white on where to get the best food in town or which bar is a must, but we will not torture you with an unsollicited holiday picture show ;-)
house_rules: Really nothing special. We wish that you treat us, the apartment and our neighbors as you want to be treated.
host_about:
Who am I? 

I am a passionate filmmaker / traveler / writer / Ashtanga Yogi. Love to cook, for friends and myself. Care for good wine, interesting conversations and books of almost any kind from graphic novels to the classics of literature.

name: Cozy & sunny room
summary: We would love to host you in our charming and centrally located flat from which you can explore the entire city. The flat is decorated nicely, always clean and offers all comfort you need for a city trip. Nearby there are restaurants and bars.
space: We are living as a couple in the 4-room flat on the 4th floor in a typical old Berlin building. The room is south sided and so you get sunlight the entire day. The room has a double bed, a night table, a desk & chair and a spacious cupboard for your clothes, But as we have to work for that, we are looking for guests that share their travelers vibe.

Here rather locals and students live, and we have a nice mix of different cultures in the neighbor hood. There are also a few parks and a lake nearby.
notes: We live in the 4th floor without elevator. For the key exchange we need to arrange a feasible timing as we are both working. Usually we can meet after I finished my work.

host_about: The way is the aim. Thats why I try to travel as much as I can. I am curious about other countires, people, music and food. :)

name: Prettiest Room in Friedrichshain's Best Location !
summary: We are renting our beautiful 28m2 Room in the heart of Friedrichshain, close to everything.  The apartment is situated right by Warschauer Strasse S-Bahnof and U-Bahnhof, and both the tramway line M10 and M13, which links to most of the inner city. It's also 5 minutes walk to Schlesiches Tor.  You will find around the house, many restaurants, bars, nightclubs, Historic sites, shopping facilities, 24/7 open Kiosks. 5 min from Berghain, 10 min from Kater Blau, 15 min from Wilde Renate.

neighborhood_overview: Start your city tour on foot, by bicycle or by public transport. The apartment is located in a quiet side street.  Every Saturday and Sunday there is a well-known antique and flea market at the end of the road.  In 3 minutes you are on the river Spree, in the city's Tiergarten park or e.g. at a Restaurant on Ship named “Capt'n Schillow" or at beer garden. Stroll along the Spree to the government district or the Charlottenburg Palace. The famous shopping street Kurfürstendamm (Ku'damm), the Berlin Zoo and many other attractions are within walking distance.
notes: For short term stay only (up to 21 days only): Since 2014, the Berlin Senate rises the so-called City tax for private nights in the amount of 5% of the published price (without Airbnb service fee) to a stay of max. 21 days. This City Tax is payable by the guests upon arrival in cash separately. Longterm rentals and demonstrable business trips are excluded from this. We look forward to welcoming you in our apartment.
transit: Free and safe parking outside the front door (public parking, street parking). Berlin has a very good public transportation system. The nearest station is the "S-Tiergarten" with only about 450 yards away. From this you get in all directions, for example in 5 min. to Kurfürstendamm (Ku'damm), in 10 min. at the Berlin fair or in 16 min. Alexanderplatz.  Distance upon arrival:  - From Central Station: 2 stops on the S-Bahn  - From Tegel airport: about 10 minutes by taxi/ cap
access: The apartment is available exclusively for you (no other guests!).
interaction: My wife and I live near the apartment. We are happy to help you with questions in words and deeds.
house_rules: The apartment is a Non-smoking apartment and is located in a quiet neighborhood. No Parties !
host_about:
Hello
we are hosts for more than 3 years in different ways. So we know all about being good hosts.  :-) 
We are happy and open-minded Berliner. We look forward to guests from all over the world, for a short trip or a longer stay, for holiday or business travel. We want to make your stay in Berlin as pleasant and relaxed as possible - as much as we wish it to us on our travels.

Welcome to the heart of the capital!


Hallo,
in verschiedener Art und Weise wir sind bereits seit über 3 Jahren Gastgeber. Durch unsere Erfahrungen wissen wir, was gutes Gastgeben ausmacht. :-))

Wir sind lebensfrohe und aufgeschlossene Berliner. Wir freuen uns auf Gäste von nah und fern, für kurz oder lang, auf Urlauber und Geschäftsreisende. Wir möchten Ihren Berlin-Aufenthalt so angenehm und entspannt wie möglich gestalten - genauso, wie wir es uns auf unseren Reisen wünschen.

 Herzlich Willkommen im Herzen der Hauptstadt!

name: Big central room in hip F'hain
summary: This sunlit room is in the midst of the nice neighborhood of Friedrichshain, in the east of Berlin! It's close to the main public transport (U-Bahn to Alexanderplatz and the Ring-Bahn) and in very short distance to well-known pubs and bars!
space: The flat is on the 4th floor. There's no elevator, so better save some energy for the last stairs back home :) However, once you arrive to the top, you'll be rewarded with some nice views over Friedrichshain and a nice little park in front of our house.
description: This sunlit room is in the midst of the nice neighborhood of Friedrichshain, in the east of Berlin! It's close to the main public transport (U-Bahn to Alexanderplatz and the Ring-Bahn) and in very short distance to well-known pubs and bars! The flat is on the 4th floor. There's no elevator, so better save some energy for the last stairs back home :) However, once you arrive to the top, you'll be rewarded with some nice views over Friedrichshain and a nice little park in front of our house. Feel free to use the kitchen to make yourself breakfast, lunch or dinner. Of course you can also use the bathroom. The living room and attached balcony are only for our private use and are only available for guests when invited. When you arrive, I am open and more than willing to share my personal preferences and tips with you, depending on what you like. Also, we provide the newest Lonely Planet edition of Berlin, so you can inform yourself and use it as your personal guide. The Boxhagener Kiez is a
neighborhood_overview: The Boxhagener Kiez is a very popular neighborhood in Friedrichshain. It is hip, but not overhyped as Kreuzberg or Neukölln. It still has a unique atmosphere - with lots of urban attractions, squatted houses, etc.  Especially for night owls and club lovers, Friedrichshain is an ideal place to stay. World-renowned clubs such as Berghain, Wilde Renate, about:blank are in a walkable distance from our flat or a cheap short taxi ride away. If you aren't in a clubbing mood, Friedrichshain also offers various possibilities for food and drinks - just ask or walk around.
transit: S-Bahn (Ringbahn): Station Ostkreuz is a 10 minute walk from our flat U-Bahn (U5) station Samariterstrasse is a 5 minute walk. Tram stations Wismarplatz (M21) is 1 minute, Boxhagener/ Holteistrasse (M13) is 5 minutes away.
access: Feel free to use the kitchen to make yourself breakfast, lunch or dinner. Of course you can also use the bathroom. The living room and attached balcony are only for our private use and are only available for guests when invited.
interaction: When you arrive, I am open and more than willing to share my personal preferences and tips with you, depending on what you like. Also, we provide the newest Lonely Planet edition of Berlin, so you can inform yourself and use it as your personal guide.
house_rules: - Please be quiet after 22:00 PM - Illegal download of movies, TV series and music forbidden. - No smoking allowed.
host_about:
Dear guests,

Nice to virtually meet you. Thank you for considering staying with me during your Berlin travel experience. 

I think you'll enjoy Friedrichshain, one of the most colorful neighborhoods in Berlin. Restaurants, cafes, shops, bars, 24/7 kiosks and electronic dance music clubs are always close to you.

I live in Berlin since the beginning of 2015. Cities which I've called home include  New York City, Amsterdam, Madrid, Hamburg and San Salvador.

I've been an active member of hospitality exchange networks and enjoy giving my guests tips to help them during their travels.

Please message me if you have any questions. Hope to hear from you soon.

Erick

summary: The room in our appartment is big, cosy and has lot of light. Our place is easy accesable as its close to the train, metro and busses. We live with our daughter from 16 months old in the appartment ourselfes, and rent out the private sleeping room. The kitchen is free to use, but good to know that we also use it. If anybody loves breakfast at his stay, please let me know and i can arrange this for you (for 5eur). We love to travel ourselfes, and thats why we love to offer airbnb to people too.

host_about:
Hello,
the reason why I joined airbnb is because I  love travelling..
I travelled for many years, now that i have a small daughter I travel a bit less, and not that long, but its still in my vains.

So of course I LOVE meeting new people, seeing new places, trying out new food, and feeling fresh and free in a new surrounding.

name: Peace and Serenity. Charming place.
summary: This cozy and spacious room in a romantic old apartment with 4m ceilings. Located in the center of Berlin, 500m away from the famous Frankfurter Alee. The house is isolated from the street noise and is perfect for rest after long walks or nights out.
space: Hidden away from the street noise on a picturesque quiet street, this apartment offers peace and quiet while still being conveniently located in the center and close to everything that makes Berlin special.

Guests have access to Wifi Large gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances Bathroom with separate tub and shower Projector for theatre style movie and entertainment enjoyment. name: Art historian's apartment in Mitte!
summary: Wohntraum im Mitte: Wunderschöne 67m2 große Wohnung im 2. Stock eines ruhigen Hinterhauses an der Haltestelle Naturkundemuseum mit 2 Zimmern und hauseigenem Fitnessstudio und Dachterrasse.  Beautiful flat in Mitte: 67 sqm with two rooms on 1st floor of a calm rear building at subway station Naturkundemuseum. Building has a gym and roof terrace for its tenants.
space: Meine Wohnung ist ein ruhiges Kleinod im aufregenden Mitte Bezirk und hat alles, was man benötigt, um einen angenehmen Aufenthalt in Berlin zu haben. Sie ist im modernen Stil eingerichtet und verfügt über einen Balkon und den Zugang zum hauseigenen Fitnessraum.
description: Wohntraum im Mitte: Wunderschöne 67m2 große Wohnung im 2. Stock eines ruhigen Hinterhauses an der Haltestelle Naturkundemuseum mit 2 Zimmern und hauseigenem Fitnessstudio und Dachterrasse.  Beautiful flat in Mitte: 67 sqm with two rooms on 1st floor of a calm rear building at subway station Naturkundemuseum. Building has a gym and roof terrace for its tenants. Meine Wohnung ist ein ruhiges Kleinod im aufregenden Mitte Bezirk und hat alles, was man benötigt, um einen angenehmen Aufenthalt in Berlin zu haben. Sie ist im modernen Stil eingerichtet und verfügt über einen Balkon und den Zugang zum hauseigenen Fitnessraum. Der Zugang erfolgt über die Chausseestraße. Die Wohnung selbst befindet sich im Hinterhof, so dass es sehr ruhig ist und man keinen Straßenlärm zu befürchten hat. Der Gast erhält einen Generalschlüssel, mit dem er Zutritt zu allen Türen hat inkl. Fitnessraum und Dachterrasse. Ich stelle meine Wohnung lediglich zur Verfügung wenn ich nicht in Berlin bin, daher werde ich lei
neighborhood_overview: Zum geschichtsträchtigen Mauerpark kann man in 5 Minuten spazieren, der Hamburger Bahnhof (Museum für zeitgenössische Kunst) und das Museum für Naturkunde, der Friedrichstadtpalast und das Galerieviertel rund um die Auguststraße sind ebenfalls fußläufig die Straße runter zu erreichen. Am liebsten gehe ich in das französische Restaurant "La bonne franquette", drei Häuser neben meinem Wohnhaus. Ansonsten kann ich das "Toca Rouge", "Xoi", "Il contadino sotto le stelle - Weinbar", "Pantry", "3 minutes sur mer" in der Torstraße und Umgebung empfehlen (weitere Empfehlung liegen dann in der Wohnung aus. Wenn man die Invalidenstraße herunterläuft, kommt man zum Weinbergspark, um den herum auch viele tolle Geschäfte, und Lokale sind.
notes: Da ich hier lebe, lasse ich alle meine privaten Gegenstände in der Wohnung. Im Kleiderschrank mache ich gerne für die Besucher Platz.
transit: Der Hauptbahnhof ist 2 Tramhaltestellen entfernt, den Flughafen Tegel erreicht man in 25 min mit UBahn und Bus. In den umliegenden Hotels kann an sich Fahrräder ausleihen. Eine Segway-Tour kann man ebenfalls am Ende der Straße buchen!
access: Der Zugang erfolgt über die Chausseestraße. Die Wohnung selbst befindet sich im Hinterhof, so dass es sehr ruhig ist und man keinen Straßenlärm zu befürchten hat. Der Gast erhält einen Generalschlüssel, mit dem er Zutritt zu allen Türen hat inkl. Fitnessraum und Dachterrasse.
interaction: Ich stelle meine Wohnung lediglich zur Verfügung wenn ich nicht in Berlin bin, daher werde ich leider kein Tourguide o.ä. sein können. Die Schlüsselübergabe erfolgt entweder persönlich oder durch eine Freundin. Stadtplan und alles wichtige zur Wohnung und dem Haus liegt selbstverständlich bereit!
house_rules: - Ich wünsche mir Gäste, die respektvoll mit meinem Eigentum umgehen und auch die Kunst zu schätzen wissen, die mich umgibt! Rauchen gerne auf dem Balkon!
host_about: I'm an art historian living in Berlin since a year and a half and I love to explore my new home town and travel the world! I can't live without french patisseries, great food, Hip Hop and the Opera! I absolutely love cooking and my guests are free to use everything they find in the kitchen. I'll have some great recommendations for my guests!

name: Lofty room in the heart of Berlin
summary: My quiet room gives you space to think, work and relax while watching the trees and the blue sky of the backyard.
space: The room is in a shared apartment and is very close to Berlins most beautiful park and only ten minutes by tram away from either Alexanderplatz or Warschauer Straße.  I use this room to work too so its especially suited for freelancers coming to the city on an assignment.  It is possible to use the room if you are more than 2 people as I have a comfy sofa bed as well. Just let me know!

name: 84 sqm + balcony in trendy F-hain
summary: Our cosy 84 sqm flat in the heart of Friedrichshain provides you with the full Berlin experience: high ceilings, double doors, vintage furniture and of course a good old Super Nintendo. The perfect base for your Berlin adventure!
space: The flat has everything any Berlin visitor could ever wish for: vintage furniture, DDR deco, the typical Berlin Altbau flair and much, much more.
description: Our cosy 84 sqm flat in the heart of Friedrichshain provides you with the full Berlin experience: high ceilings, double doors, vintage furniture and of course a good old Super Nintendo. The perfect base for your Berlin adventure! The flat has everything any Berlin visitor could ever wish for: vintage furniture, DDR deco, the typical Berlin Altbau flair and much, much more. Everything in the flat is there to be used: kitchen with all amenities, bathroom with towels etc., and of course our super cool Super Nintendo gaming console. The only thing to leave untouched (or at least not to empty completely) is our whisky and wine collection. Since we only let our flat when we´re away on holiday, there´s not that much room for interaction. There will usually be a friend to hand you the key and answer any questions about the neighbourhood or Berlin in general. And if that´s not enough, I´ll be of course available through e-mail during the whole stay (if there´s internet available in the coutry w
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in a quiet, family friendly neighbourhood in the northern part of Friedrichshain. Everything you need can be had in the close surroundings, Frankfurter Tor, Simon-Dach-Straße, Warschauer Straße and Alexanderplatz can be reached in a few minutes either by foot or by public transport.
notes: Please note that the apartment doesn´t have curtains and that there´s no coffee maker.
transit: U-Bahn Frankfurter Tor (U5) is 6 min by foot. Tram stop Bersarinplatz (M10) is 4 min away, the M21 stops just around the corner.
access: Everything in the flat is there to be used: kitchen with all amenities, bathroom with towels etc., and of course our super cool Super Nintendo gaming console. The only thing to leave untouched (or at least not to empty completely) is our whisky and wine collection.
interaction: Since we only let our flat when we´re away on holiday, there´s not that much room for interaction. There will usually be a friend to hand you the key and answer any questions about the neighbourhood or Berlin in general. And if that´s not enough, I´ll be of course available through e-mail during the whole stay (if there´s internet available in the coutry we´re in that is).
host_about:
Hi, it´s me, Corinne, 26, born in Luxembourg, lived in Cologne, Berlin, Ithaca and Washington DC. Currently back in Berlin, I´m renting out my flat whenever I´m away exploring the world as a travel blogger. Some day I might even end up at your place. So if you wanna come visit Berlin or have anything even slightly fascinating to offer, go on and send in your applications. Because, in the end, who can ever say that they´ve met a real Luxembourger? ;)

PS: Visit me on my travel blog Mighty Traveliers!

name: Tower on Wilhelmstrasse
space: Tower apartment in the 9th floor in a building created for IBA 1984. The apartment has a living room with an open kitchen plus a terrace (6m2), bedroom (queen size bed 2P + extra bed in the living room 1P) and a bathroom with tub. The apartment features a 360 ° view from any room in one of the four cardinal directions. The apartment is centrally located on the border between the districts of Kreuzberg and Mitte. You're on foot in 10 minutes at Potsdamer Platz or the Friedrichstrasse. Would you move to Berlin without a car? Then, the apartment is ideal. The U- Bahn station Kochstrasse (7 minutes on foot), the S- Bahn station Anhalterstrasse (5 minutes on foot) or Bus 29 (right outside the door) allow you to discover Berlin easy. But if you'd prefer to experience Berlin by bike, no problem! A bike hire is just a few yards away in the Anhalterstrasse.

name: Living in the middle of Kreuzberg
summary: Spacious living in a beautiful neighborhood with all needed amenities around.
space: Großzügige Wohnung mitten im Graefekiez – einem der schönsten und lebendigsten Nachbarschaften in Kreuzberg, nur einen Steinwurf entfernt zum Landwehrkanal, vielen Bars, Shops in Kreuzberg und Neukölln. Die Graefestraße bietet zahlreiche Restaurants mit internationaler Küche, aber auch viele Cafés und Bars. Das 100 qm große Altbau-Appartment verfügt über: - 2 Schlafzimmer (insg 4 Pers.), bei Bedarf gibt es 1 weitere Gästematratze. - Wohn/Esszimmer - geräumige Küche - Bad mit Wanne/Dusche - großen und grünen Balkon mit Platz zum Essen - Wireless-Internet Anbindung: - Ubahn U8 (Schönleinstraße) -> Richtung Mitte, Alex, Prenzlauer Berg - Ubahn U7 (Südstern) -> Flughafen Schönefeld, Potsdamer Platzer, Schöneberg - M41 -> Hauptbahnhof - 5 Minuten Fußweg zum Landwehrkanal / Maybachufer / Südstern - 10 Minuten Fußweg zum Kotti oder in den Bergmannkiez - 15 Minuten Weg bis nach Mitte (Alexanderplatz, Weinmeisterstraße usw.)

name: Dachgeschoss-Top Floor 15 min. from Alexanderplatz
summary: Welcome to Berlin! Willkommen in Berlin! Wir freuen uns auf unseren Gäste.. Me, Rosanna (italian from the south)  and him, Matthias( german from the south too) are happy to welcome you to this amazing city. We love travelling and meet people from other countries und von Germany.
space: Die Wohnung liegt in Berlin-Weissensee, ist sehr groß und hell, 5min bis zum See, 15 min bis zum Alexanderplatz. Wir haben ein Gästezimmer, Gästetoilette und eine Dachterrasse, falls jemand rauchen muss. Die Küche ist groß und kann natürlich mitbenutzt werden.  Our apartment is an attic floor situated in Berlin, Weissensee. Its very bright and rather quiet,  5 minutes walking to the Lake...with a beach bar!
description: Welcome to Berlin! Willkommen in Berlin! Wir freuen uns auf unseren Gäste.. Me, Rosanna (italian from the south)  and him, Matthias( german from the south too) are happy to welcome you to this amazing city. We love travelling and meet people from other countries und von Germany. Die Wohnung liegt in Berlin-Weissensee, ist sehr groß und hell, 5min bis zum See, 15 min bis zum Alexanderplatz. Wir haben ein Gästezimmer, Gästetoilette und eine Dachterrasse, falls jemand rauchen muss. Die Küche ist groß und kann natürlich mitbenutzt werden.  Our apartment is an attic floor situated in Berlin, Weissensee. Its very bright and rather quiet,  5 minutes walking to the Lake...with a beach bar! You have your own room, with blankets, towels, a very comfortable matress (that's what my mother-in-law said :P) and a wardrobe... We live in the apartement, it means you will share partly the apartament with us....despite that, we will surely respect your privacy!! Wir unterstützen euch gerne bei euren Unte
neighborhood_overview: Um die Ecke ist eine Tramhaltestelle, von dort kommt ihr überall stressfrei hin. Auf dem kiez selber, gibt es allerei Geschäfte zum Einkaufen. Am see gibt ein  Restaurant und eine Strandbar, mit gelegentlicher Livemusic. Right at the corner there is a tram stop, from there you can take several trams to Alexanderplatz and/or to Prenzlauerberg(famous Berlin's district) in just 15 minutes. In the main street there are many supermarkets, banks,diverse shopping facilities.
notes: Wir sprechen Deutsch,fränkisch. we speak english, io (Rosanna) parlo italiano y hablo espanol tambien.
transit: Um die ecke halten die Tram: M4(richtung Alexanderplatz), M13(richtung Wahrschauerstr.-Wedding) 12 (richtung Prenzaluerberg)... nur 5 min. mit M4, erreichen Sie die "Ring"-Haltestelle "Greifswalderstr." mit dem Ring erreichen Sie jede menge ecken von Berlin!
access: You have your own room, with blankets, towels, a very comfortable matress (that's what my mother-in-law said :P) and a wardrobe... We live in the apartement, it means you will share partly the apartament with us....despite that, we will surely respect your privacy!!
interaction: Wir unterstützen euch gerne bei euren Unternehmungen. If you like...we can cook together or go out for a drink...

name: Zimmer in schöner, großer, heller Altbauwohnung
summary: Schönes, großes helles Zimmer + Wohnküche und Bad in Berlin Prenlauer Berg.
description: Schönes, großes helles Zimmer + Wohnküche und Bad in Berlin Prenlauer Berg. Für Anregungen und Fragen bin ich natürlich immer offen. Gerne stelle ich auch ein paar persönliche Tipps zusammen was ihr euch unbedingt anschauen solltet. In der unmittelbarer Nähe gibt es wirklich alles, was das Herz begehrt. 4 verschiedene Lebensmittelmärkte innerhalb von 5 min erreichbar. Bis zum Kiez geht man ebenfalls nicht lang.  Es sind sehr viele nette Cafés, Bars und Restaurants in der Nähe sowie zahlreiche kleine Geschäfte. Die Straßenbahn m2 sowie die Ringbahn/ S Bahnhof Prenzlauer Allee sind in 5 min zu erreichen.  Des weiteren befindet sich ein Taxistand direkt vor der Türe und es gibt div. Fahrradläden um sich einen Drahtesel zu mieten und die Stadt zu erkunden. Es ist alles vorhanden, was zum Wohlfühlen nötig ist: Internet, komplett ausgestattete Küche, Bad inklusive Waschmaschine, Handtücher und Föhn.

transit: Die Straßenbahn m2 sowie die Ringbahn/ S Bahnhof Prenzlauer Allee sind in 5 min zu erreichen.  Des weiteren befindet sich ein Taxistand direkt vor der Türe und es gibt div. Fahrradläden um sich einen Drahtesel zu mieten und die Stadt zu erkunden.
interaction: Für Anregungen und Fragen bin ich natürlich immer offen. Gerne stelle ich auch ein paar persönliche Tipps zusammen was ihr euch unbedingt anschauen solltet.
house_rules: Licht aus wenn ihr die Wohnung verlasst und Tür abschließen.

name: sunny 5-R Apartment PrenlzlauerBerg
summary: Sunny 120 sqm flat with a balkony in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg. The fully equipped 5-room flat is a 10 min tube/tram ride away from Alexanderplatz. The flat is located in a trendy area with a lot of coffe places, bars and design shops around.
space: The sunny 120 sqm apartment with a balkony is located in "Bötzow Kiez" in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg. The 5-room flat is in an old buildung from 1900 with stucco in the third floor, 5 walking minutes away from a tube/tram-Station to Alexanderplatz.  WIFI, fully equipped kitchen (I love to cook) a Bath with a tub, 10 minutes to Hackescher Markt. Lots of Shops, Cafes, Bars and Design Stores around.  The apartment has two big living rooms with high ceilings, a kitchen, a bathroom, wooden floor, two sleeping rooms, a dressing room and a balkony. The decor is modern. The apartment has been renovated with attention to details. You have sun on the balcony and in the main rooms from early morning up to 3 pm. The street is really quiet and so are the neighbours. Best, Sören

name: Nice cozy room in Berlin Schoeneberg
summary: Centrally big room in typical Berlin old building surrounded by a lovely neighborhood. To catch up with the berlin lifestyle there is a very good public transport connection. Shopping possibilities are close and a supermarket which is open daily (except for sundays).
space: The apartment is located in the district Schoeneberg just next to the circular line between the stops S Schöneberg and S+U Innsbrucker Platz. The flat itself is a flat share with my sister. As I will be travelling, you guys will stay in my room during your reservation period. The room is spacious and bright with sprinkles of sun coming through during the mid-morning time. There is a proper bed for 2 to sleep in. Additionally, you have a self-made and cozy couch to mingle on after a long day. And if you feel like you also can watch TV.
description: Centrally big room in typical Berlin old building surrounded by a lovely neighborhood. To catch up with the berlin lifestyle there is a very good public transport connection. Shopping possibilities are close and a supermarket which is open daily (except for sundays). The apartment is located in the district Schoeneberg just next to the circular line between the stops S Schöneberg and S+U Innsbrucker Platz. The flat itself is a flat share with my sister. There is a proper bed for 2 to sleep in. Additionally, you have a self-made and cozy couch to mingle on after a long day. And if you feel like you also can watch TV. Since the room is part of a flat share the bathroom and kitchen are areas which have to be shared with either me or my room mate. The kitchen is usually the area where we get together sit, ch
notes: Owing to the fact that 95% of the time I will be on travels while I will be hosting you the check-in time varies heavily as it is dependant on the availability of my sister since she is studying and working. Please note that check-in is either until 9am or in the evening time from 8pm -10pm.  Arrivals at noon are commonly rather problematic. But there is always a way to ensure a somehwat conveniant check-in for you.
transit: train: (leaving S Schöneberg)  S1, circular line S41, S42 busses: M46 (to Zoologischer Garten and Britz) leaving from S Schöneberg M48 (to Alexanderplatz and Zehlendorf),  M85 ( to Hauptbahnhof and Lichterfelde Süd)  187 (to Wedding or Lankwitz) 248 ( to Ostbahnhof) underground:  U4 (to Nollendorfplatz -close to Ku'damm)
access: Since the room is part of a flat share the bathroom and kitchen are areas which have to be shared with either me or my room mate. The kitchen is usually the area where we get together sit, chat and cook together. Please do not access our chambers unless you need to use the washing machine or vacuum. Also there is NO SMOKING in the flat AT ALL TIMES.
interaction: Since either I or my room mate is renting her room only one of us will be living in the flat as you are staying with us. If you want to feel free to ask us any questions or just sit down and chat with us. Depending of our amount of studies for exams, we can show you a little around, take you with us to bars, clubs, etc. or give you some useful ideas where to check out places in Berlin.
house_rules: -NO SMOKING at all time -be nice and friendly to my room mate -treat everything in this household as it was yours, take care of it Thanks for following the rules.
host_about:
Hey everyone, 
my name is Chantal and I am a mechanical engineering student from Berlin, Germany. I am an open-minded, nice and tidy person to have around who loves to meet new people with different cultural background. This had already started when I was quite young since my parents used to travel around with me a lot. Which was also the beginning of my travel addiction and longing for more of getting to know different cultures. 
Besides travelling, I love to do various sports starting from kickboxing to table tennis over to football. Though at the moment I am focussing rather on kickboxing. During the rest of my freetime, I love to hang around with friends and discover new places in my city, as well as going to the movies and reading.

My motto in life: Respect every single person and treat them as you want to be treated yourself.

I am looking forward to stay with you. 
Best regs, Chantal

name: Schön, Schöner, Schöneberg:Grosser Balkon und Park
summary: Die Unterkunft ist in der 5 Gehminuten vom Winterfeldplatz entfernt. Die Gegend ist sehr entspannt und voll mit schönen Cafes und Restaurants. 2x die Woche gibt es einen schönen Wochenmarkt. Die Wohnung bietet einen grossen Balkon mit Blick auf den Kleistpark. Sie ist hell, ruhig und zentral (U Bahnhof Kleistpark ebenfalls 5 Gehminuten entfernt). Meine Unterkunft ist gut für Alleinreisende, Geschäftsreisende.

name: Artistic Alternative Apt in Neukoelln  *eco power*
summary: Hi, this is Anna. I offer this room for flatshare to stay in my appartment where me, such as my two cute little black cats live. The big bedroom (see pictures) is for you! Also for use are the kitchen, the bathroom, such as one or two bikes if wanted! The apartment is located in Neukölln, the multicultural and popular part of berlin. A few blocks in the right direction you'll have the canal and the Weserstrasse with all its bars and little manufactured stores.
space: If you want to come to Berlin and get the flair for which it's famous for, you are welcome to stay in our  very berlinesque creative musician artist apartment
description: Hi, this is Anna. I offer this room for flatshare to stay in my appartment where me, such as my two cute little black cats live. The big bedroom (see pictures) is for you! Also for use are the kitchen, the bathroom, such as one or two bikes if wanted! The apartment is located in Neukölln, the multicultural and popular part of berlin. A few blocks in the right direction you'll have the canal and the Weserstrasse with all its bars and little manufactured stores. If you want to come to Berlin and get the flair for which it's famous for, you are welcome to stay in our  very berlinesque creative musician artist apartment The big bedroom (see pictures) is for you! It has a full size bed, unlimited WiFi access, a little cupboard for your clothes. Feel free to use the kitchen, anytime til 1am. Same goes for the bathroom, the shower and bath tube. Also in case you want to ride bike during your stay in berlin, I can borrow you two bikes if necessary. If I'm home I will be working there a lot, bu
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the vibrant part of Berlin! Berlin-Neukölln is known for being the most multicultural district of the city, very creative and quite fashionable. Everything you'll need for your stay, you will get here. Very close by you find the Weserstrasse, with its bars and cafés, such as the spree canal and a park near by for some promenade. Late night kiosks, bio stores, markets - just around the corner.  Subway, bus very near. To the Hermannplatz it is only a 15 min walk.
notes: As you can see, the apartment has quite a distinguished style. The bathroom may be a bit small and quite alternative looking; I keep the flat clean, though. If you don't mind cats and are willing to venture into an artistic Berlin home, I am happy to welcome you here!
transit: Perfect public transport. The metro (U7), such as the bus (M(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)) are only five minutes walk away.
access: The big bedroom (see pictures) is for you! It has a full size bed, unlimited WiFi access, a little cupboard for your clothes. Feel free to use the kitchen, anytime til 1am. Same goes for the bathroom, the shower and bath tube. Also in case you want to ride bike during your stay in berlin, I can borrow you two bikes if necessary.
interaction: If I'm home I will be working there a lot, but am happy in giving you advices or helping you in any ways during your stay in Berlin. If you need a bike, you can borrow one from me!
house_rules: Smoking outside the kitchen window, only. Sexists, homophobs, racists and xenophobs are not welcome here. If there are questions during the stay, verbal and direct communication will be much appreciated.
host_about:
Multilingual, communicative, yet also focused on my work. 
Open minded and curious about almost everything.
Into the arts and working in those areas.
I also do offer astrological natal chart and transits readings for my guests, if interested!
My home is my castle. Come in, feel save and be gentle, too.
--

neighborhood_overview: Neukölln is one of the most frequently visited quarters in Berlin, since it has become very hip and known in the last few years. Luckily though, it hasn't lost his authentic charm with its multicultural neighbourhood, very good turkish food and low prices everywhere you go.
transit: You can find two U-Bahn lines in 5 minutes walking distance and a lot of busses that will bring you everywhere you want to go.

host_about:
Ich genieße  das Leben in vollen Zügen. Viel unterwegs, genieße ich es umso mehr nach Hause zu kommen und in meinem Zimmer entspannen zu können. 
Ich habe eine Schwäche für Frankreich und Thailändisches Essen. Selten kommt es vor, dass bei mir einmal keine Musik läuft denn mit Musik kann man am besten die schönen Momente im Leben einfangen!

name: Über den Dächern Neuköllns
summary: Deutsch/English: Ihr habt die Nase voll von teuren Hotels und sucht stattdessen eine private Unterkunft im Zentrum Neuköllns? Wunderbar dann seit ihr bei mir genau richtig! Ich biete euch meinen ganz persönlichen Rückzugsraum, einen großen Balkon, bei schönem Wetter einen direkten Blick auf den Fernsehturm und vieles mehr.
space: Ich biete euch einen Teil meines privaten Wohnraums an. Euch erwarten persönliche Eindrücke meiner vielen Reisen, ein großer Balkon, ein bequemes Doppelbett (200x180), frisch gewaschene Bettwäsche (2 Kissen und 2 Decken), eine Kommode mit ausreichend Platz für eure Sachen, eine Badewanne, frisch gewaschene Handtücher, eine Waschmaschine, einen Wäschetrockner, eine Nespresso-Kaffeemaschine (inkl. Kapseln), einen Herd (inkl. Backofen), Teller, Tassen, Töpfe, Pfannen, einen Wasserkocher und vieles mehr!
description: Deutsch/English: Ihr habt die Nase voll von teuren Hotels und sucht stattdessen eine private Unterkunft im Zentrum Neuköllns? Wunderbar dann seit ihr bei mir genau richtig! Ich biete euch meinen ganz persönlichen Rückzugsraum, einen großen Balkon, bei schönem Wetter einen direkten Blick auf den Fernsehturm und vieles mehr. Ich biete euch einen Teil meines privaten Wohnraums an. Euch erwarten persönliche Eindrücke meiner vielen Reisen, ein großer Balkon, ein bequemes Doppelbett (200x180), frisch gewaschene Bettwäsche (2 Kissen und 2 Decken), eine Kommode mit ausreichend Platz für eure Sachen, eine Badewanne, frisch gewaschene Handtücher, eine Waschmaschine, einen Wäschetrockner, eine Nespresso-Kaffeemaschine (inkl. Kapseln), einen Herd (inkl. Backofen), Teller, Tassen, Töpfe, Pfannen, einen Wasserkocher und vieles mehr! Küche Bad Schlafzimmer Wohnstube (sofern ich nicht zuhause bin) Neukölln ist in! Mindestens einmal im Monat schwärmt ein überregionales Magazin von der Aufbruchstimmung
neighborhood_overview: Neukölln ist in! Mindestens einmal im Monat schwärmt ein überregionales Magazin von der Aufbruchstimmung in Berlins Problembezirk. Tatsächlich hat Neukölln mit seiner erwachenden Kulturszene besonders jungen Berlin-Touristen einiges zu bieten. Schon seit 1999 gibt es zum Beispiel beim Festival 48 Stunden Neukölln ein Wochenende lang Theater, Lesungen und mehr zu sehen. Rund um den Reuterkiez ist eine lebendige Clubszene gewachsen und selbst in weiter entfernten Nebenstraßen öffnen kleine Galerien und Kneipen. Besonders in Nord-Neukölln, an der Grenze zu Kreuzberg zwischen Landwehrkanal und Sonnenallee, hat sich der Bezirk in den vergangenen drei Jahren gewandelt. Kreuzkölln nennen deshalb manche Berliner die Gegend, eine Art Hybrid-Kiez also. Und mittendrin: die Weserstraße. Dort reiht sich heute eine Kneipe an die nächste. Die Gäste sind junge Hauptstadttouristen, Backpacker und Studenten. Sie suchen in Neukölln das, was sie von Berlin erwarten: eine lässige Abgeranztheit, neue Musik,
notes: Die Wohnung befindet sich im Dachgeschoss. Einen Fahrstuhl gibt es nicht.
transit: Solltet ihr euch für mein Angebot entscheiden, dann wohnt ihr nur 5 Minuten vom bekannten Hermannplatz entfernt. Von dort aus fahren sowohl die U-Bahnen der Linie 7 und 8 als auch verschiedene Busse. Anreise: Solltet Ihr vom Berliner Hauptbahnhof kommen dann bietet sich der Bus M41 an. Dieser fährt direkt bis zum Hermannplatz und erspart euch das lästige umsteigen. Vom Flughafen Tegel erreicht ihr mich am besten wenn Ihr die U-Bahn der Linie 7 nehmt. Die Bahn fährt vom U-Bahnhof Jakob-Kaiser-Platz den ihr mit dem Bus 109 erreicht. Den Bus findet ihr direkt vor dem Hauptterminal.
access: Küche Bad Schlafzimmer Wohnstube (sofern ich nicht zuhause bin)
house_rules: In der Wohnstube darf geraucht werden. - Keine Partys - Kein Lärm / ab 22 Uhr Zimmerlautstärke

name: Cosy room in Neukölln!
summary: is just what you need to discover one of Berlins most vibrant districts with great bars, shops, affordable great food and a nice alternative scene. The room is in a shared flat with me- so great host included! ;)
space: This is room in a shared flat with me. I am fun, i speak fluent German, English, Portuguese and a bit of Spanish
description: is just what you need to discover one of Berlins most vibrant districts with great bars, shops, affordable great food and a nice alternative scene. The room is in a shared flat with me- so great host included! ;) This is room in a shared flat with me. I am fun, i speak fluent German, English, Portuguese and a bit of Spanish You can use the spacey kitchen which fits a bunch of people for common meals . Bathroom with bathtub, shower and washing machine. I got wifi here. I am open minded, love hosting and know my way around town and most of its neighborhoods ;) I tend to lean on the alternative side of the spectrum and am not to much into posh stuff. I enjoy hitting Bars and can show you some great hangout and party spots in various scenes of the this metropolitan heaven.  I am totally into cooking sometime together or go out to one of all the delicious places in this area. I am a history and city nerd and can easily be loured into looong talks about Berlins past. I would love to suggest
neighborhood_overview: NEUKÖLLN is awesome!  It got all you need. Its super authentic. Good Bars, great food, nice Parks, cool culture associations, artsy places, fun shops and all you would expected from Berlin. As said before its also easy to reach the rest of Berlin. My flat is right between Weserstraßenkiez, Schillerkiez and Rixdorf (no worries you will find out what those names mean ;) )
transit: You are well connected! UBahn Karl- Marx Strasse (U7) is five minutes walking and gives you esay excess to the inner city and Kreuzberg . S Bahn Sonnenallee (Ringbahn) is ten minutes walking for here. The Sbahn brings your right into Friedrichshain, Prenzlauer Berg and Wedding. Also a good connection is Metro Bus M41 that takes your straight to the train station and Mitte with all its sights.
access: You can use the spacey kitchen which fits a bunch of people for common meals . Bathroom with bathtub, shower and washing machine. I got wifi here.
interaction: I am open minded, love hosting and know my way around town and most of its neighborhoods ;) I tend to lean on the alternative side of the spectrum and am not to much into posh stuff. I enjoy hitting Bars and can show you some great hangout and party spots in various scenes of the this metropolitan heaven.  I am totally into cooking sometime together or go out to one of all the delicious places in this area. I am a history and city nerd and can easily be loured into looong talks about Berlins past. I would love to suggest you good places around town and the neighbor hood. Just aks or text me.
house_rules: respectful, open minded, polite and peaceful No homophobia, racism and so on... Smoking only  in the kitchen and with the window open. Please be respectful to my neighbors, especially when arriving at night. Clean up what you used ;) Unfortunately no pets This is an off shoes apartment- so please remove your shoes every time you enter and please take care not to spill any liquids or put dents in it. It stains easily Important NOTE: Downloading of music and movies in not allowed due to the German law. The fines are extremely high and you need to pay them in case of breaking this house rule! You may ask us in case you have any question or problem during your stay. We are happy to help Please feel your room like home so threat it accordingly In case of key lost, the charge is 50 € to made a new one
host_about:
Hey I am Patrick. Born and groomed in Hamburg and other parts of Northern Germany i now live in Berlin. I love this place. I traveled in many countries and lived in Portugal, Brazil as well as the United States.  I speak German, English and Portuguese fluently. 

I love meeting new people through traveling and hosting! 
I like Berlin for daily insperation and just the cosmoplitan craziness and most of all the freedom it overs in so many parts of life. Just a spacial place and a special time here. 
I do work here for a social buisness Start Up, called soulbottles (check us out: (URL HIDDEN) trying to make the world a bit more plastic free everyday. 

I like Bars, many a kind of music, going out in Berlin and sports.
I am fascinated by cities, societies and history.  And enjoy talking about theses things a lot. 

Before i had a whole room spare to share out i used to let people crush my coach on good old CouchSurfing. So if you wonder about my hosting capabilities have a look at my refrences over there : (URL HIDDEN)

Looking forward to meet you peeps. Cheers

name: Big, Bright, Beautiful Room in Kreuzberg
summary: The 30m2 room is beautifully bright with huge windows and high ceilings. It's a really chilled apartment with the best housemates, perfect both for someone looking for a quiet place to work or as a base from which to explore the city.
description: The 30m2 room is beautifully bright with huge windows and high ceilings. It's a really chilled apartment with the best housemates, perfect both for someone looking for a quiet place to work or as a base from which to explore the city. We are a 5 minute walk away from Hermannplatz, from where you can get on both the U7 and the U8, and there's also the M41 that runs from the end of our road - so we're very well connected! There are also tonnes of Bars and Cafes within easy walking distance.

house_rules: Only slightly unusual thing about this bedroom is that you have to walk through another room to get to it. The 'corridor' room is not always occupied, and is more like a living room, but it may be that I will be sleeping on the sofa bed in there.
host_about:
I'm a musician and translator from Bristol. I love musicals, reading, meeting new people and learning new things, travelling, food... 

I'm sociable, easygoing and trustworthy.

name: Sunny&modern 40 m² flat in Neukölln
summary: For the day time you can find lovely coffee places (LIpopette Coffee Delhi on the big and multi cultural Herrmannstraße, Ungeheuer and Cafe Loislane in the nearby located Emser Str.) For a great leisure time or the sports fans among you guys, the Tempelhofer Freiheit (the old abandoned airport which is used for fun activites or relaxing in the sun) is located in direct vicinity.  For the nighttime you ca find many bars in the Schiller Kiez or the Körnerkiez (5 minutes walking) distance.
space: Hello dear Berlin visitors, I am happy to be able to host you for your time in Berlin. My flat is located in the hip and charming area of Neukölln, Berlin. It is a 40 m² flat with a separate kitchen, separate bathroom and a living room/bedroom with a small balcony to the sunny southern side.The area offers lots of opportunities during the day as well as during the night time. name: Sonnige Kuschelwohnung am Kreuzberg mit Balkon
summary: Willkommen in meiner süßen kleinen Wohnung in Tempelhof/Kreuzberg um die Ecke vom beliebten Bergmannkiez!  Mir ist es sehr wichtig, ein gemütliches Zuhause zu haben, wo man sich gleich wohl fühlt, wenn man ankommt. Darauf habe ich in meiner Wohnung also höchsten Wert gelegt und wenn ich auf Reisen bin, dürft ihr gerne einziehen! Perfekt für zwei Personen, da das Haus sehr ruhig ist bitte ich darum zum Feiern die schönen Bars und Clubs zu nutzen :)
space: Allgemein: - Handtücher und Bettwäsche sind enthalten - Heizung einfach aufdrehen, wird kuschelig warm - sehr gute Matratze Küche: - ein super Mixer für Suppen, Smoothies, uvm. (Vitamix) - Herd mit Backofen - Kühlschrank mit Gefrierfach - super ausgestattet, viel Geschirr, Gewürze, Espressokocher, Wasserkocher, Mixer s.o., Backzubehör Für das Musikerherz: - Yamaha E-Piano (Clavinova S406),  - eine Ukulele - vielleicht auch meine Gitarre, wenn ich sie gerade nicht brauche Für die Businesspeople: - ein Multifunktionsdrucker, der druckt, scannt, kopiert und mit dem man sich via WLAN verbinden kann - nach Absprache einen Gastaccount auf meinem iMac - WLAN mit bis zu 100.000 Mbit Geschwindigkeit

neighborhood_overview: Eine sehr ruhige Nachbarschaft, der REWE Supermarkt direkt gegenüber. In der Manfred-Richthofen-Straße (200m) gibt es alles mögliche, z.B. das schöne Café Luftbrücke, einen Bioladen, Rossmann, Apotheke, diverse Restaurants und Spätshops.
transit: 550m zur U Bahn Haltestelle "Platz der Luftbrücke" 160m zum Bus 248 Haltestelle "Bayernring"
interaction: Da ich meist selbst auf Reisen bin, kann ich während eures Aufenthalts nicht 100% erreichbar sein, aber ich werde mich schnellstmöglich um euer Anliegen kümmern!
house_rules: - Bitte stark Rücksicht auf meine lieben Nachbarn nehmen. Es ist insgesamt ein sehr ruhiges Haus. Zum Feiern bitte in die schönen Bars und Clubs Berlins umziehen :) - Nachts im Treppenhaus bitte Flüsterton - Bitte Schuhe ausziehen in der Wohnung - Rauchen bitte nur auf dem Balkon
host_about:
Huhu, ich bin Eva, 25 Jahre alt, komme aus der Südpfalz und wohne in Berlin. Ich bin als Berufsmusikerin sehr viel in Deutschland unterwegs und verreise auch sehr gerne durch die Welt.

Ich habe keine Haustiere, freue mich aber immer, wenn welche da sind!

summary: Just a few minutes walking distance from the subway you will find a cosy apartment in the center of Berlin. Nearby see the market on Wednesdays and Saturdays. 4 Guests can share 2 double beds, further guests would have an extra bed or the bed-couch. Public parking lots without fee at the streets nearby.

name: Cosy apartment in Friedrichshain.
summary: My charming one room apartment is located in the heart of Friedrichshain. It's a cosy area with a lot of nice cafés, bars and fashionable boutiques just around the corner, and easy access to the neighboring areas Mitte, Kreuzberg and Prenzlauer Berg.
space: A charming bright one room apartment suitable for two persons. Fully equipped kitchen, bed sheets and towels for your use,  and free access to Wi-Fi.
description: My charming one room apartment is located in the heart of Friedrichshain. It's a cosy area with a lot of nice cafés, bars and fashionable boutiques just around the corner, and easy access to the neighboring areas Mitte, Kreuzberg and Prenzlauer Berg. A charming bright one room apartment suitable for two persons. Fully equipped kitchen, bed sheets and towels for your use,  and free access to Wi-Fi. The flat is in the heart of Friedrichshain, one of the hip and urban boroughs of Berlin, directly in the city center. The area is full of nice cafés, boutiques and bars. On Saturdays you can visit the grocery market, which sells a lot of nice local food, or the flea market on Sundays, just one minute walk from the apartment. There is a tram station directly in front of the door, or 3 minutes walk to the next subway station Frankfurter Tor. You can reach the boroughs Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg and Kreuzberg very easily in 10 – 20 min.

name: Sunny big room with balcony
summary: Nice and sunny room in the heart of Prenzlauerberg just 5 minutes walking from Helmoltzplatz. Very connected to the rest of the city by tram ( 8 min to Alex, 5 min to Mauerpark, 10 min to Frankfurtertor) and by s-bhan (5 minute walk). The room is large and have all the comfort you can need plus a very big balcony! In the apartment we live in 4 , Gerard, Johanna, their two kids and the lovely dog Hoffman. We are easygoing people, we eat vegetarian and like the company of open mind travelers.

name: Large and bright apt in P'Berg
space: Situated close to Eberswalderstraße and around the corner from Mauerpark with its flea market and arts performances as well as Kastanienallee with its dozens of cafes for Sunday brunch is my large 85 sq meter apartment. The apartment has a wooden floor, high ceilings with stucco decoration and is kept in warm crème-color and brown tones. It is situated at the southern side of the building in the third floor which guarantees lots of sun all day long. Two bedrooms with beds of 2,0 x 1,4 meters provide enough space for a total of 4 guests. For your stay you can use the nice and modern kitchen that features an oven, a dish washer, a washing machine and a dryer for your cloth.  The wireless internet allows you to research latest events in Berlin or share your experiences with friends and family at home. With the fixed phone you can make reservations at the places you want to visit or confirm opening hours. Public transportation is great with M10 right in front of the door, U(PHONE NUMBER HI

house_rules: Welcome to my place, there is one key house rule: Please be respectful with the level of noise in the hallway, so neighbors are not disturbed. Moreover, if you are interested, please check TV and balcony usage or the possibility of traditional German breakfast with me. Once you depart it would great if you could put take off your bed sheets, leave an entry in the guest book and drop the key in my mailbox "Kluge".
host_about:
A passionate traveller and big fan of Berlin. I've lived in the US, in China, French part of Switzerland (Romandie) and Spain.

Besides traveling my other passion is entrepreneurship and start-ups.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer in Zweier-WG im Bergmannkiez
summary: Hi! Wir freuen uns auf euren Besuch in unserer gemütlichen WG, in der ihr mit Marula oder mir wohnen werdet. Wenn ihr Lust habt bei uns zu wohnen, schreibt doch ein paar Sätze zu euch! :)  Come visit us in our beautiful shared flat in Kreuzberg. You will share the flat either with me or Marula. Please tell us a bit about you if you're interested  in staying with us! :)
